original: Varen Calis
string: 瓦伦·卡利斯

original: Varen
string: 瓦伦

original: Irgnar Round-Winter
string: 伊格纳尔·轮冬

original: Irgnar
string: 伊格纳尔

original: Amara Baneley
string: 阿玛拉·班利

original: Amara
string: 阿玛拉

original: Tabelle Dalen
string: 塔贝莱·达伦

original: Tabelle
string: 塔贝莱

original: Windhelm
string: 風舵城

original: Riften
string: 裂谷城

original: Whiterun
string: 白漫城

original: Solitude
string: 独孤城

original: Jarl Balgruuf wants to remind everyone that his children are all well and that the rumours about his youngest son are false.
string: 领主巴尔古夫希望提醒大家，他的孩子们都安然无恙，关于他小儿子的传言都是假的.

original: There is no need to spread falsehood and anyone responsible for the rumours will be arrested and sent to jail.
string: 无需散布谣言，任何传播谣言者都将被逮捕入狱.

original: The Honeybrew Meadery wants to remind everyone to not throw their trash or empty their chamber pot in the White River for the next 2 days.
string: 蜜酿蜜酒庄提醒各位，未来两天内请勿在白河丢弃垃圾或倾倒夜壶.

original: This is the days the meadery will draw water from the river for their next batch of mead.
string: 这几天酒坊会从河里取水，用于酿造下一批蜂蜜酒.

original: Fresh-baked sweetrolls from the Bannered Mare! None finer in all of Skyrim! Come buy your sweetroll before they are all gone.
string: 来自悬旗母马旅店的新鲜出炉的甜卷！整个天际省都找不到更好的了！快来买你的甜卷吧，趁它们还没卖光.

original: They are baked daily and are always fresh! Only at the Bannered Mare, the number one entertainment location in Whiterun.
string: 它们每天新鲜出炉，保证美味！仅在白漫城首屈一指的娱乐场所--悬旗母马客栈独家供应.

original: Arcadia's Cauldron offers remedies for all ailments: Ataxia, Rattles, Rockjoint or Witbane. Just go and ask the wise alchemist!
string: 阿尔凯迪雅之釜提供治疗所有疾病的良方:运动失调症，响尾症，石肤症或智蚀症.只需前往询问那位智慧的炼金术士即可！

original: You'll never find any better than Arcadia's Cauldron!
string: 你绝对找不到比阿尔凯迪雅之釜更好的地方了！

original: Arcadia wants to remind everyone that she helped the people of Whiterun for 20 years! 20 years!
string: 阿尔凯迪雅想要提醒大家，她帮助白漫城的居民已经20年了！整整20年！

original: She has no intention to go back to the Imperial City. She's a true professional and will continue to sell the best ingredients and potions to all.
string: 她无意返回帝都.她是一位真正的专业人士，将继续向所有人出售最优质的原料和药剂.

original: If you are looking to protect yourself or to deal some damage, visit the Warmaiden's for the finest steel.
string: 若想寻求自保或造成伤害，请前往战争少女铁匠铺选购最精良的钢制武器.

original: A warrior's steel makes all the difference!
string: 战士的钢铁之躯，决定一切！

original: The Warmainden's offer everything from boots to gauntlets and from the sharpest dagger to the sturdiest warhammer.
string: 战备商行提供从靴子到护手的一切装备，从最锋利的匕首到最坚固的战锤，一应俱全.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, hear my words! The mighty Gildergreen, sacred tree of Kynareth's temple, stands withered and weak.
string: 白漫城的子民们，听我一言！宏伟的吉娜瑞丝神庙圣树--金树，如今已枯萎凋零，虚弱不堪.

original: Once a symbol of life and renewal, now it suffers under time's cruel hand! Priestess Danica Pure-Spring seeks a champion,
string: 它曾是生命与复苏的象征，如今却在时光的残酷摧残下凋零！祭司"洁春"丹尼卡正在寻找一位勇士，

original: a soul brave enough to travel the perilous road to Eldergleam Sanctuary. Only its blessed sap can restore the tree's former glory!
string: 一位敢于踏上通往古光圣所险途的勇敢灵魂.唯有它那受祝福的树液，才能让这棵树重现昔日荣光！

original: Will no hero rise to answer Kynareth's call? Seek the temple, speak with the priestess, and bring hope to Whiterun once more!
string: 难道没有英雄响应吉娜莱丝的召唤挺身而出吗？前往神庙，与女祭司交谈，为白漫城再次带来希望！

original: Let the winds carry news of your deeds to the very gods!
string: 让风将你的功绩传颂至诸神耳畔！

original: Rejoice, people of Whiterun! The sacred Gildergreen stands tall once more, its branches brimming with life!
string: 白漫城的子民们，欢庆吧！神圣的金树再度屹立，枝头生机盎然！

original: No longer does its withered form cast sorrow upon the temple: Kynareth's blessing has returned!
string: 它那枯萎的形态不再为神殿带来悲伤:凯娜瑞丝的祝福已然回归！

original: Through courage and determination, a hero answered the call, braving the dangers of Eldergleam Sanctuary to bring forth its sacred gift.
string: 凭借勇气与决心，一位英雄响应了召唤，勇闯古光圣所的重重险阻，将其神圣的馈赠带回世间.

original: Now, the winds whisper their name, and the gods themselves take note of their deeds! Come, see the tree's splendor, and give thanks to Kynareth!
string: 如今，风儿低语着他们的名字，诸神也亲自关注着他们的功绩！来吧，见证这棵树的辉煌，并向凯娜瑞丝献上感谢！

original: May its renewed strength remind us that even in the darkest times, life can always flourish anew!
string: 愿它重获的力量提醒我们，即使在最黑暗的时刻，生命也总能重新绽放！

original: By order of the Jarl, new bounties are available to all able bodied men and women of the hold.
string: 奉领主之令，本领地所有健壮男女均可领取新的悬赏任务.

original: A reward will be offered to anyone who completes any bounties.
string: 完成任何赏金任务者，都将获得酬劳.

original: See the posted bounties by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: A new bounty regarding giants was approved by the Jarl and distributed to innkeepers. A giant camp is causing problems for travelers.
string: 领主批准了一项关于巨人的新悬赏，并已分发给各旅店老板.一个巨人营地正给旅行者带来麻烦.

original: This bounty is available to all adventurers and bounty hunters.
string: 所有冒险者和赏金猎人都可领取这份悬赏.

original: See the posted bounty by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: A dragon was sighted and established its nest in the hold.
string: 一条巨龙现身，并在领地内筑巢.

original: The presence of that dragon is a threat to the safety of the Hold and the Jarl has issued a bounty for the dragon.
string: 那条龙的存在威胁着领地的安全，领主已发布悬赏捉拿此龙.

original: See the posted bounty by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, hear me! The town of Helgen now lies in ruins!
string: 白漫城的居民们，听我说！海尔根镇现已化为废墟！

original: Travelers bring news of its destruction following the capture of the Jarl of Windhelm, the leader of the Stormcloak, Ulfric Stormcloak himself.
string: 旅行者们带来了风舵城陷落后的消息，风暴斗篷的领袖，风舵城的领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷本人已被俘.

original: We do not know what is the cause of the attack, the most likely cause is the stormcloaks raided the town to free their leader.
string: 我们不知道袭击的起因是什么，最可能的原因是风暴斗篷袭击了城镇以解救他们的领袖.

original: Others speak of more fantastical causes, even a mythical dragon that appeared from nowhere.
string: 还有人说起更离奇的缘由，甚至提到一条凭空出现的巨龙.

original: A beast of legend, a creature of fire and fury, the likes of which have not been witnessed since the time of the Dragon Cult! Can it be true?
string: 传说中的野兽，火焰与狂怒的化身，自龙教时代以来便未曾得见！这竟是真的吗？

original: Have the creatures of legend returned? The attack was close to the hold, Jarl Balgruuf will not gamble with Whiterun's safety!
string: 传说中的生物又回来了吗？这次袭击离领地很近，领主巴尔古夫不会拿白漫城的安全冒险！

original: By his order, our gates stand sealed to outsiders until more is known. To prepare for the worst, we ask merchants to stock their store
string: 根据他的命令，在了解更多情况之前，我们的城门将对外人关闭.为做最坏打算，我们要求商人们备足库存

original: and for the citizens to take shelter if danger comes! Pray to the Divines for protection, for none know what horrors may yet descend upon Whiterun!
string: 也让市民们在危险来临时有处避难！向圣灵祈祷以求庇护吧，因为无人知晓还有何等恐怖会降临白漫城！

original: People of Whiterun, listen well! Helgen, once a stronghold of the Empire, now lies in ruins! A disaster unseen in centuries has befallen Skyrim.
string: 白漫城的子民们，听好了！海尔根，曾是帝国的要塞，如今已成废墟！一场数百年未见的灾难已降临天际.

original: Some claim it was the civil war: Stormcloaks striking to free their captured leader, Ulfric Stormcloak.
string: 有人声称这是内战所致:风暴斗篷为解救其被俘的领袖乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷而发动的突袭.

original: Others speak of something far worse: a dragon, a beast of legend! Could the rumors be true?
string: 还有人说起更可怕的事:一条龙，传说中的巨兽！难道传言是真的？

original: A dragon, born of fire and fury, returning from the depths of time itself? No man has seen such horrors since the Dragon Cult walked Tamriel!
string: 一条诞生于火焰与狂怒的龙，自时间的深渊归来？自龙祭祀行走于泰姆瑞尔以来，无人曾见过如此恐怖的景象！

original: If true, none can say what terror comes next! By decree of the Jarl, the gates shall remain sealed to outsiders until the truth is known!
string: 若此言属实，无人能料接下来将面临何等恐怖！遵照领主之令，在真相查明前，城门将对外来者保持关闭！

original: The Jarl has mandated the court wizard with the mission on how to best protect the city against dragons if the worst of the rumours are true.
string: 领主已命令宫廷法师，若最糟糕的传闻属实，需研究如何最好地保护城市免受巨龙侵袭.

original: Merchants, prepare your stock. Citizens, stay vigilant, for Skyrim may stand at the edge of disaster!
string: 商人们，备好你们的货物.市民们，保持警惕，因为天际可能正站在灾难的边缘！

original: Citizens of Whiterun, rejoice! The beast that threatened our hold has been slain!
string: 白漫城的子民们，欢庆吧！威胁我们领地的巨兽已被斩杀！

original: Brave warriors stood against the dragon at the Western Watchtower, and by steel and magic, they struck it down!
string: 英勇的战士们在西部哨塔前迎战巨龙，凭借钢铁与魔法，将其击落！

original: No longer shall we tremble beneath its shadow! But hear me well: for a greater revelation shakes the very foundations of Skyrim!
string: 我们将不再颤抖于其阴影之下！但请听好:一个更重大的启示正在撼动天际的根基！

original: The ancient power of the Dragonborn has awakened! Before our very eyes, one among us absorbed the dragon's soul, wielding a force long lost to time!
string: 龙裔的古老力量已然觉醒！就在我们眼前，其中一人吸收了巨龙的灵魂，驾驭着久已失传的力量！

original: Akatosh has blessed us by sending its messenger to aid us in this crisis. And now, from the peaks of High Hrothgar, the Greybeards have spoken!
string: 阿卡托什已降下恩典，派遣其使者来协助我们度过这场危机.而今，来自霍斯加修道院之巅，灰胡子们已发出谕示！

original: The voice of the mountain echoes across the land, calling this Dragonborn to their sacred halls.
string: 山峦之声回荡在大地之上，召唤着这位龙裔前往其神圣殿堂.

original: What knowledge will they reveal? What destiny awaits? Rejoice, Whiterun! But watch the skies, for this is only the beginning!
string: 他们将揭示何种知识？又将迎来怎样的命运？欢庆吧，白漫城！但请仰望天空，因为这仅仅是个开始！

original: People of Whiterun, hear me and rejoice! The dragon that threatened our hold has fallen!
string: 白漫城的子民们，请听我说，欢庆吧！威胁我们领地的巨龙已被击败！

original: After a surprise attack by the dragon, the guards of Whiterun, led by Ireleth, met the beast at the Western Watchtower,
string: 在巨龙发动突袭后，白漫城的守卫们在伊瑞莱斯的带领下，于西部哨塔迎战了那头巨兽.

original: standing firm against fire and fury. Through courage and strength, the monster was struck down, its reign of terror ended!
string: 在烈火与狂怒中屹立不倒.凭借勇气与力量，怪物被击倒，其恐怖统治就此终结！

original: But this victory carries a deeper revelation: the Dragonborn has returned! One among us wielded a power unseen in centuries,
string: 但这场胜利揭示了一个更深的真相:龙裔已经归来！我们之中有人掌握了数个世纪以来未曾显现的力量.

original: absorbing the very essence of the fallen beast! The ancient bloodline has awakened once more!
string: 汲取了这头堕落野兽的精髓！古老的血脉再次苏醒！

original: Even the heavens acknowledge this moment, for from High Hrothgar, the Greybeards have spoken!
string: 就连上天也认可这一刻，因为灰胡子们已从霍斯加修道院发声！

original: Their voices shake the mountains, summoning the Dragonborn to their halls. What wisdom will they impart? What destiny awaits?
string: 他们的声音撼动群山，召唤龙裔前往殿堂.他们将传授何等智慧？何等命运静候降临？

original: This is a new dawn for Skyrim: watch the skies, for our fate now lies in the hands of legend!
string: 这是天际的新黎明:仰望天空吧，因为我们的命运如今已掌握在传奇手中！

original: People of Whiterun, bear witness to a moment that shall be sung in taverns and carved into legend! The beast darkening our skies has been slained!
string: 白漫城的子民们，请见证这将被传唱于酒馆，铭刻于传奇的时刻！遮蔽我们天空的恶兽已被斩杀！

original: Warriors stood against its wrath at the Western Watchtower, and through steel and sorcery, they struck down the beast that threatened our hold!
string: 勇士们在西部哨塔前直面其怒火，凭借钢铁与法术，击倒了威胁我们据点的巨兽！

original: But this is no ordinary victory. A great truth has been revealed: the Dragonborn walks among us! With ancient power unseen for centuries,
string: 但这并非寻常的胜利.一个伟大的真相已然揭晓:龙裔行走在我们中间！携带着数个世纪未曾显现的古老力量，

original: they absorbed the dragon's very soul, wielding the voice of the gods themselves! And now, the mountains tremble,
string: 他们竟吞噬了巨龙的灵魂，执掌着众神之音！如今，群山为之震颤，

original: the heavens acknowledge their return: for the Greybeards have spoken! Their call shakes the very peaks of High Hrothgar,
string: 上天认可他们的回归:因为灰胡子们已发声！他们的呼唤撼动了霍斯加修道院的群峰.

original: summoning the Dragonborn to their sacred halls. What wisdom shall they impart? What fate now stands before Skyrim?
string: 召唤龙裔前往他们的神圣殿堂.他们将传授何种智慧？如今何种命运正悬于天际之上？

original: The age of myth has returned. Watch the skies, Whiterun! For the world will never be the same again!
string: 神话时代已然回归.白漫城，仰望天际吧！因为世界将从此截然不同！

original: Citizens of Whiterun, let your voices rise in triumph! The dragon that darkened our skies has been slain!
string: 白漫城的子民们，高唱凯歌吧！那遮蔽我们天空的恶龙已被斩杀！

original: Through strength and valor, our warriors faced the beast at the Western Watchtower, and now its lifeless form lies upon the earth!
string: 凭借力量与勇气，我们的战士在西境哨塔直面了那头野兽，如今它已化作一具冰冷的尸体横陈于大地之上！

original: But in victory, a revelation shakes the very foundation of Skyrim: the Dragonborn lives! With a power unseen since the days of legend,
string: 但在胜利之际，一个启示动摇了天际的根基:龙裔还活着！拥有自传说时代以来未曾显现的力量，

original: they absorbed the fallen dragon's very soul! What destiny awaits the one who wields such strength?
string: 他们竟吞噬了陨落巨龙的灵魂！拥有如此力量之人，将迎来怎样的命运？

original: Even the winds have answered, carrying the mighty call of the Greybeards down from High Hrothgar.
string: 就连风也做出了回应，将灰胡子们从霍斯加修道院传来的强大呼唤传遍四方.

original: Their voices shake the mountains, summoning the Dragonborn to their ancient halls. What wisdom will they reveal? What truths will be spoken?
string: 他们的声音撼动群山，召唤龙裔前往古老的殿堂.他们将揭示何种智慧？又将诉说怎样的真相？

original: The world watches, and history is written anew! Whiterun stands witness to a saga that has only just begun!
string: 世界在注视，历史正被重新书写！白漫城见证了一段刚刚拉开序幕的传奇！

original: Citizens of Whiterun, hear this! The age of legend stands before our very eyes: the Dragonborn has accomplished the impossible!
string: 白漫城的子民们，听好了！传奇的时代就在我们眼前:龙裔完成了不可能的任务！

original: Within the halls of Dragonsreach, a great beast has been captured! The mighty Odahviing, a dragon born of the ancient world,
string: 在龙临宫的大厅里，一头巨兽已被捕获！那便是强大的傲达威英，一头诞生于远古世界的巨龙.

original: was bound in the palace that once served as a trap for his kin! By wit and strength, the Dragonborn lured the beast into the hold,
string: 曾被束缚于那座曾是其同族陷阱的宫殿中！凭借智慧与力量，龙裔将巨兽诱入了要塞.

original: ensnaring him beneath steel and sorcery! This daring action was done with the help of the Jarl and the guards.
string: 用钢铁与魔法将他困住！这一大胆行动得到了领主和守卫们的协助.

original: After the capture, the Dragonborn interrogated the dragon to learn where the dragon leader was hiding. From the witnesses, we have learned the truth:
string: 捕获之后，龙裔审问了那条龙，以探知龙族首领藏身何处.从目击者口中，我们得知了真相:

original: Alduin, the World-Eater, ruler of the ancient Dragon Cult, has returned! A force beyond mortal reckoning, hidden in a region unreachable by man.
string: 奥杜因，世界吞噬者，古代龙祭祀的统治者，已经归来！这是一股凡人无法估量的力量，藏匿于人类无法触及的领域.

original: The Dragonborn released the dragon after the promise of carrying the Dragonborn to the location of Alduin.
string: 龙裔在巨龙承诺将其带往奥杜因所在地后，释放了它.

original: The mighty Dragonborn is now preparing for the final showdown with Alduin and putting an end to the dragon crisis.
string: 强大的龙裔正为与奥杜因的最终决战做准备，以终结这场巨龙危机.

original: Let's all remember this day! The Dragonborn stands as a force beyond reckoning, and Whiterun bears witness to history reborn!
string: 让我们铭记这一天！龙裔已成为一股不可估量的力量，而白漫城正见证着历史的再生！

original: This battle will decide the fate of Nirn itself! Let all in Whiterun remember this day, for history is being written before our eyes!
string: 这场战斗将决定奈恩本身的命运！让白漫城的所有人都铭记这一天，因为历史正在我们眼前书写！

original: Let us pray to Akatosh that the Dragonborn shall stand victorious!
string: 让我们向阿卡托什祈祷，愿龙裔凯旋而归！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear this! The age of dragons has ended, and Skyrim stands victorious!
string: 天际的子民们，听好了！巨龙的时代已经终结，天际赢得了胜利！

original: The World-Eater, the terror of time itself, Alduin, has been vanquished! The Dragonborn, Skyrim's champion, ventured beyond the mortal realm,
string: 世界吞噬者，时间本身的恐怖，奥杜因已被击败！龙裔，天际的冠军，已踏入凡人领域之外，

original: facing the beast in the halls of Sovngarde itself! No warrior, no army, no empire could halt Alduin's wrath,
string: 在松加德殿堂直面那巨兽！没有战士，没有军队，没有帝国能阻挡奥杜因的怒火，

original: yet the Dragonborn alone stood against him in battle! And there, beneath the eternal sky of the fallen, the World-Eater was defeated,
string: 然而，唯有龙裔在战斗中独自挺身对抗他！就在那逝者永恒的苍穹之下，世界吞噬者终被击败.

original: his reign of terror broken for all time! Let Skyrim rejoice! No longer shall dragons darken our skies with fire and fury!
string: 他的恐怖统治已被永远终结！让天际欢庆吧！巨龙再也不能用火焰与怒火遮蔽我们的天空！

original: The winds carry whispers of the Dragonborn's triumph, and even the gods themselves have witnessed their deeds!
string: 风儿低语着龙裔的胜利，就连诸神也亲眼见证了他们的功绩！

original: History has been rewritten, and legend has been forged anew! The end of time has been cancelled!
string: 历史已被重写，传奇已获新生！时间终结已被取消！

original: May all give thanks to Akatosh and the Divines, and may the Dragonborn walk among us, the hero of an age reborn!
string: 愿众人感恩阿卡托什与众神，愿龙裔行走于我们之间，这位时代重生的英雄！

original: Raise your voices in triumph, citizens of Skyrim! The Dragonborn has claimed victory over Alduin, the World-Eater!
string: 高唱凯歌吧，天际的公民们！龙裔已经战胜了世界吞噬者奥杜因！

original: A battle beyond reckoning, fought not upon our soil, but in the halls of Sovngarde itself!
string: 一场超乎想象的战斗，并非在我们的土地上展开，而是在松加德的大殿之中！

original: By strength, courage, and the voice of the gods, our champion has cast down the ancient terror! And now, let Skyrim sing of this day!
string: 凭借力量，勇气与诸神之声，我们的冠军已击溃远古之恐怖！而今，让天际传颂此日之荣光！

original: The bards have composed a new song: Tale of the Tongues, a hymn retelling the despair facing Alduin and how the dragonborn stood against all odds.
string: 吟游诗人们创作了一首新歌:龙语者传说，这首颂歌重述了面对奥杜因时的绝望，以及龙裔如何逆势而战.

original: A melody that shall echo through mead halls for generations to come! No longer shall we whisper of dragons in fear: now we sing of their defeat!
string: 一首将在蜜酒大厅中世代回响的旋律！我们不再因恐惧而低语恶龙之名:如今我们高歌它们的败亡！

original: Tonight, the streets shall be filled with revelry, the taverns overflowing with song!
string: 今夜，街头将充满欢庆，酒馆将歌声满溢！

original: Let all hear the tale of the Dragonborn, and let none forget the hero who rose to meet destiny!
string: 让所有人都聆听龙裔的传说，让所有人都铭记那位挺身迎接命运的英雄！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear me! Today, Skyrim stands free! Alduin, the World-Eater, has been vanquished!
string: 天际的子民们，听我说！今天，天际自由了！世界吞噬者奥杜因已被击败！

original: The Dragonborn has fulfilled destiny, striking down the ancient beast within the halls of Sovngarde!
string: 龙裔已履行宿命，在松加德殿堂内击倒了那远古巨兽！

original: But victory does not come without cost. Many warriors fell in the battles against Alduin's kin.
string: 但胜利并非毫无代价.许多战士在与奥杜因同族的战斗中牺牲了.

original: The scars of war remain, and the echoes of those lost still linger in the winds.
string: 战争的伤痕犹在，逝者的回响仍于风中萦绕.

original: As we rejoice in the Dragonborn's triumph, let us also remember those who fought so Skyrim could see this day!
string: 当我们欢庆龙裔的胜利时，也请铭记那些为天际能迎来今日而浴血奋战的英灵！

original: Raise a toast to the Dragonborn, but do not forget the warriors who stood against the darkness.
string: 为龙裔举杯，但莫忘那些挺身对抗黑暗的战士们.

original: Their strength carried us through Skyrim's greatest trial!
string: 他们的力量带领我们度过了天际最严峻的考验！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, we are told Alduin has fallen, struck down by the Dragonborn in the halls of Sovngarde.
string: 天际的公民们，我们被告知奥杜因已经陨落，在松加德的大厅中被龙裔击倒.

original: The World-Eater has been vanquished, and Skyrim stands free of his shadow!
string: 世界吞噬者已被击败，天际已摆脱其阴影，重获自由！

original: Yet, dragons still fly. Their power remains, their presence undeniable. What will they do now their leader is slain?
string: 然而，巨龙仍在翱翔.它们的力量犹存，其存在不容忽视.如今首领已逝，它们将何去何从？

original: Will they engage in a war of succession? Will they disband as a united force? Will they leave Skyrim or Tamriel?
string: 他们会发动继承战争吗？他们会解散联合部队吗？他们会离开天际或泰姆瑞尔吗？

original: Rejoice, but remain vigilant, for no one knows what lies in the future.
string: 欢欣鼓舞，但保持警惕，因为无人知晓未来会带来什么.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, hear this! Skyrim stands victorious, and Whiterun has played its part in forging this triumph!
string: 白漫城的子民们，听好了！天际省已取得胜利，而白漫城在这场胜利的铸就中贡献了自己的力量！

original: Alduin, the World-Eater, has been vanquished, and the Dragonborn now stands as a legend beyond reckoning!
string: 世界吞噬者奥杜因已被击败，龙裔如今成为了无可估量的传奇！

original: But let it not be forgotten that the halls of Dragonsreach served as the stage for this battle's turning point!
string: 但切莫忘记，龙临宫的大厅正是这场战役的转折点所在！

original: The Jarl, ever the protector of Whiterun, lent his wisdom and strength to aid the Dragonborn in trapping the mighty Odahviing.
string: 白漫城的领主，作为这座城市的永恒守护者，以其智慧与力量协助龙裔成功捕获了强大的傲达威英.

original: The guards of Whiterun stood ready, steel against claw, ensuring the beast was bound!
string: 白漫城的守卫们严阵以待，钢刃对利爪，确保那野兽被牢牢束缚！

original: Through this act, the path to victory was revealed! The Dragonborn, with knowledge gained within these very walls,
string: 通过此举，通往胜利的道路已然显现！龙裔凭借在这高墙之内获得的知识，

original: embarked on their fateful journey to Sovngarde, where Alduin met his end at last! Let history remember that Whiterun stood beside the Dragonborn
string: 踏上了前往松加德的宿命之旅，奥杜因最终在此陨落！让历史铭记，白漫城曾与龙裔并肩而立

original: in Skyrim's greatest hour! Let songs be sung and let all raise a toast to the might of Whiterun and the hero who answered destiny's call!
string: 在天际最伟大的时刻！让歌声响起，让所有人举杯致敬白漫城的威力和那位响应命运召唤的英雄！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, we are victorious. The Dragonborn has struck down Alduin, the World-Eater, ending the crisis that has plagued our lands!
string: 天际的公民们，我们胜利了.龙裔已击倒世界吞噬者奥杜因，终结了困扰我们土地的危机！

original: No longer shall dragons bring fire and ruin, for the darkest threat has passed!
string: 巨龙再也不会带来火焰与毁灭，因为最黑暗的威胁已经过去！

original: But now, with this battle ended, what future awaits Skyrim? The Jarls, once preoccupied with dragonfire, may now turn their gaze back to war.
string: 但如今，这场战斗已然结束，天际的未来又将如何？那些曾为龙焰所困的领主们，或许会将目光重新投向战争.

original: The Empire is weaken. Shall the land see peace, or shall swords once more be drawn?
string: 帝国已然式微.这片土地将迎来和平，还是战火重燃？

original: With Alduin's fall, Skyrim stands at a crossroads.
string: 随着奥杜因的陨落，天际正站在一个十字路口.

original: The Dragonborn's tale is written, but the tale of Skyrim is far from over. Watch the holds, for the winds of change are upon us!
string: 龙裔的传说已然书写，但天际的故事远未终结.留意各领地，变革之风已向我们袭来！

original: By order of the Jarl, new bounties are available to all able bodied men and women of the hold.
string: 奉领主之令，本领地所有健壮男女均可领取新的悬赏任务.

original: A reward will be offered to anyone who completes any bounties.
string: 完成任何赏金任务者，都将获得酬劳.

original: See the posted bounties by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: A new bounty regarding giants was approved by the Jarl and distributed to innkeepers. A giant camp is causing problems for travelers.
string: 领主批准了一项关于巨人的新悬赏，并已分发给各旅店老板.一个巨人营地正给旅行者带来麻烦.

original: This bounty is available to all adventurers and bounty hunters.
string: 所有冒险者和赏金猎人都可领取这份悬赏.

original: See the posted bounty by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: A dragon was sighted and established its nest in the hold.
string: 一条巨龙现身，并在领地内筑巢.

original: The presence of that dragon is a threat to the safety of the Hold and the Jarl has issued a bounty for the dragon.
string: 那条龙的存在威胁着领地的安全，领主已发布悬赏捉拿此龙.

original: See the posted bounty by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: People of Solitude, hear this! The Empire stands strong, and Solitude remains its proud capital in Skyrim!
string: 独孤城的子民们，听好了！帝国依然强大，独孤城仍是天际引以为傲的首都！

original: By decree of the Emperor, our legions safeguard the land, ensuring order and prosperity! Let no false tongues deceive you.
string: 奉皇帝旨意，我军团守护疆土，确保秩序与繁荣！莫让虚妄之言蛊惑人心.

original: Solitude remains the shining beacon of Imperial law!
string: 独孤城依然是帝国法律的光辉灯塔！

original: Beware the lies of Ulfric Stormcloak and his rebels! Their war has brought nothing but bloodshed and ruin upon Skyrim!
string: 警惕乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷及其叛军的谎言！他们的战争给天际带来的只有流血与毁灭！

original: But fear not�General Tullius and the Imperial Legion will restore order!
string: 但请勿担忧--图留斯将军与帝国军团将恢复秩序！

original: Victory shall be ours, and Skyrim shall be returned to its rightful place under the Empire's banner!
string: 胜利必将属于我们，天际必将回归其在帝国旗帜下的正当地位！

original: All hail Jarl Elisif the Fair, rightful ruler of Solitude and a voice of reason in these turbulent times!
string: 向艾利西弗领主致敬，她是独孤城合法的统治者，也是这动荡时代中理性的声音！

original: The Empire stands beside her, and through her wisdom, Skyrim shall find peace once more!
string: 帝国与她同在，凭借她的智慧，天际必将重获和平！

original: Rejoice, people of Solitude! Imperial banners fly high, and Skyrim's rebels are on the retreat!
string: 欢庆吧，独孤城的子民！帝国的旗帜高高飘扬，天际的叛军正在溃退！

original: The Legion has struck down the Stormcloak insurgents, securing yet another glorious victory! The Empire's strength shall not waver!
string: 军团已击溃风暴斗篷叛军，再获辉煌胜利！帝国的力量绝不会动摇！

original: Citizens, beware! Those who aid the Stormcloak rebellion stand against law, order, and the safety of Skyrim!
string: 公民们，警惕！那些协助风暴斗篷叛乱的人，是在对抗法律，秩序以及天际的安全！

original: The Empire does not tolerate treason! Let all who seek peace stand with General Tullius and the Legion!
string: 帝国不容忍叛国！所有渴望和平的人都应站在图留斯将军和军团一边！

original: By order of General Tullius, Imperial patrols shall secure the roads leading from Solitude!
string: 奉图留斯将军之命，帝国人巡逻队将确保从独孤城出发的道路安全！

original: Travelers, merchants, and loyal citizens may walk safely beneath the Empire's protection! The Stormcloak threat shall not reach our gates!
string: 旅人，商贾与忠诚的公民皆可在帝国的庇护下安然通行！风暴斗篷的威胁休想踏入我们的城门！

original: Let all give thanks to the Emperor! His wisdom guides Solitude, his power safeguards Skyrim!
string: 让我们一同感谢皇帝！他的智慧指引着独孤城，他的力量守护着天际！

original: Let none forget that it is the Empire that keeps the peace and protects our lands from chaos! Stand with Solitude, stand with the Emperor!
string: 切勿忘记，正是帝国维持着和平，保护我们的土地免受混乱侵扰！与独孤城同在，与皇帝同在！

original: By decree of Jarl Elisif the Fair, Solitude's guard presence is reinforced!
string: 奉领主艾利西弗之令，独孤城的守卫力量已得到加强！

original: The guards stand ready against Stormcloak insurgents, criminal elements, and outside threats!
string: 守卫们已严阵以待，随时准备迎击风暴斗篷叛乱分子，犯罪势力以及外部威胁！

original: Patrols shall increase along trade routes, ensuring merchants and travelers remain safe in the hold!
string: 将增加贸易路线沿线的巡逻，确保商人和旅行者在领地内保持安全！

original: By decree of the Imperial Council, all magic performed within Solitude must adhere to proper regulation!
string: 奉帝国议会之令，所有在独孤城内施展的魔法必须遵守规范！

original: Destruction magic without license, necromantic experiments, and unsanctioned conjurations shall be met with investigation!
string: 无证毁灭魔法，死灵实验及未经许可的召唤术将受到调查！

original: The Empire recognizes the value of arcane knowledge, but reckless sorcery shall be met with the full force of the law.
string: 帝国认可奥术知识的价值，但鲁莽的巫术必将受到法律的严惩.

original: Citizens of Solitude, rejoice! Gold flows, trade thrives, and the markets stand bustling with goods from across Tamriel!
string: 独孤城的市民们，欢呼吧！金币流通，贸易繁荣，市场里摆满了来自泰姆瑞尔各地的货物！

original: The Empire's presence ensures safe and steady commerce, bringing Solitude prosperity unmatched across Skyrim!
string: 帝国的存在确保了安全稳定的贸易，为独孤城带来了天际无与伦比的繁荣！

original: From the docks to the marketplace, merchants welcome fine wares from Cyrodiil, Hammerfell, and beyond!
string: 从码头到市场，商人们欢迎来自塞洛迪尔，落锤省及其他地区的精美商品！

original: Let none doubt it: Solitude remains the heart of Skyrim's wealth!
string: 毋庸置疑:独孤城仍是天际财富的心脏！

original: Hear this, traders and merchants! The East Empire Company has secured yet another successful shipment to Solitude's docks!
string: 商人们，商贩们，听好了！东帝国公司又有一批货物成功运抵独孤城的码头了！

original: Exotic wares from Morrowind and the Dominion arrive untouched by disruption, thanks to Imperial oversight!
string: 来自晨风省和自治领的异域商品，在帝国人的监管下，完好无损地送达，未受任何干扰！

original: Seek out the finest jewelry, spices, and textiles, imported from lands far beyond our own!
string: 寻觅来自遥远异域的顶级珠宝，香料与精美织物！

original: The East Empire Company ensures Skyrim remains connected to Tamriel's riches!
string: 东帝国公司确保天际与泰姆瑞尔的财富保持联系！

original: Craftsmen of Skyrim, Solitude has need of skilled hands!
string: 天际的工匠们，独孤城需要技艺精湛的双手！

original: The Jarl seeks blacksmiths, masons, and workers to aid in keeping the capital fortified and thriving!
string: 领主正在招募铁匠，石匠和工人，以协助巩固并繁荣首都！

original: Strong steel, fine weapons, and well-built homes. Those who bring their craft to Solitude shall find gold and glory under Imperial protection!
string: 坚固的钢铁，精良的武器，建造精良的房屋.那些将手艺带到独孤城的人，将在帝国人的庇护下收获黄金与荣耀！

original: Need fine goods for your journey? Bits and Pieces has what you seek! Weapons, clothing, potions, and supplies. All under one roof!
string: 旅途需要精良装备？零珠碎玉满足您的需求！武器，服饰，药剂，补给品，一应俱全！

original: Whether outfitting for adventure or stocking your home, no shop in Solitude serves you better!
string: 无论是为冒险添置装备，还是为家园储备物资，独孤城的商店都能为您提供最优质的服务！

original: Drink, feast, and rest at the famous Winking Skeever! Solitude's finest mead, warm beds, and lively tales await!
string: 来著名的眨眼恶鼠酒馆畅饮，盛宴，休憩吧！独孤城最上等的蜜酒，温暖的床铺和生动的故事正等着您！

original: Whether noble or sellsword, all are welcome to share in the merriment! The Winking Skeever is the number 1 inn in Skyrim.
string: 无论贵族还是佣兵，都欢迎来此共享欢乐！眨眼恶鼠是天际省排名第一的酒馆.

original: Seeking potions for health, magic, or protection? Angeline's Aromatics has the finest mixtures in Skyrim!
string: 需要治疗，魔法或防护药剂吗？安吉琳的香氛店拥有天际最精良的混合药剂！

original: Healing droughts, arcane elixirs, and remedies crafted with expert precision. Visit today!
string: 疗伤药剂，奥术灵药，以及精心调配的各类良方.今日就来选购吧！

original: Dress with dignity and distinction! Radiant Raiment offers elegance for nobles, warriors, and officials alike!
string: 彰显尊贵与不凡！锦衣服饰店为贵族，战士和官员提供优雅服饰！

original: Whether for court, council, or celebration. True refinement begins here!
string: 无论是朝堂，议会还是庆典场合，真正的优雅皆由此开始！

original: Musicians, poets, scholars: hear this call! The Bard's College of Solitude welcomes new students of song and story to join its hallowed halls!
string: 音乐家，诗人，学者们:请聆听这召唤！独孤城吟游诗人学院欢迎新晋歌者与故事传颂者加入其神圣殿堂！

original: Learn the art of music, poetry, and history, and become part of Skyrim's greatest tradition!
string: 学习音乐，诗歌与历史的艺术，成为天际最伟大传统的一部分！

original: The College offers training from master bards, ensuring that your tales shall be sung throughout the ages!
string: 吟游诗人学院提供大师级吟游诗人的指导，确保你的传奇故事将世代传唱！

original: If you seek fame, wisdom, and adventure, the Bard's College beckons! For what is a hero without their song?
string: 若你追求名声，智慧与冒险，吟游诗人学院正召唤着你！毕竟，没有传唱的歌曲，英雄又算什么？

original: Apply today and let your voice shape the legends of tomorrow!
string: 立即申请，让你的声音塑造明天的传奇！

original: Hear this, seekers of wisdom! The Bard's College of Solitude calls upon those who wish to preserve Skyrim's greatest histories and legends!
string: 聆听吧，智慧的追寻者们！独孤城吟游诗人学院召唤所有渴望保存天际最伟大历史与传说的人们！

original: Scholars and poets alike gather within its halls to document, study, and share the tales of heroes, kings, and battlefields!
string: 学者与诗人齐聚于殿堂之中，记录，研究并传颂英雄，君王与战场的传奇！

original: If you seek to chronicle history, master the art of storytelling, and carry forth the voices of the past, the Bard's College welcomes you!
string: 若你渴望记录历史，精通叙事艺术，并传承往昔之声，吟游诗人学院欢迎你的加入！

original: Apply today and let knowledge shape your destiny!
string: 即刻申请，让知识塑造你的命运！

original: Dreamers, musicians, poets: hear this call! The Bard's College of Solitude seeks those who wish to weave tales worthy of song!
string: 梦想家，音乐家，诗人:请聆听这召唤！独孤城吟游诗人学院正在寻觅渴望编织传世诗篇之人！

original: Learn from Skyrim's finest bards, master the lute, the voice, and the quill, and let your story become legend!
string: 向天际最杰出的吟游诗人学习，掌握鲁特琴，歌喉与羽毛笔，让你的故事成为传奇！

original: Adventure awaits, for what is a hero without their song? Apply today, and let your voice shape the stories that will echo through time!
string: 冒险在召唤，英雄岂能无歌？立即申请，让你的声音塑造那些将在时光中回响的故事！

original: The halls of the Bard's College have produced Skyrim's greatest minstrels and poets!
string: 吟游诗人学院的大厅孕育了天际最杰出的吟游诗人和诗人！

original: The songs of history, the anthems of kings, the sagas of warriors: all crafted by those who once walked these very halls!
string: 历史的歌谣，君主的赞歌，勇士的传奇:皆由曾漫步于此殿之人谱写！

original: Will you be among them? Will your name be sung in taverns, remembered in courts, honored in legends?
string: 你会成为他们中的一员吗？你的名字会在酒馆中被传唱，在宫廷中被铭记，在传说中被颂扬吗？

original: The College calls upon all who wish to leave their mark upon history! Apply today and begin your journey!
string: 学院召唤所有渴望在历史上留下印记的人！立即申请，开启你的旅程！

original: Workers of Skyrim, opportunity calls!
string: 天际的工人们，机会在召唤！

original: The East Empire Company seeks strong hands and keen minds to aid in the warehouse operations at Solitude's bustling docks!
string: 东帝国公司诚聘身强力壮，头脑敏锐之人，协助管理独孤城繁忙码头的仓库运营！

original: A chance for steady coin and honest labor under Tamriel's most prosperous trade company!
string: 在泰姆瑞尔最繁荣的贸易公司旗下，获得稳定收入和体面工作的机会！

original: Tasks include loading and securing shipments, inspecting fine goods from across Tamriel,
string: 任务包括装卸和护送货物，检查来自泰姆瑞尔各地的精美商品.

original: and ensuring the flow of trade remains uninterrupted and prosperous!
string: 并确保贸易流通畅通无阻，繁荣昌盛！

original: The East Empire Company values reliability and discipline. Those who prove themselves may find greater opportunities within its ranks!
string: 东帝国公司重视可靠性与纪律.在其队伍中证明自己的人，或许能获得更多机遇！

original: Apply at the Solitude docks and join the merchants who keep Skyrim's wealth flowing!
string: 到独孤城码头报名，加入让天际财富源源不断的商人之列！

original: Hear this, hardworking folk of Skyrim! The East Empire Company urgently seeks reliable workers to aid in warehouse operations at Solitude's docks!
string: 天际的勤劳子民们，听好了！东帝国公司急需可靠工人协助独孤城码头的仓库运营！

original: Trade flows fast, and skilled hands are needed to secure shipments, inspect goods, and keep Skyrim's commerce thriving!
string: 贸易流通迅速，需要熟练的人手来确保货物运输，检查商品，并维持天际的商业繁荣！

original: Those who prove themselves in duty may find greater opportunities within the Company, rising through its ranks to earn wealth and prestige!
string: 那些在职责中证明自己的人，或许能在公司内获得更大的机遇，通过晋升赢得财富与声望！

original: The East Empire Company does not just employ workers: it fosters careers for those dedicated to Skyrim's future!
string: 东帝国公司不仅雇佣工人:它还致力于为那些献身于天际未来的人们开拓事业！

original: Seek out the foreman at the Solitude docks! Gold awaits those ready to work.
string: 去独孤城码头找工头！准备好干活的人有金币拿.

original: The Empire rewards diligence, and opportunity knocks for those who answer!
string: 帝国奖赏勤勉之人，机遇只垂青响应号召者！

original: People of Solitude, hear this and mourn! Our beloved High King Torygg has been slain: killed in cold blood by Ulfric Stormcloak!
string: 独孤城的子民们，请听此噩耗并哀悼！我们敬爱的至高王托依格已被杀害:惨遭乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷冷血谋杀！

original: A treacherous act, carried out beneath the very halls of our great city!
string: 一桩背信弃义的行径，就在我们伟大城市的殿堂之下发生！

original: This was no honorable duel, no fair contest. It was a brutal display of power, a reckless act that has torn Skyrim apart!
string: 这绝非一场荣耀的决斗，也非公正的较量.这是一场残暴的力量展示，一次鲁莽的行径，已将天际撕裂！

original: Jarl Elisif, grieving yet strong, stands as our beacon in this dark hour, guided by the wisdom of the Empire!
string: 领主艾利西弗，虽处悲痛却依然坚强，她是我们在这黑暗时刻的灯塔，在帝国的智慧指引下屹立不倒！

original: Let all loyal citizens stand firm! The Imperial Legion shall bring justice to the murderer and restore order to Skyrim! Beware the lies of rebellion;
string: 让所有忠诚的公民们坚定立场！帝国军团必将为谋杀者带来正义，并为天际恢复秩序！警惕叛乱的谎言;

original: the Stormcloaks have brought only war and suffering upon our land!
string: 风暴斗篷只给我们的土地带来了战争和苦难！

original: Honor High King Torygg's memory! Stand with Solitude, stand with the Empire, and let justice be done!
string: 铭记至高王托依格！与独孤城并肩，与帝国同在，伸张正义！

original: People of Solitude, hear this and mark this day! High King Torygg was murdered: struck down in cold blood by Ulfric Stormcloak.
string: 独孤城的子民们，听好了，记住这一天！至高王托依格被谋杀了:他是被乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷冷酷无情地杀害的.

original: His treachery has thrown Skyrim into chaos, but Solitude stands strong, unshaken in the face of rebellion!
string: 他的背叛让天际陷入混乱，但独孤城依然屹立不倒，在叛乱面前毫不动摇！

original: Justice has been served! The traitor Roggvir, who aided Ulfric's escape, has paid the price for his crimes.
string: 正义已经得到伸张！协助乌弗瑞克逃脱的叛徒罗吉维尔，已为其罪行付出了代价.

original: Let all see what fate awaits those who betray Skyrim's rightful rule! The Empire shall not tolerate treason!
string: 让所有人看看背叛天际合法统治的人将面临怎样的命运！帝国绝不会容忍叛国行径！

original: Jarl Elisif, in her wisdom, holds firm. The Imperial Legion stands ready to crush the Stormcloak insurrection and restore order to this land!
string: 艾利西弗领主以其智慧坚守立场.帝国军团已做好准备，必将粉碎风暴斗篷叛乱，恢复这片土地的秩序！

original: Stand with Solitude! Stand with the Empire! Let none forget the cost of Ulfric's ambition!
string: 与独孤城并肩！与帝国同在！让所有人都铭记乌弗瑞克野心带来的代价！

original: People of Solitude, hear this dire news! Helgen has fallen! Once a proud Imperial outpost, now reduced to ash, destroyed by a dragon's wrath!
string: 独孤城的子民们，听好了这个可怕的消息！海尔根已经陷落！昔日骄傲的帝国前哨，如今化为灰烬，毁于巨龙的怒火！

original: Survivors speak of fire raining from the skies, of homes consumed in an instant, of soldiers cut down before they could draw steel!
string: 幸存者们讲述着天降火雨，家园瞬间被吞噬，士兵们甚至来不及拔剑便已倒下！

original: This is no myth: dragons walk among us once more! This tragedy proves what we have long feared: Skyrim is not safe!
string: 这并非传说:巨龙再次行走于我们之间！这场悲剧证实了我们长久以来的恐惧:天际不再安全！

original: Only the strength of the Empire can protect us from this monstrous threat!
string: 唯有帝国的力量才能保护我们免受这可怕威胁的侵害！

original: Let none doubt: General Tullius and the Imperial Legion shall stand against this darkness!
string: 不容置疑:图留斯将军与帝国军团必将挺身对抗这黑暗！

original: Pray to the Divines, stand with the Empire, and let all Skyrim prepare for what is coming!
string: 向众神祈祷，与帝国并肩，让整个天际为即将到来的一切做好准备！

original: People of Solitude, dire news shakes the land! Helgen has fallen, consumed in fire and ruin, but that is not the only tragedy.
string: 独孤城的子民们，噩耗震撼大地！海尔根已陷落，在烈火与废墟中化为乌有，但这并非唯一的悲剧.

original: Ulfric Stormcloak has escaped! The rebel Jarl, sentenced to death for his crimes against Skyrim and the Empire, now walks free!
string: 乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷逃走了！这位因背叛天际和帝国而被判处死刑的叛军领主，如今已重获自由！

original: We are not sure of the cause of the destruction, but only an attack from the Stormcloak rebellion to free their leader could cause such destruction.
string: 我们不确定破坏的起因，但只有风暴斗篷叛乱为解救其首领发动的袭击，才可能造成如此严重的破坏.

original: Witnesses claim Ulfric fled in the chaos, using the destruction to slip from the hands of Imperial justice! What new treachery will he weave?
string: 目击者声称乌弗瑞克在混乱中逃脱，利用这场破坏从帝国人的正义手中溜走！他又将编织出怎样的新背叛？

original: How long before his rebellion spills more blood upon Skyrim's soil? Let none forget, this man murdered High King Torygg,
string: 还要多久他的叛乱才会让更多鲜血染红天际的土地？谁都不该忘记，此人谋杀了至高王托依格，

original: plunged our land into civil war, and now vanishes like a shadow upon the wind! But Solitude will not falter!
string: 将我们的土地拖入内战，如今却如风中残影般消失无踪！但独孤城绝不会动摇！

original: The Imperial Legion shall hunt him down, and the Empire will restore order!
string: 帝国军团将追捕他，帝国将恢复秩序！

original: Let loyal citizens stand firm! Pray for Skyrim's peace, and stand against the tyranny of Ulfric Stormcloak!
string: 让忠诚的公民们坚定立场！为天际的和平祈祷，并反抗乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷的暴政！

original: Citizens of Solitude, we have received news from Whiterun. We received confirmation that dragons live once more!
string: 独孤城的市民们，我们收到了来自白漫城的消息.我们已确认巨龙再次现世！

original: A beast descended upon the city, bringing fire and chaos, yet against all odds, it was slain! But that is not all.
string: 一头巨兽降临城市，带来火焰与混乱，然而不可思议的是，它被击杀了！但这还不是全部.

original: One of the city defenders became Dragonborn after absorbing the soul of the dragon. A warrior with the voice of ancient kings,
string: 一名城市守卫在吸收了巨龙的灵魂后成为了龙裔.一位拥有古代君王之声的战士.

original: wielding power unseen for centuries! Not since our great Timber Septim walked on Nirn.And now, even the Greybeards have spoken,
string: 掌握着数个世纪以来未曾得见的力量！自我们伟大的泰伯.塞普汀行走于奈恩以来，从未有过.如今，连灰胡子们也已开口言说.

original: their summons shake the mountains, calling them to High Hrothgar! This is the thunderous rumble we heard here in Solitude.
string: 他们的召唤撼动群山，呼唤他们前往霍斯加修道院！这就是我们在独孤城听到的雷鸣般轰响.

original: Let none doubt the Empire's vigilance! A dragonborn founded our great empire and we have again a dragonborn divinely sent by akatosh to help us
string: 无人可质疑帝国的警觉！龙裔创立了我们伟大的帝国，如今我们又有了一位受阿卡托什神谕派遣的龙裔来相助

original: If dragons walk among us, Skyrim must stand united! General Tullius strengthens Imperial forces and Solitude remains a beacon of safety!
string: 巨龙行走于我们之间，天际必须团结一致！图留斯将军增强了帝国人的军力，独孤城依然是安全的灯塔！

original: Pray for wisdom, prepare for what comes next, and stand with the Empire: for the age of dragons has begun anew!
string: 祈求智慧，为即将到来的一切做好准备，并与帝国并肩:因为龙的时代已再度开启！

original: Citizens of Solitude, we bring word from Whiterun! News that shakes the very foundation of Skyrim: Dragons live once more!
string: 独孤城的市民们，我们带来了白漫城的消息！这消息动摇了天际的根基:巨龙再次现世！

original: A great beast descended upon the city, bringing fire and chaos, yet against all odds, it was slain! But that is not all.
string: 一头巨兽降临城市，带来火焰与混乱，然而出乎所有人意料，它被击杀了！但这还不是全部.

original: One of the city's defenders became Dragonborn, wielding a power unseen for centuries! Not since the days of Tiber Septim,
string: 一位城市守卫成为了龙裔，掌握着数百年未现的力量！自泰伯.塞普汀时代以来，

original: the warrior-emperor who forged the Empire with the Thu'um, has the world witnessed such might! And now, even the Greybeards have spoken!
string: 那位以龙吼铸就帝国的战士皇帝，世间可曾见过如此伟力！而今，连灰胡子都已开言！

original: Their voices shook the very mountains, calling the Dragonborn to High Hrothgar! We all heard their thunderous summons, even here in Solitude.
string: 他们的声音撼动了群山，召唤龙裔前往霍斯加修道院！我们所有人都听到了那雷鸣般的召唤，即使远在独孤城也不例外.

original: Let none doubt the Empire's vigilance! A Dragonborn founded our great Empire, and now another has been divinely sent by Akatosh!
string: 无人能质疑帝国的警觉！一位龙裔创立了我们伟大的帝国，如今另一位龙裔又蒙阿卡托什神恩降临！

original: As dragons walk among us, Skyrim must stand united under Imperial strength!
string: 巨龙行走于我们之间，天际必须在帝国人的力量下团结一致！

original: General Tullius fortifies our legions, ensuring that law prevails and Solitude remains Skyrim's beacon of safety!
string: 图留斯将军正加强我们的军团，确保法律得以伸张，独孤城继续作为天际安全的灯塔！

original: Citizens of Solitude, mark this day! Word from Whiterun confirms what we dared not believe: Dragons have returned!
string: 独孤城的公民们，请记住这一天！白漫城传来的消息证实了我们不敢置信的事实:巨龙已经归来！

original: A beast descended upon the city, bringing fire and destruction, it was slain by mortal hands! In its fall, a power unseen for centuries was revealed:
string: 一头凶兽降临城市，带来烈火与毁灭，终被凡人之手斩杀！其陨落之际，一种沉寂数百年的力量随之显现:

original: a warrior who absorbed the soul of the fallen dragon! A hero like those of old. Dragonborn! Not since the reign of Tiber Septim,
string: 一位吞噬了陨落巨龙灵魂的战士！一位如古时英雄般的人物.龙裔！自泰伯.塞普汀时代以来，

original: the great founder of our Empire, has Tamriel seen such a force! And the heavens have acknowledged this truth, for even the Greybeards have spoken!
string: 自我们帝国的伟大奠基者以来，泰姆瑞尔从未见过如此强大的力量！而诸天也承认了这一事实，因为连灰胡子都已开口！

original: Their voices trembled the skies, their summons felt as far as Solitude itself! The Dragonborn has been called to High Hrothgar.
string: 他们的声音震颤天际，连远在独孤城都能感受到召唤！龙裔已被召唤至霍斯加修道院.

original: Let none falter. Skyrim faces a new danger! Dragons roam once more and only Imperial strength,and unity can ensure Skyrim's survival!
string: 无人可退缩.天际面临新的威胁！巨龙再度横行，唯有帝国人的力量与团结，方能确保天际的存续！

original: General Tullius stands ready. Solitude shall not waver! Stand with the Empire, stand with Solitude.
string: 图留斯将军已准备就绪.独孤城绝不会动摇！与帝国并肩，与独孤城同在.

original: Prepare for the trials ahead, for prophecy has awakened, and the age of dragons has begun anew!
string: 为即将到来的试炼做好准备吧，预言已然苏醒，巨龙的时代再度降临！

original: The Thalmor Ambassador Elenwen wishes to extend her gratitude to all who attended the recent reception,
string: 梭默大使爱琳温谨向所有出席近期招待会的来宾致以诚挚谢意.

original: an event held in the spirit of cooperation and mutual understanding between the Aldmeri Dominion and Skyrim.
string: 一场本着先祖神洲与天际之间合作与相互理解精神举办的盛会.

original: Throughout the evening, fruitful discussions were had regarding the current state of Skyrim, its security,
string: 整个晚上，关于天际的现状及其安全状况，进行了富有成效的讨论.

original: and the importance of maintaining stability amidst the uncertainty that plagues the region. The Thalmor remain committed to preserving order,
string: 以及在困扰该地区的不确定性中保持稳定的重要性.梭默仍致力于维护秩序，

original: offering guidance where necessary, and ensuring Skyrim continues to benefit from the wisdom and experience of the Dominion.
string: 在必要时提供指导，并确保天际继续受益于先祖神州的智慧与经验.

original: It is our belief that dialogue and diplomacy must prevail over conflict. The Embassy will continue its close cooperation with Imperial leadership,
string: 我们坚信对话与外交必须战胜冲突.大使馆将继续与帝国人领导层保持密切合作.

original: ensuring that Skyrim remains aligned with the principles of law and governance that safeguard Tamriel from chaos.
string: 确保天际始终遵循维护泰姆瑞尔免于混乱的法律与治理原则.

original: The Dominion shall remain vigilant as events unfold, observing and ensuring that Skyrim's course does not stray from the path of wisdom.
string: 随着事态发展，先祖神州将保持警惕，观察并确保天际的走向不会偏离智慧之路.

original: The Thalmor Ambassador Elenwen extends her gratitude to all attendees of our recent diplomatic reception, an event held in the spirit of cooperation,
string: 梭默大使爱琳温向所有出席我们近期外交招待会的来宾致以谢意，此次活动秉承合作精神举办.

original: refinement, and mutual understanding. The Dominion remains steadfast in its commitment to fostering stability and dialogue within Skyrim.
string: 精进与相互理解.先祖神洲始终坚定不移地致力于在天际境内促进稳定与对话.

original: Throughout the evening, productive discussions illuminated the path forward for Skyrim's governance, reinforcing the necessity of law and order.
string: 整个晚上，富有成效的讨论为天际的治理指明了前进道路，并强化了法律与秩序的必要性.

original: The Embassy is pleased with the engagement and interest shown by our distinguished guests. While all great gatherings experience minor disruptions,
string: 大使馆对各位尊贵来宾所表现出的参与热情与浓厚兴趣深感欣慰.尽管所有盛大集会都难免出现些许波折，

original: we commend the decorum and professionalism displayed by those present. The rumours about a major disruption during the reception are exaggerated
string: 我们赞扬在场人士所展现出的庄重与专业素养.关于接待期间发生重大骚动的传闻实属夸大其词

original: and the disruption is nothing unusual from a typical evening with Nords in Skyrim. The Thalmor Embassy will continue its diplomatic efforts,
string: 而且这种骚乱对于天际省诺德人的寻常夜晚来说并不稀奇.梭默大使馆将继续其外交努力，

original: observing Skyrim's evolving landscape and ensuring that its future stays within the White-Gold Concordat.
string: 观察天际不断演变的格局，并确保其未来仍符合<白金协定>的框架.

original: Citizens of Solitude, word arrives from Whiterun! In an act of unmatched bravery, a dragon has been captured, bound within the walls of Dragonsreach!
string: 独孤城的子民们，白漫城传来消息！凭借无与伦比的英勇之举，一条巨龙已被捕获，囚禁于龙临宫的城墙之内！

original: Skyrim has proven that these beasts can be contained, that their power can be controlled! And who led this mighty feat?
string: 天际已经证明这些野兽可以被控制，它们的力量可以被驾驭！而谁领导了这一壮举？

original: The Dragonborn, champion of prophecy, wielding the Thu'um! Let none doubt it: the strength of Tiber Septim's legacy flows through this warrior,
string: 龙裔，预言的冠军，驾驭着吐姆！毋庸置疑:泰伯.塞普汀的遗产之力正流淌于这位战士体内.

original: bringing hope to Skyrim! But let this victory serve as a warning as much as a triumph! Dragons still fly, still hunt and still threaten our lands!
string: 为天际带来希望！但让这场胜利既是凯歌也是警钟！巨龙仍在翱翔，仍在猎食，仍在威胁我们的家园！

original: Solitude stands firm. General Tullius fortifies our defenses, ensuring that Skyrim does not fall into chaos!
string: 独孤城屹立不倒.图留斯将军正加强我们的防御，确保天际不会陷入混乱！

original: Let us prepare for what comes next, for the Dragonborn's path is far from over.
string: 让我们为即将到来的挑战做好准备，龙裔的征途远未结束.

original: Stand with the Empire! Stand with Solitude! For the age of dragons has entered its final battle!
string: 与帝国同在！与独孤城同在！因为巨龙的时代已迎来最终决战！

original: Honored citizens of Skyrim, hear me! By decree of the Aldmeri Dominion and in the spirit of unity, Elenwen, Thalmor Ambassador to Skyrim,
string: 尊贵的天际子民们，听我说！遵照先祖神洲的法令，秉承团结的精神，天际的梭默大使爱琳温

original: extends a most distinguished invitation. On the eve of next week, the Thalmor Embassy shall host a grand gathering of Skyrim's finest:
string: 特此向您发出最尊贵的邀请.下周前夕，梭默大使馆将举办一场盛会，汇聚天际最杰出的人物:

original: a night of elegance, diplomacy, and enlightened conversation. Lords and ladies of noble lineage, esteemed magistrates,
string: 一个充满优雅，外交手腕与开明对话的夜晚.出身高贵的领主与贵妇，备受尊敬的治安官们，

original: and the most influential minds of this land shall be welcomed within the halls of our Embassy.
string: 这片土地上最具影响力的智者，将受邀进入我们使馆的大厅.

original: The Aldmeri Dominion values order and progress, and it is through civil discourse that Skyrim may take its place in a world of enlightenment.
string: 先祖神洲崇尚秩序与进步，正是通过文明对话，天际才能在开明的世界中占有一席之地.

original: Let this evening serve as a symbol of cooperation, a testament to the prosperity that awaits those who walk the path of wisdom.
string: 愿今夜的相聚成为合作的象征，见证那些行走于智慧之路者必将迎来的繁荣.

original: May the nobility of Skyrim heed this call. The gates of the Embassy shall open to those of merit and distinction.
string: 愿天际的贵族们响应此召唤.大使馆的大门将为功勋卓著与声名显赫者敞开.

original: Let the night be a beacon of what the future may hold.
string: 让今夜成为照亮未来的灯塔.

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear this! The age of dragons has ended, and Skyrim stands victorious!
string: 天际的子民们，听好了！巨龙的时代已经终结，天际赢得了胜利！

original: The World-Eater, the terror of time itself, Alduin, has been vanquished! The Dragonborn, Skyrim's champion, ventured beyond the mortal realm,
string: 世界吞噬者，时间本身的恐怖，奥杜因已被击败！龙裔，天际的冠军，已踏入凡人领域之外，

original: facing the beast in the halls of Sovngarde itself! No warrior, no army, no empire could halt Alduin's wrath,
string: 在松加德殿堂直面那巨兽！没有战士，没有军队，没有帝国能阻挡奥杜因的怒火，

original: yet the Dragonborn alone stood against him in battle! And there, beneath the eternal sky of the fallen, the World-Eater was defeated,
string: 然而，唯有龙裔在战斗中独自挺身对抗他！就在那逝者永恒的苍穹之下，世界吞噬者终被击败.

original: his reign of terror broken for all time! Let Skyrim rejoice! No longer shall dragons darken our skies with fire and fury!
string: 他的恐怖统治已被永远终结！让天际欢庆吧！巨龙再也不能用火焰与怒火遮蔽我们的天空！

original: The winds carry whispers of the Dragonborn's triumph, and even the gods themselves have witnessed their deeds!
string: 风儿低语着龙裔的胜利，就连诸神也亲眼见证了他们的功绩！

original: History has been rewritten, and legend has been forged anew! The end of time has been cancelled!
string: 历史已被重写，传奇已获新生！时间终结已被取消！

original: May all give thanks to Akatosh and the Divines, and may the Dragonborn walk among us, the hero of an age reborn!
string: 愿众人感恩阿卡托什与众神，愿龙裔行走于我们之间，这位时代重生的英雄！

original: Raise your voices in triumph, citizens of Skyrim! The Dragonborn has claimed victory over Alduin, the World-Eater!
string: 高唱凯歌吧，天际的公民们！龙裔已经战胜了世界吞噬者奥杜因！

original: A battle beyond reckoning, fought not upon our soil, but in the halls of Sovngarde itself!
string: 一场超乎想象的战斗，并非在我们的土地上展开，而是在松加德的大殿之中！

original: By strength, courage, and the voice of the gods, our champion has cast down the ancient terror! And now, let Skyrim sing of this day!
string: 凭借力量，勇气与诸神之声，我们的冠军已击溃远古之恐怖！而今，让天际传颂此日之荣光！

original: The bards have composed a new song: Tale of the Tongues, a hymn retelling the despair facing Alduin and how the dragonborn stood against all odds.
string: 吟游诗人们创作了一首新歌:<龙语者传说>，这首颂歌重述了面对奥杜因时的绝望，以及龙裔如何逆势而战.

original: A melody that shall echo through mead halls for generations to come! No longer shall we whisper of dragons in fear: now we sing of their defeat!
string: 一首将在蜜酒大厅中世代回响的旋律！我们不再因恐惧而低语恶龙之名:如今我们高歌它们的败亡！

original: Tonight, the streets shall be filled with revelry, the taverns overflowing with song!
string: 今夜，街头将充满欢庆，酒馆将歌声满溢！

original: Let all hear the tale of the Dragonborn, and let none forget the hero who rose to meet destiny!
string: 让所有人都聆听龙裔的传说，让所有人都铭记那位挺身迎接命运的英雄！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear me! Today, Skyrim stands free! Alduin, the World-Eater, has been vanquished!
string: 天际的子民们，听我说！今天，天际自由了！世界吞噬者奥杜因已被击败！

original: The Dragonborn has fulfilled destiny, striking down the ancient beast within the halls of Sovngarde!
string: 龙裔已履行宿命，在松加德殿堂内击倒了那远古巨兽！

original: But victory does not come without cost. Many warriors fell in the battles against Alduin's kin.
string: 但胜利并非毫无代价.许多战士在与奥杜因同族的战斗中牺牲了.

original: The scars of war remain, and the echoes of those lost still linger in the winds.
string: 战争的伤痕犹在，逝者的回响仍于风中萦绕.

original: As we rejoice in the Dragonborn's triumph, let us also remember those who fought so Skyrim could see this day!
string: 当我们欢庆龙裔的胜利时，也请铭记那些为天际能迎来今日而浴血奋战的英灵！

original: Raise a toast to the Dragonborn, but do not forget the warriors who stood against the darkness.
string: 为龙裔举杯，但莫忘那些挺身对抗黑暗的战士们.

original: Their strength carried us through Skyrim's greatest trial!
string: 他们的力量带领我们度过了天际最严峻的考验！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, we are told Alduin has fallen, struck down by the Dragonborn in the halls of Sovngarde.
string: 天际的公民们，我们被告知奥杜因已经陨落，在松加德的大厅中被龙裔击倒.

original: The World-Eater has been vanquished, and Skyrim stands free of his shadow!
string: 世界吞噬者已被击败，天际已摆脱其阴影，重获自由！

original: Yet, dragons still fly. Their power remains, their presence undeniable. What will they do now their leader is slain?
string: 然而，巨龙仍在翱翔.它们的力量犹存，其存在不容忽视.如今首领已逝，它们将何去何从？

original: Will they engage in a war of succession? Will they disband as a united force? Will they leave Skyrim or Tamriel?
string: 他们会发动继承战争吗？他们会解散联合部队吗？他们会离开天际或泰姆瑞尔吗？

original: Rejoice, but remain vigilant, for no one knows what lies in the future.
string: 欢欣鼓舞，但保持警惕，因为无人知晓未来会带来什么.

original: Citizens of Solitude, let the news echo through the streets and to the farthest corners of Skyrim! Alduin, the World-Eater, is no more!
string: 独孤城的子民们，让这消息响彻街道，传遍天际最遥远的角落！世界吞噬者奥杜因，已不复存在！

original: The ancient prophecy has been fulfilled: the Dragonborn has risen, and the great devourer of time has been vanquished!
string: 古老的预言已经应验:龙裔已然崛起，吞噬时间的巨兽已被击败！

original: No more shall Skyrim tremble beneath the shadow of destruction! No more shall the skies darken with the flight of doom!
string: 天际将不再在毁灭的阴影下颤抖！天空将不再因厄运的翱翔而晦暗！

original: The Dragonborn, wielding the power of old, has ended Alduin's reign, ensuring that our land stands free from the threat of dragons!
string: 龙裔，执掌古老之力，终结了奥杜因的统治，确保我们的土地免受巨龙威胁！

original: Let none doubt: our great Empire witnessed this victory! As Tiber Septim once shaped Tamriel, so too does this Dragonborn now shape Skyrim!
string: 毋庸置疑:我们伟大的帝国见证了这场胜利！正如泰伯.赛普汀曾塑造泰姆瑞尔，如今这位龙裔也正在塑造天际！

original: And with this menace defeated, let order be restored! Let unity prevail!
string: 随着此等威胁被击溃，让秩序得以重建！让团结占据上风！

original: Raise your voices in triumph! Stand with Solitude, stand with the Empire, and let all of Skyrim rejoice!
string: 高唱凯歌！与独孤城并肩，与帝国同在，让全天际欢庆！

original: For the age of dragons has seen its greatest battle, and its greatest victory!
string: 因为巨龙的时代已迎来最伟大的战役，以及最辉煌的胜利！

original: By order of the Jarl, new bounties are available to all able bodied men and women of the hold.
string: 奉领主之令，本领地所有健壮男女均可领取新的悬赏任务.

original: A reward will be offered to anyone who completes any bounties.
string: 完成任何赏金任务者，都将获得酬劳.

original: See the posted bounties by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: A new bounty regarding giants was approved by the Jarl and distributed to innkeepers. A giant camp is causing problems for travelers.
string: 领主批准了一项关于巨人的新悬赏，并已分发给各旅店老板.一个巨人营地正给旅行者带来麻烦.

original: This bounty is available to all adventurers and bounty hunters.
string: 所有冒险者和赏金猎人都可领取这份悬赏.

original: See the posted bounty by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: A dragon was sighted and established its nest in the hold.
string: 一条巨龙现身，并在领地内筑巢.

original: The presence of that dragon is a threat to the safety of the Hold and the Jarl has issued a bounty for the dragon.
string: 那条龙的存在威胁着领地的安全，领主已发布悬赏捉拿此龙.

original: See the posted bounty by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: People of Windhelm, darkness lurks within our streets! Beware, for another life has been stolen, another innocent found slain,
string: 风舵城的子民们，黑暗潜伏在我们的街道上！当心，又一条生命被夺走，又一名无辜者惨遭杀害，

original: their body mutilated by unseen hands! The city guards search tirelessly for the fiend responsible, but the killer still walks among us!
string: 他们的身体被无形之手肢解！城卫兵不懈地追捕着罪魁祸首，但凶手仍在我们之中游荡！

original: We urge all citizens to stay vigilant, avoid wandering alone at night, and report any suspicious behavior!
string: 我们敦促所有市民保持警惕，避免夜间独自外出，并报告任何可疑行为！

original: Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak has commanded his men to uncover the truth and bring the culprit to swift justice!
string: 领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷已命令部下查明真相，将罪犯绳之以法！

original: The Stormcloaks protect their own, and Windhelm shall not suffer such cowardly horrors unpunished!
string: 风暴斗篷保护自己的人民，风舵城绝不会让如此懦弱的暴行逍遥法外！

original: Let all listen: stay indoors after sundown, watch the streets, and trust no shadow!
string: 众人听令:日落后闭户不出，警惕街巷，勿信任何阴影！

original: Justice will come, and the streets of Windhelm shall be made safe once more!
string: 正义终将到来，风舵城的街道必将重获安宁！

original: People of Windhelm, hear this decree! By order of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak,
string: 风舵城的子民们，聆听此法令！奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之命，

original: let it be known that the recent crimes plaguing our city are taken with utmost seriousness!
string: 让所有人都知道，近期困扰我们城市的罪行正受到最严肃的对待！

original: The safety of Skyrim's sons and daughters shall not be overlooked, nor shall fear rule our streets!
string: 天际儿女们的安全不容忽视，恐惧也休想统治我们的街头！

original: A formal investigation has been declared, with the city guard under strict command to uncover the truth and bring the culprit to swift justice!
string: 已宣布展开正式调查，城市守卫奉命彻查真相，务必将罪犯迅速绳之以法！

original: All citizens are urged to remain calm, report any suspicious activity, and place faith in Nord justice!
string: 所有公民请保持冷静，报告任何可疑活动，并相信诺德人的正义！

original: Windhelm will not bow to chaos, nor shall we tolerate such cowardly crimes in our midst! The Stormcloak guard stands ready,
string: 风舵城绝不向混乱低头，也绝不容忍此等懦夫行径在我们之中滋生！风暴斗篷守卫已严阵以待，

original: and our city shall be protected! Let it be known: justice will prevail, and Windhelm shall not fall into fear!
string: 我们的城市必将得到守护！让世人知晓:正义必胜，风舵城绝不会陷入恐惧！

original: Jarl Elisif presides over court today and in her benevolence, she is granting audiences for any citizen of the hold that have a petition,
string: 今天由领主艾莉西夫主持朝会，她仁慈地接见领地内所有有请愿的臣民.

original: disputes or wishes to appeal to her counsel or judgement.
string: 纠纷或希望寻求她的建议或裁决.

original: All petitioners should enquire first with the steward about the procedure and the proper decorum when addressing the Jarl.
string: 所有请愿者都应先向管家咨询觐见领主时的流程与礼仪规范.

original: By decree of Jarl Elisif the Fair, all magic performed within Solitude must adhere to proper regulation!
string: 奉领主艾利西弗之令，所有在独孤城内施展的魔法必须遵守规范！

original: Destruction magic without license, necromantic experiments, and unsanctioned conjurations shall be met with investigation!
string: 无证毁灭魔法，死灵实验及未经许可的召唤术将受到调查！

original: Reckless sorcery shall be met with the full force of the law.
string: 鲁莽的巫术必将受到法律的严惩.

original: Priests of the Temple of the Divines call for prayers in this troubled time! All are welcomed to worship the Divines.
string: 圣灵神殿的祭司们在这动荡时期呼唤人们前来祈祷！所有人都被欢迎前来敬拜圣灵.

original: A great shift has come and perhaps the gods themselves take notice! The priests are available to hear your plea and to offer counsels et reconfort.
string: 一场巨大的变革已然降临，或许连诸神都已瞩目！祭司们正恭候聆听你的祈愿，并为你提供指引与慰藉.

original: Seekers of knowledge and wielders of magic: hear this call! The College of Winterhold opens its halls to those who wish to master the arcane arts,
string: 知识的追寻者与魔法的驾驭者:请聆听此召唤！冬堡学院向渴望精通奥秘技艺之人敞开大门.

original: to study the mysteries of magic, and to walk the path of scholars and sorcerers alike!
string: 研习魔法奥秘，踏上学者与法师共行之路！

original: From destruction to restoration, from illusion to conjuration, our professors stand ready to teach, guide, and shape the next generation of mages!
string: 从毁灭到修复，从幻象到召唤，我们的教授们已准备就绪，教导，引导并塑造下一代法师！

original: Do you wish to harness the elements? To bend reality to your will? Then Winterhold beckons you!
string: 你是否渴望驾驭元素之力？是否想将现实扭曲于你的意志之下？那么冬堡正在召唤你！

original: Fear not the whispers of ignorance. Magic is a force of knowledge, not destruction! Join the College and forge your own destiny,
string: 莫惧无知的低语.魔法是知识之力，而非毁灭之能！加入学院，铸就你自己的命运.

original: for Skyrim has always been shaped by those who command the power of the arcane!
string: 因为天际始终由那些掌握奥术力量的人所塑造！

original: Applications accepted within the College's gates. Prove your worth and claim your place among the best scholars.
string: 学院大门内接受申请.证明你的价值，跻身顶尖学者之列.

original: People of Skyrim, the world changes, and magic must change with it!
string: 天际的子民们，世界在变，魔法也必须随之改变！

original: The College of Winterhold stands as Skyrim's last beacon of arcane knowledge, calling upon those who seek to master the arts that shape the future!
string: 冬堡学院作为天际最后的奥术知识灯塔，召唤着那些渴望掌握塑造未来技艺的人们！

original: Dragons have returned. Prophecy has awakened. Skyrim must not stand unprepared!
string: 巨龙已然回归.预言已经苏醒.天际绝不能毫无准备！

original: Those who wield magic may yet protect our land, uncover ancient secrets, and restore the balance that has been disrupted!
string: 掌握魔法之人，仍可守护我们的土地，揭开古老秘密，并恢复已被打破的平衡！

original: The time for fear is over! The time for understanding magic is now!
string: 恐惧的时代已经结束！理解魔法的时代已经来临！

original: If you have the talent, the ambition and the drive, the College of Winterhold welcomes you!
string: 如果你有天赋，有抱负，有干劲，冬堡学院欢迎你！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, heed this warning! Magic is not a force to be feared, nor a power to be wielded carelessly!
string: 天际省的公民们，请听此警告！魔法并非令人畏惧的力量，亦非可以随意驾驭的权能！

original: Those who lack training bring ruin, while those who study the arcane forge wonders!
string: 疏于训练者招致毁灭，潜心研习奥术者铸就奇迹！

original: The College of Winterhold calls upon those who wish to study, refine, and master the mysteries of magic,
string: 冬堡学院召唤那些渴望研习，精进并掌握魔法奥秘的人们，

original: not those who would cast without understanding, or experiment without restraint!
string: 而非那些不求甚解便施法，或毫无节制进行实验之人！

original: Join the College today and wield magic with wisdom! Let Skyrim know that the arcane is not chaos, but knowledge!
string: 即刻加入学院，以智慧驾驭魔法！让天际省知晓，奥术并非混沌，而是知识！

original: Scholars, alchemists and spellcasters, Winterhold calls upon the finest minds!
string: 学者，炼金术士与施法者们，冬堡召唤最杰出的智者！

original: The College of Winterhold does not seek mere dabblers or careless experimenters: it seeks those who wish to shape the future of magical study!
string: 冬堡学院不寻求浅尝辄止者或粗心的实验者:它寻求的是那些希望塑造魔法研究未来的人！

original: Within our halls, masters of magic unravel the mysteries of Aetherius, forge spells of great power,
string: 在我们的殿堂之中，魔法大师们揭示着湮灭之境的奥秘，锻造出威力无穷的法术.

original: and study lost histories to understand what others cannot! This is no mere school. It is a sanctuary for those truly devoted to the arcane!
string: 并研习失落的历史，以理解他人所不能！这绝非寻常学府.它是真正献身于奥秘之人的圣所！

original: If you believe yourself worthy, if you seek true mastery, then step forward! The College awaits those who can carry Skyrim's magical legacy forward!
string: 若你自认足够优秀，若你追求真正的精通，那就上前来吧！学院等待着那些能够传承天际魔法遗产的人！

original: Seekers of knowledge and wielders of magic: hear this call! The College of Winterhold opens its halls to those who wish to master the arcane arts,
string: 知识的追寻者与魔法的驾驭者:请聆听此召唤！冬堡学院向渴望精通奥秘技艺之人敞开大门.

original: to study the mysteries of magic, and to walk the path of scholars and sorcerers alike!
string: 研习魔法奥秘，踏上学者与法师共行之路！

original: From destruction to restoration, from illusion to conjuration, our professors stand ready to teach, guide, and shape the next generation of mages!
string: 从毁灭到修复，从幻象到召唤，我们的教授们已准备就绪，教导，引导并塑造下一代法师！

original: Do you wish to harness the elements? To bend reality to your will? Then Winterhold beckons you!
string: 你是否渴望驾驭元素之力？是否想将现实扭曲于你的意志之下？那么冬堡正在召唤你！

original: Fear not the whispers of ignorance. Magic is a force of knowledge, not destruction! Join the College and forge your own destiny,
string: 莫惧无知的低语.魔法是知识之力，而非毁灭之能！加入学院，铸就你自己的命运.

original: for Skyrim has always been shaped by those who command the power of the arcane!
string: 因为天际始终由那些掌握奥术力量的人所塑造！

original: Applications accepted within the College's gates. Prove your worth and claim your place among the best scholars.
string: 学院大门内接受申请.证明你的价值，跻身顶尖学者之列.

original: People of Skyrim, the world changes, and magic must change with it!
string: 天际的子民们，世界在变，魔法也必须随之改变！

original: The College of Winterhold stands as Skyrim's last beacon of arcane knowledge, calling upon those who seek to master the arts that shape the future!
string: 冬堡学院作为天际最后的奥术知识灯塔，召唤着那些渴望掌握塑造未来技艺的人们！

original: Dragons have returned. Prophecy has awakened. Skyrim must not stand unprepared!
string: 巨龙已然回归.预言已经苏醒.天际绝不能毫无准备！

original: Those who wield magic may yet protect our land, uncover ancient secrets, and restore the balance that has been disrupted!
string: 掌握魔法之人，仍可守护我们的土地，揭开古老秘密，并恢复已被打破的平衡！

original: The time for fear is over! The time for understanding magic is now!
string: 恐惧的时代已经结束！理解魔法的时代已经来临！

original: If you have the talent, the ambition and the drive, the College of Winterhold welcomes you!
string: 如果你有天赋，有抱负，有干劲，冬堡学院欢迎你！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, heed this warning! Magic is not a force to be feared, nor a power to be wielded carelessly!
string: 天际省的公民们，请听此警告！魔法并非令人畏惧的力量，亦非可以随意驾驭的权能！

original: Those who lack training bring ruin, while those who study the arcane forge wonders!
string: 疏于训练者招致毁灭，潜心研习奥术者铸就奇迹！

original: The College of Winterhold calls upon those who wish to study, refine, and master the mysteries of magic,
string: 冬堡学院召唤那些渴望研习，精进并掌握魔法奥秘的人们，

original: not those who would cast without understanding, or experiment without restraint!
string: 而非那些不求甚解便施法，或毫无节制进行实验之人！

original: Join the College today and wield magic with wisdom! Let Skyrim know that the arcane is not chaos, but knowledge!
string: 即刻加入学院，以智慧驾驭魔法！让天际省知晓，奥术并非混沌，而是知识！

original: Scholars, alchemists and spellcasters, Winterhold calls upon the finest minds!
string: 学者，炼金术士与施法者们，冬堡召唤最杰出的智者！

original: The College of Winterhold does not seek mere dabblers or careless experimenters: it seeks those who wish to shape the future of magical study!
string: 冬堡学院不寻求浅尝辄止者或粗心的实验者:它寻求的是那些希望塑造魔法研究未来的人！

original: Within our halls, masters of magic unravel the mysteries of Aetherius, forge spells of great power,
string: 在我们的殿堂之中，魔法大师们揭示着湮灭之境的奥秘，锻造出威力无穷的法术.

original: and study lost histories to understand what others cannot! This is no mere school. It is a sanctuary for those truly devoted to the arcane!
string: 并研习失落的历史，以理解他人所不能！这绝非寻常学府.它是真正献身于奥秘之人的圣所！

original: If you believe yourself worthy, if you seek true mastery, then step forward! The College awaits those who can carry Skyrim's magical legacy forward!
string: 若你自认足够优秀，若你追求真正的精通，那就上前来吧！学院等待着那些能够传承天际魔法遗产的人！

original: Seekers of knowledge and wielders of magic: hear this call! The College of Winterhold opens its halls to those who wish to master the arcane arts,
string: 知识的追寻者与魔法的驾驭者:请聆听此召唤！冬堡学院向渴望精通奥秘技艺之人敞开大门.

original: to study the mysteries of magic, and to walk the path of scholars and sorcerers alike!
string: 研习魔法奥秘，踏上学者与法师共行之路！

original: From destruction to restoration, from illusion to conjuration, our professors stand ready to teach, guide, and shape the next generation of mages!
string: 从毁灭到修复，从幻象到召唤，我们的教授们已准备就绪，教导，引导并塑造下一代法师！

original: Do you wish to harness the elements? To bend reality to your will? Then Winterhold beckons you!
string: 你是否渴望驾驭元素之力？是否想将现实扭曲于你的意志之下？那么冬堡正在召唤你！

original: Fear not the whispers of ignorance. Magic is a force of knowledge, not destruction! Join the College and forge your own destiny,
string: 莫惧无知的低语.魔法是知识之力，而非毁灭之能！加入学院，铸就你自己的命运.

original: for Skyrim has always been shaped by those who command the power of the arcane!
string: 因为天际始终由那些掌握奥术力量的人所塑造！

original: Applications accepted within the College's gates. Prove your worth and claim your place among the best scholars.
string: 学院大门内接受申请.证明你的价值，跻身顶尖学者之列.

original: People of Skyrim, the world changes, and magic must change with it!
string: 天际的子民们，世界在变，魔法也必须随之改变！

original: The College of Winterhold stands as Skyrim's last beacon of arcane knowledge, calling upon those who seek to master the arts that shape the future!
string: 冬堡学院作为天际最后的奥术知识灯塔，召唤着那些渴望掌握塑造未来技艺的人们！

original: Dragons have returned. Prophecy has awakened. Skyrim must not stand unprepared!
string: 巨龙已然回归.预言已经苏醒.天际绝不能毫无准备！

original: Those who wield magic may yet protect our land, uncover ancient secrets, and restore the balance that has been disrupted!
string: 掌握魔法之人，仍可守护我们的土地，揭开古老秘密，并恢复已被打破的平衡！

original: The time for fear is over! The time for understanding magic is now!
string: 恐惧的时代已经结束！理解魔法的时代已经来临！

original: If you have the talent, the ambition and the drive, the College of Winterhold welcomes you!
string: 如果你有天赋，有抱负，有干劲，冬堡学院欢迎你！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, heed this warning! Magic is not a force to be feared, nor a power to be wielded carelessly!
string: 天际省的公民们，请听此警告！魔法并非令人畏惧的力量，亦非可以随意驾驭的权能！

original: Those who lack training bring ruin, while those who study the arcane forge wonders!
string: 疏于训练者招致毁灭，潜心研习奥术者铸就奇迹！

original: The College of Winterhold calls upon those who wish to study, refine, and master the mysteries of magic,
string: 冬堡学院召唤那些渴望研习，精进并掌握魔法奥秘的人们，

original: not those who would cast without understanding, or experiment without restraint!
string: 而非那些不求甚解便施法，或毫无节制进行实验之人！

original: Join the College today and wield magic with wisdom! Let Skyrim know that the arcane is not chaos, but knowledge!
string: 即刻加入学院，以智慧驾驭魔法！让天际省知晓，奥术并非混沌，而是知识！

original: Scholars, alchemists and spellcasters, Winterhold calls upon the finest minds!
string: 学者，炼金术士与施法者们，冬堡召唤最杰出的智者！

original: The College of Winterhold does not seek mere dabblers or careless experimenters: it seeks those who wish to shape the future of magical study!
string: 冬堡学院不寻求浅尝辄止者或粗心的实验者:它寻求的是那些希望塑造魔法研究未来的人！

original: Within our halls, masters of magic unravel the mysteries of Aetherius, forge spells of great power,
string: 在我们的殿堂之中，魔法大师们揭示着湮灭之境的奥秘，锻造出威力无穷的法术.

original: and study lost histories to understand what others cannot! This is no mere school. It is a sanctuary for those truly devoted to the arcane!
string: 并研习失落的历史，以理解他人所不能！这绝非寻常学府.它是真正献身于奥秘之人的圣所！

original: If you believe yourself worthy, if you seek true mastery, then step forward! The College awaits those who can carry Skyrim's magical legacy forward!
string: 若你自认足够优秀，若你追求真正的精通，那就上前来吧！学院等待着那些能够传承天际魔法遗产的人！

original: Seeking potions of unparalleled quality? Remedies crafted by generations of expertise? Look no further than The White Phial!
string: 寻求无与伦比品质的药剂？世代相传技艺打造的治疗良方？白瓶是您的不二之选！

original: Visit The White Phial today, where knowledge meets craft, and every elixir is made with precision and care! Your satisfaction is a guarantee!
string: 今日就来白瓶吧，这里知识交汇技艺，每一剂灵药都经过精心细致的调配！您的满意就是我们最大的保证！

original: Bargain hunters, collectors, and traders: why pay more when you can spend less? At Sadri's Used Wares, quality meets affordability!
string: 讨价还价的猎手，收藏家和商人们:既然能少花钱，何必多付？在萨德利旧货，品质与实惠兼得！

original: Weapons, armor, trinkets, and treasures: all at fair prices and ready for use! Looking to sell?
string: 武器，护甲，饰品与珍宝:价格公道，即买即用！想要出售吗？

original: Bring in your unwanted goods, and leave with coins in your pocket! No need to wait. Step inside today, and see what deals await you!
string: 带来您不需要的物品，带着金币离开！无需等待.今天就进来看看，有什么好交易在等着您！

original: Need a drink after a long day? Thirsty for mead that truly warms the soul?
string: 漫长的一天后想喝一杯吗？渴望能真正温暖灵魂的蜂蜜酒吗？

original: The New Gnisis Cornerclub offers strong spirits, lively conversation, and a place to rest your feet!
string: 新格尼西斯街角吧提供烈酒，热闹的谈话，以及一个歇脚的好去处！

original: Enjoy the finest Dunmer fare, unwind with good company, and raise your tankard to another night well spent!
string: 品尝最精致的丹莫佳肴，与良伴共度惬意时光，举杯欢庆又一个美妙的夜晚！

original: Join us at the Cornerclub, where the fire is always lit, and the drinks never run dry!
string: 来角斗俱乐部加入我们吧，这里炉火永燃，美酒不断！

original: Warriors and hunters: if steel is your companion, then only the finest will do!
string: 战士们与猎人们:若钢铁是你们的伙伴，那么唯有最精良的才配得上！

original: At Blacksmith Quarters, weapons and armor are crafted with Nord pride and precision! Battle-tested, reforged, and made for true warriors.
string: 在铁匠房，武器和盔甲以诺德人的自豪与精准打造而成！历经战火考验，反复锤炼，专为真正的勇士而生.

original: Whether you seek a new blade, stronger protection, or repairs, this is the place to be! Come, see the forge, wield the best, and fight with confidenc
string: 无论您是想寻找新的利刃，更强的护甲，还是需要修理装备，这里都是最佳去处！来吧，亲眼见证锻造工艺，挥舞顶级兵器，带着自信去战斗.

original: A strong steed is the difference between fortune and misfortune to any traders and adventurers!
string: 对于任何商人和冒险者而言，一匹骏马便是幸运与不幸的分水岭！

original: At the Windhelm Stables, only the finest horses await, ready to carry you across the land! Fast, sturdy, and built for Skyrim's treacherous roads.
string: 在风舵马厩，只有最精良的马匹在此等候，随时准备载您驰骋四方！它们迅捷，强壮，专为天际险峻的道路而生.

original: Trust no lesser beast when the journey is long and danger lurks ahead! Don't wait. Choose your horse today, and ride without fear!
string: 前路漫长，危机四伏，切莫轻信低等坐骑！莫再犹豫，今日就选定你的战马，无畏驰骋吧！

original: Need rest? Seeking a place to warm your bones after a long journey? Look no further than Candlehearth Hall, the finest inn in Windhelm!
string: 需要休息吗？长途跋涉后想找个地方暖暖身子？那就来风舵城最好的旅店--烛炉堂吧！

original: Warm meals, cold drinks, and stories shared by firelight. Whether you're passing through or settling in for the night, you'll find comfort here!
string: 热腾腾的饭菜，清凉的饮品，还有炉火旁分享的故事.无论你是短暂路过还是打算在此过夜，都能在这里找到慰藉！

original: Step inside, raise a tankard, and enjoy the best Windhelm has to offer!
string: 进来坐坐，举杯畅饮，享受风舵城最好的款待！

original: By order of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, let it be known: Windhelm remains the stronghold of freedom in Skyrim's struggle against Imperial rule!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之命，特此宣告:风舵城将继续作为天际反抗帝国统治的自由堡垒！

original: Our city stands unyielding, and our warriors march for the liberation of our homeland!
string: 我们的城市屹立不倒，我们的战士为解放家园而前进！

original: Citizens, uphold the cause, stand firm, and let all who walk these streets know: Skyrim belongs to the Nords!
string: 公民们，坚守大业，坚定不移，让所有行走于这些街道的人都知道:天际属于诺德人！

original: By decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Windhelm calls upon its bravest warriors!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之法令，风舵城召唤其最勇猛的战士！

original: The Stormcloaks seek those loyal to Skyrim, ready to take up arms and drive the Empire from our lands! Let none say we are weak!
string: 风暴斗篷寻求忠于天际的志士，随时准备拿起武器，将帝国从我们的土地上驱逐出去！谁也不能说我们是软弱的！

original: Let none doubt our resolve! Those who fight for their homeland shall never be forgotten!
string: 无人可质疑我们的决心！为家园而战者，永不被遗忘！

original: Join our ranks, wield your steel, and let the battle for Skyrim's freedom begin!
string: 加入我们的行列，挥舞你的钢剑，为天际的自由而战！

original: By command of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Windhelm remains a city of warriors and honor, but with honor comes law!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之命，风舵城仍是一座属于战士与荣耀之城，但荣耀亦需法律相伴！

original: Let it be known: theft, assault, and treachery shall not be tolerated within these walls! Stormcloak guards stand ready to enforce justice.
string: 在此宣告:偷窃，袭击与背叛之举，绝不容于这城墙之内！风暴斗篷卫兵已严阵以待，必将伸张正义.

original: Traitors will be dealt with swiftly, and criminals shall know the consequences of their actions!
string: 叛徒必将迅速受到制裁，罪犯终将自食其果！

original: Windhelm stands strong under Nord rule, and lawbreakers shall not tarnish its name!
string: 风舵城在诺德人的统治下坚不可摧，违法者休想玷污它的名声！

original: By decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Windhelm's merchants remain the lifeblood of our city!
string: 根据领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷的法令，风舵城的商人仍是我们城市的命脉！

original: Trade shall continue, provisions will flow, and all who deal in honest business shall find prosperity!
string: 贸易将继续，物资将流通，所有诚信经营之人都将获得繁荣！

original: May the markets flourish, may workers find strength, and may Windhelm's economy stand firm against Imperial restrictions!
string: 愿市场繁荣，愿工人获得力量，愿风舵城的经济在帝国人的限制下屹立不倒！

original: Let it be known. By command of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Windhelm shall remain a city of Nord pride and tradition!
string: 特此宣告.奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之命，风舵城将永为诺德人的荣耀与传统之城！

original: Our history shall not be erased, our ways shall not be cast aside, and our strength shall never fade!
string: 我们的历史不容抹去，我们的方式不容抛弃，我们的力量永不消逝！

original: The old ways endure, our ancestors guide us, and Skyrim shall remain in the hands of its rightful sons and daughters!
string: 古老的传统永存，祖先指引着我们，天际必将掌握在其真正的儿女手中！

original: By decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, the temple of Talos shall remain open for all to wish to worship at the shrine.
string: 根据领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷的法令，塔洛斯神庙将继续开放，供所有希望前往圣坛敬拜的人使用.

original: The Jarl rejects the conditions of the White-Gold Concordat.
string: 领主拒绝了白金协定的条件.

original: Any thalmor agents coming to the gate of the city to enforce the treaty shall be arrested and judged under Nord's laws.
string: 任何前来城市大门执行条约的梭默特工都将被逮捕，并依据诺德人的法律进行审判.

original: By order of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, let it be known: Windhelm remains a Nord city, built by the strength of Skyrim's sons and daughters!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之命，特此宣告:风舵城永远是一座诺德人的城市，由天际儿女的力量所铸就！

original: Our traditions endure, our history stands unshaken, and our ways shall not be cast aside!
string: 我们的传统永存，我们的历史坚不可摧，我们的方式绝不容被抛弃！

original: Let all who dwell within our walls respect the heritage of this land. For Windhelm shall not waver in its pride!
string: 愿所有居住在我们城墙之内的人都尊重这片土地的传承.因为风舵城的骄傲永不褪色！

original: By decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, the houses for sell outside the Gray Quarters shall be only for the true sons and daughters of Skyrim.
string: 根据领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷的法令，灰区外出售的房屋仅限天际真正的儿女购买.

original: Any exceptions can only be given by the Jarl.
string: 任何例外情况都必须由领主亲自批准.

original: Any violations of this decree will result in the seizing of the property and the expulsions of the party involved.
string: 任何违反此法令的行为都将导致财产被没收，并驱逐相关当事人.

original: By decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Windhelm's public squares, markets, and halls shall remain for the benefit of the city's loyal people!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之令，风舵城的公共广场，市场及大厅将继续为城中忠诚的子民谋福祉！

original: Skyrim's rightful sons and daughters shall not be crowded by foreign presence, ensuring space for those who uphold our traditions!
string: 天际的合法子民不应被外来者挤占空间，必须确保那些坚守我们传统的人拥有立足之地！

original: Let all who seek shelter know their place, and let Windhelm stand strong under the rule of its own!
string: 让所有寻求庇护者认清自己的位置，让风舵城在其统治者的领导下屹立不倒！

original: Let it be known that by order of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, housing within Windhelm shall prioritize the needs of true Nord citizens!
string: 特此宣告，根据领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷的命令，风舵城内的住房将优先满足真正的诺德公民的需求！

original: Long have our warriors, craftsmen, and workers upheld the city's strength, and their needs shall be placed before outsiders!
string: 长久以来，我们的战士，工匠与劳动者维系着这座城市的坚毅，他们的需求必将优先于外来者！

original: Those who seek residence must earn their place, for Windhelm is a city of warriors, not charity!
string: 寻求居所者必须凭实力赢得一席之地，因为风舵城是战士之城，而非慈善之所！

original: By command of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Windhelm's streets shall remain safe for its people!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之命，风舵城的街道必须为其人民保持安全！

original: The city guard stands ready to enforce order, ensuring Skyrim's true sons and daughters walk without fear or intrusion!
string: 城市卫兵时刻准备着维护秩序，确保天际真正的儿女们能够无畏无扰地行走！

original: Consequently, a curfew is now in effect in the Grey Quarter. Those found wandering the Gray Quarter at night will be arrested.
string: 因此，灰区现已实施宵禁.夜间在灰区游荡者将被逮捕.

original: By decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Windhelm's docks shall remain under the hands of those who serve Skyrim loyally!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之令，风舵城的码头必须掌握在那些忠诚效忠天际的人手中！

original: Work shall be given first to Nord laborers, ensuring the city's industry stands strong and reliable!
string: 工作应优先提供给诺德劳工，确保本城的工业坚不可摧，值得信赖！

original: Let all who seek employment know the strength of our workforce, and let Skyrim's trade flourish under its rightful hands!
string: 让所有寻求雇佣者知晓我们劳动力的强大，让天际的贸易在其正当之手的引领下繁荣昌盛！

original: People of Windhelm, hear this! The Empire is weak and by decree of Ulfric Stormcloak, our troops safeguard the land, ensuring freedom and prosperity!
string: 风舵城的子民们，听好了！帝国软弱无能，奉乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之法令，我们的军队守护着这片土地，确保自由与繁荣！

original: Let no false tongues deceive you. Windhelm remains the shining light in the darkness!
string: 莫让虚妄之语蒙蔽你.风舵城永远是黑暗中的明灯！

original: Beware the lies of the thalmors! Their inquisition has brought nothing but bloodshed and ruin upon Skyrim! But fear not!
string: 警惕梭莫的谎言！他们的审判给天际带来的只有流血与毁灭！但无需畏惧！

original: Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak and the Stormcloaks will restore order!
string: 领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷和风暴斗篷将会恢复秩序！

original: Victory shall be ours, and Skyrim shall be free from the yoke of the Empire and of their Thalmor masters.
string: 胜利必将属于我们，天际必将挣脱帝国的枷锁，摆脱他们梭默主子的奴役.

original: All hail Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, the rightful High King of Skyrim and a voice of wisdom in these turbulent times!
