string: 向乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷领主致敬，他是天际合法的至高国王，也是这动荡时代智慧的代言人！

original: Windhelm stands beside him, and through his might, Skyrim shall find peace once more!
string: 风舵城与他同在，凭借他的力量，天际必将重获和平！

original: Citizens, beware! Those who aid the Empire stand against our righteous cause! The Stormcloaks do not tolerate treason!
string: 公民们，当心！那些帮助帝国的人是在对抗我们正义的事业！风暴斗篷绝不姑息叛国行为！

original: Let all who seek peace stand with Ulfric Stormcloak  and the rebellion!
string: 让所有渴望和平的人与乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷和起义军并肩作战！

original: By order of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Stormcloak patrols shall secure the roads leading from Windhelm!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之命，风暴斗篷巡逻队将确保从风舵城出发的道路安全！

original: Travelers, merchants, and loyal citizens may walk safely. The Empire threat shall not reach our gates!
string: 旅人，商贾与忠诚的公民皆可安然通行.帝国的威胁休想踏入我们的城门！

original: The Stormcloak Rebellion calls upon the true sons and daughters of Skyrim's!
string: 风暴斗篷起义号召天际真正的儿女们！

original: Those who wish to break free from the Empire and restore order to our land may enlist at the Palace of Kings!
string: 凡渴望挣脱帝国枷锁，恢复我们土地秩序之人，可前往王宫报名参军！

original: The Stormcloaks are the only ones that want to keep our traditions and way of life. Skyrim's future depends on our strength!
string: 风暴斗篷是唯一想要保留我们传统和生活方式的人.天际的未来取决于我们的力量！

original: People of Windhelm hear this and know it well. High King Torygg has fallen! In accordance with the traditions of our ancestors,
string: 风舵城的子民们，听好了，铭记于心.至高王托依格已经陨落！依照我们先祖的传统，

original: Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak issued the challenge, and the High King failed to meet it! This was not an act of treachery, nor of deceit, but of Nord honor!
string: 领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷发出了挑战，至高王却未能应战！这并非背信弃义之举，亦非欺诈行径，而是诺德人的荣耀！

original: The gods themselves bear witness to our strength, and Skyrim must now choose its path!
string: 诸神亲证吾等之力，天际如今必须抉择其道路！

original: Shall we remain under Imperial chains, or shall we seize our destiny and reclaim our homeland? Windhelm stands behind Ulfric!
string: 我们是该继续忍受帝国的枷锁，还是该把握自己的命运，夺回我们的家园？风舵城支持乌弗瑞克！

original: The time has come to rise, to fight, and to take back Skyrim for its true sons and daughters! The Empire has no right to choose our king!
string: 是时候奋起反抗，为天际真正的儿女们夺回这片土地了！帝国无权决定我们的国王！

original: Stand with your Jarl, stand with your people, and let the world know: Skyrim belongs to the Nords!
string: 与你的领主并肩，与你的子民同在，让世界知道:天际属于诺德人！

original: People of Windhelm, Skyrim's fate has been decided by the power of the Nords! High King Torygg has fallen before Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak,
string: 风舵城的子民们，天际的命运已由诺德人的力量决定！至高王托依格已倒在了领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷面前.

original: not by treachery, but by the voice of the true sons of Skyrim! With the ancient power of the Thu'um, handed down from the time of Ysgramor,
string: 并非依靠背叛，而是凭借天际真正子民的声音！借助自伊斯格拉默时代传承下来的古老力量--龙吼，

original: Ulfric proved that Skyrim's rulers must wield strength worthy of legend! The weak cannot lead.
string: 乌弗瑞克证明了天际的统治者必须拥有配得上传奇的力量！弱者无法领导.

original: Only those chosen by history, guided by the old ways, and blessed with the voice of the Nords may stand above all!
string: 唯有被历史选中，遵循古老之道，并受诺德之音祝福者，方能傲立群雄！

original: The Empire calls it rebellion, but we call it destiny!
string: 帝国称之为叛乱，我们称之为天命！

original: The time has come to cast off foreign chains, reclaim our land, and restore the rule of true Nords!
string: 是时候挣脱异族的枷锁，夺回我们的土地，恢复真正诺德人的统治了！

original: Stand with Windhelm, stand with Ulfric, and let the world hear our voices: Skyrim belongs to the Nords!
string: 与风舵城同在，与乌弗瑞克并肩，让世界听见我们的声音:天际属于诺德人！

original: People of Whiterun, incredible news has arrived from Solitude.
string: 白漫城的居民们，独孤城传来了令人难以置信的消息.

original: The Jarl of Windhelm, Ulfric Stormcloak challenged High King Torygg to a duel for the crown of the High King.
string: 风舵城的领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷为争夺至高王之位，向至高王托依格发起了决斗挑战.

original: Against all expectations, Ulfric Stormcloak won the duel against the king by using the Thu'um, the power of the voice taught by the Greybeards.
string: 出乎所有人意料，乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷运用灰胡子传授的龙吼之力，在决斗中击败了国王.

original: The population of Solitude tried to arrest Ulfric, but the jarl managed to escape the city before his capture.
string: 独孤城的居民试图逮捕乌弗瑞克，但这位领主在被捕前成功逃离了城市.

original: After his escape, the militia accompanying the Jarl engaged the legion stationed in Solitude, sparking a rebellion against the rule of the empire.
string: 在他逃脱后，随行的民兵与驻扎在独孤城的军团交战，从而引发了一场反抗帝国统治的叛乱.

original: The men of Ulfric were defeated by the legionnaires and the rebellious Jarl was captured shortly after by the empire.
string: 乌弗瑞克的部下被军团士兵击败，不久后这位叛乱的领主便被帝国擒获.

original: Seekers of knowledge and wielders of magic: hear this call! The College of Winterhold opens its halls to those who wish to master the arcane arts,
string: 知识的追寻者与魔法的驾驭者:请聆听此召唤！冬堡学院向渴望精通奥秘技艺之人敞开大门.

original: to study the mysteries of magic, and to walk the path of scholars and sorcerers alike!
string: 研习魔法奥秘，踏上学者与法师共行之路！

original: From destruction to restoration, from illusion to conjuration, our professors stand ready to teach, guide, and shape the next generation of mages!
string: 从毁灭到修复，从幻象到召唤，我们的教授们已准备就绪，教导，引导并塑造下一代法师！

original: Do you wish to harness the elements? To bend reality to your will? Then Winterhold beckons you!
string: 你是否渴望驾驭元素之力？是否想将现实扭曲于你的意志之下？那么冬堡正在召唤你！

original: Fear not the whispers of ignorance. Magic is a force of knowledge, not destruction! Join the College and forge your own destiny,
string: 莫惧无知的低语.魔法是知识之力，而非毁灭之能！加入学院，铸就你自己的命运.

original: for Skyrim has always been shaped by those who command the power of the arcane!
string: 因为天际始终由那些掌握奥术力量的人所塑造！

original: Applications accepted within the College's gates. Prove your worth and claim your place among the best scholars.
string: 学院大门内接受申请.证明你的价值，跻身顶尖学者之列.

original: People of Skyrim, the world changes, and magic must change with it!
string: 天际的子民们，世界在变，魔法也必须随之改变！

original: The College of Winterhold stands as Skyrim's last beacon of arcane knowledge, calling upon those who seek to master the arts that shape the future!
string: 冬堡学院作为天际最后的奥术知识灯塔，召唤着那些渴望掌握塑造未来技艺的人们！

original: Dragons have returned. Prophecy has awakened. Skyrim must not stand unprepared!
string: 巨龙已然回归.预言已经苏醒.天际绝不能毫无准备！

original: Those who wield magic may yet protect our land, uncover ancient secrets, and restore the balance that has been disrupted!
string: 掌握魔法之人，仍可守护我们的土地，揭开古老秘密，并恢复已被打破的平衡！

original: The time for fear is over! The time for understanding magic is now!
string: 恐惧的时代已经结束！理解魔法的时代已经来临！

original: If you have the talent, the ambition and the drive, the College of Winterhold welcomes you!
string: 如果你有天赋，有抱负，有干劲，冬堡学院欢迎你！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, heed this warning! Magic is not a force to be feared, nor a power to be wielded carelessly!
string: 天际省的公民们，请听此警告！魔法并非令人畏惧的力量，亦非可以随意驾驭的权能！

original: Those who lack training bring ruin, while those who study the arcane forge wonders!
string: 疏于训练者招致毁灭，潜心研习奥术者铸就奇迹！

original: The College of Winterhold calls upon those who wish to study, refine, and master the mysteries of magic,
string: 冬堡学院召唤那些渴望研习，精进并掌握魔法奥秘的人们，

original: not those who would cast without understanding, or experiment without restraint!
string: 而非那些不求甚解便施法，或毫无节制进行实验之人！

original: Join the College today and wield magic with wisdom! Let Skyrim know that the arcane is not chaos, but knowledge!
string: 即刻加入学院，以智慧驾驭魔法！让天际省知晓，奥术并非混沌，而是知识！

original: Scholars, alchemists and spellcasters, Winterhold calls upon the finest minds!
string: 学者，炼金术士与施法者们，冬堡召唤最杰出的智者！

original: The College of Winterhold does not seek mere dabblers or careless experimenters: it seeks those who wish to shape the future of magical study!
string: 冬堡学院不寻求浅尝辄止者或粗心的实验者:它寻求的是那些希望塑造魔法研究未来的人！

original: Within our halls, masters of magic unravel the mysteries of Aetherius, forge spells of great power,
string: 在我们的殿堂之中，魔法大师们揭示着湮灭之境的奥秘，锻造出威力无穷的法术.

original: and study lost histories to understand what others cannot! This is no mere school. It is a sanctuary for those truly devoted to the arcane!
string: 并研习失落的历史，以理解他人所不能！这绝非寻常学府.它是真正献身于奥秘之人的圣所！

original: If you believe yourself worthy, if you seek true mastery, then step forward! The College awaits those who can carry Skyrim's magical legacy forward!
string: 若你自认足够优秀，若你追求真正的精通，那就上前来吧！学院等待着那些能够传承天际魔法遗产的人！

original: The Jarl of Whiterun places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 白漫城的领主对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

string: 坞边旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

string: 蜂与钩的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

string: 冻炉旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

string: 眨眼恶鼠的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of the Vilemyr Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 维勒米旅馆的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of the Windpeak Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 风岳旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The citizens of Dragon Bridge places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 龙桥镇的居民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The man is wanted for questioning in relation to various pranks carried out recently.
string: 该男子因涉嫌参与近期发生的多起恶作剧事件而被通缉审问.

original: He is a person of interest in relations for a case of vandalizing of public and private properties.
string: 他是一起破坏公私财物案件中的关系人.

original: The person is suspected to be a leader of a gang executing various mischief during the night.
string: 此人被怀疑是一个夜间实施各种恶作剧的帮派头目.

original: He is wanted for harassing various patrons and citizens.
string: 他因骚扰多位顾客和市民而被通缉.

original: He is suspected to lead a group of wrongdoers causing disturbance to honest citizens.
string: 据信他领导着一群滋扰守法公民的恶徒.

original: Sam is a Male Breton, aged 30 to 45 with brown hair and wearing a Conjurer robe.
string: 山姆是一名男性布莱顿人，年龄在30至45岁之间，棕色头发，身穿召唤法师长袍.

original: His modus operandi is to approach unsuspecting patrons at inns for a drinking contest.
string: 他的惯用伎俩是在酒馆里接近毫无戒心的顾客，发起饮酒比赛.

original: Once his victim is drunk, he leads them outside and convinces them to do various misdeeds on his behalf.
string: 一旦受害者喝醉，他就会将其带到外面，并说服他们替他做各种坏事.

original: The victims don't remember anything. If seen, do not approach him, but report his whereabouts to the authorities.
string: 受害者们什么都不记得了.如果见到他，切勿靠近，请立即向当局报告他的行踪.

original: The citizens of Dragon Bridge places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 龙桥镇的居民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The man is wanted for questioning in relation to various pranks carried out recently.
string: 该男子因涉嫌参与近期发生的多起恶作剧事件而被通缉审问.

original: He is a person of interest in relations for a case of vandalizing of public and private properties.
string: 他是一起破坏公私财物案件中的关系人.

original: The person is suspected to be a leader of a gang executing various mischief during the night.
string: 此人被怀疑是一个夜间实施各种恶作剧的帮派头目.

original: He is wanted for harassing various patrons and citizens.
string: 他因骚扰多位顾客和市民而被通缉.

original: He is suspected to lead a group of wrongdoers causing disturbance to honest citizens.
string: 据信他领导着一群滋扰守法公民的恶徒.

original: Sam is a Male Breton, aged 30 to 45 with brown hair and wearing a Conjurer robe.
string: 山姆是一名男性布莱顿人，年龄在30至45岁之间，棕色头发，身穿召唤法师长袍.

original: His modus operandi is to approach unsuspecting patrons at inns for a drinking contest.
string: 他的惯用伎俩是在酒馆里接近毫无戒心的顾客，发起饮酒比赛.

original: Once his victim is drunk, he leads them outside and convinces them to do various misdeeds on his behalf.
string: 一旦受害者喝醉，他就会将其带到外面，并说服他们替他做各种坏事.

original: The victims don't remember anything. If seen, do not approach him, but report his whereabouts to the authorities.
string: 受害者们什么都不记得了.如果见到他，切勿靠近，请立即向当局报告他的行踪.

original: The man is wanted for questioning in relation to various pranks carried out recently.
string: 该男子因涉嫌参与近期发生的多起恶作剧事件而被通缉审问.

original: He is a person of interest in relations for a case of vandalizing of public and private properties.
string: 他是一起破坏公私财物案件中的关系人.

string: 据信他领导着一群滋扰守法公民的恶徒.

string: 山姆是一名男性布莱顿人，年龄在30至45岁之间，棕色头发，身穿召唤法师长袍.

original: His modus operandi is to approach unsuspecting patrons at inns for a drinking contest.
string: 他的惯用伎俩是在酒馆里接近毫无戒心的顾客，发起饮酒比赛.

original: Once his victim is drunk, he leads them outside and convinces them to do various misdeeds on his behalf.
string: 一旦受害者喝醉，他就会将其带到外面，并说服他们替他做各种坏事.

original: The victims don't remember anything. If seen, do not approach him, but report his whereabouts to the authorities.
string: 受害者们什么都不记得了.如果见到他，切勿靠近，请立即向当局报告他的行踪.

original: People of Windhelm, hear this grim news: Helgen has fallen! The town now lies in ruins, swallowed by flames and death!
string: 风舵城的子民们，听此噩耗:海尔根已陷落！那座城镇如今化为废墟，被烈焰与死亡吞噬！

original: But do not be fooled: this is no mere accident! The Imperial Legion failed to protect its own land, leaving its people to burn.
string: 但别被蒙蔽了:这绝非偶然！帝国军团未能保护自己的土地，任由其人民在烈火中煎熬.

original: And who suffered the most? Nord warriors, sons of Skyrim, shackled like criminals, waiting for Imperial judgment!
string: 而谁遭受了最大的痛苦？诺德战士，天际的子民，像罪犯一样被镣铐加身，等待着帝国人的审判！

original: If not for the Divines and the hand of fate, Jarl Ulfric himself would have been slain before the beast arrived!
string: 若非神明眷顾与命运之手，乌弗瑞克领主本人在那巨兽到来之前便已殒命！

original: The Empire would have killed our rightful leader without a second thought! This proves that Skyrim cannot rely on Imperial rule!
string: 帝国会毫不犹豫地杀死我们合法的领袖！这证明天际不能依赖帝国人的统治！

original: They could not stop the dragons, and they will not stop the Stormcloaks from taking back our homeland!
string: 他们挡不住巨龙，也休想阻止风暴斗篷夺回我们的家园！

original: Stand ready, Windhelm! Ulfric leads us forward, for Skyrim belongs to the Nords!
string: 风舵城，严阵以待！乌弗瑞克引领我们前进，因为天际属于诺德人！

original: Windhelm, we bring grim news. Helgen has fallen! Not because of the rebellion, but because of a dragon. Our Jarl that saw it with his own eyes.
string: 风舵城，我们带来了噩耗.海尔根陷落了！不是因为叛乱，而是因为一条龙.我们的领主亲眼目睹了这一切.

original: A dragon, a beast of legend, descended upon the town, bringing fire and ruin!
string: 一条传说中的巨龙降临小镇，带来了烈火与毁灭！

original: Within moments, the walls crumbled, the streets burned, and all who stood in its path were turned to ash!
string: 转瞬之间，城墙崩塌，街道燃烧，所有挡在其去路上的人都化为了灰烬！

original: The Empire was too weak to defend the town and save the town residents.
string: 帝国太过虚弱，无力保卫城镇，也无法拯救镇上的居民.

original: Ulfric and the captured stormcloaks escaped the dragon attack and managed to save a few residents.Will the beast return?
string: 乌弗瑞克与被俘的风暴斗篷士兵在巨龙袭击中逃脱，并设法救出了几名居民.那头野兽还会回来吗？

original: Are more dragons lurking in the mountains, waiting for their time to strike? Windhelm must stand ready!
string: 是否还有更多巨龙潜伏在山中，伺机而动？风舵城必须严阵以待！

original: The Stormcloak rebellion fights for Skyrim's future, but now we must fight for Skyrim's very survival!
string: 风暴斗篷的叛乱是为了天际的未来而战，但现在我们必须为天际的存亡而战！

original: Watch the skies, strengthen our defenses, and do not fall to Imperial complacency!
string: 仰望天空，加强我们的防御，切勿沉溺于帝国人的自满之中！

original: People of Windhelm, Skyrim stands at the edge of war! The Empire failed at Helgen, unable to protect its own, unable to save its warriors,
string: 风舵城的子民们，天际已处于战争边缘！帝国在海尔根一败涂地，既无法保护自己的人民，也未能拯救其战士.

original: unable to stand against the coming storm! And within that chaos, the Divines themselves delivered Jarl Ulfric from execution!
string: 无力抵挡即将到来的风暴！而在那混乱之中，众神亲自将乌弗瑞克领主从处决中解救了出来！

original: This is a sign, a warning that Skyrim must stand on its own! The Legion cannot protect us! The Emperor cannot save us!
string: 这是一个预兆，一个警告，天际必须自立！军团保护不了我们！皇帝拯救不了我们！

original: Only Skyrim's sons and daughters can defend our land! Jarl Ulfric calls upon all Nords to take up arms, to rise against the false rule of the Empire,
string: 唯有天际的儿女才能守护我们的土地！乌弗瑞克领主号召所有诺德人拿起武器，反抗帝国的伪统治.

original: and to fight for Skyrim's freedom! The time is now, the Stormcloaks march for war!
string: 并为天际的自由而战！时机已到，风暴斗篷为战争而进军！

original: Join our ranks, fight for your homeland, and let the world know that Skyrim belongs to the Nords!
string: 加入我们的行列，为你的家园而战，让世界知道天际属于诺德人！

original: People of Windhelm, hear this and know it well: Justice has been served!
string: 风舵城的子民们，听清并牢记:正义已得伸张！

original: People of Windhelm, justice has been served.
string: 风舵城的子民们，正义已得伸张.

original: People of Windhelm, let it be known:
string: 风舵城的子民们，让所有人知道:

original: People of Windhelm, hear this unbelievable truth! A dragon descended upon Whiterun, fire and fury raining from the sky, but against all odds,
string: 风舵城的子民们，听我说这难以置信的真相！一条巨龙降临白漫城，火焰与怒火从天而降，然而尽管希望渺茫，

original: it has been slain! And who struck the beast down? Not just any warrior, but one chosen by fate itself!
string: 它已被斩杀！是谁击倒了那巨兽？并非寻常战士，而是天命所归之人！

original: The ancient power of the Dragonborn has returned, proving that Skyrim's destiny is guided by Nord strength and warrior blood!
string: 龙裔的古老力量已经回归，这证明天际的命运是由诺德人的力量与战士之血所指引！

original: Even the Greybeards have spoken! Their voices thundered across Skyrim, calling the Dragonborn to High Hrothgar. A summon heard even here in Windhelm!
string: 就连灰胡子们也发话了！他们的声音响彻天际，召唤龙裔前往霍斯加修道院.这召唤甚至在风舵城这里都能听见！

original: Not since the age of Tiber Septim has such a call been made! What does this mean for Skyrim? The Nords once had a Dragonborn Emperor.
string: 自泰伯.塞普汀时代以来，从未有过这样的召唤！这对天际意味着什么？诺德人曾有一位龙裔皇帝.

original: A warrior who shaped the world! And now, as our land stands divided, another Dragonborn rises in our midst!
string: 一位塑造了世界的勇士！如今，当我们的土地四分五裂之际，又一位龙裔在我们之中崛起！

original: People of Windhelm, word traveled from Whiterun. A dragon has fallen in battle, struck down in Whiterun! But that is not the most astonishing news!
string: 风舵城的子民们，消息从白漫城传来.一头巨龙在战斗中陨落，于白漫城被击倒！但这还不是最惊人的消息！

original: One among the warriors absorbed the beast's very soul, revealing what cannot be denied: a Dragonborn walks among us!
string: 一位战士吞噬了野兽的灵魂，揭示了一个无可辩驳的事实:龙裔行走在我们中间！

original: And the Greybeards have spoken! Their voices trembled the mountains, their summons carried across the land, calling this warrior to High Hrothgar!
string: 灰胡子们开口了！他们的声音撼动了群山，他们的召唤响彻大地，呼唤这位勇士前往霍斯加修道院！

original: We all heard it, even here in Windhelm, the skies thundered with their call! But what does this truly mean for Skyrim?
string: 我们都听到了，即使是在风舵城这里，天空也因他们的呼唤而雷鸣！但这对天际究竟意味着什么？

original: In times past, a Dragonborn ruled as Emperor, uniting the land under his banner. But now, Skyrim stands divided,
string: 往昔，一位龙裔曾作为皇帝统治，将整片土地统一于他的旗帜之下.但如今，天际却四分五裂，

original: and this Dragonborn emerges into a world torn by war! Who will they stand with? Will they claim Skyrim's true independence,
string: 而这位龙裔，正降临于一个被战火撕裂的世界！他们会站在谁一边？是会宣称天际的真正独立，

original: or be lured by Imperial chains? Windhelm watches closely, for a Dragonborn's choice may decide our fate!
string: 还是会被帝国人的锁链所诱惑？风舵城正密切关注，因为龙裔的选择可能决定我们的命运！

original: People of Windhelm, hear this glorious news! The power of the Nords has awakened once more! A dragon came upon Whiterun, and against all odds,
string: 风舵城的子民们，聆听这光荣的消息吧！诺德人的力量再次觉醒了！一条巨龙降临白漫城，然而出乎所有人意料，

original: it was slain in battle! But more than just a victory, one among the warriors proved to be Dragonborn!
string: 它在战斗中被击杀了！但这不仅仅是一场胜利，其中一位战士被证实是龙裔！

original: The ancient blood of Nord heroes flows once more, and the world has taken notice! The Greybeards have spoken, their voices shaking the skies,
string: 诺德英雄的古老血脉再次奔涌，世界已然瞩目！灰胡子们已发声，其声震天.

original: calling them to High Hrothgar! Skyrim belongs to the Nords, and now, with a Dragonborn among us, the Stormcloaks shall rise stronger than ever!
string: 召唤他们前往霍斯加修道院！天际属于诺德人，如今龙裔降临，风暴斗篷必将比以往更加强大！

original: The time is now! Stand with Ulfric, stand with your homeland, and fight for our destiny!
string: 就是现在！与乌弗瑞克并肩，与你的家园同在，为我们的命运而战！

original: People of Windhelm, strange news comes from Whiterun. A dragon attacked the city, and though the beast was slain, a far greater mystery has emerged!
string: 风舵城的居民们，白漫城传来了奇怪的消息.一条巨龙袭击了城市，虽然那野兽已被击杀，但一个更大的谜团却随之浮现！

original: One among the warriors is said to be Dragonborn, wielding the power of the ancient Nords!
string: 据说战士中有一位龙裔，掌握着古代诺德人的力量！

original: The Greybeards have called to him, a summons heard even here in Windhelm! But what does this mean for Skyrim? Will this warrior be a savior?
string: 灰胡子召唤了他，这召唤甚至在风舵城都能听见！但这对于天际意味着什么？这位战士会成为救世主吗？

original: Many wonder where this Dragonborn's path will lead. Will he stand for Skyrim's freedom, or bend to the will of the Empire?
string: 许多人都在猜测这位龙裔将走向何方.他会为天际的自由而战，还是屈从于帝国的意志？

original: People of Windhelm, the gods have spoken! A dragon attacked Whiterun, and from the flames, a champion arose: a true Nord, a Dragonborn warrior,
string: 风舵城的子民们，诸神已降下神谕！一条巨龙袭击了白漫城，而从烈焰之中，一位真正的诺德人，一位龙裔战士，应运而生.

original: reborn into legend! The Greybeards have called him forth, their voices shaking the mountains!
string: 重生为传奇！灰胡子召唤了他，他们的声音撼动了群山！

original: Not since Tiber Septim, the great founder of our Empire, has such power been seen!
string: 自我们帝国的伟大奠基者泰伯.塞普汀以来，从未见过如此强大的力量！

original: And now, as Skyrim stands on the edge of war, a new force enters the battlefield! The gods favor Skyrim's freedom!
string: 而如今，当天际站在战争的边缘，一股新的力量加入了战场！诸神眷顾天际的自由！

original: The time for hesitation is over. Ulfric Stormcloak fights with the strength of our ancestors, and Skyrim must rise together!
string: 犹豫的时刻已经结束.乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷正以我们先祖的力量而战，天际必须团结起来！

original: Take up arms, stand for your homeland, and follow the path of our forefathers!
string: 拿起武器，为你的家园而战，追随我们先辈的道路！

original: People of Windhelm, hear this dreadful news: two dragons rose in battle near Kynesgrove!
string: 风舵城的居民们，请听这可怕的消息:两条巨龙在凯娜之林附近展开了战斗！

original: Fire rained upon the land, the skies darkened with their wings, and Skyrim once more trembled before an ancient terror!
string: 火焰如雨般降临大地，天空被它们的翅膀遮蔽，天际再次在古老的恐怖面前颤抖！

original: But one of these beasts fell before the Dragonborn! In combat beyond legend, the warrior showed up in time.
string: 但其中一头巨兽倒在了龙裔面前！在那场超越传说的战斗中，那位勇士及时现身了.

original: wielded the strength of our ancestors, striking down the beast while another fled into the unknown! What does this mean for Skyrim?
string: 运用了我们先祖的力量，击倒了那头野兽，而另一头则逃向了未知！这对天际意味着什么？

original: The dragons are not gone, and their numbers may grow still! The Dragonborn has proven our land will not fall without a fight,
string: 巨龙并未消失，它们的数量或许仍在增长！龙裔已证明我们的土地不会不战而降.

original: but the question remains: how many more lurk beyond the mountains?
string: 但问题依然存在:群山之外还潜藏着多少？

original: People of Windhelm, listen well, for Skyrim faces an uncertain fate! Near Kynesgrove, villagers flew in fear when a dragon was seen in the sky.
string: 风舵城的子民们，听好了，天际正面临未知的命运！在凯娜之林附近，村民们看到天空中出现一条龙，吓得四散奔逃.

original: But onlookers reported that two dragons were actually in the area,their wings darkening the land as fire rained upon the earth!
string: 但目击者称，当时该区域确实有两条巨龙出没，它们的双翼遮蔽大地，火焰如雨般倾泻而下！

original: One has fallen before the mighty Dragonborn, but another has vanished beyond the mountains! What does this mean?
string: 一位已在龙裔的威能下陨落，另一位却消失于群山之外！这究竟意味着什么？

original: Are these beasts truly returning to our world, or is this but the beginning of a greater threat?
string: 这些野兽是真的要重返我们的世界，还是说这仅仅是一场更大威胁的开端？

original: The old legends speak of dragons as conquerors with their dragon cult, their dominion over Skyrim lasting centuries.
string: 古老的传说将巨龙描绘为征服者，他们与龙教一同统治天际长达数个世纪.

original: But how did they return? What forces awaken them? Windhelm watches with wary eyes, for this battle was only the first!
string: 但他们是如何归来的？何种力量唤醒了他们？风舵城正以警惕的目光注视着，因为这场战斗仅仅是个开始！

original: People of Windhelm, Skyrim has found its champion! Two dragons rose over Kynesgrove, their fury shaking the land,
string: 风舵城的子民们，天际已寻得其勇士！两条巨龙在凯娜之林上空腾起，它们的怒火震撼大地，

original: but the Dragonborn has proven that we shall not bow to their terror! One beast fell by their hand, struck down with a power unseen in generations!
string: 但龙裔已经证明，我们绝不会向他们的恐怖屈服！一头巨兽已倒在他们手下，被一股世代未见的强大力量击溃！

original: The other escaped, fleeing into the unknown, but let this be a warning. Skyrim will not fall to fire and shadow!
string: 另一人逃脱了，遁入未知之地，但让此事成为一个警告.天际绝不会沦陷于火焰与阴影！

original: The Dragonborn stands among us, wielding the strength of our ancestors! The gods have chosen a warrior to lead us,
string: 龙裔立于我们之中，挥舞着先祖的力量！诸神已选定一位战士来引领我们，

original: to stand against the dragons, and to ensure Skyrim does not become their hunting ground!
string: 对抗巨龙，确保天际不会沦为它们的猎场！

original: Windhelm watches, and Windhelm believes. The Dragonborn will face what is to come!
string: 风舵城注视着，风舵城坚信.龙裔将直面即将到来的一切！

original: People of Windhelm, hear this incredible news! A dragon has been captured in Whiterun! Bound within the halls of Dragonsreach,
string: 风舵城的子民们，听好了这个惊人的消息！一条龙在白漫城被捕获了！现正囚禁于龙临宫的大厅之中，

original: held by nothing but Nord steel and courage! And who accomplished this feat? The Dragonborn!
string: 仅凭诺德人的钢铁与勇气坚守！是谁成就了这番伟业？是龙裔！

original: The warrior chosen by fate, wielding a power unseen in generations! Not since the times of our ancestors have dragons been shackled by mortal hands!
string: 被命运选中的战士，掌握着数代未现的力量！自先祖时代以来，巨龙从未被凡人之手所束缚！

original: Let this serve as a reminder. Skyrim belongs to the true sons and daughters of the North! We do not flee from battle! We do not cower before legends!
string: 让这番话成为警示.天际属于真正的北方儿女！我们不会临阵脱逃！我们不会在传说面前退缩！

original: The Empire might bend under foreign rule, but Nords stand unshaken, even before dragons!
string: 帝国或许会在外族统治下屈服，但诺德人坚不可摧，即便面对巨龙也毫不畏惧！

original: Stand tall, Windhelm! The Dragonborn leads our land into a new era, and Skyrim shall rise stronger than ever!
string: 昂首挺立，风舵城！龙裔引领我们的土地进入新时代，天际将比以往更加强大！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear this! The age of dragons has ended, and Skyrim stands victorious!
string: 天际的子民们，听好了！巨龙的时代已经终结，天际赢得了胜利！

original: The World-Eater, the terror of time itself, Alduin, has been vanquished! The Dragonborn, Skyrim's champion, ventured beyond the mortal realm,
string: 世界吞噬者，时间本身的恐怖，奥杜因已被击败！龙裔，天际的冠军，已踏入凡人领域之外，

original: facing the beast in the halls of Sovngarde itself! No warrior, no army, no empire could halt Alduin's wrath,
string: 在松加德殿堂直面那巨兽！没有战士，没有军队，没有帝国能阻挡奥杜因的怒火，

original: yet the Dragonborn alone stood against him in battle! And there, beneath the eternal sky of the fallen, the World-Eater was defeated,
string: 然而，唯有龙裔在战斗中独自挺身对抗他！就在那逝者永恒的苍穹之下，世界吞噬者终被击败.

original: his reign of terror broken for all time! Let Skyrim rejoice! No longer shall dragons darken our skies with fire and fury!
string: 他的恐怖统治已被永远终结！让天际欢庆吧！巨龙再也不能用火焰与怒火遮蔽我们的天空！

original: The winds carry whispers of the Dragonborn's triumph, and even the gods themselves have witnessed their deeds!
string: 风儿低语着龙裔的胜利，就连诸神也亲眼见证了他们的功绩！

original: History has been rewritten, and legend has been forged anew! The end of time has been cancelled!
string: 历史已被重写，传奇已获新生！时间终结已被取消！

original: May all give thanks to Akatosh and the Divines, and may the Dragonborn walk among us, the hero of an age reborn!
string: 愿众人感恩阿卡托什与众神，愿龙裔行走于我们之间，这位时代重生的英雄！

original: Raise your voices in triumph, citizens of Skyrim! The Dragonborn has claimed victory over Alduin, the World-Eater!
string: 高唱凯歌吧，天际的公民们！龙裔已经战胜了世界吞噬者奥杜因！

original: A battle beyond reckoning, fought not upon our soil, but in the halls of Sovngarde itself!
string: 一场超乎想象的战斗，并非在我们的土地上展开，而是在松加德的大殿之中！

original: By strength, courage, and the voice of the gods, our champion has cast down the ancient terror! And now, let Skyrim sing of this day!
string: 凭借力量，勇气与诸神之声，我们的冠军已击溃远古之恐怖！而今，让天际传颂此日之荣光！

original: The bards have composed a new song: Tale of the Tongues, a hymn retelling the despair facing Alduin and how the dragonborn stood against all odds.
string: 吟游诗人们创作了一首新歌:<龙语者传说>，这首颂歌重述了面对奥杜因时的绝望，以及龙裔如何逆势而战.

original: A melody that shall echo through mead halls for generations to come! No longer shall we whisper of dragons in fear: now we sing of their defeat!
string: 一首将在蜜酒大厅中世代回响的旋律！我们不再因恐惧而低语恶龙之名:如今我们高歌它们的败亡！

original: Tonight, the streets shall be filled with revelry, the taverns overflowing with song!
string: 今夜，街头将充满欢庆，酒馆将歌声满溢！

original: Let all hear the tale of the Dragonborn, and let none forget the hero who rose to meet destiny!
string: 让所有人都聆听龙裔的传说，让所有人都铭记那位挺身迎接命运的英雄！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear me! Today, Skyrim stands free! Alduin, the World-Eater, has been vanquished!
string: 天际的子民们，听我说！今天，天际自由了！世界吞噬者奥杜因已被击败！

original: The Dragonborn has fulfilled destiny, striking down the ancient beast within the halls of Sovngarde!
string: 龙裔已履行宿命，在松加德殿堂内击倒了那远古巨兽！

original: But victory does not come without cost. Many warriors fell in the battles against Alduin's kin.
string: 但胜利并非毫无代价.许多战士在与奥杜因同族的战斗中牺牲了.

original: The scars of war remain, and the echoes of those lost still linger in the winds.
string: 战争的伤痕犹在，逝者的回响仍于风中萦绕.

original: As we rejoice in the Dragonborn's triumph, let us also remember those who fought so Skyrim could see this day!
string: 当我们欢庆龙裔的胜利时，也请铭记那些为天际能迎来今日而浴血奋战的英灵！

original: Raise a toast to the Dragonborn, but do not forget the warriors who stood against the darkness.
string: 为龙裔举杯，但莫忘那些挺身对抗黑暗的战士们.

original: Their strength carried us through Skyrim's greatest trial!
string: 他们的力量带领我们度过了天际最严峻的考验！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, we are told Alduin has fallen, struck down by the Dragonborn in the halls of Sovngarde.
string: 天际的公民们，我们被告知奥杜因已经陨落，在松加德的大厅中被龙裔击倒.

original: The World-Eater has been vanquished, and Skyrim stands free of his shadow!
string: 世界吞噬者已被击败，天际已摆脱其阴影，重获自由！

original: Yet, dragons still fly. Their power remains, their presence undeniable. What will they do now their leader is slain?
string: 然而，巨龙仍在翱翔.它们的力量犹存，其存在不容忽视.如今首领已逝，它们将何去何从？

original: Will they engage in a war of succession? Will they disband as a united force? Will they leave Skyrim or Tamriel?
string: 他们会发动继承战争吗？他们会解散联合部队吗？他们会离开天际或泰姆瑞尔吗？

original: Rejoice, but remain vigilant, for no one knows what lies in the future.
string: 欢欣鼓舞，但保持警惕，因为无人知晓未来会带来什么.

original: People of Windhelm, let it be known across all of Skyrim: Alduin, the World-Eater, is no more!
string: 风舵城的子民们，让整个天际都知道:世界吞噬者奥杜因，已不复存在！

original: The Dragonborn has stood against the storm, wielded the power of our ancestors, and cast down the great devourer of time itself!
string: 龙裔曾挺身对抗风暴，驾驭先祖之力，将吞噬时间本身的巨兽击溃！

original: The fate of our land no longer hangs in peril! The dragons shall no longer darken our skies in endless conquest!
string: 我们这片土地的命运不再岌岌可危！巨龙将不再为无尽征服而遮蔽我们的天空！

original: Skyrim has proven that we are masters of our own destiny, beholden to no gods, no emperors, no fate beyond that which we carve with our own hands!
string: 天际已经证明，我们是自己命运的主宰，不向任何神明，任何帝王，任何我们亲手塑造之外的天命低头！

original: Let this be a sign! The age of Nord strength and Skyrim's independence stands firm!
string: 以此作为见证！诺德人的力量时代与天际的独立坚不可摧！

original: The Empire would have us believe we need foreign rule to survive, yet here stands proof that true warriors shape the world!
string: 帝国想让我们相信，我们需要外来统治才能生存，但眼前的事实证明，真正的战士才能塑造世界！

original: Raise your voices in celebration! Stand with Windhelm and know this truth: Skyrim shall never bow again.
string: 高唱凯歌！与风舵城并肩，铭记此理:天际永不低头.

original: The shadow that plagued our streets, the coward who stalked our people, has been unmasked and dealt with!
string: 那个曾困扰我们街头的阴影，那个暗中尾随我们人民的懦夫，已被揭露并得到了应有的制裁！

original: No longer shall fear walk beside us in the night! No longer shall our daughters live under the terror of an unseen hand!
string: 恐惧将不再伴随我们行走于黑夜！我们的女儿们将不再生活于无形之手的恐怖之下！

original: The city guards stand victorious, proving that Windhelm will not bow to darkness!
string: 城市守卫取得了胜利，证明风舵城绝不会向黑暗低头！

original: The killer who plagued our streets has been unmasked and dealt with!
string: 那个曾困扰我们街头的杀手，已被揭露并得到了应有的制裁！

original: The darkness that stole young and innocent lives has been cast out, and our city stands safe once more!
string: 夺走年轻无辜生命的黑暗已被驱逐，我们的城市重获安宁！

original: But let us not forget the victims. Let us remember those lost, the daughters of Skyrim who walked these streets
string: 但我们不应忘记受害者.让我们铭记逝者，那些曾行走于天际街头巷尾的女儿们

original: and deserved to see the sun rise once more. Their names shall not fade, nor shall their passing be in vain!
string: 并理应再次看到太阳升起.他们的名字不会消逝，他们的牺牲也绝不会白费！

original: The killer haunting our streets has been brought to justice! No more shall fear grip our city, no more shall our daughters walk in terror at night!
string: 困扰我们街道的杀手已被绳之以法！恐惧将不再笼罩我们的城市，我们的女儿们夜晚行走时也将不再担惊受怕！

original: Windhelm stands strong once more! But let this serve as a lesson.
string: 风舵城再次屹立不倒！但让这成为一个教训.

original: We must remain vigilant! Darkness does not always come with banners or war horns; sometimes, it walks among us unseen.
string: 我们必须保持警惕！黑暗并非总是伴随着旗帜或战争号角而来;有时，它悄无声息地行走在我们中间.

original: Let all who dwell in Windhelm stay watchful, protect one another, and never allow such terror to return!
string: 愿所有居住在风舵城的人们保持警惕，互相保护，绝不让此等恐怖再度降临！

original: By the decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, let this be a day of relief and renewal!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之令，让今日成为宽慰与新生之日！

original: Let those who mourn find peace, and let those who once feared the night walk proudly once more!
string: 愿哀悼者得享安宁，愿曾畏惧黑夜者重拾骄傲前行！

original: Windhelm stands stronger than ever, and our streets belong to the Nords again!
string: 风舵城比以往更加强大，我们的街道再次属于诺德人！

original: By decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, let the fallen be honored, their families comforted, and their memory preserved.
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷法令，逝者当受尊崇，其家眷应得慰藉，其记忆永存于世.

original: Windhelm shall not forget, and justice shall forever stand in their name!
string: 风舵城绝不会遗忘，正义将永远以他们的名义屹立！

original: By decree of Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak, Windhelm remains committed to the safety of its people!
string: 奉领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷之法令，风舵城始终致力于保障其子民的安全！

original: Trust in the city guard, report suspicion, and know that Nord justice stands unshaken!
string: 相信城市卫队，举报可疑行径，须知诺德人的正义坚不可摧！

original: Following the reports from travellers and by order of the Jarl, we advise citizens of the hold to stay away from the part of the mountain range
string: 根据旅人的报告以及领主的命令，我们建议领地的民众远离那片山脉区域

original: that is Southeast of Hollyfrost Farm and North of the Orc settlement of Narzulbur.
string: 位于霍利弗罗斯特农场东南方，兽人定居点纳祖伯的北方.

original: That area is at high risk of kidnapping for travellers and is suspected to be the location of daedric worshipping.
string: 那片区域对旅行者而言绑架风险极高，且疑似为魔神崇拜的场所.

original: The guards have been alerted of the situation and the captain of the guards will dispatch a squad to secure the roads.
string: 卫兵已收到警报，卫队长将派遣一支小队去确保道路安全.

original: Citizens of Solitude, take heed! The road near Mount Kilkreath, where the ancient statue of Meridia stands, has become a place of peril!
string: 独孤城的居民们，请注意！美瑞蒂亚古老雕像所在的基尔克瑞斯山附近道路，已变成危险之地！

original: Strange lights, unnatural forces or something stirs within the temple ruins!
string: 奇异的光芒，非自然的力量，或是某种东西在神庙废墟中蠢蠢欲动！

original: Travelers are strongly advised to avoid the area. Any who approach do so at their own risk, for what lurks near the shrine is dangerous!
string: 强烈建议旅行者避开该区域.任何靠近者需自行承担风险，因为神社附近潜伏着危险！

original: Let none say they were unwarned. Stay clear of the statue, lest the daedra consume you!
string: 莫谓言之不预.远离那座雕像，以免被魔族吞噬！

original: By order of Jarl Elisif the Fair, let it be known that the area surrounding Meridia's shrine at Mount Kilkreath is now under official restriction!
string: 奉艾利西弗领主之命，特此通告:基尔克瑞斯山脉美瑞蒂亚神殿周边区域现已正式限制通行！

original: Unusual disturbances have been reported, and the safety of travelers cannot be guaranteed!
string: 据报有异常骚动，旅行者的安全无法保证！

original: Solitude's guards shall monitor access, ensuring no citizen strays into uncertain danger. Those who ignore this decree do so at their own risk!
string: 独孤城的卫兵将监控出入，确保没有市民误入险境.无视此法令者，后果自负！

original: This restriction shall remain until further notice. The Jarl's word is law: heed the warning, and stay away from the shrine!
string: 此限制将持续至另行通知.领主的命令即为法律:谨记警告，远离圣坛！

original: Citizens of Solitude, take heed! The shrine of Meridia, standing at Mount Kilkreath, has become a place of great disturbance!
string: 独孤城的市民们，注意了！位于基尔克瑞斯山的美瑞蒂亚神龛，已成为一处严重骚乱之地！

original: Strange lights flicker, strange noise is heard and those who venture too close do not always return!
string: 诡异的光芒闪烁不定，怪异的声响不绝于耳，那些冒险靠近的人并非总能安然归来！

original: Travelers are strongly advised to keep their distance! What lurks near the shrine remains unknown, but let none say they weren't warned.
string: 强烈建议旅行者保持距离！神社附近潜伏着什么尚不明确，但勿谓言之不预.

original: Solitude looks after its people, but some dangers are beyond steel and spell!
string: 独孤城会庇护它的子民，但有些危险是刀剑与法术都无法抵挡的！

original: Turn back if you value your safety, and do not test fate near Meridia's shrine!
string: 若你珍惜自身安危，就请回头，莫在美瑞蒂亚圣坛附近test命运！

original: Citizens of Solitude, hear this news! Multiple travellers and merchants reported that the danger that plagued Mount Kilkreath is gone,
string: 独孤城的市民们，听好了！多位旅行者和商人报告称，困扰基尔克瑞斯山的危险已经消失.

original: and the area is safe once more! Where once danger lurked, now light reigns supreme!
string: 这片区域再次安全了！曾经危险潜伏之处，如今光明至高无上！

original: The unnatural horrors that threatened travelers are no more, and the road is safe once again!
string: 威胁旅人的诡异恐怖已不复存在，道路重归安全！

original: Let all who doubted know that the divines watch over Skyrim, and their champions bring balance where chaos once stood!
string: 让所有曾心存疑虑者知晓，诸神眷顾着天际，而他们的勇士已在混沌之地重建秩序！

original: Travelers may walk freely around Mount Kilkreath.
string: 旅行者如今可以自由行走于基尔克瑞斯山周边.

original: Citizens of Solitude, rejoice! Where darkness once loomed over Mount Kilkreath, now light has been restored!
string: 独孤城的居民们，欢庆吧！曾笼罩在基尔克瑞斯山上的黑暗，如今光明已重现！

original: Thanks to the bravery of a lone champion, the old ruins have been cleansed of the undeads, making Skyrim safer!
string: 多亏了一位孤胆勇士的英勇，古老遗迹中的亡灵已被清除，让天际更加安全！

original: This hero stood against forces beyond mortal reckoning, and triumphed where others feared to tread!
string: 这位英雄挺身对抗凡人难以想象的强大势力，在他人望而却步之处赢得了胜利！

original: Who they are may remain unknown, but let all who walk Skyrim's roads know: it is their strength that keeps this land safe!
string: 他们的身份或许无人知晓，但让所有行走在天际道路上的人都明白:正是他们的力量守护着这片土地的安宁！

original: The road is open once more, and the mountain is free of peril! May Solitude remember those who stand against darkness,
string: 道路已再次畅通，山脉已无险情！愿独孤城铭记那些挺身对抗黑暗之人，

original: and may the gods guide their path!
string: 愿诸神指引他们的道路！

original: Citizens of Solitude, hear this proclamation: The ruins at Mount Kilkreath have been cleansed and the light of Akatosh shines upon Skyrim once more!
string: 独孤城的子民们，聆听此公告:基尔克瑞斯山脉的废墟已被净化，阿卡托什之光再次照耀天际！

original: Let all who doubted see: The Divines have not abandoned this lan, and have banished the evil lurking in the area.
string: 让所有心存疑虑者见证:诸神并未抛弃这片土地，已将潜伏此地的邪恶彻底驱逐.

original: The roads around Mount Kilkreath and to roads to Dragon Bridge are now safe for travelers and citizens.
string: 基尔克瑞斯山周边以及通往龙桥镇的道路现已对旅行者和市民安全无虞.

original: Know this: Skyrim is watched over, and the presence of the Divines shall not be ignored!
string: 须知:天际受诸神注视，神明的存在不容忽视！

original: Citizen of Skyrim. The Jarl wishes to warn everyone about travellers afflicted with a sickness.
string: 天际的市民.领主希望警告所有人，提防那些染上疾病的旅行者.

original: These people are afflicted from a sickness worthy of Peryite. We do not know what that sickness is,
string: 这些人患上了一种连魄伊特都觉得痛苦的疾病。我们不知道那到底是什么病，

original: but the most visible symptom is a red rash covering their body as if the color of their skin was red.
string: 但最明显的症状是全身布满红色皮疹，仿佛皮肤本身变成了红色.

original: If provoked, they will vomit a green bile that will poison you. It is suspected that this also transmits the sickness.
string: 若被激怒，它们会吐出绿色胆汁使你中毒.据推测，这也会传播疾病.

original: If you see one on the road, it's best to avoid them and report the sighting to the guards.
string: 如果在路上看到他们，最好避开并向守卫报告.

original: Do not interact with them as they might infect you.
string: 不要与他们接触，以免被感染.

original: Citizen of Skyrim. The Jarl wishes to warn everyone about travellers afflicted with a sickness.
string: 天际的市民.领主希望警告所有人，提防那些染上疾病的旅行者.

original: These people are afflicted from a sickness worthy of Peryite. We do not know what that sickness is,
string: 这些人患上了一种连魄伊特都觉得痛苦的疾病。我们不知道那到底是什么病，

original: but the most visible symptom is a red rash covering their body as if the color of their skin was red.
string: 但最明显的症状是全身布满红色皮疹，仿佛皮肤本身变成了红色.

string: 若被激怒，它们会吐出绿色胆汁使你中毒.据推测，这也会传播疾病.

string: 如果在路上看到他们，最好避开并向守卫报告.

original: Do not interact with them as they might infect you.
string: 不要与他们接触，以免被感染.

string: 天际的市民.领主希望警告所有人，提防那些染上疾病的旅行者.

string: 这些人患上了一种连魄伊特都觉得痛苦的疾病。我们不知道那到底是什么病，

original: but the most visible symptom is a red rash covering their body as if the color of their skin was red.
string: 但最明显的症状是全身布满红色皮疹，仿佛皮肤本身变成了红色.

original: If provoked, they will vomit a green bile that will poison you. It is suspected that this also transmits the sickness.
string: 若被激怒，它们会吐出绿色胆汁使你中毒.据推测，这也会传播疾病.

original: If you see one on the road, it's best to avoid them and report the sighting to the guards.
string: 如果在路上看到他们，最好避开并向守卫报告.

original: Do not interact with them as they might infect you.
string: 不要与他们接触，以免被感染.

original: Citizen of Skyrim. The Jarl emits a warning against visiting the city of Dawnstar.
string: 天际的市民.领主发出警告，不要前往晨星城.

original: After many reports from travellers and verification done by the authorities, it appears an unnatural curse lays on the town.
string: 根据众多旅行者的报告以及官方的核实，这座城镇似乎笼罩着某种非自然的诅咒.

original: The residents of Dawnstar cannot rest, their nights are filled with terror and horrible nightmares.
string: 晨星的居民无法安眠，他们的夜晚充满了恐惧与可怕的噩梦.

original: Travelers are strongly advised to avoid Dawnstar until further notice! For those that must go to the town,
string: 强烈建议旅行者们在另行通知前避免前往晨星！对于那些必须前往该镇的人，

original: we recommend taking the necessary precautions to avoid falling under the curse.
string: 我们建议采取必要的预防措施，以免受到诅咒的影响.

original: It's recommended to keep the visit as short as possible and to avoid staying the night inside the town.
string: 建议尽量缩短访问时间，避免在镇内过夜.

original: Camping outside the city limit is preferable as an alternative.
string: 在城外露营是更可取的替代方案.

original: The Jarl of Dawnstar announces the curse that plagued Dawnstar has been lifted, and peace has returned to the city!
string: 晨星的领主宣布，困扰晨星的诅咒已被解除，和平已重返这座城市！

original: The people, once tormented by sleepless nights filled with terror and dreadful visions, may now rest without fear!
string: 那些曾被充满恐惧与可怕幻象的无眠之夜折磨的人们，如今可以安然入眠，再无畏惧！

original: Whatever dark force gripped the town has been vanquished, and the hearts of Dawnstar's people may heal at last!
string: 无论何种黑暗力量曾笼罩这座城镇，如今已被击败，晨星镇民的心灵终得疗愈！

original: Travelers may once again visit the city without concern. Our Jarl is pleased to lift the travel ban and all safety measures.
string: 旅行者们可以再次安心造访这座城市.我们的领主很高兴能解除旅行禁令及所有安全限制.

original: Citizen of Skyrim. The Jarl emits a warning against visiting the city of Dawnstar.
string: 天际的市民.领主发出警告，不要前往晨星城.

string: 根据众多旅行者的报告以及官方的核实，这座城镇似乎笼罩着某种非自然的诅咒.

string: 强烈建议旅行者们在另行通知前避免前往晨星！对于那些必须前往该镇的人，

original: we recommend taking the necessary precautions to avoid falling under the curse.
string: 我们建议采取必要的预防措施，以免受到诅咒的影响.

original: It's recommended to keep the visit as short as possible and to avoid staying the night inside the town.
string: 建议尽量缩短访问时间，避免在镇内过夜.

original: Camping outside the city limit is preferable as an alternative.
string: 在城外露营是更可取的替代方案.

string: 晨星的领主宣布，困扰晨星的诅咒已被解除，和平已重返这座城市！

string: 那些曾被充满恐惧与可怕幻象的无眠之夜折磨的人们，如今可以安然入眠，再无畏惧！

original: Whatever dark force gripped the town has been vanquished, and the hearts of Dawnstar's people may heal at last!
string: 无论何种黑暗力量曾笼罩这座城镇，如今已被击败，晨星镇民的心灵终得疗愈！

string: 旅行者们可以再次安心造访这座城市.我们的领主很高兴能解除旅行禁令及所有安全限制.

string: 天际的市民.领主发出警告，不要前往晨星城.

original: After many reports from travellers and verification done by the authorities, it appears an unnatural curse lays on the town.
string: 根据众多旅行者的报告以及官方的核实，这座城镇似乎笼罩着某种非自然的诅咒.

original: The residents of Dawnstar cannot rest, their nights are filled with terror and horrible nightmares.
string: 晨星的居民无法安眠，他们的夜晚充满了恐惧与可怕的噩梦.

string: 强烈建议旅行者们在另行通知前避免前往晨星！对于那些必须前往该镇的人，

original: we recommend taking the necessary precautions to avoid falling under the curse.
string: 我们建议采取必要的预防措施，以免受到诅咒的影响.

original: It's recommended to keep the visit as short as possible and to avoid staying the night inside the town.
string: 建议尽量缩短访问时间，避免在镇内过夜.

original: Camping outside the city limit is preferable as an alternative.
string: 在城外露营是更可取的替代方案.

string: 晨星的领主宣布，困扰晨星的诅咒已被解除，和平已重返这座城市！

original: The people, once tormented by sleepless nights filled with terror and dreadful visions, may now rest without fear!
string: 那些曾被充满恐惧与可怕幻象的无眠之夜折磨的人们，如今可以安然入眠，再无畏惧！

original: Whatever dark force gripped the town has been vanquished, and the hearts of Dawnstar's people may heal at last!
string: 无论何种黑暗力量曾笼罩这座城镇，如今已被击败，晨星镇民的心灵终得疗愈！

original: Travelers may once again visit the city without concern. Our Jarl is pleased to lift the travel ban and all safety measures.
string: 旅行者们可以再次安心造访这座城市.我们的领主很高兴能解除旅行禁令及所有安全限制.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, take heed! Strangers from Hammerfell, calling themselves Alik'r Warriors,
string: 白漫城的居民们，请注意！有一群自称阿利克尔战士的落锤省外乡人

original: have been seen moving through the hold, seeking information on an unknown woman.
string: 有人看到他们在领地里穿行，打探一名身份不明女性的消息.

original: After an incident with the guards, the Jarl issued the order to ban them from entering the city.
string: 在发生与守卫的冲突后，领主下令禁止他们进入城市.

original: Every citizen is advised to avoid dealings with these redguards.
string: 建议每位公民避免与这些红卫人打交道.

original: If you see one, we recommend avoiding him and if you are approached by one of them and are being pestered, please inform the guards.
string: 如果看到他们，建议避开;若被其接近并受到纠缠，请通知守卫.

original: They are suspected of wanting to cause public disturbance or otherwise trying to break the public peace.
string: 他们被怀疑意图制造公共骚乱，或试图破坏公共安宁.

original: By decree of the Jarl, let it be known that strangers from Hammerfell, calling themselves Alik'r Warriors,
string: 奉领主之命，特此通告:有一群自称阿利克尔战士的落锤省外乡人

original: have been observed moving through Whiterun Hold, seeking information about the whereabouts of redguard women.
string: 有人观察到他们穿行于白漫领，打探红卫女性的下落.

original: Their presence has raised concerns, even clashing with the guards after being caught sneaking into the city.
string: 他们的出现引起了担忧，甚至在潜入城市被抓后与守卫发生了冲突.

original: The Jarl revoked their access to Whiterun and are no longer welcomed as guests. The Jarl advises all citizens to exercise caution.
string: 领主已撤销他们进入白漫城的许可，不再将他们视为宾客.领主建议所有市民保持警惕.

original: The proclamation is that no aid is to be given, no dealings entertained, and any interactions must be reported immediately!
string: 公告规定:不得提供任何援助，不得进行任何交易，所有互动必须立即上报！

original: Whiterun remains a city of honor, but foreigners shall not abuse our Nord hospitality. Heed this decree, and ensure our hold remains secure!
string: 白漫城依然是一座荣耀之城，但外乡人不得滥用我们诺德人的好客之道.谨遵此令，确保我们的领地安全无虞！

original: Citizens of Whiterun, this is an official warning to all who walk these streets! Strangers from Hammerfell,
string: 白漫城的居民们，这是对所有行走在这些街道上的人的正式警告！来自落锤省的陌生人，

original: calling themselves Alik'r warriors, have been seen in the city, even persisting to enter after being banned from the city.
string: 自称阿利克尔战士，已被目击在城中活动，甚至在被禁止入城后仍坚持进入.

original: Their inquiries are persistent about finding a redguard woman.
string: 他们坚持不懈地打听一位红卫女人的下落.

original: Some say they seek only one, but who can say who or what else they pursue? Their words are smooth and they are offering money to buy information.
string: 有人说他们只寻找一个目标，但谁能断言他们还追寻着谁或什么？他们言辞圆滑，正出钱购买情报.

original: Let's all be cautious! If their inquiries reach your ears, step away, offer no aid, and report all dealings to the guards.
string: 大家务必谨慎！若听闻他们的打探，请立即远离，切勿提供帮助，并将所有接触情况上报守卫.

original: Travelers from Hammerfell walk the roads of our hold, warriors known as the Alik'r, speaking of one woman they seek.
string: 有一群来自落锤省的旅人行走在我们领地的道路上，他们被称为阿利克尔战士，口中念叨着正在寻找某个女子.

original: Their clothes mark them as Redguard nomads, their blades sharp and curved.
string: 他们的服饰表明他们是红卫人游牧民，他们的刀刃锋利而弯曲.

original: Do not listen or interact with them, as they went against the law and clashed with the guards inside the city.
string: 不要听信或与他们接触，因为他们触犯了法律，并在城市内与守卫发生了冲突.

original: They lost the friendly statue granted to visitors. Some of their group are wanted by the law and caution is advised with them.
string: 他们丢失了赠予访客的友好雕像.他们中的一些人正被法律通缉，建议与他们接触时保持谨慎.

original: If seen, report them to the guards. All upstanding citizens should avoid any dealings with them. Together, we can keep Whiterun safe for everyone.
string: 若发现他们，请向守卫报告.所有正直的公民都应避免与他们有任何往来.齐心协力，我们就能让白漫城对每个人都保持安全.

original: Citizens and travelers, Solitude is proud of its harbor and of its lighthouse. The harbor remains the center of Skyrim's trade and naval might!
string: 市民们与旅人们，独孤城以其海港和灯塔为傲.这座海港依然是天际贸易与海军力量的中心！

original: The lighthouse guides merchant ships daily to port and out in the Sea of Ghosts for safe sailing.
string: 灯塔每日引导商船安全进出港口，在幽灵之海上航行无忧.

original: Even with all the trouble in Skyrim, the harbor traffic remains steady and the dockworkers labor tirelessly to move the merchandise swiftly.
string: 尽管天际麻烦不断，港口交通依然繁忙，码头工人不辞辛劳地快速搬运货物.

original: All of this is a great asset for any merchants looking to trade in foreign goods.
string: 对于任何有意从事异国商品贸易的商人而言，这一切都是极有价值的资产.

original: It is possible to visit the lighthouse for those desiring to see the surrounding landscape and see.
string: 对于那些渴望观赏周边景致并一探究竟的人来说，灯塔是可以参观的.

original: For more information, please inquire with the Steward for the details.
string: 欲知详情，请向管家咨询具体细节.

original: Citizens and sailors, take heed! The light atop Solitude Lighthouse has gone dark, and the seas beyond the harbor is dangerous for every ships.
string: 市民与水手们，请注意！独孤灯塔顶部的灯光已经熄灭，港口外的海域对所有船只都变得危险.

original: Already, one vessel, the Icerunner, has run aground upon the shores, its wreckage being a reminder of what happens when the beacon fails to shine!
string: 已有船只，冰行者号，搁浅于海岸，其残骸警示着灯塔熄灭时的后果！

original: All captains and crew must sail with caution, for the waters grow treacherous without the lighthouse guiding their way!
string: 所有船长与船员务必谨慎航行，失去灯塔指引的海域正变得危机四伏！

original: Efforts are underway to restore the beacon. The city's guards are investigating the lighthouse and don't exclude a criminal action as responsible.
string: 正在努力修复信标.城市守卫正在调查灯塔，不排除是犯罪行为所致.

original: Until further indication, all vessels sailing on the Karth River must be navigated by a captain familiar with the body of water.
string: 在另行通知前，所有在卡尔斯河上航行的船只必须由熟悉该水域的船长驾驶.

original: This ensures that all ships may sail safely and avoid future shipwrecks.
string: 这确保了所有船只都能安全航行，避免未来的海难.

original: Citizens and sailors, take heed! The light atop Solitude Lighthouse has gone dark, and Skyrim's northern waters grow deadly for those who sail!
string: 市民与水手们，请注意！独孤灯塔顶部的灯光已经熄灭，天际省北部的海域对航行之人变得危机四伏！

original: Authorities suspect foul play behind these events.
string: 当局怀疑这些事件背后有阴谋.

original: Already, one vessel, the Icerunner, has run aground upon the frozen beach, its crew killed and its cargo pillaged by bandits
string: 已有船只，冰行者号，搁浅在结冰的海滩上，船员被杀，货物被强盗洗劫一空

original: before any rescue team could arrive on site.
string: 在救援队抵达现场之前.

original: We ask everyone to refrain from rumors and anyone with information should come forth and inform the guards.
string: 我们要求所有人不要传播谣言，任何掌握信息的人都应主动向守卫报告.

original: Meanwhile, all captains should sail with caution, for the sea is not the only threat.
string: 与此同时，所有船长都应谨慎航行，因为大海并非唯一的威胁.

original: The authorities investigate and the guards stand watch, but until the beacon is restored and the criminals arrested,
string: 当局展开调查，卫兵严阵以待，但在灯塔修复，罪犯落网之前，

original: all mariners must navigate carefully and be wary of unidentified ships.
string: 所有水手都必须谨慎航行，警惕不明船只.

original: Citizens of Solitude, hear this call! As many of you have seen, the beacon atop Solitude Lighthouse has failed,
string: 独孤城的市民们，听此召唤！正如你们许多人所见，独孤灯塔顶端的信标已经熄灭，

original: leaving sailors blind to the dangers of our waters!
string: 让水手们对我们的水域危险视而不见！

original: Already, the Icerunner lies wrecked upon the shore, a grim warning of what happens without its guiding light!
string: 冰霜行者号已然搁浅在岸边，这惨状正是失去其指引之光的下场！

original: The Jarl Elisif the Fair is looking for a new lighthouse keeper to replace the current keeper that let the lights die down and cause that disaster.
string: 艾利西弗领主正在寻找一位新的灯塔看守人，以接替那位让灯火熄灭并导致那场灾难的现任看守.

original: Skilled workers, craftsmen, or those with practical knowledge of light and flame: Step forward!
string: 技艺精湛的工人，工匠，或是对光与火焰有实际知识的人:请站出来！

original: The city seeks capable hands to restore and maintain the beacon, ensuring Solitude's harbor remains safe for trade and travel!
string: 这座城市正在寻找能干的人手来修复和维护灯塔，以确保独孤城的港口对贸易和旅行保持安全！

original: The compensation includes fair pay and free accommodation in the lighthouse.
string: 补偿包括公平的薪酬和灯塔内的免费住宿.

original: Citizens of Solitude, heed this request from the Jarl Elisif the Fair!
string: 独孤城的子民们，请聆听艾利西弗领主的这一请求！

original: A report from Dragon Bridge indicates strange activities in the form of unnatural noises and lights near Wolfskull Cave.
string: 龙桥镇的一份报告指出，狼头骨洞穴附近出现了异常噪音和光芒等可疑活动.

original: Under the authority of the Steward, a call goes out to skilled adventurers, warriors, and those who don't fear crawling in dark caves!
string: 奉总管之命，现征召技艺高超的冒险者，无畏的战士，以及不惧在黑暗洞穴中匍匐前行的勇者！

original: The cave must be investigated and the wild animals or bandits inhabiting it be put to death.
string: 必须探查洞穴，并消灭栖息其中的野兽或匪徒.

original: Those who answer this call shall be compensated the standard bounty reward, along with the gratitude of the Jarl.
string: 响应此号召者，将获得标准赏金酬劳，以及领主的感激.

original: Who among you shall rise to meet the challenge?
string: 你们之中，谁将挺身而出迎接挑战？

original: Citizens of Solitude, hear this urgent call from the Steward Falk Firebeard in the name of the Jarl.
string: 独孤城的市民们，听好了！以领主的名义，管家"火胡"佛可发出紧急通告.

original: The city seeks capable adventurers or mercenaries to investigate Wolfskull Cave.
string: 城市正在寻找有能力的冒险者或雇佣兵去调查狼头骨洞穴.

original: The town guards and the Legion's forces are stretched thin, tending to other security matters across the hold and the province.
string: 城镇守卫和军团兵力捉襟见肘，正忙于处理领地及全省范围内的其他安全事务.

original: With soldiers occupied and patrols spread far,
string: 士兵们忙于战事，巡逻队又分散各处，

original: the city is hiring experienced adventurers or mercenaries who will step forward to investigate the report about the cave.
string: 这座城市正在招募经验丰富的冒险者或雇佣兵，他们将挺身而出，调查关于那个洞穴的报告.

original: Those who answer the call shall be compensated for their service fairly for their service.
string: 响应号召者，必将获得与其贡献相称的公正酬报.

original: Those interested in investigating Wolfskull Cave should go to the Blue Palace and speak with the steward. Who among you will answer this call?
string: 有意调查狼头骨洞穴的人，请前往蓝宫与管家交谈.你们之中谁愿意响应这个召唤？

original: Citizens of Solitude, let it be known that thanks to the wisdom and foresight of Jarl Elisif the Fair,
string: 独孤城的子民们，请知晓，多亏了艾利西弗领主的智慧与远见，

original: a great threat has been averted before it could take hold!
string: 一场巨大的威胁在它成形之前就被化解了！

original: A report from Dragon Bridge on troubling activity around the cave was dismissed by the court as an overreaction.
string: 龙桥镇关于洞穴附近可疑活动的报告被宫廷斥为反应过度.

original: The Jarl recognized it was more than an alarming report. After hiring an adventurer,
string: 领主意识到这不仅仅是一份令人不安的报告.在雇佣了一名冒险者后，

original: it was revealed that a group of necromancers stirred dark magic within Wolfskull Cave, seeking to bring back the Wolf Queen, Potema herself.
string: 据揭露，一群死灵法师在狼头骨洞穴内搅动黑暗魔法，试图复活狼女王波提玛本人.

original: Through decisive action, the necromancers were dealt with before they could complete their ritual.
string: 在亡灵法师完成仪式之前，我们果断采取行动，将他们一举消灭.

original: Let all remember that true leadership is knowing when to act before the storm arrives, and through the vigilance of our Jarl,
string: 愿众人铭记，真正的领导力在于懂得在风暴来临前采取行动，而仰赖我们领主的警觉，

original: Solitude remains safe! Raise a toast to Elisif the Fair and her wisdom, for this city will never falter against unseen threats!
string: 独孤城依然安全！举杯敬艾利西弗及其智慧，因为这座城市在无形的威胁面前永不退缩！

original: Citizens of Solitude, the jarl is proud to announce that a terrible plot fomented by necromancers in Wolfskull Cave was foiled
string: 独孤城的子民们，领主自豪地宣布，狼头骨洞穴中死灵法师策划的一场可怕阴谋已被挫败

original: by the vigilance of the city's hired adventurer. Even as their ritual was stopped before completion, and that most of the necromancers were killed,
string: 多亏了城中雇佣的冒险者保持警惕.即便他们的仪式在完成前被阻止，且大部分亡灵法师已被消灭，

original: we ask everyone to stay vigilant to the situation. By order of the city guard, we ask all citizens and visitors to report immediately any signs of
string: 我们要求所有人对当前局势保持警惕.根据城市卫队的命令，我们要求所有市民和访客立即报告任何迹象

original: necromantic rituals, suspicious gatherings, or unnatural disturbances must be reported immediately!
string: 任何涉及死灵仪式，可疑集会或异常扰动的行为都必须立即上报！

original: The guards suspect that remains of the necromancer groups might attempt their ritual again in another location.
string: 守卫们怀疑亡灵法师团体的残余势力可能会在另一处地点再次尝试他们的仪式.

original: Stay watchful, and help Solitude to remain free from threats.
string: 保持警惕，帮助独孤城免受威胁.

original: Citizens of Solitude, an investigation conducted within Wolfskull Cave has revealed a group of necromancers doing a binding ritual
string: 独孤城的居民们，在狼头骨洞穴内进行的调查发现了一群死灵法师正在举行束缚仪式

original: with the goal to use the being as a tool to overthrow the leadership of Skyrim.
string: 其目的是利用该存在作为工具来推翻天际的领导层.

original: That group has been either killed or scattered. Because not all who conspire in the black arts reveal themselves so easily,
string: 那群人要么被杀，要么四散奔逃.因为并非所有研习黑魔法的人都会轻易暴露自己.

original: the city guard emits the order to remain vigilant!
string: 城卫队发布命令，要求保持警惕！

original: Reports of strange gatherings, unnatural occurrences, or hidden rituals must be brought to the authorities without delay!
string: 关于异常集会，超自然现象或隐秘仪式的报告，必须立即上报给当局！

original: Let the city stand watchful and help the hold to remain safe for all honest citizens.
string: 让这座城市保持警惕，帮助领地守护所有诚实公民的安全.

original: Citizens of Solitude, hear this urgent proclamation!
string: 独孤城的公民们，请听此紧急公告！

original: As you know, the necromancer cult located within Wolfskull Cave has been disrupted, our duty is not yet done!
string: 如你所知，位于狼头骨洞穴内的死灵法师教派已被捣毁，但我们的任务尚未完成！

original: Shadows still linger, and those who fled the cave may yet remain hidden among us!
string: 阴影仍未散去，那些逃离洞穴的人或许仍藏匿在我们之中！

original: By decree of the Jarl, an official investigation is now underway, ensuring that no remnant of the forbidden cult escapes our grasp!
string: 奉领主之命，官方调查现已展开，确保无一邪教余孽能逃脱我们的掌控！

original: The city calls upon priests and scholars that specialise in identifying necromantic rituals, especially ancient rites.
string: 这座城市召集了专门识别亡灵法术仪式，尤其是古老仪式的祭司与学者.

original: That knowledge will be vital for the investigation and help localize any remnants of the necromancers.
string: 这些知识对调查至关重要，有助于定位任何亡灵法师的残余势力.

original: Those that desire to help the investigation should report to the captain of the guards.
string: 有意协助调查者，请向卫兵队长报告.

original: Citizens of Solitude, in a stunning turn of events,
string: 独孤城的市民们，在一系列令人震惊的事件中，

original: the interruption of the necromantic ritual in the Wolfskull Cave didn't destroy the spirit summoned.
string: 狼头骨洞穴中亡灵仪式的打断并未摧毁被召唤的灵魂.

original: And that spirit was that of the Wolf Queen herself, Potema Septim. Her spirit seeked refuge in her burial chamber located below Solitude.
string: 而那灵魂正是狼女王波提玛.塞普汀本人的魂魄.她的灵魂在独孤城地下的墓室中寻求庇护.

original: But rejoice, the foul schemes of Potema Septim have been thwarted, and the city remains safe!
string: 但值得庆幸的是，波蒂玛.塞普汀的邪恶阴谋已被挫败，这座城市依然安全！

original: Let none doubt the wisdom of Jarl Elisif the Fair, who saw the signs before calamity could strike!
string: 莫要怀疑艾利西弗领主的智慧，她在灾祸降临前便已洞察先兆！

original: Through swift action and the aid of brave souls, Skyrim has been spared the return of a dark presence,
string: 通过迅速的行动和英勇之士的援助，天际得以免于黑暗势力的回归.

original: and the city shall not suffer under the folly of the Wolf Queen.
string: 而这座城市不应因狼后的愚行而蒙受苦难.

original: Citizens of Solitude, hear this proclamation!
string: 独孤城的公民们，请听此公告！

original: The necromancer cult in Wolfskull summoned the spirit of Potema Septim, the dreaded Wolf Queen, and tried to bind her to their will.
string: 狼颅堡的死灵法师教团召唤了令人畏惧的狼女王波蒂玛.赛普汀的灵魂，并试图将其束缚于他们的意志之下.

original: As their ritual was interrupted, it was thought Potema's spirit would return to Oblivion,
string: 由于他们的仪式被打断，人们认为波耶西亚的灵魂会回归湮灭，

original: but instead, she hid in the ancient crypts below the Hall of the Dead.
string: 但她却躲在了亡者之厅下方的古老墓穴中.

original: Thanks to the courage and skill of a lone champion, the sinister remnants of her power have been cast away,
string: 多亏了一位孤胆勇士的勇气与技艺，她力量的邪恶残余已被驱散.

original: ensuring that Solitude stands unshaken by the past!
string: 确保独孤城不会因过去而动摇！

original: The city owes its safety to those who do not falter in the face of evil, and their deeds shall not be forgotten!
string: 这座城市的安宁，归功于那些面对邪恶毫不退缩的人们，他们的功绩将永世铭记！

original: Citizens of Windhelm, hear this call for aid! Nurelion, master alchemist of the White Phial, seeks a brave adventurer for a task of great importance!
string: 风舵城的公民们，请听此求助之声！白瓶药坊的炼金大师努瑞莱昂，正在寻找一位勇敢的冒险者来完成一项至关重要的任务！

original: Legends speak of a rare, flawless phial, forged by the greatest alchemists of old. A relic of untold value and power!
string: 传说中提及一个稀世罕见，完美无瑕的炼金瓶，由古代最伟大的炼金术士所锻造.这是一件价值连城，蕴含无穷力量的神器！

original: Nurelion has spent a lifetime searching, and now, as his years grow short, he needs a skilled hand to bring his dream to fruition!
string: 努瑞莱昂穷尽一生追寻，如今岁月将尽，他需要一双巧手来实现他的梦想！

original: Do you seek adventure? Do you crave riches and renown? Then step forward. This is a quest worthy of those bold enough to seize it!
string: 你渴望冒险吗？你渴求财富与声望吗？那就上前来吧.这项任务，正适合那些有胆量去夺取它的人！

original: Seek out Nurelion at his shop, the White Phial, and claim your chance at fame and glory!
string: 前往努瑞莱昂的店铺"白瓶"，寻找他，争取属于你的名望与荣耀！

original: Citizens of Windhelm, hear this solemn news. Nurelion, master alchemist of the White Phial, lies upon his deathbed.
string: 风舵城的居民们，请聆听这则沉痛的消息.白瓶药坊的炼金大师努瑞莱昂已卧于病榻，生命垂危.

original: Long has he sought the legendary relic, and at last, it has been retrieved.
string: 他长久以来追寻着那件传说中的遗物，如今终于将其寻回.

original: For years, Nurelion served this city, his knowledge of alchemy unmatched, his pursuit of the White Phial his life's greatest ambition.
string: 多年来，努瑞莱昂一直服务于这座城市，他的炼金术知识无人能及，而追寻白瓶则是他一生最大的抱负.

original: Now, as his strength fades, Windhelm pays its respects to a man whose dedication knew no bounds.
string: 如今，随着他的力量逐渐消逝，风舵城向这位奉献无疆之人致以敬意.

original: Let those who knew him speak his name in honor. Let those who valued his craft remember his work.
string: 让认识他的人以敬意呼唤他的名字.让珍视他技艺的人铭记他的作品.

original: The White Phial shall remain, but its seeker's journey has come to an end.
string: 白瓶将永存，但追寻者的旅程已至终点.

original: Citizens of Windhelm, let it be known: Nurelion, master alchemist of the White Phial, approaches his final rest.
string: 风舵城的居民们，请知悉:白瓶药坊的炼金大师努瑞莱昂即将安息.

original: His pursuit of the legendary phial spanned decades, his knowledge shaping the craft of generations.
string: 他对传奇药瓶的追寻跨越数十年，其学识塑造了数代人的技艺.

original: Though his time now fades, his legacy shall not be lost!
string: 纵使他的时代终将逝去，其功业必将永存！

original: The White Phial has been recovered, and though he may not live to fully claim its glory, let all who practice alchemy remember his dedication.
string: 白瓶已寻回，纵使他可能无缘亲享其全部荣光，愿所有研习炼金术者铭记他的奉献.

original: His wisdom enriched Skyrim, and his name shall stand among the greatest alchemists of our age!
string: 他的智慧滋养了天际，其名必将位列本时代最伟大的炼金术师之中！

original: His shop remains a beacon for knowledge, and his work endures in the hands of his apprentice.
string: 他的店铺依然是知识的灯塔，而他的工作则由其学徒传承延续.

original: Those desiring to pay a visit to Nurelion may do so during the day, but know that he is sleeping and resting most of the time.
string: 想要拜访努瑞莱昂的人可以在白天前往，但要知道他大部分时间都在睡觉休息.

original: His apprentice keeps the shop open and can help with your needs while he's not attending to the needs of Nurelion.
string: 他的学徒会照常开店，在努瑞莱昂无暇分身时为你提供所需帮助.

original: Citizens of Windhelm, we bring somber news: Nurelion, master alchemist of the White Phial, lies upon his deathbed.
string: 风舵城的市民们，我们带来一个沉痛的消息:白瓶药坊的炼金大师努瑞莱昂已卧病在床，生命垂危.

original: The relic he spent a lifetime seeking has been recovered, yet time has robbed him of the chance to fully claim his victory!
string: 他穷尽一生追寻的圣物已然寻回，但时光却剥夺了他完全宣告胜利的机会！

original: A lifetime of pursuit for an artifact of legendary purity, and now, as he finally holds it, his strength fails him.
string: 穷尽一生追寻传说中纯净无瑕的圣物，如今终于将其握在手中，他的力量却已衰竭.

original: His ambition was great, his dedication unmatched, yet fate has been unkind!
string: 他雄心勃勃，矢志不渝，奈何命运多舛！

original: Let all honor the man who sought the truth within the arcane craft.
string: 让所有人向这位在奥法技艺中探寻真理之人致以敬意.

original: The shop remains open by Quintus Navale and can help with your needs while he's not attending to the needs of Nurelion.
string: 店铺由奎因图斯.那瓦勒照常营业，在努瑞莱昂无暇分身时为你提供所需帮助.

original: Citizens of Windhelm, let it be known: Nurelion, master alchemist of the White Phial, has passed from this world.
string: 风舵城的居民们，请知悉:白瓶药坊的炼金大师努瑞莱昂已与世长辞.

original: His knowledge, his craft, and his tireless pursuit of the legendary phial defined his years, and now, his journey has come to an end.
string: 他的学识，技艺，以及对那传奇药瓶不知疲倦的追寻，定义了他的一生.如今，这段旅程已至终点.

original: Yet his work shall not fade. His apprentice, Quintus, has taken up the mantle,
string: 然而他的功业不会消逝.他的学徒昆图斯已接过了衣钵，

original: ensuring that the White Phial remains a beacon of alchemical mastery in Windhelm!
string: 确保白瓶在风舵城始终是炼金术造诣的灯塔！

original: Let those who seek potions and remedies know that the shop still stands, and its doors remain open to all in need!
string: 让那些寻求药剂与疗方的人知晓，店铺依然屹立，其大门始终为所有需要帮助的人敞开！

original: Let us honor Nurelion's memory, and let Windhelm's alchemy flourish under new hands.
string: 让我们铭记努瑞莱昂，让风舵城的炼金术在新的手中蓬勃发展.

original: May his knowledge live on, and may his apprentice forge his own legacy in the years to come.
string: 愿他的学识得以传承，愿他的学徒在未来岁月中铸就自己的传奇.

original: Citizens of Windhelm, let it be known: Nurelion, master alchemist of the White Phial, has passed from this world.
string: 风舵城的居民们，请知悉:白瓶药坊的炼金大师努瑞莱昂已与世长辞.

original: His dedication to his craft, his pursuit of knowledge, and his service to our city have left a lasting mark upon Windhelm.
string: 他对技艺的专注，对知识的追求以及对本城的服务，已在风舵城留下了不朽的印记.

original: The Jarl wishes to extend his condolences to Quintus, his loyal apprentice, and to all who called Nurelion a friend.
string: 领主希望向他的忠实学徒昆图斯，以及所有视努瑞莱昂为友的人致以哀悼.

original: His years were spent in the pursuit of something greater, and though he is gone, his legacy shall endure.
string: 他毕生追求着更伟大的事业，虽已逝去，但其功业必将永存.

original: Windhelm honors its own, and the White Phial shall remain a place of knowledge and healing, its doors open to those in need.
string: 风舵城珍视自己的子民，白漫药瓶将始终作为知识与治愈之所，为有需要之人敞开大门.

original: May his memory be preserved, and may his apprentice carry forward the wisdom of his teachings.
string: 愿他的记忆得以留存，愿他的学徒能传承其教诲的智慧.

original: Let Skyrim remember its scholars, and let Windhelm stand strong in their honor!
string: 让天际铭记它的学者，让风舵城为他们的荣耀而屹立不倒！

original: Citizens of Windhelm, hear this sad news: Nurelion, master alchemist of the White Phial, has passed from this world.
string: 风舵城的居民们，请听此噩耗:白瓶药坊的炼金大师努瑞莱昂已与世长辞.

original: His pursuit of knowledge, his dedication to his craft, and his relentless search for the legendary phial defined his years.
string: 他对知识的追求，对技艺的执着，以及为寻找传说中的圣瓶而付出的不懈努力，定义了他的一生.

original: To honor his memory, all who wish to pay their respects may visit the White Phial, where his apprentice, Quintus, now carries forward his legacy.
string: 为纪念他，所有希望表达敬意者皆可前往白瓶药坊，其学徒昆图斯现已继承其事业.

original: The shop stands as a testament to Nurelion's lifelong devotion to alchemy, and all who knew him are welcome to reflect upon his life's work.
string: 这家店铺是努瑞莱昂毕生奉献于炼金术的见证，所有认识他的人都可在此追思他毕生的心血.

original: May his wisdom endure, may his name be remembered, and may Windhelm honor one of its finest alchemists!
string: 愿他的智慧长存，愿他的名号被铭记，愿风舵城永远铭记其最杰出的炼金术师之一！

original: Citizens of Windhelm, take heed! The East Empire Company faces grave danger.
string: 风舵城的公民们，请注意！东帝国公司正面临严重危险.

original: Pirates threaten their ships, and the seas grow more treacherous with each passing day!
string: 海盗威胁着他们的船只，海上局势日益险恶！

original: The Blood Horkers strike at trade routes, robbing honest merchants and choking the lifeblood of Skyrim's commerce!
string: 血海掠夺者袭击贸易路线，抢劫诚实的商人，扼杀天际商业的命脉！

original: The Company seeks mercenaries willing to take the fight to the pirates, reclaim lost goods, and restore safe passage to the northern waters!
string: 公司正在招募雇佣兵，愿意与海盗作战，夺回失物，并恢复通往北部水域的安全通道！

original: Do you seek gold and glory? Do you wield steel without fear? Then step forward! The East Empire Company pays well for those who answer their call!
string: 你渴望黄金与荣耀吗？你能否无畏地挥舞刀剑？那就上前来吧！东帝国公司会慷慨回报那些响应召唤的人！

original: Seek out Orthus Endario at the Company's Windhelm office for further details.
string: 详情请前往公司在风舵城的办事处寻找奥苏斯.恩达里奥.

original: Citizens of Windhelm, hear this: The Blood Horkers have been defeated!
string: 风舵城的市民们，听好了:血海狂徒已被击败！

original: The lawless pirates who plagued our northern waters, striking at honest merchants have been driven to ruin!
string: 那些在我们北部海域肆虐，袭击诚实商人的无法无天的海盗，如今已被彻底击溃！

original: The East Empire Company thanks the brave warriors and mercenaries who defeated them.
string: 东帝国公司感谢击败他们的勇敢战士和雇佣兵.

original: Gold flows once more and ships sail without fear. Skyrim stands victorious over those who sought to rob it blind!
string: 金币再度流通，船只无畏航行.天际战胜了那些企图将其洗劫一空的敌人！

original: Let this be a warning: those who prey upon our lands shall not find refuge in the north!
string: 以此作为警告:胆敢劫掠我们土地的人，在北方将无处容身！

original: Raise your voices in celebration, for the Blood Horkers threaten Windhelm no more!
string: 高唱凯歌，血海掠夺者再也威胁不到风舵城了！

original: Citizens of Windhelm, rejoice! The Blood Horkers have been driven out from the sea of ghosts!
string: 风舵城的市民们，欢呼吧！血海狂徒已被逐出幽灵之海！

original: With their defeat, the East Empire Company restores the free flow of trade, ensuring merchants sail without fear once more!
string: 随着他们的失败，东帝国公司恢复了贸易的自由流通，确保商人们再度无畏航行！

original: No longer shall honest traders suffer under the weight of piracy!
string: 诚实的商人将不再遭受海盗的欺压！

original: Gold and goods shall flow again, strengthening Skyrim's markets and enriching all who take part!
string: 金币与货物将再次流通，巩固天际的市场，让所有参与者都富裕起来！

original: Let this victory serve as proof to those who seek to cripple Skyrim's trade, who prey upon its workers and merchants.
string: 让这场胜利成为对那些企图破坏天际贸易，侵害其工人和商人者的明证.

original: Raise your voices, Windhelm! The seas are safe once more, and prosperity returns to the north!
string: 高唱凯歌，风舵城！海域重归安宁，繁荣再现北境！

original: People of Windhelm, let it be known: the Blood Horkers have fallen! Their reign of piracy has ended, having received swift justice!
string: 风舵城的子民们，请听我宣告:血海掠夺者已经覆灭！他们的海盗统治已告终结，正义已迅速降临！

original: And who do we have to thank? Brave warriors, mercenaries who stepped forward and took the fight to the enemy!
string: 我们该感谢谁？是那些挺身而出，向敌人发起战斗的勇敢战士和雇佣兵！

original: Without their skill and strength, Skyrim's waters would still be overrun with thieves and murderers!
string: 没有他们的技艺与力量，天际的水域至今仍会被盗贼与杀人犯所盘踞！

original: The East Empire Company now sails free and unchallenged, thanks to those who answered the call to battle!
string: 多亏了响应战斗号召的人们，东帝国公司如今得以自由航行，无人能敌！

original: Let Windhelm remember their deeds and let all who seek adventure take inspiration from those who fought for our land's safety!
string: 让风舵城铭记他们的功绩，让所有寻求冒险的人从那些为保卫我们土地安全而战的人身上汲取灵感！

original: Raise a tankard, speak their names, and know that true warriors have shaped Skyrim's future!
string: 举杯共饮，高呼其名，铭记真正的勇士已铸就天际的未来！

original: Let it be known that the ruins of Saarthal remain an active site of historical research, overseen by the mages of the College of Winterhold.
string: 致所有人知悉，萨瑟尔城的遗迹仍是一处活跃的历史研究场所，由冬堡学院的法师们负责监管.

original: The excavation is ongoing, and entry is strictly prohibited to all outside the College faculty and designated researchers.
string: 挖掘工作正在进行中，除学院教职员工及指定研究人员外，严禁任何外部人员进入.

original: Saarthal holds invaluable secrets of Skyrim's ancient past, and the College is committed to preserving and studying its depths with the utmost care.
string: 萨瑟尔城蕴藏着天际远古历史中无价的秘密，学院致力于以最谨慎的态度去保护和研究其深层奥秘.

original: Unauthorized entry may result in severe consequences, as both magical and structural hazards remain within the site.
string: 未经授权进入可能导致严重后果，因为该地点内仍存在魔法和结构上的危险.

original: For those interested in the academic findings, periodic reports shall be issued by the College in due course.
string: 对学术研究成果感兴趣者，学院将适时发布定期报告.

original: We appreciate the cooperation of the public in respecting this critical work.
string: 我们感谢公众对此重要工作的理解与配合.

original: Citizens of Skyrim! By order of the Jarl of Winterhold, Saarthal is restricted until further notice.
string: 天际的公民们！根据冬堡领主的命令，萨塔尔现已限制进入，直至另行通知.

original: The ruins of Saarthal, the first home of the Nords, remains an ancient bastion of historical significance.
string: 萨瑟尔城的废墟，作为诺德人最初的故乡，至今仍是具有重大历史意义的古老堡垒.

original: The site is under the careful study of the College of Winterhold.
string: 该遗址正由冬堡学院进行细致研究.

original: The scholars seek to uncover its secrets, and with each passing day, new discoveries bring us closer to understanding Skyrim's distant past!
string: 学者们致力于揭开它的秘密，随着每一天的流逝，新的发现都让我们更接近理解天际那遥远的过去！

original: However, Saarthal remains a site of unpredictable dangers.
string: 然而，萨瑟尔城遗址仍是一处充满未知危险的地方.

original: For the safety of all, entry is strictly forbidden to anyone outside the College's authorized research teams.
string: 为保障所有人的安全，严禁学院授权研究团队以外的人员进入.

original: Unauthorized visitors will be arrested and detained by the authority of the Jarl of Winterhold.
string: 未经许可的访客将被冬堡领主的权威逮捕并拘留.

original: The College remains dedicated to expanding the knowledge of magic and history for the benefit of all Skyrim.
string: 学院始终致力于为全天际的利益拓展魔法与历史知识.

original: Let it be known that the ruins of Saarthal remain an active site of historical research, overseen by the mages of the College of Winterhold.
string: 致所有人知悉，萨瑟尔城的遗迹仍是一处活跃的历史研究场所，由冬堡学院的法师们负责监管.

original: The excavation is ongoing, and entry is strictly prohibited to all outside the College faculty and designated researchers.
string: 挖掘工作正在进行中，除学院教职员工及指定研究人员外，严禁任何外部人员进入.

original: Saarthal holds invaluable secrets of Skyrim's ancient past, and the College is committed to preserving and studying its depths with the utmost care.
string: 萨瑟尔城蕴藏着天际远古历史中无价的秘密，学院致力于以最谨慎的态度去保护和研究其深层奥秘.

original: Unauthorized entry may result in severe consequences, as both magical and structural hazards remain within the site.
string: 未经授权进入可能导致严重后果，因为该地点内仍存在魔法和结构上的危险.

original: For those interested in the academic findings, periodic reports shall be issued by the College in due course.
string: 对学术研究成果感兴趣者，学院将适时发布定期报告.

original: We appreciate the cooperation of the public in respecting this critical work.
string: 我们感谢公众对此重要工作的理解与配合.

original: Citizens of Skyrim! By order of the Jarl of Winterhold, Saarthal is restricted until further notice.
string: 天际的公民们！根据冬堡领主的命令，萨塔尔现已限制进入，直至另行通知.

string: 萨瑟尔城的废墟，作为诺德人最初的故乡，至今仍是具有重大历史意义的古老堡垒.

original: The site is under the careful study of the College of Winterhold.
string: 该遗址正由冬堡学院进行细致研究.

original: The scholars seek to uncover its secrets, and with each passing day, new discoveries bring us closer to understanding Skyrim's distant past!
string: 学者们致力于揭开它的秘密，随着每一天的流逝，新的发现都让我们更接近理解天际那遥远的过去！

original: However, Saarthal remains a site of unpredictable dangers.
string: 然而，萨瑟尔城遗址仍是一处充满未知危险的地方.

original: For the safety of all, entry is strictly forbidden to anyone outside the College's authorized research teams.
string: 为保障所有人的安全，严禁学院授权研究团队以外的人员进入.

original: Unauthorized visitors will be arrested and detained by the authority of the Jarl of Winterhold.
string: 未经许可的访客将被冬堡领主的权威逮捕并拘留.

original: The College remains dedicated to expanding the knowledge of magic and history for the benefit of all Skyrim.
string: 学院始终致力于为全天际的利益拓展魔法与历史知识.

string: 致所有人知悉，萨瑟尔城的遗迹仍是一处活跃的历史研究场所，由冬堡学院的法师们负责监管.

string: 挖掘工作正在进行中，除学院教职员工及指定研究人员外，严禁任何外部人员进入.

original: Saarthal holds invaluable secrets of Skyrim's ancient past, and the College is committed to preserving and studying its depths with the utmost care.
string: 萨瑟尔城蕴藏着天际远古历史中无价的秘密，学院致力于以最谨慎的态度去保护和研究其深层奥秘.

string: 未经授权进入可能导致严重后果，因为该地点内仍存在魔法和结构上的危险.

string: 对学术研究成果感兴趣者，学院将适时发布定期报告.
