original: They are a criminal organization bent to destroy the Companions. They are cowards opposing the Companions without honor or cause.
string: 他们是一个致力于摧毁战友团的犯罪组织.这些懦夫毫无荣誉感和正当理由地对抗战友团.

original: If you have seen them, speak with us immediately. Your information may help bring that group to justice.
string: 若你曾见过他们，请立即与我们交谈.你提供的信息或许能将那个团伙绳之以法.

original: All reports shall be kept discreet and your aid will be rewarded with Septims.
string: 所有报告均需保密处理，您的协助将以赛普汀币作为酬谢.

original: Good people of Skyrim! The time has come to stand with the Companions once more.
string: 天际的善良子民们！是时候再次与战友团并肩而战了.

original: A group called the Silver Hand hide in the wild, attack any travellers and declare the Companions their enemies.
string: 一个名为银手的组织藏身荒野，袭击所有旅人，并宣称战友团是他们的敌人.

original: If you see anything: strange travelers, secret trails, hostile camps in the hills, come to us.
string: 如果你看到任何异常情况:可疑的旅人，隐秘的小径，山间的敌对营地，请立即来找我们.

original: Your information might help destroy the Silver Hand and you will be rewarded in gold.
string: 你提供的信息或许能帮助摧毁银手，你将获得金币作为奖赏.

original: Let these bandits learn that as long as the Companions lives, no bandit is safe.
string: 让这些强盗明白，只要战友团还在，就没有强盗是安全的.

original: Hear ye, hear ye, Skyrim and all true sons and daughters of Skyrim. The Companions seek fragments of Wuuthrad, the legendary weapon of Ysgramor.
string: 听好了，听好了，天际以及所有真正的天际儿女们.战友团正在寻找巫斯拉德的碎片，那是伊斯格拉默的传奇武器.

original: Some have been found, yet others lie scattered across the land, lost with time. If you bear knowledge of these shards, speak to the Companions.
string: 有些已被寻获，但其余的仍散落在这片土地上，随时间流逝而遗失.若你知晓这些碎片的下落，请告知战友团.

original: Your aid may help reforge a legacy of Skyrim. Let this be the moment in which Wuuthrad is restored.
string: 你的援助或许能重铸天际的传奇.让这一刻成为巫斯拉德重现荣光的时刻.

original: To all lovers of Skyrim and of its history: Jorrvaskr calls upon you!
string: 致所有热爱天际及其历史的人们:月瓦斯卡在召唤你！

original: The Companions seek to reclaim the shattered fragments of Wuuthrad, the sacred axe that forged our history!
string: 战友团正致力于寻回巫斯拉德的碎片，这把神圣的战斧铸就了我们的历史！

original: Any who hold knowledge of its fragments, be they kept in vaults, sold by smugglers, or hidden by time, bring that information to Jorrvaskr!
string: 凡掌握其碎片信息者，无论存于宝库，经走私者贩卖，或为时光所掩藏，皆请携此情报前来月瓦斯卡！

original: Such aid shall earn the favor of the Companions and that is certainly worth its weight in gold.
string: 这样的援助将赢得战友团的青睐，其价值无疑堪比黄金.

original: Help restore what was lost, and your name may stand beside Ysgramor's banner forevermore.
string: 帮助恢复失落之物，你的名字或许将永远与伊斯格拉默的旗帜并肩而立.

original: Citizens of Skyrim. The Companions of Jorrvaskr desire to share with all their latest tale.
string: 天际的公民们.月瓦斯卡的战友团希望与所有人分享他们最新的传奇故事.

original: They have struck down a vile den of the Silver Hand, a band of low-life criminals and reclaimed from their grip a fragment of Wuuthrad,
string: 他们铲除了银手的一个邪恶巢穴，那是一群卑劣的罪犯，并从他们手中夺回了一块巫斯拉德的碎片.

original: the sacred axe of Ysgramor himself!
string: 伊斯格拉默本人的神圣战斧！

original: These cowards dared to hold what was never theirs, but they could not stand before the fury and unity of true warriors!
string: 这些懦夫竟敢占据本不属于他们的东西，但在真正战士的怒火与团结面前，他们根本不堪一击！

original: In a clash deep within Dustman's Cairn, the Companions proved their legacy will not be stolen, and honor will not be silenced!
string: 在清洁者石冢深处的冲突中，战友团证明了他们的传承不会被窃取，荣誉不会被埋没！

original: Let it be known throughout Whiterun and beyond that those who defy tradition shall fall beneath the blades of the worthy.
string: 让白漫城乃至更远之地的人们知晓，凡违逆传统者，必将在勇者之刃下陨落.

original: Be part of reforging the weapon! If you have information about pieces of Wuuthrad, the Companions will pay handsomely for any useful information.
string: 参与重铸这件武器！如果你有关于巫斯拉德碎片的信息，战友团将为任何有用的情报支付丰厚的报酬.

original: Honorable folk of Skyrim,
string: 尊贵的天际子民们，

original: Let it be known that the Companions still seek to reclaim the scattered fragments of Wuuthrad, sacred weapon of Ysgramor, our honored forebear!
string: 众所周知，战友团仍在努力寻回巫斯拉德的碎片，那是我们尊崇的先祖伊斯格拉默的神圣武器！

original: The Companions are proud to report that some fragments have been recovered, but more remain lost to time, hidden in crypts or ruins.
string: 战友团自豪地报告，部分碎片已被寻回，但仍有更多湮没于时光之中，深藏于墓穴或遗迹之内.

original: If you hold knowledge of potential locations, come forth and speak with the shield-brothers of Jorrvaskr!
string: 若你知晓潜在的地点，请上前与月瓦斯卡的盾牌兄弟们交谈！

original: The reforging of Wuuthrad is not just a task of steel, it is the reclaiming of legacy,
string: 巫斯拉德的重铸不仅是钢铁的锻冶，更是对传承的复归.

original: and all who aid in its return shall be remembered in the stories sung within the halls of the Companions!
string: 所有协助其回归之人，都将被铭记于战友团大厅传唱的故事中！

original: Help us restore what once was mighty, and let the axe of legend strike true once more!
string: 助我们重振昔日雄风，让传奇之斧再度精准出击！

original: Hear ye, people of Skyrim.
string: 听好了，天际的子民们.

original: The Companions continue their sacred mission to recover the fragments of Wuuthrad, the legendary axe of Ysgramor, hero of our ancestors.
string: 战友团继续着他们神圣的使命，收集巫斯拉德的碎片--那是我们祖先的英雄伊斯格拉默的传奇战斧.

original: Some pieces have been reclaimed through trial and steel, but others remain lost across Skyrim.
string: 有些碎片已通过试炼与钢铁之力寻回，但其余的仍散落在天际各处.

original: We call upon all adventurers, scholars and common folks: bring us knowledge of these shards, and you shall be rewarded!
string: 我们呼吁所有冒险者，学者与平民:为我们带来这些碎片的信息，必有重赏！

original: Whether your aid comes by word or deed, your contribution shall be marked with coin, respect, and the favor of Jorrvaskr.
string: 无论您的援助是建言还是行动，您的贡献都将以金币，尊重以及月瓦斯卡的青睐作为回报.

original: Speak with the shield-brothers, and let your name be counted among those who rebuild a legend!
string: 与盾牌兄弟们交谈，让你的名字被载入重建传奇的行列！

original: For honor. For history. For Skyrim! The reforging of Wuuthrad begins with you!
string: 为了荣誉.为了历史.为了天际！巫斯拉德的重铸，从你开始！

original: We have received news for the Companions that they clear a bandit encampment located in our hold.
string: 我们收到消息，战友团清除了我们领地内的一处强盗营地.

original: The Jarl desires to express her gratitude for the great service the Companions provided to the hold.
string: 领主希望表达她对战友团为领地所做巨大贡献的感激之情.

original: As the Companions were not paid for this action, the Jarl sees this as an approval in her claim as High Queen and wishes to return their generosity.
string: 由于战友团此次行动未收取报酬，领主视此为对其作为至高女王主张的认可，并希望回报他们的慷慨之举.

original: As such, the Jarl requests any information about Wuuthrad, the weapon of the founder of the Companions.
string: 因此，领主请求任何关于巫斯拉德--战友团创始人之武器的信息.

original: If anyone knows the location of a piece of the weapon, please inform the Blue Palace and the Jarl will reward you if the information is truthfully.
string: 若有人知晓该武器任一碎片的下落，请告知蓝宫，若信息属实，领主将予以奖赏.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! To all citizens of Skyrim, hear this proclamation from the Companions: Justice has been served, and vengeance executed!
string: 听好了，听好了！致天际的所有公民，请聆听战友团的宣告:正义已得伸张，复仇已然执行！

original: The vile group known as the Silver Hand, enemies of honor and desecrators of Jorrvaskr's sacred halls, has been vanquished by the Companions!
string: 那个被称为银手的卑劣团体，荣誉之敌与月瓦斯卡神圣殿堂的亵渎者，已被战友团彻底消灭！

original: Their camps have been razed, their leaders have fallen and the remains of the group scattered.
string: 他们的营地已被夷为平地，首领也已倒下，残存的成员四散奔逃.

original: The spilled blood of the Harbinger Kodlak Whitemane has been answered tenfold!
string: 先驱者"白鬃"克拉科所流的血，已得到十倍的偿还！

original: Kodlak Whitemane has been avenged and his soul can now rest easy. His legacy shall endure!
string: 白鬃"克拉科已得复仇，其灵魂终可安息.纵使他的时代终将逝去，其功业必将永存！

original: Hear ye, citizens of Skyrim! The mighty weapon Wuuthrad, the battleaxe once wielded by Ysgramor himself, has been reforged by the Companions.
string: 天际的公民们，听好了！强大的武器巫斯拉德，那把曾由伊斯格拉默本人挥舞的战斧，已被战友团重新锻造.

original: With fragments gathered through trial, battle, and sacrifice, the greatest blacksmith of Skyrim, Eorlund Gray-Mane,
string: 通过试炼，战斗与牺牲收集的碎片，天际最伟大的铁匠厄伦德.灰鬃

original: reforged the weapon with the fire of the mythical Skyforge itself.
string: 用神话中的天空锻炉之火重铸了这把武器.

original: The shield-brothers carried the reforged blade on a solemn pilgrimage to the hallowed Tomb of Ysgramor, bringing the weapon to its rightful owner.
string: 盾牌兄弟们携重铸之刃，踏上前往伊斯格拉默圣墓的庄严朝圣之旅，将武器交还其合法主人.

original: Within those ancient halls, the warriors gave tribute to their Harbinger and laid to rest the soul of Kodlak Whitemane,
string: 在那古老的大厅中，战士们向他们的先驱致敬，并让"白鬃"克拉科的灵魂得以安息.

original: whose spirit now walks beside his ancestors in Sovngard.
string: 其灵魂如今已与先祖们一同漫步于松加德.

original: Let it be known that the Companions stand renewed with Wuuthrad returned to Ysgramor.
string: 让所有人都知道，随着巫斯拉德重归伊斯格拉默，战友团已重获新生.

original: Following that pilgrimage, a new age begins for the Companions and their new Harbinger.
string: 在那次朝圣之后，战友团及其新任先驱开启了一个崭新的时代.

original: Words are coming from Whiterun that the companions lost their Harbinger to a vicious attack on their Mead Hall from the group named the Silver Hand.
string: 有消息从白漫城传来，战友团的首领在蜜酒大厅遭到名为银手的组织残忍袭击而遇难.

original: The Companions were swift to avenge his death by storming the Silver Hand stronghold and killing those responsible.
string: 战友团迅速为他的死复仇，攻入银手据点并击杀了那些责任人.

original: Following the funerals of the Harbinger, the most senior members of the Companions did a pilgrimage to the tomb of Ysgramor,
string: 在战友团先驱的葬礼之后，最资深的成员们前往伊斯格拉默之墓进行了一次朝圣，

original: to bring back the mighty Wuuthrad, which was reforged after the funerals.
string: 带回在葬礼后重铸的强大武器巫斯拉德.

original: The pilgrimage culminated with the selection of a new Harbinger.
string: 朝圣最终以选择新的先驱者告终。

original: The Jarl Elisif the Fair extends her condolences to all the members of the Companions and wishes a long life to the new Harbinger.
string: 领主艾利西弗向所有战友团成员致以哀悼，并祝愿新任先驱者长寿安康.

original: Let it be known throughout Solitude and in the hold.
string: 请让独孤城及其领地内的人们知晓.

original: That by decree of Jarl Elisif the Fair, the tradition of the Burning of King Olaf shall now be held not once, but every week within our proud city!
string: 奉领主艾利西弗之令，焚烧奥拉夫国王的传统庆典，今后将不再只举办一次，而是每周都在我们这座骄傲的城市内举行！

original: Following solemn reflection and heartfelt counsel with the Bard's College, we now embrace our stories anew.
string: 经过与吟游诗人学院的庄重反思和诚挚商议，我们如今重新拥抱自己的故事.

original: For music must not merely mourn, it must inspire and unite!
string: 音乐不应仅仅哀悼，它必须鼓舞人心，团结众人！

original: In that spirit, Solitude shall stand as the beacon where legend meets laughter and history finds harmony!
string: 本着这种精神，独孤城将作为一座灯塔，在这里传说与欢笑相遇，历史与和谐交融！

original: Come forth each week to the plaza below the college, where fire shall dance on Olaf, verses from bards shall echo, and festival food be enjoyed.
string: 每周都来学院下方的广场吧，届时火焰将在奥拉夫身上舞动，吟游诗人的诗句将在此回荡，节庆美食也将供人享用.

original: To all citizens of Solitude and visitors, the Bard's College proudly invites you to attend our newly weekly celebration: the Burning of King Olaf!
string: 致独孤城全体市民及来访者，吟游诗人学院诚邀您参加我们新设的每周庆典:焚烧奥拉夫国王！

original: This beloved tradition, once held but once a year, now lights the stage every week, with fire, verse, and spirited performance!
string: 这项备受喜爱的传统，曾每年仅举行一次，如今每周都以火焰，诗篇与激昂的表演点亮舞台！

original: Join us beneath the open sky near the College as tales are told, songs are performed, and King Olaf's effigy meets the flame once more.
string: 加入我们，在学院附近的露天广场，听故事，赏歌曲，并再次见证奥拉夫国王的雕像被火焰吞噬.

original: Enjoy feasting, music, and the sharp wit of Skyrim's finest performers. Whether noble or humble, all are welcome.
string: 享受盛宴，音乐，以及天际最优秀表演者的机敏才智.无论高贵或卑微，所有人皆受欢迎.

original: Hear ye! Hear ye! Everyone is invited to attend the next Burning of King Olaf, a weekly spectacle in Solitude hosted by the Bard's College.
string: 大家听好了！大家听好了！诚邀各位参加下周的奥拉夫国王火祭，这是由吟游诗人学院在独孤城每周举办的盛事.

original: What awaits at the festival: Live performances by Skyrim's most gifted bards. They'll regale you with tales of triumph and of treachery.
string: 庆典上有什么:天际最有天赋的吟游诗人的现场表演.他们将用胜利与背叛的故事款待你.

original: Street-side feasts and mead tastings, courtesy of local brewers and merchants. Drink Spice Wine made especially for the festival.
string: 街头盛宴与蜂蜜酒品鉴，由本地酿酒师与商人倾情呈现.畅饮专为庆典特制的香料葡萄酒.

original: Costumed re-enactments and open-stage storytelling by members of the Bard's College.
string: 吟游诗人学院成员进行的化装重演和开放式舞台故事讲述.

original: See the art stalls and trinket traders offering songsheets, hand-carved lyres, fire-themed curios, and more.
string: 看看那些艺术摊位和小饰品商贩，他们出售歌谱，手工雕刻的里拉琴，火焰主题的奇趣物件等等.

original: Finally, see the crowning event, the grand effigy lighting ceremony, where King Olaf's likeness meets the flame amid cheering crowds.
string: 最后，请观赏加冕盛典--盛大的雕像点火仪式，在欢呼的人群中，奥拉夫国王的雕像将与火焰相遇.

original: All hearts are welcome to attend.
string: 欢迎所有心怀善意之人前来参加.

original: Musicians, poets, scholars: hear this call! The Bard's College of Solitude welcomes new students of song and story to join its hallowed halls!
string: 音乐家，诗人，学者们:请聆听这召唤！独孤城吟游诗人学院欢迎新晋歌者与故事传颂者加入其神圣殿堂！

original: Learn the art of music, poetry, and history, and become part of Skyrim's greatest tradition!
string: 学习音乐，诗歌与历史的艺术，成为天际最伟大传统的一部分！

original: The College offers training from master bards, ensuring that your tales shall be sung throughout the ages!
string: 吟游诗人学院提供大师级吟游诗人的指导，确保你的传奇故事将世代传唱！

original: If you seek fame, wisdom, and adventure, the Bard's College beckons! For what is a hero without their song?
string: 若你追求名声，智慧与冒险，吟游诗人学院正召唤着你！毕竟，没有传唱的歌曲，英雄又算什么？

original: Apply today and let your voice shape the legends of tomorrow!
string: 立即申请，让你的声音塑造明天的传奇！

original: Hear this, seekers of wisdom! The Bard's College of Solitude calls upon those who wish to preserve Skyrim's greatest histories and legends!
string: 聆听吧，智慧的追寻者们！独孤城吟游诗人学院召唤所有渴望保存天际最伟大历史与传说的人们！

original: Scholars and poets alike gather within its halls to document, study, and share the tales of heroes, kings, and battlefields!
string: 学者与诗人齐聚于殿堂之中，记录，研究并传颂英雄，君王与战场的传奇！

original: If you seek to chronicle history, master the art of storytelling, and carry forth the voices of the past, the Bard's College welcomes you!
string: 若你渴望记录历史，精通叙事艺术，并传承往昔之声，吟游诗人学院欢迎你的加入！

original: Apply today and let knowledge shape your destiny!
string: 即刻申请，让知识塑造你的命运！

original: Dreamers, musicians, poets: hear this call! The Bard's College of Solitude seeks those who wish to weave tales worthy of song!
string: 梦想家，音乐家，诗人:请聆听这召唤！独孤城吟游诗人学院正在寻觅渴望编织传世诗篇之人！

original: Learn from Skyrim's finest bards, master the lute, the voice, and the quill, and let your story become legend!
string: 向天际最杰出的吟游诗人学习，掌握鲁特琴，歌喉与羽毛笔，让你的故事成为传奇！

original: Adventure awaits, for what is a hero without their song? Apply today, and let your voice shape the stories that will echo through time!
string: 冒险在召唤，英雄岂能无歌？立即申请，让你的声音塑造那些将在时光中回响的故事！

original: The halls of the Bard's College have produced Skyrim's greatest minstrels and poets!
string: 吟游诗人学院的大厅孕育了天际最杰出的吟游诗人和诗人！

original: The songs of history, the anthems of kings, the sagas of warriors: all crafted by those who once walked these very halls!
string: 历史的歌谣，君主的赞歌，勇士的传奇:皆由曾漫步于此殿之人谱写！

original: Will you be among them? Will your name be sung in taverns, remembered in courts, honored in legends?
string: 你会成为他们中的一员吗？你的名字会在酒馆中被传唱，在宫廷中被铭记，在传说中被颂扬吗？

original: The College calls upon all who wish to leave their mark upon history! Apply today and begin your journey!
string: 学院召唤所有渴望在历史上留下印记的人！立即申请，开启你的旅程！

original: Seekers of knowledge and wielders of magic: hear this call! The College of Winterhold opens its halls to those who wish to master the arcane arts,
string: 知识的追寻者与魔法的驾驭者:请聆听此召唤！冬堡学院向渴望精通奥秘技艺之人敞开大门.

original: to study the mysteries of magic, and to walk the path of scholars and sorcerers alike!
string: 研习魔法奥秘，踏上学者与法师共行之路！

original: From destruction to restoration, from illusion to conjuration, our professors stand ready to teach, guide, and shape the next generation of mages!
string: 从毁灭到修复，从幻象到召唤，我们的教授们已准备就绪，教导，引导并塑造下一代法师！

original: Do you wish to harness the elements? To bend reality to your will? Then Winterhold beckons you!
string: 你是否渴望驾驭元素之力？是否想将现实扭曲于你的意志之下？那么冬堡正在召唤你！

original: Fear not the whispers of ignorance. Magic is a force of knowledge, not destruction! Join the College and forge your own destiny,
string: 莫惧无知的低语.魔法是知识之力，而非毁灭之能！加入学院，铸就你自己的命运.

original: for Skyrim has always been shaped by those who command the power of the arcane!
string: 因为天际始终由那些掌握奥术力量的人所塑造！

original: Applications accepted within the College's gates. Prove your worth and claim your place among the best scholars.
string: 学院大门内接受申请.证明你的价值，跻身顶尖学者之列.

original: People of Skyrim, the world changes, and magic must change with it!
string: 天际的子民们，世界在变，魔法也必须随之改变！

original: The College of Winterhold stands as Skyrim's last beacon of arcane knowledge, calling upon those who seek to master the arts that shape the future!
string: 冬堡学院作为天际最后的奥术知识灯塔，召唤着那些渴望掌握塑造未来技艺的人们！

original: Dragons have returned. Prophecy has awakened. Skyrim must not stand unprepared!
string: 巨龙已然回归.预言已经苏醒.天际绝不能毫无准备！

original: Those who wield magic may yet protect our land, uncover ancient secrets, and restore the balance that has been disrupted!
string: 掌握魔法之人，仍可守护我们的土地，揭开古老秘密，并恢复已被打破的平衡！

original: The time for fear is over! The time for understanding magic is now!
string: 恐惧的时代已经结束！理解魔法的时代已经来临！

original: If you have the talent, the ambition and the drive, the College of Winterhold welcomes you!
string: 如果你有天赋，有抱负，有干劲，冬堡学院欢迎你！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, heed this warning! Magic is not a force to be feared, nor a power to be wielded carelessly!
string: 天际省的公民们，请听此警告！魔法并非令人畏惧的力量，亦非可以随意驾驭的权能！

original: Those who lack training bring ruin, while those who study the arcane forge wonders!
string: 疏于训练者招致毁灭，潜心研习奥术者铸就奇迹！

original: The College of Winterhold calls upon those who wish to study, refine, and master the mysteries of magic,
string: 冬堡学院召唤那些渴望研习，精进并掌握魔法奥秘的人们，

original: not those who would cast without understanding, or experiment without restraint!
string: 而非那些不求甚解便施法，或毫无节制进行实验之人！

original: Join the College today and wield magic with wisdom! Let Skyrim know that the arcane is not chaos, but knowledge!
string: 即刻加入学院，以智慧驾驭魔法！让天际省知晓，奥术并非混沌，而是知识！

original: Scholars, alchemists and spellcasters, Winterhold calls upon the finest minds!
string: 学者，炼金术士与施法者们，冬堡召唤最杰出的智者！

original: The College of Winterhold does not seek mere dabblers or careless experimenters: it seeks those who wish to shape the future of magical study!
string: 冬堡学院不寻求浅尝辄止者或粗心的实验者:它寻求的是那些希望塑造魔法研究未来的人！

original: Within our halls, masters of magic unravel the mysteries of Aetherius, forge spells of great power,
string: 在我们的殿堂之中，魔法大师们揭示着湮灭之境的奥秘，锻造出威力无穷的法术.

original: and study lost histories to understand what others cannot! This is no mere school. It is a sanctuary for those truly devoted to the arcane!
string: 并研习失落的历史，以理解他人所不能！这绝非寻常学府.它是真正献身于奥秘之人的圣所！

original: If you believe yourself worthy, if you seek true mastery, then step forward! The College awaits those who can carry Skyrim's magical legacy forward!
string: 若你自认足够优秀，若你追求真正的精通，那就上前来吧！学院等待着那些能够传承天际魔法遗产的人！

original: By order of the Jarl, new bounties are available to all able bodied men and women of the hold.
string: 奉领主之令，本领地所有健壮男女均可领取新的悬赏任务.

original: A reward will be offered to anyone who completes any bounties.
string: 完成任何赏金任务者，都将获得酬劳.

original: See the posted bounties by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: A new bounty regarding giants was approved by the Jarl and distributed to innkeepers. A giant camp is causing problems for travellers.
string: 领主批准了一项关于巨人的新悬赏，并已分发给各旅店老板.一个巨人营地正给旅行者带来麻烦.

original: This bounty is available to all adventures and bounty hunters.
string: 所有冒险者和赏金猎人都可领取这份悬赏.

original: See the posted bounty by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管对话，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: A dragon was sighted and established its nest in the hold.
string: 一条巨龙现身，并在领地内筑巢.

original: The presence of that dragon is a threat to the safety of the Hold and the Jarl has issued a bounty for the dragon.
string: 那条龙的存在威胁着领地的安全，领主已发布悬赏捉拿此龙.

original: See the posted bounty by talking to any innkeepers of the hold or by talking directly to the steward.
string: 通过与该领地的任何旅店老板交谈，或直接与总管交谈，查看已发布的悬赏令.

original: Listen everyone, the great Maven Black-Briar offers a new bounty.
string: 大家都听着，伟大的玛雯.黑棘发布了一项新的悬赏.

original: Citizens of Riften, the great Maven Black-Briar offers a new bounty.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，伟大的玛雯.黑棘发布了一项新的悬赏.

original: Attention citizens of Riften, the great Maven Black-Briar offers a new bounty.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，伟大的玛雯.黑棘发布了一项新的悬赏.

original: Citizen of Riften, Maven Black-Briar, the magnificent owner of the best meadery in Skyrim, offers a new bounty.
string: 裂谷城的市民们，天际最棒蜜酒庄的显赫主人玛雯.黑棘发布了一项新的悬赏.

original: Listen everyone, a new bounty has been approuved by the generous and gracious Maven Black-Briar,
string: 大家都听着，慷慨而仁慈的玛雯.黑棘已经批准了一项新的悬赏.

original: It's on a former employee. It is believed that person stole from the Black-Briar Meadery and is wanted for questioning.
string: 目标是一名前雇员.据信此人从黑荆棘蜜酒庄盗窃财物，现因需要问讯而被通缉.

original: It's on a former bounty hunter. That person failed to complete a previous bounty graciously granted by Maven.
string: 目标是一名前赏金猎人.此人未能完成梅文先前慷慨授予的悬赏任务.

original: It's on a former business partner. That partner failed to fulfil his contract and is wanted for breach of contract.
string: 这是针对一位前商业伙伴的.那位伙伴未能履行合同，因违约而被通缉.

original: This one is a personal matter and requires a discreet bounty hunter that is flexible with the terms of the bounty.
string: 此事涉及私人事务，需要一位行事谨慎，对悬赏条件能灵活处理的赏金猎人.

original: It's on a former employee that is suspected to be a mole from a competitor. The bounty is to bring him back alive and be judged for his crime.
string: 目标是一名前雇员，怀疑是竞争对手派来的卧底.悬赏要求活捉此人，让他接受审判并为其罪行付出代价.

original: If you are interested in the bounty, seek Maven herself. If she judges you competent and worthy of her time, she'll provide you the details.
string: 如果你对悬赏感兴趣，就去找梅文本人.如果她认为你能力足够且值得她花时间，她会告诉你详情.

original: To anyone desiring to help the magnificent Maven with the bounty, speak to her directly. Please note that only the best is considered for the bounty.
string: 任何有意愿协助显赫的玛雯完成悬赏的人，请直接与她交谈.请注意，只有最优秀的人选才会被考虑接受这项悬赏.

original: Please note that only the best can apply and any amateurs bothering Maven for this bounty will be punished and banned from future bounties.
string: 请注意，只有最优秀者方可申请，任何业余人士若因此悬赏打扰梅文，将受到惩罚并被禁止参与未来的悬赏任务.

original: For the privilege to do a favour for the Black-Briar family, any potential bounty hunter must prove their worth and provide a deposit.
string: 任何想要为黑棘家族效力的赏金猎人，都必须证明自己的价值并缴纳保证金，才能获得这份殊荣.

original: Remember that a successful bounty is always a fast way to gain trust from Maven and she always rewards generously those she thrusts.
string: 记住，成功完成悬赏总是快速赢得梅文信任的捷径，而她向来对信赖之人慷慨有加.

original: Beside the reward, successfully completing the bounty will grant the privilege to do other profitable work for Maven.
string: 除了赏金之外，成功完成悬赏任务还将获得为玛雯处理其他有利可图工作的特权.

original: Maven Black-Briar is always the most generous and the reward for this bounty is higher than a bounty from the Jarl.
string: 玛雯.黑棘总是最慷慨的，这项悬赏的赏金比领主发布的还要高.

original: Hear ye! Hear ye! All those in need of strong arms and sharp steel, take heed!
string: 听好了！听好了！所有需要强健臂膀与锋利刀剑的人，都注意了！

original: The Companions of Jorrvaskr stand ready to be hired for honorable tasks, protection, and even as enforcers of the law!
string: 月瓦斯卡的战友团随时准备承接光荣的任务，提供保护，甚至担任法律的执行者！

original: Be it bandits, wild beasts or trouble you'd rather face with a sword beside you.
string: 无论是强盗，野兽，还是你更愿意持剑面对的麻烦.

original: The Companions are the extra steel standing ready to answer with grit, honor, and unmatched prowess!
string: 战友团是随时准备以坚韧，荣誉和无与伦比的勇武挺身而出的额外钢铁力量！

original: Seek them atop the Wind District in Whiterun. Speak with Vilkas, Aela, or Farkas to arrange your needs with an unbreakable contract.
string: 前往白漫城的风区高处寻找他们.与威尔卡斯，艾拉或法卡斯交谈，通过一份牢不可破的契约来安排你的需求.

original: If danger dares, the Companions defend!
string: 若危险胆敢来犯，战友团必将挺身捍卫！

original: Citizens of Skyrim! The Companions are not mere swords-for-hire, they are defenders of the people, bound by a sacred code of honor and loyalty!
string: 天际的公民们！战友团绝非普通的雇佣兵，他们是人民的守护者，恪守着荣誉与忠诚的神圣准则！

original: If danger strikes, if injustice brews, if courage is needed, you may seek their aid, but know that they fight only for worthy causes and honest coin!
string: 若危难降临，若冤屈滋生，若需勇气挺身，你可寻求他们的援助，但须知他们只为正义的事业与诚实的酬劳而战！

original: Their blades are sharp, and their oaths unshaken! For protection, justice, and valor unmatched: hire the Companions!
string: 他们的利刃锋利，誓言坚定！为寻求无与伦比的保护，正义与勇气:雇佣战友团吧！

original: Citizens of Skyrim. Not all mercenaries who swing blades do so for honor!
string: 天际的公民们.并非所有挥舞刀剑的佣兵都是为了荣誉而战！

original: While shady sellswords loiter in taverns with false promises and empty eyes, the true warriors of Jorrvaskr offer strength with trust and tradition!
string: 当那些可疑的佣兵在酒馆里游荡，满口虚假承诺，眼神空洞时，月瓦斯卡真正的战士们以信任与传统提供力量！

original: If you need protection or aid in your travels, turn not to back-alley swords, but to the Companions.
string: 若你旅途需要庇护或援助，莫求助于暗巷刀剑，当寻战友团.

original: Veterans of battle and keepers of Skyrim's glory! Their price is fair, their word is iron, and their axes strike only for noble cause!
string: 身经百战的勇士，天际荣耀的守护者！他们索价公允，诺言如铁，战斧只为崇高事业而挥！

original: Speak with Vilkas, Aela, or Farkas atop the Wind District in Skyrim. Don't trust the amateurs: hire your strength from true professionals!
string: 在天际的风区顶端与威尔卡斯，艾拉或法卡斯交谈.别相信业余人士:从真正的专业人士那里雇佣你的力量！

original: Citizens of Skyrim! The fearless Companions are proud to announce another victory against a vile bandit camp plaguing Skyrim.
string: 天际的公民们！无畏的战友团自豪地宣布，我们又一次战胜了困扰天际的邪恶强盗营地.

original: No longer shall these raiders steal from honest folk, nor shall their blades be drawn against the innocent.
string: 这些掠夺者将不再能从诚实的人们那里偷窃，他们的刀刃也不得再指向无辜之人.

original: The threat is over, and our roads and farms are safer for everyone!
string: 威胁已经解除，我们的道路和农田对所有人都更安全了！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Broken Helm Hollow with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟姊妹们以力量与正义降临裂盔山谷，将匪徒如风前糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Faldar's Tooth with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟与姐妹们以力量与正义降临法尔达之牙，将匪徒如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Four Skull Lookout with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟姊妹们以力量与正义降临四头骨瞭望台，将匪徒如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Nilheim with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟姊妹们以力量与正义降临尼尔海姆，将强盗们如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon the Rift Watchtower with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟会的兄弟姐妹们以力量与正义降临裂痕领瞭望塔，将强盗们如风前糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon the Ruins of Bthalft with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟会的兄弟姐妹们以力量与正义降临巴塔尔夫特遗迹，将强盗们如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Treva's Watch with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟与姐妹们以力量与正义降临翠瓦警戒堡，将匪徒如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Bilegulch Mine with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 持盾的兄弟姐妹们以力量与正义降临胆汁矿坑，将强盗们如风前糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Cracked Tusk Keep with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟姊妹们以力量与正义降临裂牙堡垒，将强盗们如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Embershard Mine with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟姊妹们以力量与正义降临碎火矿场，将强盗们如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Frostmere Crypt with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 持盾的兄弟姐妹们以力量与正义降临霜池地穴，将那些强盗如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Knifepoint Ridge with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟姊妹们以力量与正义降临刀锋岭，将匪徒如风中糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Snowpoint Beacon with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟姊妹们以力量与正义降临雪峰灯塔，将匪徒如糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon Fort Fellhammer with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟姊妹们以力量与正义降临在铁锤堡，将那些强盗如风前糠秕般驱散！

original: The shield-brothers and sisters descended upon a camp near Ustengrav with might and justice, scattering the brigands like chaff before the wind!
string: 盾牌兄弟会的兄弟姐妹们以力量与正义之姿降临乌斯滕格拉夫附近的营地，将那些强盗如风吹糠秕般驱散！

original: Let all outlaws remember this truth: Those who live by lawless steel will meet their end by the Companions!
string: 让所有不法之徒铭记这个真理:以无法之刃为生者，终将命丧战友团之手！

original: Remember that Skyrim is safer because of the Companions and their sense of justice and honor.
string: 记住，正是因为有战友团及其秉持的正义与荣誉感，天际才更加安全.

original: Citizen of Skyrim. The Jarl wishes to warn everyone about travellers afflicted with a sickness.
string: 天际的市民.领主希望警告所有人，提防那些染上疾病的旅行者.

original: These people are afflicted from a sickness worthy of Peryite. We do not know what that sickness is,
string: 这些人患上了一种连魄伊特都觉得痛苦的疾病。我们不知道那到底是什么病，

original: but the most visible symptom is a red rash covering their body as if the color of their skin was red.
string: 但最明显的症状是全身布满红色皮疹，仿佛皮肤本身变成了红色.

original: If provoked, they will vomit a green bile that will poison you. It is suspected that this also transmits the sickness.
string: 若被激怒，它们会吐出绿色胆汁使你中毒.据推测，这也会传播疾病.

original: If you see one on the road, it's best to avoid them and report the sighting to the guards.
string: 如果在路上看到他们，最好避开并向守卫报告.

original: Do not interact with them as they might infect you.
string: 不要与他们接触，以免被感染.

original: The Jarl of Whiterun places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 白漫城的领主对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

original: The Jarl of Solitude places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 独孤城的领主对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

original: The Jarl of Markarth places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 马卡斯城的领主对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

original: The Jarl of Morthal places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 莫萨尔的领主对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

original: The Jarl of Dawnstar places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 晨星的领主对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

original: The Jarl of Winterhold places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 冬堡的领主对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

original: The Jarl of Windhelm places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 风舵城的领主悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The Jarl of Riften places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 裂谷城的领主对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

original: The Jarl of Falkreath places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 佛克瑞斯的领主悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The villagers of Karthwasten places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 卡斯威斯腾的村民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The villagers of Ivarstead places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 伊瓦尔镇的村民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The citizens of Riverwood places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 河木镇的居民对山姆.圭文悬赏通缉.

original: The villagers of Shor's Stone places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 舒尔之石的村民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The villagers of Rorikstead places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 洛利克镇的村民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The villagers of Kynesgrove places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 凯娜之林的村民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The citizens of Stonehills places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 石丘镇的居民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of The Bannered Mare places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 悬旗母马的老板悬赏捉拿山姆·圭文.

original: The owner of Braidwood Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 辫枝旅馆的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of Candlehearth Hall places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 烛炉堂的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of Dead Man's Drink places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 亡者之饮的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of The Drunken Huntsman places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 醉猎户的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of Frostfruit Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 霜果旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of the Four Shields Tavern places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 四盾酒馆的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of Moorside Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 坞边旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of the New Gnisis Cornerclub places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 新格尼西斯街角吧的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of the Nightgate Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 夜扉旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of the Silver-Blood Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 银血旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of Old Hroldan Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 古霍尔丹旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owners of The Bee and Barb places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 蜂与钩的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owners of The Frozen Hearth places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 冻炉旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of The Winking Skeever places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 眨眼恶鼠的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of the Vilemyr Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 维勒米旅馆的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The owner of the Windpeak Inn places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 风岳旅店的老板悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The citizens of Dragon Bridge places a bounty on Sam Guevenne.
string: 龙桥镇的居民悬赏捉拿山姆.圭文.

original: The man is wanted for questioning in relation to various pranks carried out recently.
string: 该男子因涉嫌参与近期发生的多起恶作剧事件而被通缉审问.

original: He is a person of interest in relations for a case of vandalizing of public and private properties.
string: 他是一起破坏公私财物案件中的关系人.

original: The person is suspected to be a leader of a gang executing various mischief during the night.
string: 此人被怀疑是一个夜间实施各种恶作剧的帮派头目.

original: He is wanted for harassing various patrons and citizens.
string: 他因骚扰多位顾客和市民而被通缉.

original: He is suspected to lead a group of wrongdoers causing disturbance to honest citizens.
string: 据信他领导着一群滋扰守法公民的恶徒.

original: Sam is a Male Breton, aged 30 to 45 with brown hair and wearing a Conjurer robe.
string: 山姆是一名男性布莱顿人，年龄在30至45岁之间，棕色头发，身穿召唤法师长袍.

original: His modus operandi is to approach unsuspecting patrons at inns for a drinking contest.
string: 他的惯用伎俩是在酒馆里接近毫无戒心的顾客，发起饮酒比赛.

original: Once his victim is drunk, he leads them outside and convinces them to do various misdeeds on his behalf.
string: 一旦受害者喝醉，他就会将其带到外面，并说服他们替他做各种坏事.

original: The victims don't remember anything. If seen, do not approach him, but report his whereabouts to the authorities.
string: 受害者们什么都不记得了.如果见到他，切勿靠近，请立即向当局报告他的行踪.

original: Citizen of Skyrim. The Jarl emits a warning against visiting the city of Dawnstar.
string: 天际的市民.领主发出警告，不要前往晨星城.

original: After many reports from travellers and verification done by the authorities, it appears an unnatural curse lays on the town.
string: 根据众多旅行者的报告以及官方的核实，这座城镇似乎笼罩着某种非自然的诅咒.

original: The residents of Dawnstar cannot rest, their nights are filled with terror and horrible nightmares.
string: 晨星的居民无法安眠，他们的夜晚充满了恐惧与可怕的噩梦.

original: Travelers are strongly advised to avoid Dawnstar until further notice! For those that must go to the town,
string: 强烈建议旅行者们在另行通知前避免前往晨星！对于那些必须前往该镇的人，

original: we recommend taking the necessary precautions to avoid falling under the curse.
string: 我们建议采取必要的预防措施，以免受到诅咒的影响.

original: It's recommended to keep the visit as short as possible and to avoid staying the night inside the town.
string: 建议尽量缩短访问时间，避免在镇内过夜.

original: Camping outside the city limit is preferable as an alternative.
string: 在城外露营是更可取的替代方案.

original: The Jarl of Dawnstar announces the curse that plagued Dawnstar has been lifted, and peace has returned to the city!
string: 晨星的领主宣布，困扰晨星的诅咒已被解除，和平已重返这座城市！

original: The people, once tormented by sleepless nights filled with terror and dreadful visions, may now rest without fear!
string: 那些曾被充满恐惧与可怕幻象的无眠之夜折磨的人们，如今可以安然入眠，再无畏惧！

original: Whatever dark force gripped the town has been vanquished, and the hearts of Dawnstar's people may heal at last!
string: 无论何种黑暗力量曾笼罩这座城镇，如今已被击败，晨星镇民的心灵终得疗愈！

original: Travelers may once again visit the city without concern. Our Jarl is pleased to lift the travel ban and all safety measures.
string: 旅行者们可以再次安心造访这座城市.我们的领主很高兴能解除旅行禁令及所有安全限制.

original: Let it be known that the ruins of Saarthal remain an active site of historical research, overseen by the mages of the College of Winterhold.
string: 致所有人知悉，萨瑟尔城的遗迹仍是一处活跃的历史研究场所，由冬堡学院的法师们负责监管.

original: The excavation is ongoing, and entry is strictly prohibited to all outside the College faculty and designated researchers.
string: 挖掘工作正在进行中，除学院教职员工及指定研究人员外，严禁任何外部人员进入.

original: Saarthal holds invaluable secrets of Skyrim's ancient past, and the College is committed to preserving and studying its depths with the utmost care.
string: 萨瑟尔城蕴藏着天际远古历史中无价的秘密，学院致力于以最谨慎的态度去保护和研究其深层奥秘.

original: Unauthorized entry may result in severe consequences, as both magical and structural hazards remain within the site.
string: 未经授权进入可能导致严重后果，因为该地点内仍存在魔法和结构上的危险.

original: For those interested in the academic findings, periodic reports shall be issued by the College in due course.
string: 对学术研究成果感兴趣者，学院将适时发布定期报告.

original: We appreciate the cooperation of the public in respecting this critical work.
string: 我们感谢公众对此重要工作的理解与配合.

original: Citizens of Skyrim! By order of the Jarl of Winterhold, Saarthal is restricted until further notice.
string: 天际的公民们！根据冬堡领主的命令，萨塔尔现已限制进入，直至另行通知.

original: The ruins of Saarthal, the first home of the Nords, remains an ancient bastion of historical significance.
string: 萨瑟尔城的废墟，作为诺德人最初的故乡，至今仍是具有重大历史意义的古老堡垒.

original: The site is under the careful study of the College of Winterhold.
string: 该遗址正由冬堡学院进行细致研究.

original: The scholars seek to uncover its secrets, and with each passing day, new discoveries bring us closer to understanding Skyrim's distant past!
string: 学者们致力于揭开它的秘密，随着每一天的流逝，新的发现都让我们更接近理解天际那遥远的过去！

original: However, Saarthal remains a site of unpredictable dangers.
string: 然而，萨瑟尔城遗址仍是一处充满未知危险的地方.

original: For the safety of all, entry is strictly forbidden to anyone outside the College's authorized research teams.
string: 为保障所有人的安全，严禁学院授权研究团队以外的人员进入.

original: Unauthorized visitors will be arrested and detained by the authority of the Jarl of Winterhold.
string: 未经许可的访客将被冬堡领主的权威逮捕并拘留.

original: The College remains dedicated to expanding the knowledge of magic and history for the benefit of all Skyrim.
string: 学院始终致力于为全天际的利益拓展魔法与历史知识.

original: Let it be known that the ruins of Saarthal remain an active site of historical research, overseen by the mages of the College of Winterhold.
string: 致所有人知悉，萨瑟尔城的遗迹仍是一处活跃的历史研究场所，由冬堡学院的法师们负责监管.

original: The excavation is ongoing, and entry is strictly prohibited to all outside the College faculty and designated researchers.
string: 挖掘工作正在进行中，除学院教职员工及指定研究人员外，严禁任何外部人员进入.

original: Saarthal holds invaluable secrets of Skyrim's ancient past, and the College is committed to preserving and studying its depths with the utmost care.
string: 萨瑟尔城蕴藏着天际远古历史中无价的秘密，学院致力于以最谨慎的态度去保护和研究其深层奥秘.

original: Unauthorized entry may result in severe consequences, as both magical and structural hazards remain within the site.
string: 未经授权进入可能导致严重后果，因为该地点内仍存在魔法和结构上的危险.

original: For those interested in the academic findings, periodic reports shall be issued by the College in due course.
string: 对学术研究成果感兴趣者，学院将适时发布定期报告.

original: We appreciate the cooperation of the public in respecting this critical work.
string: 我们感谢公众对此重要工作的理解与配合.

original: Citizens of Skyrim! By order of the Jarl of Winterhold, Saarthal is restricted until further notice.
string: 天际的公民们！根据冬堡领主的命令，萨塔尔现已限制进入，直至另行通知.

original: The ruins of Saarthal, the first home of the Nords, remains an ancient bastion of historical significance.
string: 萨瑟尔城的废墟，作为诺德人最初的故乡，至今仍是具有重大历史意义的古老堡垒.

original: The site is under the careful study of the College of Winterhold.
string: 该遗址正由冬堡学院进行细致研究.

original: The scholars seek to uncover its secrets, and with each passing day, new discoveries bring us closer to understanding Skyrim's distant past!
string: 学者们致力于揭开它的秘密，随着每一天的流逝，新的发现都让我们更接近理解天际那遥远的过去！

original: However, Saarthal remains a site of unpredictable dangers.
string: 然而，萨瑟尔城遗址仍是一处充满未知危险的地方.

original: For the safety of all, entry is strictly forbidden to anyone outside the College's authorized research teams.
string: 为保障所有人的安全，严禁学院授权研究团队以外的人员进入.

original: Unauthorized visitors will be arrested and detained by the authority of the Jarl of Winterhold.
string: 未经许可的访客将被冬堡领主的权威逮捕并拘留.

original: The College remains dedicated to expanding the knowledge of magic and history for the benefit of all Skyrim.
string: 学院始终致力于为全天际的利益拓展魔法与历史知识.

original: Residents of Riften, here's a message from Maven Black-Briar.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，这是玛雯.黑棘带来的消息.

original: The rumours about my grandson Sibbi being in jail are true.
string: 关于我孙子西比入狱的传闻是真的.

original: By order of the Jarl, he was arrested for a crime he committed and I agreed for him to be jailed to pay for his crime.
string: 根据领主的命令，他因所犯罪行被捕，我同意将他监禁以赎罪.

original: As an upstanding citizen, I fully support the Jarl and the application of the law.
string: 作为一名正直的市民，我完全支持领主及其对法律的执行.

original: My family name cannot allow anyone to escape the consequences of their actions, especially regarding the law of our Hold.
string: 我的家族不容许任何人逃脱其行为的后果，尤其是在我们领地的法律面前.

original: Citizens of Riften, hear this breaking news: the Black-Briar Lodge was broken into by unknown offenders.
string: 裂谷城的市民们，请听这则突发新闻:黑棘小屋遭不明歹徒闯入.

original: The thieves forced open the estate's safe and empty its contents. Among the stolen property is a prized stallion of great value and pedigree.
string: 盗贼撬开了庄园的保险箱，将其中的财物洗劫一空.失窃物品中包括一匹血统优良，价值连城的珍贵种马.

original: Let it be known: Those who meddle in the affairs of the Black-Briar family shall receive no quarter, no pardon, and no mercy.
string: 特此声明:凡胆敢插手黑棘家族事务者，必将格杀勿论，绝不宽恕，绝不留情.

original: Maven Black-Briar is renowned for her benevolence and discernment,
string: 玛雯.黑棘以其仁慈与明辨是非而闻名.

original: and will extend clemency to the first culprit who comes forward with truthful testimony regarding their accomplices.
string: 并将对第一个站出来如实供述同伙罪行的罪犯予以宽大处理.

original: Failing that, a generous reward is offered to any who can provide information leading to the apprehension of the culprits.
string: 若无法达成，任何能提供线索协助缉拿元凶者，都将获得丰厚酬劳.

original: Let this event serve as a solemn reminder: the Black-Briar name shall not be defied. The thieves will be punished to the full extent of the law.
string: 让此事成为一次庄严的警示:布莱克-布莱尔家族的名誉不容挑衅.窃贼必将受到法律最严厉的惩处.

original: Good citizens of the Rift, the guards are investigating an unlawful entry into Black-Briar Lodge
string: 裂痕领的善良市民们，守卫正在调查黑棘小屋的非法闯入事件

original: and the theft of secured property and the disappearance of a prized horse.
string: 以及安全财产的失窃和一匹珍贵马匹的失踪.

original: The perpetrators remain unidentified and are considered dangerous.
string: 作案者身份不明，且被视为危险人物.

original: Breaking and entry is a violation of Riften Hold law and will be prosecuted without leniency.
string: 破门而入违反裂谷领法律，将严惩不贷.

original: At the request of the Jarl, the guards are fully cooperating with the Black-Briar family and the investigation is ongoing.
string: 应领主的要求，守卫们正全力配合黑棘家族，调查仍在进行中.

original: The guards ask the population for any information regarding the crime.
string: 守卫向民众询问有关罪行的任何信息.

original: Additionally, a bounty is now in effect for any information leading to the identification and arrest of those involved.
string: 此外，现对任何能提供线索以识别并逮捕涉案人员的信息悬赏缉拿.

original: People of Riften, if you ever venture to the docks, the Jarl ask you to be aware of the dock workers and to let them do their work,
string: 裂谷城的市民们，若你们前往码头，领主提醒你们留意码头工人，并让他们安心工作.

original: even if they are muttering insanities about dwemers, their ruins and their lost knowledge.
string: 即便他们正喃喃自语着关于锻莫族，他们的遗迹以及失落知识的疯言疯语.

original: Unless they turn aggressive, the dock workers should be ignored and left to their work.
string: 除非他们变得具有攻击性，否则码头工人应当被忽略，让他们继续工作.

original: If they are aggressive or are harassing other people, go report them to the guards stationed at the docks.
string: 如果他们具有攻击性或在骚扰他人，就去向码头驻守的卫兵报告.

original: They will know how to defuse the situation.
string: 他们会知道如何化解局面.

original: Citizens of Riften, an argonian dock worker called From-Deepest-Fathoms is seeking the help of an adventurer familiar with dwemer ruins.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，一位名叫源自深处的亚龙人码头工人正在寻求熟悉矮人遗迹的冒险者帮助.

original: The request is to navigate deep in a nearby dwemer ruin.
string: 请求是深入探索附近的一座矮人遗迹.

original: We couldn't understand the remainder of what she requested as she doesn't seem to be all there.
string: 我们没能理解她剩下的请求，因为她看起来神志不太清醒.

original: We don't know if a reward is offered, or even if the ruin is safe for adventurers.
string: 我们不知道是否有悬赏，甚至不清楚那座遗迹对冒险者而言是否安全.

original: If you are desperate for adventure and cannot find any else, you can go talk to From-Deepest-Fathoms for all the details.
string: 如果你渴望冒险却无处可寻，可以去和源自深处谈谈，了解所有详情.

original: Hear this, people of Riften. Reports are coming in that a new dwemer ruin was unlocked.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，听好了.有报告称，一座新的矮人遗迹已被开启.

original: The ancient dwemer city of Avanchnzel was previously locked due to a failed expedition.
string: 古老的矮人城市阿旺晨泽尔因一次失败的探险而此前一直处于封闭状态.

original: We are not sure how the entrance was unlocked, but travellers passing nearby confirmed that an adventurer managed to open the entrance.
string: 我们不确定入口是如何被打开的，但经过附近的旅行者证实，有一位冒险家成功开启了入口.

original: As dwemer ruins are filled with danger,
string: 由于矮人遗迹充满了危险，

original: the Jarl is issuing a proclamation to forbid anyone to enter the ruin of Avanchnzel until a proper expedition can be assembled and explore the ruin.
string: 领主正在发布公告，禁止任何人进入阿旺晨泽尔遗迹，直至组建起合适的探险队并完成对遗迹的勘察.

original: Anyone caught trespassing will be thrown in jail.
string: 任何擅闯者都将被投入监狱.

original: Hear this, citizens of Riften! Word has spread that the long-sealed Dwemer city of Avanchnzel has been unshackled from its iron grip.
string: 裂谷城的市民们，听好了！有消息传来，那座被封印已久的矮人城市阿旺晨泽尔已经挣脱了它的铁腕束缚.

original: Once thought inaccessible due to a doomed expedition, its entrance now stands ajar, reopened by an unknown adventurer.
string: 曾因一次注定失败的探险而被认为无法进入，如今其入口微敞，由一位不知名的冒险者重新开启.

original: This is according to witnesses passing near the ruin. The Jarl warns: Dwemer ruins are perilous, and Avanchnzel is no exception.
string: 这是根据路过遗迹的目击者所述.领主警告:矮人遗迹危机四伏，阿旺晨泽尔也不例外.

original: By decree, no citizen may approach the site until a sanctioned expedition is assembled.
string: 根据法令，在获得批准的探险队组建完成前，任何公民不得靠近该地点.

original: Trespassers shall face swift justice and a cell beneath the Keep.
string: 擅闯者将面临迅捷的审判，并被关押在要塞地牢之中.

original: Citizens of Riften, hear me! The town of Helgen was burned to ashes!
string: 裂谷城的居民们，听我说！海尔根镇已被烧成灰烬！

original: Travelers bring news of its destruction following the capture of the Jarl of Windhelm, the leader of the Stormcloak, Ulfric Stormcloak himself.
string: 旅行者们带来了风舵城陷落后的消息，风暴斗篷的领袖，风舵城的领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷本人已被俘.

original: Even if the rest of Skyrim suspects that the stormcloaks raided the town to free their leader.
string: 即使天际的其他人怀疑是风暴斗篷袭击了城镇以解救他们的领袖.

original: We know that Ulfric would never allow his troops to go to such extremes.
string: 我们知道乌弗瑞克绝不会允许他的部下采取如此极端的手段.

original: From reports coming from Windhelm, they claim a dragon came from the  sky to free Ulfric.
string: 根据风舵城传来的报告，他们声称有一条龙从天而降，解放了乌弗瑞克.

original: A beast of legend, the likes of which have not been witnessed since the time of the Dragon Cult!
string: 传说中的野兽，自龙教时代以来便未曾得见！

original: A clear sign of the righteousness of the cause that the Stormcloaks defend. The Empire was too weak to defend the town and save the town residents.
string: 这清楚地证明了风暴斗篷所捍卫事业的正义性.帝国过于软弱，未能保卫城镇并拯救居民.

original: We do not know where that dragon went after the attack, but the Jarl urges everyone to be cautious when traveling outside.
string: 我们不知道那条龙在袭击后去了哪里，但领主敦促大家外出旅行时务必保持警惕.

original: People of Riften, the Civil War is not over! The Empire failed to execute Ulfric Stromcloak at Helgen.
string: 裂谷城的子民们，内战尚未结束！帝国在海尔根未能处决乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷.

original: The Divines themselves delivered Jarl Ulfric from execution by sending a dragon to attack the Empire.
string: 众神亲自派出一条巨龙袭击帝国，从而将乌弗瑞克领主从处决中解救了出来.

original: This is a sign that Akatosh turned its back on the Empire and now favors the Rebellion.
string: 这是阿卡托什背弃帝国，转而支持叛军的征兆.

original: Skyrim must now stand on its own and no longer support the wickedness of the Empire.
string: 天际如今必须自立，不再支持帝国的邪恶行径.

original: Ulfric Stormcloak calls upon all true Nords to take up arms, to rise against the false rule of the Empire, and to fight for Skyrim's freedom!
string: 乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷号召所有真正的诺德人拿起武器，反抗帝国的虚假统治，为天际的自由而战！

original: The time is now, the Stormcloaks march for war! Fight for your homeland, and let Tamriel know that Skyrim belongs to the Nords!
string: 时机已到，风暴斗篷为战争而进军！为你的家园而战，让塔姆瑞尔知道天际属于诺德人！

original: People of the Rift, we have received news from Whiterun delivered by courier.
string: 裂痕领的居民们，我们收到了由信使从白漫城带来的消息.

original: A dragon has attacked Whiterun, but the most incredible is that dragon was struck down by a hero of legends.
string: 一条龙袭击了白漫城，但最不可思议的是，那条龙被一位传说中的英雄击倒了.

original: As unbelievable as this sounds, one of the defenders absorbed the soul of the dragon upon its defeat, revealing that a dragonborn stands among us!
string: 尽管听起来难以置信，但其中一位守卫在巨龙陨落时吸收了它的灵魂，这揭示了我们之中竟有一位龙裔！

original: And we all heard the thundering shouts from High Hrothgar.
string: 我们都听到了从霍斯加修道院传来的雷鸣般的吼声.

original: The greybeards themselves recognized the dragonborn and summoned them to the Throat of the World.
string: 灰胡子们亲自认可了龙裔，并将其召唤至世界之喉.

original: What does this truly mean for Skyrim? In times past, a Dragonborn ruled as Emperor, uniting the land under his banner.
string: 这对天际究竟意味着什么？在过去，一位龙裔曾作为皇帝统治，将这片土地统一在他的旗帜下.

original: But now, Skyrim stands divided, and this Dragonborn emerges into a world torn by war!
string: 但如今，天际四分五裂，而这位龙裔却在一个被战争撕裂的世界中现身！

original: Who will they stand with? Will they claim Skyrim's true independence, or be swayed by Imperial chains?
string: 他们会站在谁一边？是会宣称天际的真正独立，还是会被帝国人的锁链所动摇？

original: People of Riften, strange news comes from Whiterun. A dragon attacked the city, and though the beast was slain, this is not the most incredible news!
string: 裂谷城的居民们，白漫城传来了奇怪的消息.一条巨龙袭击了那座城市，虽然那野兽已被击杀，但这还不是最惊人的消息！

original: One among the warriors is said to be Dragonborn, wielding the power of the ancient Nords!
string: 据说战士中有一位龙裔，掌握着古代诺德人的力量！

original: The Greybeards have called to them, a summons heard even here in Riften!
string: 灰胡子召唤了他们，这召唤声甚至在裂谷城这里都能听见！

original: But what does this mean for Skyrim? Will this warrior be a savior, or a threat?
string: 但这对于天际意味着什么？这位战士会成为救世主，还是威胁？

original: Many wonder where this Dragonborn's path will lead. Will it be for Skyrim's freedom?
string: 许多人都在想，这位龙裔的道路将通向何方.是为了天际的自由吗？

original: Citizens of Riften, we now know more about the strange shout that came out of High Hrothgar.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，我们现在对霍斯加修道院传来的奇异吼声有了更多了解.

original: We heard that call that was as loud as thunder and we all have speculations about what it was and what it could mean.
string: 我们听到了那声如雷鸣般的呼唤，大家纷纷猜测那是什么，又可能意味着什么.

original: We received news from Whiterun that a dragon attacked the city, and after a difficult battle, it was slain.
string: 我们收到来自白漫城的消息，一条巨龙袭击了该城，经过一场艰苦的战斗，它被击杀了.

original: But this is not why the Greybeard manifested themselves so loudly.
string: 但这并非灰胡子如此大声显现的原因.

original: No, it is because one of the defenders was revealed to be a Dragonborn.
string: 不，是因为其中一名守卫被发现是龙裔.

original: We don't have more details, but the Greybeards recognized this power of legends and have called to them.
string: 我们没有更多细节，但灰胡子们认可了这种传说中的力量，并已向他们发出召唤.

original: But what does this mean for Skyrim? Will this warrior be a savior, or another threat?
string: 但这对于天际意味着什么？这位战士会成为救世主，还是另一个威胁？

original: Citizens of Riften, the recent disturbances caused by the Thalmors in the Ratway Warrens are over.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，梭默在鼠道洞穴引发的近期骚乱已经结束.

original: The guards have entered the Ratway to escort the Thalmor out of the city.
string: 守卫们已经进入鼠道，要将梭默人护送离开这座城市.

original: Let it be known that order has been restored, and the city is once again secure. The Jarl thanks the vigilant few who alerted the guards to the situa
string: 特此宣告，秩序已恢复，城市重归安宁.领主感谢那些警惕的少数人及时向守卫通报了情况.

original: The Jarl and the captain of the guards have officially protested to the Thalmor ambassador
string: 领主与卫队长已正式向梭默大使提出抗议

original: as the Thalmor agents have overstepped their authority given by the White-Gold Concordat.
string: 因为梭默特工已经越过了<白金协定>赋予他们的权限.

original: By decree of the Aldmeri Dominion and in cooperation with the Jarl of Riften,
string: 根据先祖神洲的法令，并与裂谷城领主合作，

original: recent activity in the lower quarters of the city has prompted a temporary increase in Dominion oversight.
string: 近期下城区的活动促使统治机构临时加强了监管力度.

original: We have received word that Talos worship was happening inside the Ratway. Lucky for all residents of that filthy place,
string: 我们收到消息，鼠道里正在进行塔洛斯崇拜活动.对那个肮脏地方的所有居民来说，这真是万幸.

original: no proof of worship of that false god was found and our agents didn't stay a second longer than necessary.
string: 没有发现崇拜那个伪神的证据，我们的特工一刻也没有多停留.

original: Let it be known: the Dominion remains committed to stability, order, and lawful governance across Skyrim.
string: 特此声明:先祖神州仍致力于维护天际的稳定，秩序与合法治理.

original: Our presence in Riften is not one of occupation, but of assistance to ensure that dangerous ideologies do not take root in the shadows.
string: 我们在裂谷城的存在并非占领，而是协助确保危险的思想不会在阴影中扎根.

original: Citizens are advised to report any suspicious behavior, particularly those invoking ancient allegiances or inciting unrest.
string: 市民应举报任何可疑行为，特别是那些援引古老效忠誓言或煽动骚乱的行为.

original: The peace of Skyrim is a shared responsibility. No place is too hidden or too filthy for our agents to enforce the terms of the White-Gold Concordat.
string: 维护天际的和平是我们共同的责任.无论多么隐蔽或肮脏的角落，我们的特工都会确保<白金协定>的条款得到执行.

original: Ladies and gentlemen, hear this incredible news! The Dragonborn, with the help of the authorities in Whiterun, captured a dragon inside Dragonsreach.
string: 女士们先生们，请听这则惊人的消息！龙裔在白漫城官方的协助下，于龙临宫内捕获了一条龙.

original: This feat of strength proves that dragons are not all-powerful beings.
string: 这一壮举证明，龙并非无所不能的存在.

original: It shows that we can win the war they started on us. The Dragonborn is a mighty hero and this is the latest exploit in their legend.
string: 这表明我们能够赢得他们强加于我们的战争.龙裔是一位强大的英雄，这是其传奇事迹中最新的一笔.

original: The Jarl sent a delegation to Whiterun to inquire if the same tactics can be applied in Riften to help secure our city.
string: 领主派了一个代表团前往白漫城，询问是否可以在裂谷城应用同样的策略来帮助确保我们城市的安全.

original: Let us prepare for what comes next, for the Dragonborn's path is far from over. But at last, hope is growing for all of us.
string: 让我们为即将到来的挑战做好准备，龙裔的征途远未结束.但最终，希望在我们所有人心中滋长.

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear this! The age of dragons has ended, and Skyrim stands victorious!
string: 天际的子民们，听好了！巨龙的时代已经终结，天际赢得了胜利！

original: The World-Eater, the terror of time itself, Alduin, has been vanquished! The Dragonborn, Skyrim's champion, ventured beyond the mortal realm,
string: 世界吞噬者，时间本身的恐怖，奥杜因已被击败！龙裔，天际的冠军，已踏入凡人领域之外，

original: facing the beast in the halls of Sovngarde itself! No warrior, no army, no empire could halt Alduin's wrath,
string: 在松加德殿堂直面那巨兽！没有战士，没有军队，没有帝国能阻挡奥杜因的怒火，

original: yet the Dragonborn alone stood against him in battle! And there, beneath the eternal sky of the fallen, the World-Eater was defeated,
string: 然而，唯有龙裔在战斗中独自挺身对抗他！就在那逝者永恒的苍穹之下，世界吞噬者终被击败.

original: his reign of terror broken for all time! Let Skyrim rejoice! No longer shall dragons darken our skies with fire and fury!
string: 他的恐怖统治已被永远终结！让天际欢庆吧！巨龙再也不能用火焰与怒火遮蔽我们的天空！

original: The winds carry whispers of the Dragonborn's triumph, and even the gods themselves have witnessed their deeds!
string: 风儿低语着龙裔的胜利，就连诸神也亲眼见证了他们的功绩！

original: History has been rewritten, and legend has been forged anew! The end of time has been cancelled!
string: 历史已被重写，传奇已获新生！时间终结已被取消！

original: May all give thanks to Akatosh and the Divines, and may the Dragonborn walk among us, the hero of an age reborn!
string: 愿众人感恩阿卡托什与众神，愿龙裔行走于我们之间，这位时代重生的英雄！

original: Raise your voices in triumph, citizens of Skyrim! The Dragonborn has claimed victory over Alduin, the World-Eater!
string: 高唱凯歌吧，天际的公民们！龙裔已经战胜了世界吞噬者奥杜因！

original: A battle beyond reckoning, fought not upon our soil, but in the halls of Sovngarde itself!
string: 一场超乎想象的战斗，并非在我们的土地上展开，而是在松加德的大殿之中！

original: By strength, courage, and the voice of the gods, our champion has cast down the ancient terror! And now, let Skyrim sing of this day!
string: 凭借力量，勇气与诸神之声，我们的冠军已击溃远古之恐怖！而今，让天际传颂此日之荣光！

original: The bards have composed a new song: Tale of the Tongues, a hymn retelling the despair facing Alduin and how the dragonborn stood against all odds.
string: 吟游诗人们创作了一首新歌:<龙语者传说>，这首颂歌重述了面对奥杜因时的绝望，以及龙裔如何逆势而战.

original: A melody that shall echo through mead halls for generations to come! No longer shall we whisper of dragons in fear: now we sing of their defeat!
string: 一首将在蜜酒大厅中世代回响的旋律！我们不再因恐惧而低语恶龙之名:如今我们高歌它们的败亡！

original: Tonight, the streets shall be filled with revelry, the taverns overflowing with song!
string: 今夜，街头将充满欢庆，酒馆将歌声满溢！

original: Let all hear the tale of the Dragonborn, and let none forget the hero who rose to meet destiny!
string: 让所有人都聆听龙裔的传说，让所有人都铭记那位挺身迎接命运的英雄！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear me! Today, Skyrim stands free! Alduin, the World-Eater, has been vanquished!
string: 天际的子民们，听我说！今天，天际自由了！世界吞噬者奥杜因已被击败！

original: The Dragonborn has fulfilled destiny, striking down the ancient beast within the halls of Sovngarde!
string: 龙裔已履行宿命，在松加德殿堂内击倒了那远古巨兽！

original: But victory does not come without cost. Many warriors fell in the battles against Alduin's kin.
string: 但胜利并非毫无代价.许多战士在与奥杜因同族的战斗中牺牲了.

original: The scars of war remain, and the echoes of those lost still linger in the winds.
string: 战争的伤痕犹在，逝者的回响仍于风中萦绕.

original: As we rejoice in the Dragonborn's triumph, let us also remember those who fought so Skyrim could see this day!
string: 当我们欢庆龙裔的胜利时，也请铭记那些为天际能迎来今日而浴血奋战的英灵！

original: Raise a toast to the Dragonborn, but do not forget the warriors who stood against the darkness.
string: 为龙裔举杯，但莫忘那些挺身对抗黑暗的战士们.

original: Their strength carried us through Skyrim's greatest trial!
string: 他们的力量带领我们度过了天际最严峻的考验！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, we are told Alduin has fallen, struck down by the Dragonborn in the halls of Sovngarde.
string: 天际的公民们，我们被告知奥杜因已经陨落，在松加德的大厅中被龙裔击倒.

original: The World-Eater has been vanquished, and Skyrim stands free of his shadow!
string: 世界吞噬者已被击败，天际已摆脱其阴影，重获自由！

original: Yet, dragons still fly. Their power remains, their presence undeniable. What will they do now their leader is slain?
string: 然而，巨龙仍在翱翔.它们的力量犹存，其存在不容忽视.如今首领已逝，它们将何去何从？

original: Will they engage in a war of succession? Will they disband as a united force? Will they leave Skyrim or Tamriel?
string: 他们会发动继承战争吗？他们会解散联合部队吗？他们会离开天际或泰姆瑞尔吗？

original: Rejoice, but remain vigilant, for no one knows what lies in the future.
string: 欢欣鼓舞，但保持警惕，因为无人知晓未来会带来什么.

original: Citizens of Riften, we have rejoicing news to share: Alduin, the World-Eater, has been defeated by the Dragonborn.
string: 裂谷城的公民们，我们有一个值得欢庆的消息要分享:世界吞噬者奥杜因已被龙裔击败.

original: I repeat: Alduin, the World-Eater, has been defeated by the Dragonborn.
string: 我重申:世界吞噬者奥杜因已被龙裔击败.

original: The Dragonborn stood against the mighty dragon, wielding the power of the Thu'um and killed Alduin.
string: 龙裔挺身对抗强大的巨龙，运用龙吼之力，最终杀死了奥杜因.

original: No more shall Skyrim tremble beneath the shadow of winged destruction.
string: 天际将不再在翼翅毁灭的阴影下颤抖.

original: The dragonborn entered eternal legends with that victory and that Skyrim shall not bow to false king or false emperor.
string: 龙裔凭借这场胜利进入了永恒的传说，而天际也绝不会向伪王或伪帝低头.

original: Let this day be remembered as a day of rejoicing, a day of celebration, a day of victory over oppression!
string: 愿今日被铭记为欢欣之日，庆典之日，战胜压迫的胜利之日！

original: The College of Winterhold is proud to announce a discovery of unprecedented significance deep within the ruins of Saarthal.
string: 冬堡学院自豪地宣布，在萨瑟尔城遗迹深处取得了一项具有空前意义的重大发现.

original: An artifact of great importance was uncovered. This revelation changes our understanding of Saarthal and the early days of the ancient Nords.
string: 一件极为重要的文物被发掘出来.这一发现改变了我们对萨瑟尔城以及古代诺德人早期历史的理解.

original: Our scholars are tirelessly working to study and understand the nature of this find, ensuring that Skyrim benefits from the wisdom it may hold.
string: 我们的学者正孜孜不倦地研究并理解这一发现的性质，确保天际能从其中可能蕴含的智慧中获益.

original: However, this site remains strictly restricted,
string: 然而，此地仍处于严格管制之下，

original: as the College must proceed with caution to ensure safety and preserve the integrity of the excavation.
string: 因为学院必须谨慎行事，以确保安全并维护挖掘工作的完整性.

original: Further details shall be revealed in due time, as research continues.
string: 随着研究的深入，更多细节将在适当时候公布.

original: Let all who value knowledge rejoice, for magic has revealed a secret long hidden in the depths of time!
string: 让所有珍视知识的人欢欣鼓舞吧，魔法已揭示了一个深藏于时光深处的秘密！

original: The Arch-Mage of the College of Winterhold reminds everyone that entry to Saarthal is strictly prohibited until further notice.
string: 冬堡学院的法师长提醒各位，萨塔尔现已严禁进入，直至另行通知.

original: The College of Winterhold announces it has uncovered a discovery of immense historical and of magical significance deep within the ruins of Saarthal.
string: 冬堡学院宣布，在萨瑟尔城的废墟深处发现了一项具有重大历史与魔法意义的遗迹.

original: Saarthal was the first great Nord settlement, and the site of a horrific massacre at the hands of the Snow Elves that we know as the Night of Tears.
string: 萨瑟尔城是诺德人的第一座大型定居点，也是雪精灵犯下那场我们称之为'泪之夜'的恐怖大屠杀的发生地.

original: The cause behind the Night of Tears is still an ongoing debate among historians
string: 泪之夜背后的起因在历史学家中仍是一个持续的争论

original: The College found an artifact of great importance that was heavily protected.
string: 学院发现了一件受到严密保护的重要文物.

original: Many findings leading to the room of the artifacts lead the College to believe its findings may hold answers for the cause of the Night of Tears.
string: 许多指向神器房间的发现让学院相信，其研究成果或许能揭示泪之夜的起因.

original: Scholars now study the site with great care, ensuring history is preserved and are slowly unraveling its mysteries.
string: 学者们如今正以极大的谨慎研究这处遗址，确保历史得以保存，并逐步揭开它的奥秘.

original: However, entry remains forbidden to all except authorized researchers. The power within Saarthal may be far greater than we yet understand!
string: 然而，除授权研究者外，任何人仍被禁止进入.萨瑟尔城内的力量可能远超我们目前的理解！

original: We ask patience from the public, and in time, the truth of our ancestors shall be revealed once more!
string: 我们恳请公众保持耐心，真相终将重现，我们祖先的荣光必将再次昭示天下！

original: Citizens of Skyrim, let it be known that the rumours about the recent events within the College's halls are exaggerated.
string: 天际的公民们，请知晓，关于学院大厅内近期事件的传闻实属夸大其词.

original: Nothing is out of control, These types of events are common for a College studying magic and whatever experiment conducted is fully under control.
string: 一切尽在掌控之中，这类事件对于研究魔法的学院来说司空见惯，任何实验都处于完全控制之下.

original: Our scholars are working diligently to ensure that all findings are properly contained and understood.
string: 我们的学者正不懈努力，确保所有发现都能得到妥善封存与透彻理解.

original: We ask that rumors and speculation be stopped. There is no danger to Skyrim, nor cause for concern.
string: 我们要求停止谣言和猜测.天际没有危险，也无需担忧.

original: The College stands as a pillar of knowledge, committed to advancing magical understanding safely and responsibly.
string: 学院是知识的支柱，致力于安全且负责任地推进魔法理解.

original: Our research continues, and all operations within the College proceed as expected.
string: 我们的研究仍在继续，学院内的一切运作都按预期进行.

original: Skyrim's citizens may rest assured that the College remains steadfast in its pursuit of wisdom, free from unnecessary alarm.
string: 天际的公民们可以放心，学院在追求智慧的道路上依然坚定不移，无需不必要的恐慌.

original: Citizens of Skyrim, hear this and know that recent events within the College's halls are fully contained and under control.
string: 天际的公民们，请听好，学院内部最近发生的事件已完全得到控制，局势稳定.

original: Magic is a force to be studied, shaped, and mastered, and our scholars continue to unravel its mysteries with precision and care.
string: 魔法是一种需要研究，塑造并掌握的力量，我们的学者们正以严谨细致的态度，持续探索其奥秘.

original: Let this be seen not as a matter of concern, but as a testament to the College's commitment to arcane knowledge.
string: 请将此视为学院对奥术知识承诺的证明，而非令人担忧之事.

original: The greatest breakthroughs often come from challenges met and overcome!
string: 最伟大的突破往往源于迎接并战胜挑战！

original: The College of Winterhold remains dedicated to the pursuit of magical knowledge and all magical research shall continue, uninterrupted and secure!
string: 冬堡学院始终致力于追求魔法知识，所有魔法研究将继续进行，不受干扰且安全无虞！

original: To all of Skyrim, let it be known that the College of Winterhold stands as Skyrim's foremost authority on magic.
string: 致全天际省，让所有人知晓，冬堡学院是天际省魔法领域的最高权威.

original: Recent developments within our halls have been swiftly addressed by our scholars,
string: 我们殿堂内近期的变故已由学者们迅速处理妥当，

original: proving once again that only masters of the arcane can truly wield and govern its mysteries!
string: 再次证明，唯有精通奥术的大师才能真正驾驭并掌控其奥秘！

original: We remind all that the College remains the best institution of magical study, capable of handling all matters related to the arcane with expertise.
string: 我们提醒所有人，学院仍是魔法研究的最佳机构，能够以专业能力处理所有与奥术相关的事务.

original: Let not fear or uncertainty guide speculations. Those who dedicate themselves to magic understand its power better than any outsider!
string: 莫让恐惧或疑虑左右揣测.投身魔法之人，比任何外行都更懂得它的力量！

original: Rest assured, Skyrim is under no threat, and the College's work shall continue for the benefit of all who seek knowledge!
string: 请放心，天际并无威胁，学院的工作将继续为所有追求知识的人造福！

original: As a temporary precaution, the College of Winterhold advises all to avoid the college and the town of Winterhold for the next few days
string: 作为一项临时预防措施，冬堡学院建议所有人在未来几天内避开学院及冬堡镇

original: and that all planned visits should be cancelled.
string: 所有计划中的访问均应取消.

original: Citizens of Skyrim, the College of Winterhold has withstood its greatest trial!
string: 天际的公民们，冬堡学院已经经受住了它最严峻的考验！

original: Through wisdom and the strength of its scholars, the College emerges renewed and stronger,
string: 凭借智慧与学者们的力量，学院焕然一新，更加强大.

original: prepared to lead the way in magical study for generations to come!
string: 已准备好引领未来数代人的魔法研究之路！

original: The mysterious artifact unearthed in Saarthal was the Eye of Magnus.
string: 在萨瑟尔城出土的神秘神器是玛格努斯之眼.

original: Its secrets have been confronted, and though its presence tested our scholars, our commitment to understanding the arcane has never wavered.
string: 其奥秘已被直面，尽管它的存在考验了我们的学者，但我们对理解奥术的承诺从未动摇.

original: Let Skyrim recognize that magic remains a force to be harnessed, not feared!
string: 让天际省认识到，魔法依然是一种应当被驾驭而非畏惧的力量！

original: With new leadership guiding the College, we stand ready to usher in a new era of magical study,
string: 随着新领导层引领学院，我们已准备好开启魔法研究的新纪元.

original: expanding our research, sharing our findings, and ensuring that the pursuit of wisdom remains unshaken by adversity!
string: 拓展我们的研究，分享我们的发现，并确保对智慧的追求在逆境中毫不动摇！

original: An official proclamation from the College of Winterhold. The College stands stronger than ever!
string: 冬堡学院官方公告.学院比以往任何时候都更加强大！

original: A great danger was threatening the College of Winterhold and the Arch-Mage Savos Aren sacrificed himself to save the College.
string: 冬堡学院曾面临巨大威胁，首席法师萨沃斯.阿冉为拯救学院而牺牲了自己.

original: Long lives the memory of the Arch-Mage Aren! The College of Winterhold is proud to announce that a new Arch-Mage has been selected from its members.
string: 愿大法师阿伦永垂不朽！冬堡学院自豪地宣布，已从其成员中推选出一位新的大法师.

original: Under their leadership, the pursuit of magic shall expand beyond past limitations, ensuring that Skyrim remains a beacon of arcane knowledge!
string: 在他们的领导下，对魔法的追求将超越过去的局限，确保天际始终是奥术知识的灯塔！

original: Let it be known that the College remains committed to the mastery and understanding of magic.
string: 让所有人知晓，学院始终致力于魔法的掌握与理解.

original: With the guidance of its new Arch-Mage, its scholars shall push the boundaries of arcane wisdom further than ever before!
string: 在新任首席法师的引领下，其学者们将把奥术智慧的边界推向前所未有的高度！

original: The College of Winterhold wishes to assure all concerned that the recent incident has been fully resolved, and normal operations have resumed.
string: 冬堡学院希望向所有相关方保证，近期事件已得到圆满解决，并已恢复正常运作.

original: While the situation posed no threat to Skyrim or the public,
string: 尽管这一局势并未对天际或公众构成威胁，

original: we regret to report the death of Arch-Mage Savos Aren and of his second-in-command, Master Wizard Mirabelle Ervine.
string: 我们沉痛地报告，首席法师萨沃斯.阿冉及其副手，法师大师米拉贝勒.厄文已经逝世.

original: Rumors regarding further casualties among faculty and visitors are greatly exaggerated and categorically denied by the College.
string: 关于教职员工和访客进一步伤亡的传闻纯属夸大其词，学院对此予以坚决否认.

original: Likewise, accusations of carelessness in handling the powerful artifacts uncovered in Saarthal hold no merit.
string: 同样，关于在萨瑟尔城发现的强大神器处理不当的指控也毫无根据.

original: As a precaution, the artifact in question has been securely sealed and is no longer subject to study or public viewing, including by researchers.
string: 作为预防措施，该文物已被安全封存，不再接受研究或公开展示，包括研究人员在内.

original: The College of Winterhold remains Skyrim's authority on the arcane and is dedicated to the safe and responsible study of magic.
string: 冬堡学院依然是天际省在神秘学领域的权威机构，致力于安全且负责任地研究魔法.

original: Our scholars know best how to pursue their research.
string: 我们的学者最清楚该如何开展他们的研究.

original: Citizens of Skyrim, the College of Winterhold proclaims it has faced a test unlike any before and has emerged stronger than ever!
string: 天际的公民们，冬堡学院宣告它经历了一场前所未有的考验，并变得比以往更加强大！

original: Magic is a force of great mystery and power, and only those who dare to harness its depths can truly understand its potential.
string: 魔法是一种充满神秘与强大力量的存在，唯有敢于深入探索其奥秘之人，方能真正领悟其潜力.

original: Though we mourn the loss of Arch-Mage Savos Aren and Master Wizard Mirabelle Ervine, their wisdom shall not fade.
string: 尽管我们为失去大法师萨沃斯.阿冉和首席法师米拉贝勒.厄文而哀悼，但他们的智慧将永不消逝.

original: Their dedication to magical study pushed the boundaries of knowledge, and the College shall honor them by continuing their work!
string: 他们对魔法研究的执着拓展了知识的边界，学院将通过延续他们的事业来纪念他们！

original: Let all know that our scholars have confronted great arcane forces, have overcome the trials set before them,
string: 让所有人都知道，我们的学者直面了强大的奥术力量，并克服了摆在他们面前的考验.

original: and now stand ready to advance magical study further than ever before.
string: 并已准备好将魔法研究推向前所未有的新高度.

original: The artifact known as the Eye of Magnus has been secured, and research continues, stronger and wiser than before!
string: 被称为玛格努斯之眼的神器已被妥善保管，研究仍在继续，比以往更加强大和明智！

original: By order of the new Arch-Mage of the College of Winterhold, all magical study shall proceed with renewed dedication to the future of Skyrim!
string: 奉冬堡学院新任首席法师之命，所有魔法研习应以对天际未来的全新奉献精神继续推进！

original: The authorities have received multiple reports of a large flying creature spotted within the hold.
string: 当局已收到多起报告，称在领地内发现了一只大型飞行生物.

original: While such claims remain unverified, the Jarl takes these accounts seriously, particularly in light of the recent unexplained destruction of Helgen.
string: 尽管这些说法尚未得到证实，但领主对这些描述非常重视，尤其是考虑到海尔根最近遭遇了原因不明的毁灭.

original: Investigations are ongoing, but no confirmation has been made regarding the nature of the beast, nor whether it is connected to the events at Helgen.
string: 调查仍在进行中，但尚未确认这头野兽的性质，也未确认其是否与海尔根事件有关.

original: Citizens are urged to remain calm and report any unusual sightings to the nearest guard post.
string: 敦促市民保持冷静，如有任何异常目击情况，请立即向最近的守卫岗哨报告.

original: Reports have reached the Jarl of a large flying beast seen in the skies above the hold.
string: 有报告传到领主那里，称在领地上空发现了一只巨大的飞行野兽.

original: While such tales stir the imagination, the Jarl remains unconvinced of their credibility.
string: 尽管这些传闻引人遐想，但领主仍对其真实性存疑.

original: Flying beasts belong in old Nord legends, not in the affairs of the present day.
string: 飞行野兽只属于古老的诺德人传说，与当今世事无关.

original: No evidence has yet been found to support the claims. Citizens are advised not to spread panic and to not participate in this mass hysteria.
string: 目前尚未发现支持这些说法的证据.建议公民不要散播恐慌，也不要参与这场集体狂热.

original: People of Skyrim, hear this invitation from the Companions The warriors of Jorrvaskr seek fresh blood and fearless hearts to join their ranks!
string: 天际的子民们，聆听战友团的邀请！月瓦斯卡的战士们正在寻找新鲜血液和无畏之心加入他们的行列！

original: All able-bodied folk with courage in their bones and steel in their grip may apply!
string: 凡身强体壮，胆识过人，手握利刃者，皆可前来报名！

original: You need not be of noble birth nor seasoned in battle, all who possess a warrior's spirit are welcome!
string: 无需出身高贵，亦不必身经百战，凡怀有战士之魂者，皆可前来！

original: Report to Jorrvaskr, in Whiterun, and speak to the Harbinger Prove your worth, and your name may one day be sung among the halls of heroes!
string: 前往白漫城的月瓦斯卡报到，与先驱者交谈.证明你的价值，有朝一日，你的名字或许会在英雄殿堂中被传颂！

original: Join the Companions, and let everyone know you stand for honor, strength, and true brotherhood!
string: 加入战友团，让所有人都知道你代表着荣誉，力量与真正的兄弟情谊！

original: People of Skyrim. The leaders of the Companions seek any information regarding the Silver Hand.
string: 天际的子民们.战友团的领袖们正在寻求任何关于银手的信息.

original: Any information about their movements, hideouts, or dealings will be handsomely rewarded.
string: 任何关于他们行踪，藏身处或交易的信息都将获得丰厚回报.

original: They are a criminal organization bent to destroy the Companions. They are cowards opposing the Companions without honor or cause.
string: 他们是一个致力于摧毁战友团的犯罪组织.这些懦夫毫无荣誉感和正当理由地对抗战友团.

original: If you have seen them, speak with us immediately. Your information may help bring that group to justice.
string: 若你曾见过他们，请立即与我们交谈.你提供的信息或许能将那个团伙绳之以法.

original: All reports shall be kept discreet and your aid will be rewarded with Septims.
string: 所有报告均需保密处理，您的协助将以赛普汀币作为酬谢.

original: Good people of Skyrim! The time has come to stand with the Companions once more.
string: 天际的善良子民们！是时候再次与战友团并肩而战了.

original: A group called the Silver Hand hide in the wild, attack any travellers and declare the Companions their enemies.
string: 一个名为银手的组织藏身荒野，袭击所有旅人，并宣称战友团是他们的敌人.

original: If you see anything: strange travelers, secret trails, hostile camps in the hills, come to us.
string: 如果你看到任何异常情况:可疑的旅人，隐秘的小径，山间的敌对营地，请立即来找我们.

original: Your information might help destroy the Silver Hand and you will be rewarded in gold.
string: 你提供的信息或许能帮助摧毁银手，你将获得金币作为奖赏.

original: Let these bandits learn that as long as the Companions lives, no bandit is safe.
string: 让这些强盗明白，只要战友团还在，就没有强盗是安全的.

original: Hear ye, hear ye, Skyrim and all true sons and daughters of Skyrim. The Companions seek fragments of Wuuthrad, the legendary weapon of Ysgramor.
string: 听好了，听好了，天际以及所有真正的天际儿女们.战友团正在寻找巫斯拉德的碎片，那是伊斯格拉默的传奇武器.

original: Some have been found, yet others lie scattered across the land, lost with time. If you bear knowledge of these shards, speak to the Companions.
string: 有些已被寻获，但其余的仍散落在这片土地上，随时间流逝而遗失.若你知晓这些碎片的下落，请告知战友团.

original: Your aid may help reforge a legacy of Skyrim. Let this be the moment in which Wuuthrad is restored.
string: 你的援助或许能重铸天际的传奇.让这一刻成为巫斯拉德重现荣光的时刻.

original: To all lovers of Skyrim and of its history: Jorrvaskr calls upon you!
string: 致所有热爱天际及其历史的人们:月瓦斯卡在召唤你！

original: The Companions seek to reclaim the shattered fragments of Wuuthrad, the sacred axe that forged our history!
string: 战友团正致力于寻回巫斯拉德的碎片，这把神圣的战斧铸就了我们的历史！

original: Any who hold knowledge of its fragments, be they kept in vaults, sold by smugglers, or hidden by time, bring that information to Jorrvaskr!
string: 凡掌握其碎片信息者，无论存于宝库，经走私者贩卖，或为时光所掩藏，皆请携此情报前来月瓦斯卡！

original: Such aid shall earn the favor of the Companions and that is certainly worth its weight in gold.
string: 这样的援助将赢得战友团的青睐，其价值无疑堪比黄金.

original: Help restore what was lost, and your name may stand beside Ysgramor's banner forevermore.
string: 帮助恢复失落之物，你的名字或许将永远与伊斯格拉默的旗帜并肩而立.

original: Citizens of Skyrim. The Companions of Jorrvaskr desire to share with all their latest tale.
string: 天际的公民们.月瓦斯卡的战友团希望与所有人分享他们最新的传奇故事.

original: They have struck down a vile den of the Silver Hand, a band of low-life criminals and reclaimed from their grip a fragment of Wuuthrad,
string: 他们铲除了银手的一个邪恶巢穴，那是一群卑劣的罪犯，并从他们手中夺回了一块巫斯拉德的碎片.

original: the sacred axe of Ysgramor himself!
string: 伊斯格拉默本人的神圣战斧！

original: These cowards dared to hold what was never theirs, but they could not stand before the fury and unity of true warriors!
string: 这些懦夫竟敢占据本不属于他们的东西，但在真正战士的怒火与团结面前，他们根本不堪一击！

original: In a clash deep within Dustman's Cairn, the Companions proved their legacy will not be stolen, and honor will not be silenced!
string: 在清洁者石冢深处的冲突中，战友团证明了他们的传承不会被窃取，荣誉不会被埋没！

original: Let it be known throughout Whiterun and beyond that those who defy tradition shall fall beneath the blades of the worthy.
string: 让白漫城乃至更远之地的人们知晓，凡违逆传统者，必将在勇者之刃下陨落.

original: Be part of reforging the weapon! If you have information about pieces of Wuuthrad, the Companions will pay handsomely for any useful information.
string: 参与重铸这件武器！如果你有关于巫斯拉德碎片的信息，战友团将为任何有用的情报支付丰厚的报酬.

original: Honorable folk of Skyrim,
string: 尊贵的天际子民们，

original: Let it be known that the Companions still seek to reclaim the scattered fragments of Wuuthrad, sacred weapon of Ysgramor, our honored forebear!
string: 众所周知，战友团仍在努力寻回巫斯拉德的碎片，那是我们尊崇的先祖伊斯格拉默的神圣武器！

original: The Companions are proud to report that some fragments have been recovered, but more remain lost to time, hidden in crypts or ruins.
string: 战友团自豪地报告，部分碎片已被寻回，但仍有更多湮没于时光之中，深藏于墓穴或遗迹之内.

original: If you hold knowledge of potential locations, come forth and speak with the shield-brothers of Jorrvaskr!
string: 若你知晓潜在的地点，请上前与月瓦斯卡的盾牌兄弟们交谈！

original: The reforging of Wuuthrad is not just a task of steel, it is the reclaiming of legacy,
string: 巫斯拉德的重铸不仅是钢铁的锻冶，更是对传承的复归.

original: and all who aid in its return shall be remembered in the stories sung within the halls of the Companions!
string: 所有协助其回归之人，都将被铭记于战友团大厅传唱的故事中！

original: Help us restore what once was mighty, and let the axe of legend strike true once more!
string: 助我们重振昔日雄风，让传奇之斧再度精准出击！

original: Hear ye, people of Skyrim.
string: 听好了，天际的子民们.

original: The Companions continue their sacred mission to recover the fragments of Wuuthrad, the legendary axe of Ysgramor, hero of our ancestors.
string: 战友团继续着他们神圣的使命，收集巫斯拉德的碎片--那是我们祖先的英雄伊斯格拉默的传奇战斧.

original: Some pieces have been reclaimed through trial and steel, but others remain lost across Skyrim.
string: 有些碎片已通过试炼与钢铁之力寻回，但其余的仍散落在天际各处.

original: We call upon all adventurers, scholars and common folks: bring us knowledge of these shards, and you shall be rewarded!
string: 我们呼吁所有冒险者，学者与平民:为我们带来这些碎片的信息，必有重赏！

original: Whether your aid comes by word or deed, your contribution shall be marked with coin, respect, and the favor of Jorrvaskr.
string: 无论您的援助是建言还是行动，您的贡献都将以金币，尊重以及月瓦斯卡的青睐作为回报.

original: Speak with the shield-brothers, and let your name be counted among those who rebuild a legend!
string: 与盾牌兄弟们交谈，让你的名字被载入重建传奇的行列！

original: For honor. For history. For Skyrim! The reforging of Wuuthrad begins with you!
string: 为了荣誉.为了历史.为了天际！巫斯拉德的重铸，从你开始！

original: Hear ye, hear ye! To all citizens of Skyrim, hear this proclamation from the Companions: Justice has been served, and vengeance executed!
string: 听好了，听好了！致天际的所有公民，请聆听战友团的宣告:正义已得伸张，复仇已然执行！

original: The vile group known as the Silver Hand, enemies of honor and desecrators of Jorrvaskr's sacred halls, has been vanquished by the Companions!
string: 那个被称为银手的卑劣团体，荣誉之敌与月瓦斯卡神圣殿堂的亵渎者，已被战友团彻底消灭！

original: Their camps have been razed, their leaders have fallen and the remains of the group scattered.
string: 他们的营地已被夷为平地，首领也已倒下，残存的成员四散奔逃.

original: The spilled blood of the Harbinger Kodlak Whitemane has been answered tenfold!
string: 先驱者"白鬃"克拉科所流的血，已得到十倍的偿还！

original: Kodlak Whitemane has been avenged and his soul can now rest easy. His legacy shall endure!
string: 白鬃"克拉科已得复仇，其灵魂终可安息.纵使他的时代终将逝去，其功业必将永存！

original: Hear ye, citizens of Skyrim! The mighty weapon Wuuthrad, the battleaxe once wielded by Ysgramor himself, has been reforged by the Companions.
string: 天际的公民们，听好了！强大的武器巫斯拉德，那把曾由伊斯格拉默本人挥舞的战斧，已被战友团重新锻造.

original: With fragments gathered through trial, battle, and sacrifice, the greatest blacksmith of Skyrim, Eorlund Gray-Mane,
string: 通过试炼，战斗与牺牲收集的碎片，天际最伟大的铁匠厄伦德.灰鬃

original: reforged the weapon with the fire of the mythical Skyforge itself.
string: 用神话中的天空锻炉之火重铸了这把武器.
