string: 小偷拒绝透露身份，但他身上却带着老练扒手的典型工具:滑溜的手指，暗藏的刀片，以及一个不属于他的钱袋.

original: Witnesses say he'd been circling the stalls since morning, eyeing wares and wallets alike.
string: 目击者称他从早上起就在摊位周围转悠，既打量商品也盯着人们的钱包.

original: Let this be a warning to all who think our citizens and merchants are ripe for plunder: our guards are watchful, and justice is swift.
string: 以此警告所有觊觎我国公民与商贾，妄图劫掠之人:我们的守卫时刻警惕，正义必将迅速降临.

original: Citizens of Solitude, The palace authorities have received reports of increased criminal activity across Skyrim have reached our city.
string: 独孤城的市民们，宫廷当局已收到报告，天际各地日益猖獗的犯罪活动已蔓延至我们的城市.

original: But there is nothing to fear: Solitude is no stranger to unrest, and we do not falter. The Imperial Legion stands watch over our city.
string: 但无需担忧:独孤城对动荡并不陌生，我们不会动摇.帝国军团正守卫着我们的城市.

original: Our guards are trained, our walls are strong, and our loyalty to the Empire is unwavering.
string: 我们的卫兵训练有素，城墙坚不可摧，对帝国的忠诚坚定不移.

original: While lesser holds may struggle with illegal dealings and lawless guilds, Solitude remains a beacon of order.
string: 尽管其他较小的领地可能饱受非法交易和无法无天行会的困扰，独孤城却始终是秩序的光辉灯塔.

original: Should you witness suspicious behavior, report it to the nearest guard or Legion officer. Trust in the Empire. Solitude will not bend to thieves.
string: 若目睹可疑行为，请向最近的守卫或军团军官报告.请相信帝国.独孤城绝不会向窃贼屈服.

original: Hear ye, proud citizens of Solitude! As crime spreads like rot through Skyrim's lesser holds, let it be known:
string: 独孤城的骄傲子民们，请听好！当罪恶如同腐坏般在天际省的其他领地蔓延时，须知:

original: Solitude remains firm, disciplined, and loyal. While Windhelm drowns in rebellion and Riften bows to thieves, we stand with the Empire.
string: 独孤城始终坚定，守纪且忠诚.当风舵城深陷叛乱泥潭，裂谷城向盗贼屈膝时，我们与帝国同在.

original: With law, order, and the Legion. While we have seen an increase of thievery and petty crimes, our situation is much better than any stormcloak city.
string: 法律，秩序与军团同在.尽管盗窃和小型犯罪有所增加，但我们的处境仍远胜于任何风暴斗篷的城市.

original: Our guards stay vigilant day and night. We recommend all honest citizens to watch their purse or to keep it hidden when going to the market.
string: 我们的守卫日夜保持警惕.我们建议所有诚实的市民在去市场时看好自己的钱包，或者将其藏好.

original: We encourage that everyone locks their doors and windows at all times.Report suspicious activity. Stay vigilant.
string: 我们鼓励大家始终锁好门窗.报告可疑活动.保持警惕.

original: Trust in the Empire that built peace. The recent wave of crime will be dealt with.
string: 请相信缔造和平的帝国.最近的犯罪浪潮必将得到处理.

original: People of Solitude, hear this proclamation of our Jarl Elisif the Fair.
string: 独孤城的子民们，请聆听我们的领主艾利西弗的宣告.

original: In light of rising criminal activity across the hold, all citizens are to remain alert and cooperative with city guards and the authorities.
string: 鉴于领地内犯罪活动日益猖獗，所有市民务必保持警惕，并与城市守卫及当局保持合作.

original: The Blue Palace recognizes the threat posed by the rise of the Thieves Guild. The recent numerous acts of thievery reported bear their mark.
string: 蓝宫已意识到盗贼公会崛起所带来的威胁.近期上报的多起盗窃案件均带有他们的印记.

original: The Jarl will not surrender the wealth of her city to an organized criminal faction and will respond with swift and decisive action.
string: 领主绝不会将城市的财富拱手让给有组织的犯罪团伙，并将以迅速果断的行动予以回应.

original: Consequently, any citizen found aiding or harboring known criminals will be subject to the law of the Hold.
string: 因此，任何被发现协助或窝藏已知罪犯的公民，都将受到领地法律的制裁.

original: Anyone found in possession of thieve tools will receive a harsher punishment and spend extra time as a subject for the court wizard Sybille Stentor.
string: 任何人若被发现持有盗贼工具，将受到更严厉的惩罚，并额外作为宫廷法师希比利.斯丹特的实验对象服刑更长时间.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! The captain of the guards announces that a thief was arrested last night.
string: 听好了，听好了！守卫队长宣布昨夜已逮捕一名窃贼.

original: He was caught by a guard patrolling while he tried to lockpick a door to a local shop.
string: 他在试图撬开当地一家店铺的门锁时，被巡逻的守卫逮了个正着.

original: During the pat down, the guards found many items in his possession that the thief couldn't explain.
string: 搜身过程中，守卫在他身上发现了许多连小偷自己都无法解释的物品.

original: Many of those were the standard tools for members of the Thieves Guild.
string: 其中许多都是盗贼公会成员的标准工具.

original: After a round of inspection of the surroundings, no signs of breaking and entering were found,
string: 经过一轮对周边的检查，未发现任何破门而入的迹象.

original: leading the guards to believe that the thief didn't successfully steal anything.
string: 让守卫们相信小偷并未成功偷走任何东西.

original: The city remains safe and the crime rate is low due to the vigilance of our guards.
string: 多亏了我们守卫的警惕，这座城市依然安全，犯罪率也很低.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! The captain of the guard announces that a thief was arrested last night while attempting to pick the lock of a local shop.
string: 听好了，听好了！守卫队长宣布昨夜一名窃贼在试图撬开本地一家店铺的门锁时被当场逮捕.

original: A patrolling guard caught him in the act, and upon search, discovered numerous suspicious items,
string: 一名巡逻卫兵当场抓获了他，并在搜查中发现了大量可疑物品.

original: many resembling the standard tools favored by members of the Thieves Guild.
string: 其中许多都类似于盗贼公会成员偏爱的标准工具.

original: No signs of forced entry were found, and it appears the thief failed to complete his crime.
string: 现场未发现强行闯入的痕迹，看来小偷未能完成其犯罪行为.

original: Thanks to the vigilance of our guards, the city remains secure.
string: 多亏了我们守卫的警惕，这座城市依然安全.

original: Yes, let it be known: the city remains safe and the crime rate is low due to the vigilance of our guards.
string: 是的，要让所有人都知道:多亏了我们守卫的警惕，这座城市依然安全，犯罪率也很低.

original: Hear ye, hear ye Citizens! A pick pocketer met his match today in the busy marketplace.
string: 诸位市民，听好了！今天在繁忙的集市上，一个扒手终于遇到了对手.

original: As he reached for a patron's coin pouch, a sharp-eyed guard spotted the theft and seized the culprit before he could vanish into the crowd.
string: 就在他伸手去拿一位顾客的钱袋时，一名目光锐利的守卫发现了这起盗窃，并在小偷混入人群之前抓住了他.

original: The thief refused to identify himself, but bore the telltale tools of a seasoned pickpocket: slick fingers, a hidden blade, and a purse not his own.
string: 小偷拒绝透露身份，但他身上却带着老练扒手的典型工具:滑溜的手指，暗藏的刀片，以及一个不属于他的钱袋.

original: Witnesses say he'd been circling the stalls since morning, eyeing wares and wallets alike.
string: 目击者称他从早上起就在摊位周围转悠，既打量商品也盯着人们的钱包.

original: Let this be a warning to all who think our citizens and merchants are ripe for plunder: our guards are watchful, and justice is swift.
string: 以此警告所有觊觎我国公民与商贾，妄图劫掠之人:我们的守卫时刻警惕，正义必将迅速降临.

original: Hear ye, hear ye citizens of Whiterun! Trouble brews instead of sweet mead at the Honeybrew Meadery.
string: 白漫城的市民们，听好了！蜜酒庄里酝酿的不是甜美的蜜酒，而是麻烦.

original: Sabjorn, its ambitious proprietor, was arrested yesterday after a failed tasting by the Whiterun Guard captain.
string: 其野心勃勃的老板撒布乔恩，在白漫卫兵队长品酒失败后，于昨日被捕.

original: According to the captain, Sabjorn tried to poison him with a new variety of mead.
string: 据船长说，撒布乔恩试图用一种新酿的蜂蜜酒毒害他.

original: The motive is unclear, but further inspection of the mead revealed a foul odor of skeever poison.
string: 动机尚不明确，但进一步检查蜜酒时，发现了一股臭鼬毒液的恶臭.

original: The captain arrested the man on the spot and brought him directly to the Dragonsreach Dungeon.
string: 队长当场逮捕了那名男子，并直接将他押送至龙临宫地牢.

original: We salute the strong constitution of the captain, being able to fulfill his duty while poisoned.
string: 我们钦佩船长强健的体魄，即便中毒仍能履行职责.

original: He was later cured by Arcadia who concocted a cure for the poison.
string: 他后来被阿尔凯迪雅治愈了，她配制了解毒剂.

original: Citizens of Whiterun and loyal patrons of fine drink, let it be known that Honeybrew Meadery has entered a new era with the renewed leadership.
string: 白漫城的市民们以及美酒的忠实爱好者们，请知悉，蜜酒庄在重获新生的领导层带领下已步入一个崭新的时代.

original: We deeply regret the recent incident involving tainted mead and the harm it may have caused.
string: 对于近期发生的蜜酒污染事件及其可能造成的伤害，我们深表遗憾.

original: The entire corrupted batch has been destroyed, and the meadery thoroughly cleansed.
string: 所有受污染的批次已全部销毁，酒坊也已彻底清洁完毕.

original: Under new management, we vow transparency, integrity, and above all, excellence in every bottle.
string: 在新管理层的带领下，我们承诺每一瓶酒都秉持透明，诚信，最重要的是追求卓越品质.

original: Our mead will be brewed with the finest ingredients, tested for purity, and worthy of Skyrim's proud traditions.
string: 我们的蜜酒将采用最优质的原料酿造，经过纯度测试，无愧于天际引以为傲的传统.

original: We thank you for your patience. In return, we pledge to restore your trust, one sip at a time.
string: 感谢您的耐心.作为回报，我们承诺将点滴重拾您的信任.

original: Hear this, good folk of Whiterun! The Honeybrew Meadery has cast off the rot of its former leadership.
string: 白漫城的善良市民们，听好了！蜜酒庄已经摆脱了前任领导层的腐朽.

original: Sabjorn, in his reckless ambition, allowed skeevers to infest the very cellars where your mead was brewed.
string: 撒布乔恩，因其鲁莽的野心，竟任由雪鼠侵扰酿造你们蜜酒的地窖.

original: Who knows what was the true extent of the damage resulting from the carelessness of Sabjorn.
string: 谁知道撒布乔恩的疏忽到底造成了多大损失.

original: But no longer! Under new management, the infestation has been purged. Every skeever slain and their nest destroyed.
string: 但这一切已成过去！在新的管理下，鼠患已被根除.每一只雪鼠都被消灭，它们的巢穴也已被摧毁.

original: Every corner of the meadery was cleansed and all repairs done.
string: 蜜酒庄的每个角落都被清扫干净，所有破损之处也已修缮完毕.

original: The meadery now stands vermin-free, repaired and committed to the highest standards of cleanliness and quality.
string: 如今这家蜂蜜酒坊已无虫害侵扰，修缮一新，并致力于达到最高标准的清洁与品质.

original: We invite you to visit the meadery and see for yourself the improvement. We guarantee that you will taste the best mead of Skyrim.
string: 我们诚邀您亲临蜜酒庄，亲眼见证我们的改进.我们保证您将品尝到天际最上等的蜜酒.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! By order of the Jarl and the captain of the guard, all citizens are hereby warned:
string: 听好了，听好了！奉领主与守卫队长之令，特此警告全体市民:

original: A rise in thefts, cons and pickpocketing has been reported across Whiterun, particularly at the marketplace and around the Gildergreen.
string: 据报道，白漫城各地盗窃，诈骗和扒窃案件有所增加，尤其是在市场和金树周围.

original: Coin purses are stolen and locks are tested. Those points to the influence of the Thieves Guild.
string: 钱袋失窃，门锁被撬，这些都指向盗贼公会日益增长的影响力.

original: The city guard remains committed to stop all crimes. Arrests are coming soon. No criminal shall find safe haven within our walls.
string: 城市守卫始终致力于制止一切犯罪行为.逮捕行动即将展开.任何罪犯都别想在我们的城墙内找到安全的避风港.

original: Citizens are urged to stay alert, secure their homes, and report any suspicious behavior immediately.
string: 市民们被敦促保持警惕，确保家中安全，并立即报告任何可疑行为.

original: Together, we shall keep Whiterun strong, honest, and free from the grip of crimes.
string: 我们将携手共进，让白漫城保持强大，诚实，并摆脱犯罪的掌控.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Citizens of Whiterun, take heed! Petty crime has spread through our streets like a sickness!
string: 白漫城的市民们，听好了，听好了！小偷小摸的罪行已如瘟疫般在我们的街道蔓延！

original: Shops are ransacked, homes are breached during the night, purses are stolen in broad daylight! The guards are stretched thin to secure Whiterun.
string: 商店被洗劫，房屋在夜间被闯入，钱包在光天化日之下被盗！守卫们为了保卫白漫城已疲于奔命.

original: The authorities suspect a coordinated effort coming from the Thieves Guild and probably with the help of locals.
string: 当局怀疑盗贼公会正在进行有组织的行动，很可能得到了当地人的协助.

original: So far, no arrests were done to stop the increased crime.
string: 迄今为止，尚未采取任何逮捕行动来遏制日益增长的犯罪活动.

original: For now, it is recommended to lock your doors and windows, and hide your coin purse. Trust no stranger and be wary of any physical contact.
string: 目前建议锁好门窗，藏好钱袋.不要相信陌生人，警惕任何身体接触.

original: If you see something suspicious, report it to the nearest guard. Do not intervene alone.
string: 若发现可疑情况，请立即向最近的守卫报告.切勿单独行动.

original: The Jarl assures us justice will prevail and all criminals and their accomplices will be punished for their crime.
string: 领主向我们保证正义必将得到伸张，所有罪犯及其同伙都将因其罪行受到惩罚.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, hear this decree by the Jarl.
string: 白漫城的子民们，聆听领主的法令.

original: Recently, Whiterun has been the victim of a crime wave consisting of petty crimes such as pickpocketing, shoplifting, breaking and entering.
string: 最近，白漫城遭受了一波犯罪浪潮的侵袭，其中包括扒窃，商店行窃，非法闯入等轻微罪行.

original: The investigation in these crimes revealed a pattern that is consistent with how the Thieves Guild operates in a city.
string: 对这些罪行的调查揭示了一种模式，与盗贼公会在城市中的运作方式相符.

original: To protect the honest man and woman of Whiterun, the Thieves Guild, along with its members,
string: 为保护白漫城的正直男女，盗贼公会及其成员

original: collaborators and sympathisers are hereby banned from the Whiterun Hold.
string: 合作者与同情者即日起被禁止进入白漫领.

original: Anyone found with Thieves Guild clothing or memorabilia will be arrested and interrogated.
string: 任何被发现持有盗贼公会服饰或纪念品者将被逮捕并审讯.

original: Furthermore, a curfew is in effect in Whiterun, Anyone found outside after midnight will be arrested.
string: 此外，白漫城已实施宵禁，午夜后仍在户外者将被逮捕.

original: All honest citizens are asked to help by reporting any suspicious activities.
string: 所有诚实公民都被要求协助举报任何可疑活动.

original: The authorities are reminding everyone that performing the Dark Sacrament is illegal and a serious crime.
string: 当局提醒所有人，进行黑暗圣礼是违法行为，属于严重犯罪.

original: Anyone found to have performed the Dark Sacrament will be treated the same as a murderer.
string: 任何被发现实施过黑暗祭礼的人，都将被视为杀人犯同等对待.

original: Please report anyone known to have performed it. It could be your life that is in danger.
string: 请举报任何已知实施过此行为的人.这可能会危及你的生命.

original: Hear this new decree from the Jarl: The book 'A Kiss, Sweet Mother' is now outlawed as it describes the Dark Sacrament and how to perform it.
string: 听好了，领主颁布新法令:因<甜蜜母亲之吻>一书描述了黑暗圣礼及其施行方法，现予以查禁.

original: Exceptions can be made after a request has been sent to the Steward. Those exceptions will be evaluated by the Steward and approved by the Jarl.
string: 在向管家提交申请后，可以提出例外请求.这些例外情况将由管家评估，并由领主批准.

original: Any copy found by the guards will be seized and burned. The owner shall pay a fine in gold.
string: 任何被守卫发现的副本都将被没收并焚毁.物主须支付金币作为罚款.

original: Hear this, sons and daughters of Skyrim! Crime creeps through our streets, and who do we find behind it?
string: 听好了，天际的儿女们！罪恶正悄然蔓延在我们的街头，而幕后黑手是谁？

original: Not true Nords, but outsiders, Imperials, and those who prefer coins over honor and kin!
string: 不是真正的诺德人，而是外来者，帝国人，以及那些将金币看得比荣誉和亲族更重的人！

original: The Empire's weakness has poisoned our borders, letting thieves and cutthroats slip through like frost through cracked stone.
string: 帝国的软弱已毒害了我们的边境，让盗贼与杀手如寒霜渗入裂隙般悄然潜入.

original: The weakness of the Empire gives room for the Thieves Guild to gain influence.
string: 帝国的衰弱为盗贼公会扩大影响力提供了可乘之机.

original: But Windhelm does not kneel. Our guards stand firm, our people stand proud, and our cause remains just.
string: 但风舵城绝不屈服.我们的守卫坚如磐石，我们的人民傲然挺立，我们的事业正义永存.

original: Our Jarl and the guards will face the crime wave with honor and bring to justice all criminals.
string: 我们的领主和守卫将以荣誉面对犯罪浪潮，将所有罪犯绳之以法.

original: Let the Empire drown in its own corruption. We shall cleanse our city with steel and honor.Citizens, report suspicious behavior.
string: 让帝国在其自身的腐败中沉沦吧.我们将以钢铁与荣誉净化我们的城市.市民们，请举报可疑行为.

original: Protect your homes. Trust in Nord honor and trust in Skyrim's strength!
string: 保卫你们的家园.相信诺德人的荣耀，相信天际的力量！

original: Citizens of Windhelm! The rising tide of crime is no mystery. We know the cause:
string: 风舵城的公民们！犯罪率的上升并非无迹可寻.我们知道原因:

original: it is the work of outsiders, weak-bloods, and Imperial sympathizers who visit our city under the guise of trade and friendship.
string: 这是外来者，懦弱之徒和帝国人同情者的所作所为，他们以贸易和友谊为幌子造访我们的城市.

original: These are not our people. They do not share our blood, our honor, or our cause.
string: 这些人并非我们的同胞.他们不与我们血脉相连，不与我们共享荣誉，亦不与我们志同道合.

original: As our High King Ulfric Stormcloak has declared: �Skyrim belongs to the Nords. And Windhelm shall be its heart, pure and unyielding.'
string: 正如我们的至高王乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷所宣告的:'天际属于诺德人.而风舵城将成为其心脏，纯洁且不屈.'

original: Effective immediately by order of the Jarl, curfews will be enforced in the Gray Quarter.
string: 根据领主命令，灰区即刻起实行宵禁.

original: Guards will protect the Stone Quarter and Valunstrad during the curfew to intercept any potential criminals.
string: 守卫将在宵禁期间保护石区和瓦伦斯特拉德区，以拦截任何潜在的罪犯.

original: We ask that all suspicious activity must be reported to the city guard.
string: 我们要求所有可疑活动必须向城市卫队报告.

original: Let it be known: Windhelm will not be conquered by crime, but fight their enemy until victory.
string: 让世人知晓:风舵城不会被罪恶征服，必将与敌人战斗直至胜利.

original: Hearken, loyal sons and daughters of Skyrim! Windhelm is under siege! Not by an army, but by crime.
string: 听好了，天际的忠诚儿女们！风舵城正被围困！不是被军队，而是被罪恶.

original: The authorities see a surge in crimes targeting Nord residents and shops. Pickpocketing, shoplifting, along with breaking and entering.
string: 当局发现针对诺德人居民和店铺的犯罪案件激增，包括扒窃，商店行窃以及非法闯入.

original: This is the result of the chaos sowed by the Empire. Their weakness allowed outsiders to exploit the good nature of the sons and daughters of Skyrim.
string: 这正是帝国播下混乱的恶果.他们的软弱让外人得以利用天际儿女的善良本性.

original: They allowed the Thieves Guild to infest and spread across Skyrim.
string: 他们放任盗贼公会在天际滋生蔓延.

original: Windhelm will not stand idle. Windhelm will protect their own.
string: 风舵城不会袖手旁观.风舵城将保护自己的人民.

original: To protect the safety of the city and to catch any potential troublemaker, all visitors will be searched before crossing the gate.
string: 为确保城市安全并抓捕潜在滋事者，所有访客在通过城门时都将接受搜查.

original: All foreign merchants shall be subject to stricter inspections. Anyone caught with items associated with the Thieves Guild will be thrown in Jail.
string: 所有外国商人都将接受更严格的检查.任何人若被发现携带与盗贼公会相关的物品，都将被投入监狱.

original: Imperial sympathizers will be watched. Stand tall, Nords. The snow may fall, but Windhelm never will.
string: 帝国人的同情者将被监视.挺起胸膛，诺德人.风雪或许会降临，但风舵城永不陷落.

original: By decree of the city guard captain and steward to the Jarl, here are new rules aimed to stop the recent crime spree in the city.
string: 奉领主侍卫长兼总管之命，现颁布新规以遏止城内近期频发的犯罪活动.

original: You loiter near the palace gates? Jail. You speak ill of Skyrim? Jail. You wear Imperial clothes? Jail. You take too long to buy at a stall? Jail.
string: 你在宫殿大门附近闲逛？坐牢.你说天际的坏话？坐牢.你穿帝国人的衣服？坐牢.你在摊位买东西太久？坐牢.

original: You undercook mammoth steak? Jail. Overcook it? Also jail. You whistle in the Gray Quarter after sundown? Jail.
string: 猛犸象排没烤熟？进监狱.烤过头了？也进监狱.日落后在灰区吹口哨？进监狱.

original: You look suspicious while buying arrows? Jail. You ask too many questions? Jail. You are a bard and your songs are bad? Jail.
string: 你买箭时神色可疑？坐牢.你问太多问题？坐牢.你是吟游诗人但歌难听？坐牢.

original: You are a bard and your songs are good but sound vaguely Cyrodiilic? Jail. You are not a Nord and you breathe too loudly? Jail.
string: 你是吟游诗人，歌虽好却隐约有赛瑞迪尔风格？进监狱.你不是诺德人还呼吸声太大？进监狱.

original: You are a Nord and you breathe too loudly? Warning. Then jail. Windhelm is not a playground. It is a fortress.
string: 你是诺德人还呼吸声太大？警示.然后进监狱.风舵城不是游乐场.它是座堡垒.

original: Obey, or be jailed. Right away. No trial. No nothing.
string: 服从，否则立刻入狱.没有审判，什么都没有.

original: The city guards are looking for information regarding a recent murder.
string: 城市卫兵正在寻找最近一起谋杀案的相关信息.

original: The captain of the guards is asking the help of the population regarding a person that was found dead.
string: 卫兵队长正在向民众寻求帮助，以调查一具被发现尸体的案件.

original: The city guards have opened an investigation regarding a recent murder and are asking the people of the Hold for information.
string: 城市卫兵已就近期发生的一起谋杀案展开调查，并正向领地的民众征集线索.

original: An unknown barbarian in Ivarstead was found lifeless by a local man. Foul play is suspected in her death.
string: 一名身份不明的野蛮人在伊瓦尔镇被当地居民发现时已无生命迹象.她的死亡疑似存在他杀嫌疑.

original: A Nord fishwife on the Riften Fishery was discovered dead by a dock worker with visible signs of a struggle on her body.
string: 裂谷渔场的一名诺德人渔妇被码头工人发现死亡，身上有明显打斗痕迹.

original: A miner was found dead in a mine in Shor's Stone with a pickaxe in his back.
string: 一名矿工被发现死在舒尔之石的矿井里，背上插着一把矿镐.

original: The suspect has escaped the scene and the guards are actively looking for them.
string: 嫌疑人已逃离现场，守卫们正在积极搜寻他们.

original: A strange individual was seen around the time of the murder in the area.
string: 案发时段附近区域曾出现一名可疑人物.

original: The victim was last seen talking to a hooded individual.
string: 受害者最后一次被看见时，正在与一名戴兜帽的人交谈.

original: A person unknown to locals was seen inquiring about the victim.
string: 有陌生人向当地人打听受害者的消息.

original: The suspect is a male Nord.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性诺德人.

original: The suspect is a female Nord.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性诺德人.

original: The suspect is a male Breton.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性布莱顿人.

original: The suspect is a female Breton.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性布莱顿人.

original: The suspect is a male Imperial.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性帝国人.

original: The suspect is a female Imperial.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性帝国人.

original: The suspect is a male redguard.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性红卫人.

original: The suspect is a female redguard.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性红卫人.

original: The suspect is a male Orc.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性兽人.

original: The suspect is a female Orc.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性兽人.

original: The suspect is a male Dark elf.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性黑暗精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Dark elf.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性黑暗精灵.

original: The suspect is a male Bosmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性木精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Bosmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性木精灵.

original: The suspect is a male Altmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性高精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Altmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性高精灵.

original: And believed to be a young adult.
string: 并且据信是一名年轻人.

original: And believed to be middle-aged.
string: 并且据信是中年人.

original: And believed to be a senior citizen.
string: 且据信是一名老年人.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a set of dark robes.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一套深色长袍.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a set of eather armor.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一套皮甲.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a green tunic with light-colored trousers.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一件绿色束腰外衣和浅色长裤.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a white shirt with dark trousers.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一件白色衬衫和深色长裤.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing tattered clothes and was barefoot.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着破烂的衣服，并且赤着脚.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing hunting clothes along with a long bow.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着猎装，并携带一把长弓.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing fine clothing with fine furs on the shoulders.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯身穿做工考究的服装，肩部装饰着上等毛皮.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing mage robes.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着法师长袍.

original: Anyone with information about the deceased or other useful information that may lead to the arrest of the suspect is welcomed to contact the guards.
string: 任何掌握死者相关信息或其他有助于逮捕嫌疑人的有用信息的人，都欢迎与守卫联系.

original: The suspect is considered dangerous and should not be interacted with directly.
string: 该嫌疑人被视为危险人物，不应直接接触.

original: Hearken, citizens of Riften! Nura and Volwulf Snow-Shod are proud to announce the wedding of their son,
string: 裂谷城的市民们，请听好！努拉和沃尔夫.雪蹄夫妇自豪地宣布他们儿子的婚礼，

original: Asgeir Snow-Shod, to Vittoria Vici of Solitude and cousin to the Emperor himself. Though her blood runs Imperial, her heart now beats for Skyrim.
string: 艾斯盖尔.雪蹄，致独孤城的维托利亚.维齐，皇帝本人的表亲.尽管她流淌着帝国人的血液，但她的心如今已为天际而跳动.

original: This union shall take place in the Temple of the Divines in Solitude. This is proof that even the Empire sees worth in our sons and daughters.
string: 这场婚礼将在独孤城的圣灵神殿举行.这证明了即使是帝国也认可我们儿女的价值.

original: It is a testament to the strength of Skyrim's people that even the highborn of Cyrodiil seek alliance through marriage.
string: 这证明了天际人民的强大，就连赛洛迪尔的高贵家族也寻求通过联姻来结盟.

original: May the Divines bless this bond, and may Riften stand ever proud of the Snow-Shod name!
string: 愿众神祝福这段姻缘，愿裂谷城永远为雪蹄之名而自豪！

original: Hearken, citizens of Riften! Nura and Volwulf Snow-Shod take great pride in announcing the forthcoming union of their son,
string: 裂谷城的市民们，请听好！努拉和沃尔武夫.雪蹄夫妇怀着无比自豪的心情宣布，他们的儿子即将迎来婚礼，

original: Asgeir Snow-Shod, to Lady Vittoria Vici of Solitude, kinswoman to the Emperor.
string: 艾斯盖尔.雪蹄，致独孤城的维托利亚.维齐女士，皇帝之亲族.

original: This sacred bond shall be solemnized within the halls of the Temple of the Divines in Solitude.
string: 这份神圣的盟约将在独孤城的圣灵神殿内庄严缔结.

original: Though they both stood on different sides of the Civil War, their union is for the greater good of Skyrim.
string: 尽管他们站在内战的不同阵营，但他们的结合是为了天际的更大福祉.

original: May the Divines look with favor upon this union.
string: 愿众神眷顾这段结合.

original: Hear ye! Hear ye, good folk of Riften! Lend me your ears and hearts, for a child has vanished from our midst!
string: 听好了！听好了，裂谷城的善良百姓们！请侧耳倾听，敞开心扉，因为有个孩子在我们中间失踪了！

original: Young Aventus Aretino, of Nord blood and around ten year-old, has disappeared from Honorhall Orphanage!
string: 年轻的诺德人阿文图斯.艾瑞提诺，大约十岁，已从荣耀堂孤儿院失踪！

original: He has pale skin and dark hair. He may be frightened and seeking refuge beyond our gates.
string: 他肤色苍白，头发乌黑.他可能受到了惊吓，正在我们的城门之外寻求庇护.

original: If you glimpse the boy or hear word of his wanderings, report with haste to the city guard or Mistress Grelod herself.
string: 若瞥见那男孩或听闻其行踪，请速向城市守卫或格瑞洛德夫人本人禀报.

original: The child is confused, and fate may have led him astray.Let the Divines guide us to his safe return!
string: 这孩子困惑迷茫，或许是命运将他引向了歧途.愿圣灵指引我们，护佑他平安归来！

original: Tell your neighbors, spread the word! By order of the Riften guard, let it be known that Aventus Aretino is missing!
string: 告诉你的邻居，把这个消息传开！根据裂谷城守卫的命令，阿文图斯.艾瑞提诺失踪了！

original: Hear ye, hear ye! A grim discovery this morning at Honorhall Orphanage: Grelod the Kind, longtime caretaker of Riften's orphans, was found dead.
string: 听说了吗，听说了吗！今晨荣耀堂孤儿院发生了一起骇人听闻的事件:长期照料裂谷城孤儿的慈祥的桂罗被发现身亡.

original: The cause remains unknown, though no witnesses have come forward.
string: 虽然尚无目击者出面，但原因依然不明.

original: The city guard is investigating, and citizens are urged to remain calm and refrain from speculation.
string: 城市守卫正在调查，敦促市民保持冷静，不要妄加揣测.

original: Mistress Constance Michel has assumed responsibility for the orphanage and assures the public that the children are safe and well cared for.
string: 康斯坦斯.米切尔女士已接管孤儿院，并向公众保证孩子们安全无恙，得到了妥善照料.

original: Let us remember Grelod's long dedication and service to care for the orphan of Riften.
string: 让我们铭记慈祥的桂罗长期致力于照顾裂谷城孤儿的奉献与服务.

original: Citizens of Riften, Recent events at Honorhall Orphanage have stirred unfounded speculation.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，荣耀堂孤儿院最近发生的事件引发了毫无根据的猜测.

original: Let it be known that the death of Grelod the Kind bears no indication of foul play beyond the reach of the law.
string: 特此声明，慈祥的桂罗之死并无任何迹象表明存在法律无法制裁的谋杀行为.

original: The Riften Guard has found no evidence linking this incident to any clandestine organizations, including the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 裂谷城卫兵尚未发现任何证据表明此事与包括黑暗兄弟会在内的任何秘密组织有关.

original: I caution all residents against rumor-mongering, which only serves to disrupt the peace and stability we strive to maintain.
string: 我告诫所有居民切勿散布谣言，这只会破坏我们努力维护的和平与稳定.

original: Let us offer our sympathies to the children of Honorhall and trust in Mistress Constance Michel's capable leadership.
string: 让我们向荣誉堂的孩子们致以慰问，并相信康斯坦斯.米切尔女士的卓越领导能力.

original: Citizens of Riften, hear this message for the Jarl:
string: 裂谷城的子民们，聆听领主的传讯:

original: It is with sorrow that I acknowledge the passing of Grelod the Kind, longtime matron of the Honorhall Orphanage.
string: 我怀着悲痛的心情，确认慈祥的桂罗--荣耀堂孤儿院多年的女院长--已经离世.

original: While her methods were unusual, her role in tending to Skyrim's forgotten children was nonetheless significant.
string: 尽管她的方法不同寻常，但她在照料天际那些被遗忘的孩子们方面所扮演的角色，其重要性依然不容忽视.

original: It is clear from the reports from the city guard, there is no link between this incident and any rumored assassins of the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 根据城市守卫的报告，此事与传闻中的黑暗兄弟会刺客之间并无关联.

original: Children might claim it to be the case, but this is only their imagination at play.
string: 孩子们或许会这么说，但这不过是他们想象力的发挥罢了.

original: Let us offer sympathy to the children of Honorhall and for now, Mistress Constance Michel will step in as the new matron of Honorhall Orphanage.
string: 让我们向荣耀堂的孩子们表达同情，目前康斯坦斯.米切尔女士将暂代荣耀堂孤儿院的新任女院长.

original: May she be a role model for all these orphans.
string: 愿她成为所有这些孤儿的榜样.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! A dark day has fallen upon Skyrim!
string: 听好了，听好了！黑暗之日已降临天际！

original: The bride to our own Asgeir Snow-Shod, Vittoria Vici, was murdered in cold blood at her wedding in Solitude!
string: 我们艾斯盖尔.雪蹄的新娘，维托利亚.维齐，在独孤城的婚礼上被残忍地谋杀了！

original: The city guard in Solitude has launched an investigation with the help of the Legion, but the assassins managed to escape the city.
string: 独孤城的守卫在军团的协助下展开了调查，但刺客们已成功逃离了城市.

original: The people of Solitude were quick to accuse the Snow-Shods or even the Stormcloaks to be behind the murder.
string: 独孤城的居民迅速指责雪蹄氏族，甚至认为是风暴斗篷策划了这起谋杀.

original: Riften mourns with the Snow-Shod family and the Jarl wishes to publicly express her sympathy to Asgeir and his family.
string: 裂谷城与雪靴家族一同哀悼，领主希望公开向阿斯盖尔及其家人表达慰问.

original: The Jarl's court and in a common accord with the Snow-Shods, condemns this vile act, and denies any involvement in the murder.
string: 领主法庭与雪靴氏族一致谴责这一卑劣行径，并否认与谋杀事件有任何牵连.

original: Citizens of Riften, be wary when traveling, especially to Solitude.
string: 裂谷城的居民们，出行时请务必小心，尤其是前往独孤城.

original: There is no guarantee for your safety as the risk of retaliation against the citizens of the Rift is extremely high.
string: 无法保证您的安全，因为裂痕领公民遭受报复的风险极高.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Riften grieves today.
string: 诸位市民，听好了！裂谷城今日沉浸在悲痛之中.

original: Our noble son, Asgeir Snow-Shod, mourns the loss of his beloved Vittoria Vici, slain like a common criminal on the day uniting two great houses.
string: 我们高贵的儿子，艾斯盖尔.雪蹄，哀悼他挚爱的维托利亚.维齐的逝去，她在两大世家联姻之日，如同一个普通罪犯般被杀害.

original: Asgeir is furious and wants everyone to know that he will take his revenge on the assassins. Asgeir speaks thus:
string: 阿斯盖尔怒不可遏，他要让所有人都知道，他必将向那些刺客复仇.阿斯盖尔如此说道:

original: They took her from me in front of my family. I swear by the Nine that I will personally hunt these cowards and take everything from them.
string: 他们当着我家人的面把她从我身边夺走.我向九圣灵发誓，我将亲自追猎这些懦夫，夺走他们的一切.

original: The Jarl's court offers full support to Solitude's investigation to find the murderers and bring them to justice.
string: 领主宫廷全力支持独孤城的调查，以找出凶手并将其绳之以法.

original: People of the Rift! Hear this news. Gaius Maro, an agent of the Penitus Oculatus and son to their commander, was found dead in the line of duty.
string: 裂痕领的居民们！请听此消息.洞察眼特工，其指挥官之子加留斯.马洛，在执行任务时被发现身亡.

original: He was killed while touring the cities of Skyrim to survey their security in preparation for the Emperor's visit.
string: 他在巡视天际各城，为皇帝到访考察安保情况时遇害.

original: It is believed that his death is related to the Civil War
string: 据信他的死与内战有关

original: and was targeted by the Stormcloaks as a way to disrupt the high command of the Empire in Skyrim.
string: 并成为风暴斗篷的目标，以此扰乱帝国在天际的高级指挥系统.

original: How would the Penitus Oculatus respond? It's unlikely that Commander Maro would let this go unpunished.
string: 洞察眼会如何回应？马洛指挥官不太可能对此不加惩处.

original: The citizens of the Rift are advised to be cautious, even more than normal.
string: 裂痕领的居民被建议要格外小心，比平时更加谨慎.

original: There's a real danger that the Legion will arrest anyone that crossed their path.
string: 军团确实有可能逮捕任何挡路的人.

original: Do not provoke the Legions if seen on the road and be extra careful while dealing with them.
string: 在路上遇到军团时不要挑衅他们，与他们打交道时要格外小心.

original: Citizens of Riften! The Emperor Titus Mede II shall arrive in Skyrim in the coming days.
string: 裂谷城的公民们！皇帝提图斯.迈德二世将于近日抵达天际.

original: From the messages received by the Jarl, the Emperor shall stay only in Solitude for a short visit.
string: 根据领主收到的消息，皇帝只会在独孤城进行短暂访问.

original: The reason is related to the murder of his cousin, Vittoria Vici, the wife of Asgeir Snow-Shod.
string: 原因与他表妹维托利亚.维齐的谋杀案有关，她是艾斯盖尔.雪蹄的妻子.

original: No one knows why the Emperor decided to involve himself directly in the investigation, but the rumour mill is going wild with speculation.
string: 无人知晓为何皇帝决定亲自介入调查，但流言蜚语已因各种猜测而甚嚣尘上.

original: It's recommended to avoid Solitude and the hold during the visit of the Emperor as the security will be tight and the guards on high alert.
string: 建议在皇帝访问期间避开独孤城及其领地，因为届时安保将非常严密，守卫也会高度戒备.

original: As many within our Hold are favorable to the Stormcloak's cause, being from the Rift might be enough for the Solitude guards to arrest you.
string: 由于我们领地内许多人都支持风暴斗篷的事业，仅仅是来自裂痕领这一点，就足以让独孤城的守卫逮捕你.

original: Hear me, sons and daughters of Skyrim! The heart of the Empire has stopped beating.
string: 听我说，天际的儿女们！帝国的心脏已停止跳动.

original: Emperor Titus Mede II is dead, struck down by poison during his meals.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世已死，他在用餐时中毒身亡.

original: The assassins managed to do something not seen since the Oblivion Crisis. This is no single murder.
string: 这些刺客做到了自湮灭危机以来从未有过的事.这绝非单起谋杀案.

original: It is the death of the Empire itself! Surely, this will spell the end of  the power of Cyrodill over the other provinces of Tamriel.
string: 这是帝国自身的覆灭！无疑，这将意味着赛洛迪尔对泰姆瑞尔其他行省统治权的终结.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Words from Solitude have arrived. Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated!
string: 听好了，听好了！从独孤城传来了消息.皇帝提图斯.迈德二世被刺杀了！

original: Poisoned within Castle Dour itself, during a grand feast, by one posing as the famed Gourmet.
string: 在阴郁堡内的一场盛大宴会上，被伪装成著名美食家的人下毒杀害.

original: The Penitus Oculatus has declared a full investigation. The killer remains at large. Solitude is under curfew, its gates watched day and night.
string: 洞察眼已宣布展开全面调查.凶手仍在逃.独孤城实施宵禁，城门日夜有人看守.

original: The Empire calls for vigilance in every hold. Here in Riften, Lady Maven Black-Briar urges calm and cooperation with Imperial law.
string: 帝国要求每个领地都保持警惕.在裂谷城，玛雯.黑棘女士敦促大家保持冷静并与帝国法律合作.

original: Let no rumor divide us, and let no traitor find shelter within our walls.
string: 莫让流言离间我们，莫让叛徒在我们墙内寻得庇护.

original: Citizens, be watchful. The hand that struck the Emperor may yet reach for others.
string: 公民们，保持警惕.那只袭击皇帝的手，可能还会伸向其他人.

original: People of Riften, attend! The Emperor of Tamriel, Titus Mede II, has been murdered in Solitude, poisoned at his own table by a false Gourmet.
string: 裂谷城的子民们，听好了！泰姆瑞尔的皇帝提图斯.迈德二世已在独孤城遇害，被一个假冒的美食家在宴席上毒杀.

original: Lady Maven Black-Briar reminds all loyal citizens that this is an attack on the very heart of order and stability.
string: 玛雯.黑棘夫人提醒所有忠诚的市民，这是对秩序与稳定核心的直接攻击.

original: The assassin's identity is unknown, but the Empire will not rest until justice is done.
string: 刺客身份不明，但帝国必将伸张正义，绝不姑息.

original: Harbor no fugitives. Speak no seditious words. The safety of the Rift depends on our unity.
string: 不得藏匿逃犯.不得散布煽动言论.裂痕领的安全有赖于我们的团结.

original: Hear this, people of the Rift! News is coming from Solitude:
string: 裂痕领的民众们，听好了！独孤城传来消息:

original: Emperor Titus Mede II is dead, poisoned in the Castle Dour during a feast with other Imperial nobles.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世已死，他在阴郁堡与其他帝国人贵族共进宴会时被毒杀.

original: And yet, their famed Penitus Oculatus could not stop a lone impostor from walking into their kitchens,
string: 然而，他们那著名的洞察眼却没能阻止一个冒牌货独自走进他们的厨房.

original: serving death on a silver plate and leaving the castle unarmed.
string: 将死亡奉上银盘，并让城堡毫无防备.

original: Now the Empire scrambles, pointing fingers at the sons and daughters of Skyrim. But we know the truth: no Stormcloak hand was needed.
string: 如今帝国仓促应对，将矛头指向天际的儿女们.但我们清楚真相:根本不需要风暴斗篷出手.

original: This was the work of their own weakness, their own enemies born of their rule.
string: 这是他们自身软弱的结果，是他们统治下滋生的敌人.

original: Let it be known: the Rift will not bow its head in shame for the Empire's failings. We stand watchful and we stand free.
string: 特此宣告:裂痕领不会因帝国的过失而羞愧低头.我们保持警惕，我们屹立自由.

original: Hear this, citizens of Riften! The Dark Brotherhood, murderers of Vittoria Vici,
string: 裂谷城的子民们，听好了！黑暗兄弟会，谋杀维托利亚.维齐的凶手，

original: slayers of noble Gaius Maro, and conspirators against the Emperor, have been destroyed!
string: 杀害高贵的加留斯.马洛的凶手，以及密谋对抗皇帝的叛徒，已被铲除！

original: By the Emperor's own decree, the Penitus Oculatus struck down the assassins in their Falkreath den, ending their reign of terror.
string: 根据皇帝本人的谕令，洞察眼在佛克瑞斯的巢穴中剿灭了那些刺客，终结了他们的恐怖统治.

original: No longer will the folk of Skyrim fear their presence. No longer shall justice be robbed of her reach.
string: 天际的子民将不再畏惧他们的存在.正义将不再被剥夺其应有的伸张.

original: Give thanks to the Divines for the vigilance of the Penitus Oculatus, and be proud that life is stronger than death!
string: 感谢众神赐予洞察眼的警醒守护，并为生命强于死亡而自豪！

original: Listen closely, friends and travellers! Word from Falkreath says the Dark Brotherhood have been destroyed by the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 各位朋友和旅人，请仔细听好！佛克瑞斯传来消息，黑暗兄弟会已被洞察眼彻底剿灭.

original: Those assassins were afterall behind the murders of Vittoria Vici and of Gaius Maro. They were even those behind the attempt on the Emperor's life.
string: 那些刺客终究是杀害维托利亚.维齐和加留斯.马洛的幕后黑手.他们甚至还是企图刺杀皇帝的元凶.

original: Only through cunning and planning that the Penitus Oculatus deceived the Dark Brotherhood when they tried to poison the Emperor.
string: 正是凭借诡计与谋划，洞察眼才在试图毒害皇帝时欺骗了黑暗兄弟会.

original: It was a body double that replaced the Emperor Titus Medes II. Because of the trap, the Penitus Oculatus were led to the Dark Brotherhood's hideout.
string: 那是用来替换提图斯.迈德斯二世皇帝的替身.由于这个圈套，洞察眼被引向了黑暗兄弟会的藏身处.

original: The Penitus Oculatus raided the place located near Falkreath.
string: 洞察眼突袭了位于佛克瑞斯附近的那个地方.

original: They swept in like hawks on a hare, tore their lair apart, and left nothing but ashes and corpses.
string: 他们如鹰扑兔般席卷而来，将巢穴撕得粉碎，只留下灰烬与尸骸.

original: So breathe easy, Riften! No longer shall we fear the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 所以，裂谷城，可以松口气了！我们再也不必惧怕黑暗兄弟会了.

original: Listen well, folk of Riften! The Emperor is dead, truly this time. Slain aboard The Katariah, right in Solitude's own harbor.
string: 裂谷城的百姓们听好了！皇帝驾崩了，这次是真的.就在独孤城的港口，在卡塔利亚号上被刺杀了.

original: The Penitus Oculatus said the Dark Brotherhood was finished. They say the Empire was safer. But now the Emperor lies cold.
string: 洞察眼说黑暗兄弟会已经完蛋了.他们说帝国更安全了.但现在皇帝却已冰冷地躺下.

original: The Jarl reminds all citizens to remain calm and steady.
string: 领主提醒所有市民保持冷静与镇定.

original: There will be uncertainties in the coming days and weeks, but the intrigues of the Empire won't affect Riften and the people of the Rift.
string: 未来几天乃至几周内局势或许会有变数，但帝国的阴谋不会影响到裂谷城和裂痕领的人民.

original: We have all the reasons to continue our daily life and continue our business as usual.
string: 我们有充分的理由继续日常生活，照常营业.

original: Hear this news, people of Riften. The Jarl have received the news from Solitude that the Emperor is dead. For real this time.
string: 裂谷城的子民们，请听此消息.领主已从独孤城获悉，皇帝驾崩了.这次是真的.

original: his time aboard The Katariah, right in Solitude's harbor. From the message received, the Dark Brotherhood are responsible for it.
string: 这次事件发生在独孤城港口的卡塔利亚号上.根据收到的消息，黑暗兄弟会对此负责.

original: The Dark Brotherhood is not as destroyed as the Penitus Oculatus claimed. Currently, the whole Empire is in uproar and Solitude is in chaos.
string: 黑暗兄弟会并不像洞察眼声称的那样已被消灭.如今整个帝国一片哗然，独孤城更是陷入混乱.

original: The remaining agents of the Penitus Oculatus are doing everything they can to pursue the Dark Brotherhood,
string: 洞察眼的剩余特工正在竭尽全力追捕黑暗兄弟会.

original: but the organisation has vanished and no one knows where they are.
string: 但这个组织已经消失，无人知晓他们的去向.

original: Hear this, citizens of Riften! The Dark Brotherhood has been destroyed!
string: 裂谷城的子民们，听好了！黑暗兄弟会已被铲除！

original: The Penitus Oculatus struck down the assassins in their Falkreath den, ending their reign of terror.
string: 洞察眼突袭了刺客们在佛克瑞斯的巢穴，终结了他们的恐怖统治.

original: No longer will the folk of Skyrim fear their presence. No longer shall justice be robbed of her reach.
string: 天际的子民将不再畏惧他们的存在.正义将不再被剥夺其应有的伸张.

original: Give thanks to the Divines for the vigilance of the Penitus Oculatus, and be proud that life is stronger than death!
string: 感谢众神赐予洞察眼的警醒守护，并为生命强于死亡而自豪！

original: Listen closely, friends and travellers! Word from Falkreath says the Dark Brotherhood have been destroyed by the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 各位朋友和旅人，请仔细听好！佛克瑞斯传来消息，黑暗兄弟会已被洞察眼彻底剿灭.

original: Only through cunning and planning that the Penitus Oculatus deceived the Dark Brotherhood in finding their hideout and the way to access it.
string: 正是通过诡计与谋划，洞察眼才得以欺骗黑暗兄弟会，找到了他们的藏身之处及其进入方法.

original: The Penitus Oculatus raided the place located near Falkreath.
string: 洞察眼突袭了位于佛克瑞斯附近的那个地方.

original: They swept in like hawks on a hare, tore their lair apart, and left nothing but ashes and corpses.
string: 他们如鹰扑兔般席卷而来，将巢穴撕得粉碎，只留下灰烬与尸骸.

original: So breathe easy, Riften! No longer shall we fear the Dark Brotherhood.
string: 所以，裂谷城，可以松口气了！我们再也不必惧怕黑暗兄弟会了.

original: The city guards are looking for information regarding a recent murder.
string: 城市卫兵正在寻找最近一起谋杀案的相关信息.

original: The captain of the guards is asking the help of the population regarding a person that was found dead.
string: 卫兵队长正在向民众寻求帮助，以调查一具被发现尸体的案件.

original: The city guards have opened an investigation regarding a recent murder and are asking the people of the Hold for information.
string: 城市卫兵已就近期发生的一起谋杀案展开调查，并正向领地的民众征集线索.

original: A Nord laborer at Katla's Farm was found dead by another laborer. Marks on his body lead the guards to conclude it was murder.
string: 凯特拉农场的一名诺德劳工被另一名劳工发现死亡.他身上的痕迹让守卫断定这是一起谋杀.

original: A traveling dignitary was found dead in our streets, discovered by a guard while on patrol.
string: 一位旅行的显贵被发现死在我们街道上，是被巡逻的守卫发现的.

original: A priest was found stabbed in the Hall of the Dead, with ritual markings on his body.
string: 一名牧师被发现遭刺死于亡者之厅，身上带有仪式性的标记.

original: The suspect has escaped the scene and the guards are actively looking for them.
string: 嫌疑人已逃离现场，守卫们正在积极搜寻他们.

original: A strange individual was seen around the time of the murder in the area.
string: 案发时段附近区域曾出现一名可疑人物.

original: The victim was last seen talking to a hooded individual.
string: 受害者最后一次被看见时，正在与一名戴兜帽的人交谈.

original: A person unknown to locals was seen inquiring about the victim.
string: 有陌生人向当地人打听受害者的消息.

original: The suspect is a male Nord.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性诺德人.

original: The suspect is a female Nord.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性诺德人.

original: The suspect is a male Breton.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性布莱顿人.

original: The suspect is a female Breton.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性布莱顿人.

original: The suspect is a male Imperial.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性帝国人.

original: The suspect is a female Imperial.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性帝国人.

original: The suspect is a male redguard.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性红卫人.

original: The suspect is a female redguard.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性红卫人.

original: The suspect is a male Orc.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性兽人.

original: The suspect is a female Orc.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性兽人.

original: The suspect is a male Dark elf.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性黑暗精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Dark elf.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性黑暗精灵.

original: The suspect is a male Bosmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性木精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Bosmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性木精灵.

original: The suspect is a male Altmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性高精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Altmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性高精灵.

original: And believed to be a young adult.
string: 并且据信是一名年轻人.

original: And believed to be middle-aged.
string: 并且据信是中年人.

original: And believed to be a senior citizen.
string: 且据信是一名老年人.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a set of dark robes.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一套深色长袍.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a set of eather armor.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一套皮甲.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a green tunic with light-colored trousers.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一件绿色束腰外衣和浅色长裤.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a white shirt with dark trousers.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一件白色衬衫和深色长裤.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing tattered clothes and was barefoot.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着破烂的衣服，并且赤着脚.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing hunting clothes along with a long bow.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着猎装，并携带一把长弓.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing fine clothing with fine furs on the shoulders.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯身穿做工考究的服装，肩部装饰着上等毛皮.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing mage robes.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着法师长袍.

original: Anyone with information about the deceased or other useful information that may lead to the arrest of the suspect is welcomed to contact the guards.
string: 任何掌握死者相关信息或其他有助于逮捕嫌疑人的有用信息的人，都欢迎与守卫联系.

original: The suspect is considered dangerous and should not be interacted with directly.
string: 该嫌疑人被视为危险人物，不应直接接触.

original: The authorities are reminding everyone that performing the Dark Sacrament is illegal and a serious crime.
string: 当局提醒所有人，进行黑暗圣礼是违法行为，属于严重犯罪.

original: Anyone found to have performed the Dark Sacrament will be treated the same as a murderer.
string: 任何被发现实施过黑暗祭礼的人，都将被视为杀人犯同等对待.

original: Please report anyone known to have performed it. It could be your life that is in danger.
string: 请举报任何已知实施过此行为的人.这可能会危及你的生命.

original: Hear this new decree from the Jarl: The book 'A Kiss, Sweet Mother' is now outlawed as it describes the Dark Sacrament and how to perform it.
string: 听好了，领主颁布新法令:因<甜蜜母亲之吻>一书描述了黑暗圣礼及其施行方法，现予以查禁.

original: Exceptions can be made after a request has been sent to the Steward. Those exceptions will be evaluated by the Steward and approved by the Jarl.
string: 在向管家提交申请后，可以提出例外请求.这些例外情况将由管家评估，并由领主批准.

original: Any copy found by the guards will be seized and burned. The owner shall pay a fine in gold.
string: 任何被守卫发现的副本都将被没收并焚毁.物主须支付金币作为罚款.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Vittoria Vici, esteemed cousin to Emperor Titus Mede II and steward of the East Empire Company,
string: 听好了，听好了！维托利亚.维齐，皇帝提图斯.迈德二世尊贵的表亲，东帝国公司的总管，

original: shall wed Asgeir Snow-Shod of Riften, noble son of the Snow-Shod family.
string: 将与裂谷城雪蹄家族的贵族之子艾斯盖尔.雪蹄成婚.

original: This union marks a hopeful step toward peace in our troubled land, a bridge between the Empire and the Stormcloak rebellion.
string: 这次联姻是我们这片动荡土地上迈向和平的希望一步，是帝国与风暴斗篷叛乱之间的一座桥梁.

original: The ceremony shall be held in the courtyard of the Temple of the Divines, with festivities open to the public.
string: 仪式将在圣灵神殿的庭院举行，庆祝活动对公众开放.

original: Let all who cherish harmony and prosperity attend and celebrate this blessed day.
string: 愿所有珍视和谐与繁荣的人们，都来参与并庆祝这蒙福之日.

original: May the Divines smile upon the couple, and may Skyrim find unity in their vows.
string: 愿众神眷顾这对新人，愿天际在他们的誓言中找到团结.

original: Citizens of Solitude and loyal subjects of the Empire, gather ye close and mark this day with reverence.
string: 独孤城的市民们，帝国的忠诚子民们，请聚拢过来，怀着敬畏之心铭记这一天.

original: Let it be known throughout Skyrim: Vittoria Vici, cousin to Emperor Titus Mede II shall wed Asgeir Snow-Shod,
string: 让整个天际省知晓:维托利亚.维齐，皇帝提图斯.迈德二世的表亲，将嫁给艾斯盖尔.雪蹄.

original: a son of Riften and of a region aligned with rebellion.
string: 裂谷城之子，亦是反叛之地的子民.

original: This union, sanctified by the Divines and blessed by our wise Jarl, shines as a testament to Imperial grace.
string: 这场由圣灵见证，我们英明的领主赐福的联姻，闪耀着帝国人风范的光辉.

original: As Vittoria embraces Asgeir, so shall the Empire embrace Skyrim, not with blade or conquest, but with compassion and unity.
string: 正如维托里亚拥抱阿斯盖尔，帝国也将拥抱天际，不是凭借刀剑或征服，而是以怜悯与团结之心.

original: The Emperor offers peace to those who seek it.
string: 皇帝向寻求和平的人伸出橄榄枝.

original: Come witness this sacred ceremony, a symbol of the Empire's undying hope, and a reminder that even the rebels may return to the fold.
string: 来见证这场神圣的仪式吧，它象征着帝国不朽的希望，也提醒着人们，即便是叛军也可能重归阵营.

original: Glory to the Empire! May the Divines guide the path of reconciliation.
string: 帝国荣光永存！愿圣灵指引和解之路.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! A vile act has struck at the heart of our great city!
string: 听好了，听好了！一桩卑劣的行径重创了我们伟大城市的心脏！

original: Vittoria Vici, beloved cousin to Emperor Titus Mede II, was murdered at her wedding, beneath the very gaze of the Divines!
string: 维托利亚.维齐，皇帝提图斯.迈德二世深爱的表亲，竟在她的婚礼上，在众神的注视下被谋杀了！

original: What was meant to be a symbol of unity and mercy between Empire and Skyrim has become a day of sorrow and outrage.
string: 这本该是帝国与天际之间团结与仁慈的象征，如今却成了悲伤与愤慨之日.

original: The Penitus Oculatus have taken over the city guard in conducting a full investigation.
string: 洞察眼已接管城市卫队，正在进行全面调查.

original: All citizens are urged to collaborate and bring any information they have about the event or the assassin.
string: 所有市民都被敦促合作，提供任何关于该事件或刺客的信息.

original: Justice will be served and the murderer will face justice.
string: 正义必将得到伸张，杀人凶手将受到法律的制裁.

original: Hear ye, loyal citizens of Solitude! A heinous crime was committed in our city!
string: 独孤城的忠诚市民们，听好了！我们的城市发生了一起滔天罪行！

original: Vittoria Vici, noble cousin to Emperor Titus Mede II, was murdered at her wedding in broad daylight!
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世的贵族表亲维托利亚.维齐，竟在光天化日之下的婚礼上被谋杀了！

original: The perpetrator left the city and managed to dodge all the guards and infuriated wedding guests.
string: 肇事者逃离了城市，成功躲过了所有守卫和愤怒的婚礼宾客.

original: The wedding was already controversial because someone of the Emperor family was marrying known Stormcloak sympathisers.
string: 这场婚礼本就充满争议，因为皇室成员竟要迎娶众所周知的风暴斗篷同情者.

original: Who but the Stormcloaks would oppose this union so violently?
string: 除了风暴斗篷，还有谁会如此激烈地反对这场联合？

original: The Stormcloaks, ever bitter and blind with hatred toward the Empire, could not respect the truce this union could symbolize.
string: 风暴斗篷，始终对帝国怀有刻骨的仇恨与盲目的敌意，无法尊重这一联合可能象征的休战协议.

original: The rebellion is bloodthirsty, but be sure of one thing: the blood spilled in our courtyard cries out for justice.
string: 叛乱者嗜血成性，但有一点可以肯定:洒在我们庭院里的鲜血正呼唤着正义.

original: The Empire shall not forget. Solitude shall not forgive. Glory to the Empire! Down with the traitors!
string: 帝国不会忘记.独孤城不会原谅.帝国荣光永存！叛徒下楼！

original: Hear ye, citizens of Solitude! The joyous union between Vittoria Vici and Asgeir Snow-Shod of Riften has ended not in celebration, but in blood.
string: 独孤城的公民们，听好了！维托利亚.维齐与来自裂谷城的艾斯盖尔.雪蹄之间的喜事，并未以庆典收场，而是以鲜血告终.

original: Vittoria Vici, cousin to Emperor Titus Mede II, was murdered at her own wedding reception.
string: 维托利亚.维齐，皇帝提图斯.迈德二世的表亲，在她自己的婚礼招待会上被谋杀了.

original: In the chaos following the murder, the Snow-Shod family promptly left Solitude before the  Penitus Oculatus could interrogate them.
string: 在谋杀案引发的混乱中，雪靴家族在洞察眼组织审问他们之前迅速离开了独孤城.

original: They are wanted for questioning about their involvement in the events leading to the murder,
string: 他们因涉嫌参与导致谋杀的事件而被通缉审问.

original: especially the parents that were not shy to derogatory remarks about the Empire and their allegiance to the Stormcloak.
string: 尤其是那些毫不避讳对帝国发表贬损言论，并宣誓效忠于风暴斗篷的父母.

original: All of this raises suspicions that they were involved in the murder of their new daughter-in-law and how much they had planned it.
string: 这一切都让人怀疑他们是否参与了新儿媳的谋杀，以及他们对此策划了多少.

original: All for the goal to hurt the Emperor. The family of the Emperor extended an open arms to enemies and instead of accepting this gesture of peace,
string: 一切只为伤害皇帝.皇帝的家族向敌人张开双臂，而非接受这份和平的示意.

original: they preferred to strike the Empire. Solitude stands firmly with the Empire and demands answers for the murder of one of its residents.
string: 他们更倾向于攻击帝国.独孤城坚定地与帝国站在一起，并要求为其一位居民的谋杀事件给出交代.

original: Hear ye, loyal citizens of Solitude! What should have been a day of triumph now echoes with betrayal.
string: 独孤城的忠诚市民们，听好了！本应是凯旋之日，如今却回荡着背叛之声.

original: The wedding of Vittoria Vici, esteemed cousin to Emperor Titus Mede II, has ended not in unity, but in blood.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世尊贵的表亲，维托利亚.维齐的婚礼，并未以结合告终，而是以流血收场.

original: Vittoria was murdered during her own reception, struck down in our capital, in sight of the Divines.
string: 维托利亚在她自己的招待会上遇害，就在我们首都，众神见证之下被击倒.

original: In the wake of this cowardly act, the Snow-Shod family, long known for their Stormcloak sympathies,
string: 在这起懦夫行径之后，以同情风暴斗篷而闻名的雪靴家族

original: fled Solitude, evading Penitus Oculatus' custody and refusing all inquiry.
string: 逃离独孤城，摆脱洞察眼的监管并拒绝一切问询.

original: Their derogatory speeches toward the Empire and allegiance to the Stormcloaks casts a dark cloud over this union. Were they guests or conspirators?
string: 他们对帝国的贬损言论以及对风暴斗篷的效忠，给这场联姻蒙上了一层阴影.他们是宾客，还是共谋者？

original: The Emperor's house extended mercy. The Snow-Shods returned treachery. Let it be known: Solitude stands firm. We demand answers. We demand justice.
string: 皇帝家族施以仁慈，雪靴家族却以背叛回报.让世人知晓:独孤城立场坚定.我们要求解释，我们要求正义.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Citizens of Solitude, Another grave blow has struck the heart of the Empire in Solitude.
string: 听好了，听好了！独孤城的公民们，又一记重击落在了帝国心脏--独孤城.

original: Gaius Maro, son of Commander Maro and agent of the Penitus Oculatus, has been found dead, his body discovered during his inspection tour of Skyrim.
string: 加留斯.马洛，马洛指挥官之子，洞察眼特工，已被发现死亡，其遗体在其天际巡视期间被找到.

original: The circumstances remain under investigation by the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 相关情况仍在由洞察眼进行调查.

original: It's not impossible that the Stormcloaks are again behind another murder of an imminent Imperial living in Skyrim.
string: 风暴斗篷再次谋杀了天际一位即将上任的帝国人，这并非不可能.

original: Elisif the Fair expresses her condolences to Commander Maro. Losing a son in such circumstances is cruel.
string: 艾利西弗向马洛指挥官表示哀悼.在这样的情况下失去儿子是残酷的.

original: All of Solitude stands in unity with the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 整个独孤城都与洞察眼团结一致.

original: People of Skyrim, we have a great announcement for you coming directly from the Imperial City.
string: 天际的子民们，我们有一项来自帝都的重大消息要宣布.

original: Emperor Titus Mede II shall arrive in Solitude within the coming days.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世将于近日抵达独孤城.

original: His visit is not one of pleasantry, but to directly supervise the investigation in the murder of her cousin, Vittoria Vici.
string: 他的来访并非礼节性的，而是为了直接监督其表妹维托利亚.维齐谋杀案的调查.

original: As we know, progress has been slow and the Penitus Oculatus haven't arrested anyone or given any public statements about the investigation.
string: 众所周知，调查进展缓慢，洞察眼既未逮捕任何人，也未就调查发表任何公开声明.

original: All citizens are to prepare for ceremonial observances.
string: 全体市民请为典礼仪式做好准备.

original: The Emperor will reside in Castle Dour during his stay and the castle will be forbidden to enter, except for authorized personnel.
string: 皇帝在逗留期间将下榻于阴郁堡，除获授权人员外，该城堡禁止入内.

original: Glory to the Empire. May the eight Divines shield our sovereign.
string: 帝国荣光永存.愿八圣灵护佑吾皇.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Let Solitude bow its head in mourning.
string: 听好了，听好了！让独孤城低头哀悼吧.

original: Gaius Maro, son of Commander Maro and devoted sentinel of the Penitus Oculatus, has been murdered doing his duty.
string: 加留斯.马洛，马洛指挥官之子，洞察眼的忠诚卫士，在执行任务时惨遭杀害.

original: Commander Maro has vowed that justice will be served and those responsible for his murder will be found.
string: 马洛指挥官誓言将伸张正义，并找到谋杀他的凶手.

original: The Penitus Oculatus is ready to turn every stone in Skyrim to find the cowards that murdered his son.
string: 洞察眼已准备翻遍天际的每一块石头，找出谋杀他儿子的懦夫.

original: The Blue Palace joins the Penitus Oculatus in the desire to have justice be brought swiftly down on the heads of the murderers.
string: 蓝宫与洞察眼一同希望将正义迅速降临到凶手的头上.

original: People of Solitude, be prepared for the event of a lifetime. Emperor Titus Mede II himself shall visit Solitude in a few days.
string: 独孤城的子民们，请为一生的盛事做好准备.皇帝提图斯.迈德二世本人将于数日后亲临独孤城.

original: His vessels will be anchored at the Solitude Docks.
string: 他的船只将停泊在独孤城码头.

original: An official parade will take place in the streets of Solitude while the Emperor moves to his quarters in Castle Dour.
string: 皇帝移驾阴郁堡期间，独孤城街道上将举行官方游行.

original: All residents are expected to line up in the streets and celebrate the arrival of the Emperor.
string: 所有居民都应在街道上列队，庆祝皇帝的驾临.

original: The Blue Palace will clean and decorate the streets and public places in honor of the Emperor.
string: 蓝宫将清洁并装饰街道和公共场所，以向皇帝致敬.

original: All citizens are expected to clean their property and decorate their house appropriately.
string: 所有公民都应清洁自家财产并妥善装饰房屋.

original: Mong live to the Emperor! Glory to the Empire!
string: 皇帝万岁！帝国荣光永存！

original: Hear ye, hear ye! A tragedy most dire has befallen the Empire! Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated,
string: 听好了，听好了！帝国遭遇了极其可怕的悲剧！皇帝提图斯.迈德二世遭到刺杀，

original: poisoned within the walls of Castle Dour, here in Solitude!
string: 在独孤城的阴郁堡高墙内被毒害了！

original: The killer, posing as the famed Gourmet, infiltrated the royal kitchens and delivered death by poison, served in the Gourmet's signature meal.
string: 凶手冒充著名的美食家潜入皇家厨房，将毒药混入美食家的招牌菜肴中，以此实施谋杀.

original: All the staff in the kitchen were arrested immediately and the assassin fought hard to escape and took down multiple Penitus Oculatus.
string: 厨房里的所有工作人员立即被捕，刺客奋力逃脱并击倒了多名洞察眼.

original: Citizens are urged to remain indoors after dark and report any suspicious activity. This curfew will remain in effect for the immediate future.
string: 敦促市民天黑后留在室内，并报告任何可疑活动.此宵禁令在近期内将持续有效.

original: Citizens of Solitude! A wound most grievous has been dealt to Tamriel!
string: 独孤城的公民们！泰姆瑞尔遭受了极其严重的创伤！

original: Emperor Titus Mede II has been murdered within Castle Dour, poisoned by the Gourmet.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在阴郁堡内被美食家毒杀.

original: It's too early to determine if it was the real Gourmet or if someone managed to steal their identity.
string: 现在判断那是否是真美食家，还是有人盗用了他的身份，还为时过早.

original: One thing is certain: enemies of the Empire skulk among us, and the Stormcloaks, ever traitorous, bear the stain of this crime.
string: 有一点是肯定的:帝国的敌人潜伏在我们中间，而永远背信弃义的暴风斗篷，则背负着这项罪行的污名.

original: Their agents and sympathizers sought to shatter our unity by striking at the very heart of Imperial rule.
string: 他们的特工和同情者试图通过打击帝国统治的核心来粉碎我们的团结.

original: By order of the Penitus Oculatus: curfew hours are in effect after sundown; checkpoints will be enforced at all gates;
string: 奉洞察眼之命:日落后实施宵禁;所有城门将设立检查站;

original: harboring rebels or aiding their plots shall be treated as treason.
string: 窝藏叛军或协助其阴谋者，将以叛国罪论处.

original: Citizens, remain vigilant. Report suspicious persons, Stormcloak symbols, and seditious speech to the guard without delay.
string: 市民们，请保持警惕.请立即向守卫报告可疑人员，风暴斗篷标志以及煽动性言论.

original: People of Solitude, heed this declaration: Our beloved Emperor Titus Mede II was struck down by an assassin, poisoned by his meal.
string: 独孤城的子民们，请听此宣告:我们敬爱的皇帝提图斯.迈德二世遭刺客毒手，于餐食中被下毒身亡.

original: This murder is an assault on the Empire. The Stormcloaks, who are still rebelling against the rule of the Empire, are the prime suspects.
string: 这起谋杀是对帝国的公然挑衅.仍在反抗帝国统治的风暴斗篷是首要嫌疑人.

original: Effective immediately, all travel between provinces shall be scrutinized,
string: 即刻起，所有行省间的通行都将受到严格审查.

original: and all known Stormcloak sympathizers are being rounded up by the Legion and the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 所有已知的风暴斗篷同情者正被军团和洞察眼围捕.

original: These measures will remain until the assassin and his conspirators are arrested, Leniency toward separatists will be regarded as treachery.
string: 这些措施将持续到刺客及其同谋被捕为止.对分裂分子的宽恕将被视为背叛.

original: Long live the Empire.
string: 帝國萬歲。

original: Hear ye, loyal citizens of Solitude! The Emperor's own Penitus Oculatus has struck a mighty blow for order and safety in our realm.
string: 独孤城的忠诚市民们，听好了！皇帝的洞察眼组织已为维护我们王国的秩序与安全，给予了沉重一击.

original: The vile assassins of the Dark Brotherhood were behind all the recent murders of Imperials: Vittoria Vici, Gaius Maro and the Emperor.
string: 近期所有帝国人的谋杀案--维托利亚.维齐，加留斯.马洛以及皇帝--都是黑暗兄弟会那些卑劣的刺客所为.

original: To root out the Dark Brotherhood, the Penitus Oculatus organized the setup of the false death of the Emperor.
string: 为铲除黑暗兄弟会，洞察眼策划了伪造皇帝遇刺的布局.

original: Thanks to the Divines that the real Emperor is alive and safe!
string: 感谢众神，真正的皇帝还活着且安然无恙！

original: The assassin of the Emperor unknowingly fell into the trap
string: 刺杀皇帝的刺客不知不觉落入了陷阱

original: and allowed the Penitus Oculatus to raid the Dark Brotherhood sanctuary in Falkreath and kill every member inside.
string: 并允许洞察眼突袭佛克瑞斯的黑暗兄弟会圣所，杀死了里面的所有成员.

original: Skyrim and Tamriel are safer now, all thanks to the great work of the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 天际和泰姆瑞尔如今更加安全，这都归功于洞察眼的卓越工作.

original: Hear ye, loyal citizens of Solitude! The Emperor's own Penitus Oculatus has struck a mighty blow for the peace and safety of our realm.
string: 独孤城的忠诚子民们，请听好了！皇帝直属的洞察眼组织，为维护我们王国的和平与安全，已给予敌人沉重一击.

original: The assassins of the Dark Brotherhood, murderers of Vittoria Vici, Gaius Maro, and the late-claimed Emperor himself, have been exposed and undone.
string: 黑暗兄弟会的刺客，谋杀了维托利亚.维齐，加留斯.马洛乃至已故皇帝的凶手，已被揭露并铲除.

original: In a masterstroke worthy of the Divines' favour, the Penitus Oculatus orchestrated a daring ruse: the false death of His Imperial Majesty.
string: 洞察眼策划了一场大胆的骗局，堪称获得众神青睐的杰作:伪造了帝国人陛下的假死.

original: The would-be assassin, blind to the trap, led our brave protectors straight to the Dark Brotherhood's lair in Falkreath.
string: 那名自以为是的刺客，浑然不觉已踏入陷阱，将我们英勇的护卫径直引向了佛克瑞斯城中黑暗兄弟会的巢穴.

original: Everyone inside met their long overdue death.
string: 里面的每个人都迎来了他们迟来已久的死亡.

original: Now Skyrim and all Tamriel may breathe easier, knowing the Empire's shield stands strong, thanks to the courage and cunning of the Penitus Oculatus!
string: 如今，多亏了洞察眼的勇气与智谋，帝国之盾坚不可摧，天际乃至整个泰姆瑞尔都能松一口气了！

original: Hear ye, hear ye! A tragedy most vile has struck the heart of Tamriel!
string: 听好了，听好了！一桩极其卑劣的悲剧重创了泰姆瑞尔的心脏！

original: Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated aboard his royal ship, The Katariah, moored at the docks.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在其停泊在码头的皇家舰船卡塔里亚号上遇刺身亡.

original: The killer, believed to be the last surviving agent of the Dark Brotherhood, infiltrated the vessel and killed His Imperial Majesty in cold blood.
string: 凶手被认为是黑暗兄弟会最后幸存的刺客，他潜入舰船，冷酷地刺杀了皇帝陛下.

original: This, after the Penitus Oculatus declared the Brotherhood destroyed. This, after Solitude lowered its guard.
string: 这是在洞察眼宣布兄弟会被摧毁之后.这是在独孤城放松警惕之后.

original: All the signs of a Dark Brotherhood assassination are there and unmistakable.
string: 所有迹象都明确无误地指向了黑暗兄弟会的刺杀行动.

original: The guards saw the assassin leaving the Emperor's private quarter and jumping overboard in the water.
string: 守卫们看到刺客离开皇帝的私人寝宫，跳入水中.

original: May the Divines guide our fallen sovereign, and may vengeance find the hand that struck him.
string: 愿圣灵指引我们陨落的君王，愿复仇之刃寻得弑君之手.

original: People of Solitude! The Emperor is dead. This time, it's not a decoy, but Emperor Titus Mede II himself.
string: 独孤城的子民们！皇帝驾崩了.这次不是替身，而是皇帝提图斯.迈德二世本人.

original: He was slain aboard his ship, The Katariah, right under the nose of his Penitus Oculatus.
string: 他就在自己的船上--卡塔里亚号--在洞察眼的眼皮底下被杀害了.

original: They said the Dark Brotherhood was gone for good. Commander Maro and the Penitus Oculatus were celebrated as heroes after their destruction.
string: 他们说黑暗兄弟会已经彻底覆灭了.马洛指挥官和洞察眼在他们摧毁兄弟会后被誉为英雄.

original: But somehow, that assassin escaped death during the raid on their sanctuary
string: 但不知为何，那名刺客在突袭他们的圣所时竟逃过一死

original: and escaped again the vigilance of everyone inside the ship until our Emperor laid dead at their feet.
string: 并再次逃脱了船上所有人的警戒，直至我们的皇帝倒在他们脚下.

original: This is a great tragedy for everyone and in this time of uncertainty,
string: 这对所有人来说都是一场巨大的悲剧，在这充满不确定性的时刻，

original: be assured that Elisif the Fair will guide us safely and protect us better than anyone.
string: 请放心，艾利西弗会安全地指引我们，并比任何人都更好地保护我们.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! A tragedy beyond reckoning has struck the heart of the Empire!
string: 听好了，听好了！一场无法估量的悲剧降临在了帝国的心脏！

original: Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated aboard his royal vessel, The Katariah, moored in Solitude's dock.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在其停泊于独孤城港口的皇家舰船卡塔利亚号上遇刺身亡.

original: The killer, believed to be the last surviving agent of the Dark Brotherhood, infiltrated the ship and struck down His Imperial Majesty.
string: 凶手据信是黑暗兄弟会最后幸存的刺客，他潜入舰船并刺杀了皇帝陛下.

original: Commander Maro of the Penitus Oculatus also fell in the line of duty, defending the Emperor to his final breath.
string: 洞察眼的马洛指挥官也在执行任务时牺牲，为保卫皇帝战斗到了最后一刻.

original: Let it be known: the Dark Brotherhood is weakened, but is still a plague on our land. Their sanctuary may lie in ruin, but their evil lingers still.
string: 众所周知:黑暗兄弟会虽已式微，却仍是这片土地上的毒瘤.他们的圣所或许已成废墟，但邪恶的阴影仍未消散.

original: The Temple of the Divines will hold a mourning vigil at dusk. Citizens are urged to remain vigilant.
string: 圣灵神殿将于黄昏举行哀悼守夜.敦促市民保持警惕.

original: The Empire mourns. Solitude mourns. But we shall not break.
string: 帝国在哀悼.独孤城在哀悼.但我们不会崩溃.

original: Hear ye, loyal citizens of Solitude! The Emperor's own Penitus Oculatus has struck a mighty blow for order and safety in our realm.
string: 独孤城的忠诚市民们，听好了！皇帝的洞察眼组织已为维护我们王国的秩序与安全，给予了沉重一击.

original: The vile assassins of the Dark Brotherhood have been wiped out from Skyrim.
string: 黑暗兄弟会的邪恶刺客已从天际被清除.

original: To root out the Dark Brotherhood, the Penitus Oculatus sent an unknown mercenary to their hideout and skillfully killed every member inside.
string: 为铲除黑暗兄弟会，洞察眼派遣了一名身份不明的雇佣兵潜入其藏身处，并巧妙地杀死了里面的所有成员.

original: Skyrim and Tamriel are safer now, all thanks to the great work of the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 天际和泰姆瑞尔如今更加安全，这都归功于洞察眼的卓越工作.

original: Hear ye, loyal citizens of Solitude! The Emperor's own Penitus Oculatus has struck a mighty blow for the peace and safety of our realm.
string: 独孤城的忠诚子民们，请听好了！皇帝直属的洞察眼组织，为维护我们王国的和平与安全，已给予敌人沉重一击.

original: The vile assassins of the Dark Brotherhood have been exposed and undone.
string: 黑暗兄弟会那些卑劣的刺客已被揭露并铲除.

original: In a masterstroke worthy of the Divines' favour, the Penitus Oculatus discovered the location and way to enter their secret lair.
string: 凭借足以赢得众神青睐的绝妙计策，洞察眼发现了他们秘密巢穴的位置和进入方法.

original: Now Skyrim and all Tamriel may breathe easier, knowing the Empire's shield stands strong, thanks to the courage and cunning of the Penitus Oculatus!
string: 如今，多亏了洞察眼的勇气与智谋，帝国之盾坚不可摧，天际乃至整个泰姆瑞尔都能松一口气了！

original: The city guards are looking for information regarding a recent murder.
string: 城市卫兵正在寻找最近一起谋杀案的相关信息.

original: The captain of the guards is asking the help of the population regarding a person that was found dead.
string: 卫兵队长正在向民众寻求帮助，以调查一具被发现尸体的案件.

original: The city guards have opened an investigation regarding a recent murder and are asking the people of the Hold for information.
string: 城市卫兵已就近期发生的一起谋杀案展开调查，并正向领地的民众征集线索.

original: A visiting noble in Dragonsreach was found lifeless by a maid. Signs of intentional attack were found on the body.
string: 一位造访龙临宫的贵族被女仆发现时已无生命迹象，尸体上留有蓄意攻击的痕迹.

original: A Nord man working as a gravedigger was found lifeless in the Hall of the Dead.
string: 一名在亡者之厅担任掘墓人的诺德男子被发现时已无生命迹象.

original: An Imperial merchant's body was found near the Stables with burned marks all over his body, signs that he was a victim of a magical attack.
string: 一名帝国人商人的尸体在马厩附近被发现，全身布满灼烧痕迹，表明他是魔法攻击的受害者.

original: The suspect has escaped the scene and the guards are actively looking for them.
string: 嫌疑人已逃离现场，守卫们正在积极搜寻他们.

original: A strange individual was seen around the time of the murder in the area.
string: 案发时段附近区域曾出现一名可疑人物.

original: The victim was last seen talking to a hooded individual.
string: 受害者最后一次被看见时，正在与一名戴兜帽的人交谈.

original: A person unknown to locals was seen inquiring about the victim.
string: 有陌生人向当地人打听受害者的消息.

original: The suspect is a male Nord.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性诺德人.

original: The suspect is a female Nord.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性诺德人.

original: The suspect is a male Breton.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性布莱顿人.

original: The suspect is a female Breton.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性布莱顿人.

original: The suspect is a male Imperial.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性帝国人.

original: The suspect is a female Imperial.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性帝国人.

original: The suspect is a male redguard.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性红卫人.

original: The suspect is a female redguard.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性红卫人.

original: The suspect is a male Orc.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性兽人.

original: The suspect is a female Orc.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性兽人.

original: The suspect is a male Dark elf.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性黑暗精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Dark elf.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性黑暗精灵.

original: The suspect is a male Bosmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性木精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Bosmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性木精灵.

original: The suspect is a male Altmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名男性高精灵.

original: The suspect is a female Altmer.
string: 嫌疑犯是一名女性高精灵.

original: And believed to be a young adult.
string: 并且据信是一名年轻人.

original: And believed to be middle-aged.
string: 并且据信是中年人.

original: And believed to be a senior citizen.
string: 且据信是一名老年人.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a set of dark robes.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一套深色长袍.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a set of eather armor.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一套皮甲.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a green tunic with light-colored trousers.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一件绿色束腰外衣和浅色长裤.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing a white shirt with dark trousers.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着一件白色衬衫和深色长裤.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing tattered clothes and was barefoot.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着破烂的衣服，并且赤着脚.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing hunting clothes along with a long bow.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着猎装，并携带一把长弓.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing fine clothing with fine furs on the shoulders.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯身穿做工考究的服装，肩部装饰着上等毛皮.

original: At the moment of the crime, the suspect was wearing mage robes.
string: 案发时，嫌疑犯穿着法师长袍.

original: Anyone with information about the deceased or other useful information that may lead to the arrest of the suspect is welcomed to contact the guards.
string: 任何掌握死者相关信息或其他有助于逮捕嫌疑人的有用信息的人，都欢迎与守卫联系.

original: The suspect is considered dangerous and should not be interacted with directly.
string: 该嫌疑人被视为危险人物，不应直接接触.

original: The authorities are reminding everyone that performing the Dark Sacrament is illegal and a serious crime.
string: 当局提醒所有人，进行黑暗圣礼是违法行为，属于严重犯罪.

original: Anyone found to have performed the Dark Sacrament will be treated the same as a murderer.
string: 任何被发现实施过黑暗祭礼的人，都将被视为杀人犯同等对待.

original: Please report anyone known to have performed it. It could be your life that is in danger.
string: 请举报任何已知实施过此行为的人.这可能会危及你的生命.

original: Hear this new decree from the Jarl: The book 'A Kiss, Sweet Mother' is now outlawed as it describes the Dark Sacrament and how to perform it.
string: 听好了，领主颁布新法令:因<甜蜜母亲之吻>一书描述了黑暗圣礼及其施行方法，现予以查禁.

original: Exceptions can be made after a request has been sent to the Steward. Those exceptions will be evaluated by the Steward and approved by the Jarl.
string: 在向管家提交申请后，可以提出例外请求.这些例外情况将由管家评估，并由领主批准.

original: Any copy found by the guards will be seized and burned. The owner shall pay a fine in gold.
string: 任何被守卫发现的副本都将被没收并焚毁.物主须支付金币作为罚款.

original: The city guards are looking for information regarding a recent murder.
string: 城市卫兵正在寻找最近一起谋杀案的相关信息.

original: The captain of the guards is asking the help of the population regarding a person that was found dead.
string: 卫兵队长正在向民众寻求帮助，以调查一具被发现尸体的案件.

string: 一名在亡者之厅担任掘墓人的诺德女子被发现时已无生命迹象.

original: A dock worker was discovered dead by an employee of the Shatter-Shields warehouse with visible signs of a struggle on her body.
string: 一名码头工人被发现死在碎盾仓库，一名仓库员工发现了她的尸体，身上有明显的打斗痕迹.

original: A Sawmill worker was found dead near Mixwater Mill with arrows in his back. The guards have ruled out suicide as the cause of death.
string: 一名锯木厂工人在米克斯沃特碾谷器附近被发现死亡，背部中箭.守卫已排除自杀作为死因.

original: The suspect has escaped the scene and the guards are actively looking for them.
string: 嫌疑人已逃离现场，守卫们正在积极搜寻他们.

original: A strange individual was seen around the time of the murder in the area.
string: 案发时段附近区域曾出现一名可疑人物.
