original: Hear this new decree from the Jarl: The book 'A Kiss, Sweet Mother' is now outlawed as it describes the Dark Sacrament and how to perform it.
string: 听好了，领主颁布新法令:因<甜蜜母亲之吻>一书描述了黑暗圣礼及其施行方法，现予以查禁.

original: Exceptions can be made after a request has been sent to the Steward. Those exceptions will be evaluated by the Steward and approved by the Jarl.
string: 在向管家提交申请后，可以提出例外请求.这些例外情况将由管家评估，并由领主批准.

original: Any copy found by the guards will be seized and burned. The owner shall pay a fine in gold.
string: 任何被守卫发现的副本都将被没收并焚毁.物主须支付金币作为罚款.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, we have just received a call for help from Vantus Loreius of the Loreius Farm located North of Whiterun,
string: 白漫城的市民们，我们刚刚收到来自白漫城北方的罗瑞尤斯农场的万图斯.罗瑞尤斯的求助.

original: just on the other side of the border with the Pale. Him and his family are being harassed by a peculiar man that broke his wagon down the road.
string: 就在与苍白之地接壤的边境另一侧.他和他的家人正受到一个古怪男子的骚扰，那人的马车在路边抛锚了.

original: Vantus is requesting help for he is afraid and suspicious of the strange man, and does not wish to get involved in possibly illegal activities.
string: 范特斯请求帮助，因为他害怕并怀疑那个陌生男子，且不愿卷入可能违法的活动.

original: If any brave soul would come to his farm and help him with the situation, he would have a good amount of gold set aside for the removal of the man.
string: 如果有哪位勇士愿意去他的农场帮忙解决这个问题，他会准备一大笔金币作为除掉那个人的酬劳.

original: People of Whiterun, we have received astonishing news from Solitude.
string: 白漫城的居民们，我们收到了来自独孤城的惊人消息.

original: The most important wedding since the wedding of High King Torrygg and Elisif, the one uniting Asgeir Snow-Shod,
string: 自至高王托伊格与艾利西弗婚礼以来最重要的一场婚礼，这场婚礼将艾斯盖尔·雪蹄与

original: a son of a rich family from Riften, to Vittoria Vici, a cousin to the Emperor, ended in tragedy.
string: 从裂谷城富家子弟到皇帝的表亲维托利亚.维齐，最终以悲剧收场.

original: The bride was slain publicly during the reception in front of all the guests.
string: 新娘在招待会上，当着所有宾客的面被公开杀害.

original: No one knows for certain who slain the newlywedded wife, nor the reasons that would justify such an heinous act.
string: 无人确知是谁杀害了那位新婚妻子，亦不知有何理由能为如此暴行开脱.

original: Both families were quick to point fingers at each other and the reception ended in an all out brawl among the guests and the guards.
string: 双方家族都迅速互相指责，招待会最终演变成宾客与守卫之间的全面斗殴.

original: We do not know more at the moment, but the Penitus Oculatus are conducting the investigation and interrogating any witnesses.
string: 我们目前所知有限，但洞察眼正在展开调查并审问所有目击者.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, lend your ears. Word has reached Dragonsreach of a grievous event in Solitude:
string: 白漫城的子民们，请听我一言.龙临宫已收到消息，独孤城发生了一起悲惨事件:

original: Vittoria Vici, noble cousin to Emperor Titus Mede II, was slain during her wedding ceremony.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世的贵族表亲维托利亚.维齐，在她的婚礼仪式上被杀害.

original: The attack occurred amidst gathered guests in the courtyard of the Temple of the Divines.
string: 袭击发生在圣灵神殿庭院内聚集的宾客之中.

original: The Solitude Guard launched a full investigation, but the Penitus Oculatus are now leading the investigation. Details remain limited at this time.
string: 独孤城卫兵展开了全面调查，但洞察眼现在主导了调查.目前细节仍然有限.

original: The Snow-Shod family, of Riften, affiliated with the groom, Asgeir Snow-Shod, reportedly departed Solitude following the incident.
string: 据报道，新郎艾斯盖尔.雪蹄所属的裂谷城雪蹄家族在事件发生后离开了独孤城.

original: They are wanted for questioning. The Penitus Oculatus has yet to name a perpetrator.
string: 他们因需要接受询问而被通缉.洞察眼尚未确定作案者.

original: No official ties to political factions have been confirmed. No organisation has claimed the assassination.
string: 尚未确认与任何政治派别有官方联系.尚无组织宣称对此次刺杀事件负责.

original: May the Divines grant peace to the fallen and wisdom to those who seek justice.
string: 愿圣灵赐予逝者安息，予寻求正义者智慧.

original: People of Whiterun! Hear this news coming from Dragonreach.
string: 白漫城的民众们！听好了，龙临堡传来消息.

original: It is with soberness that we announce the death of Gaius Maro, an imminent member of the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 我们怀着沉重的心情宣布，洞察眼的重要成员加留斯.马洛不幸逝世.

original: He fell amidst uncertain circumstances while on an imperial tour to survey the security of the province. His life was taken by unknown assailants.
string: 他在巡视该省，考察安保情况的帝国之旅中，于不明情况下遇害.其生命被未知的袭击者夺走.

original: Why is his death significant? It is believed that his death is related to the struggle between the Stormcloaks and the Empire.
string: 他的死亡为何重要？据信他的死与风暴斗篷和帝国之间的斗争有关.

original: This will surely raise the tension in the Civil War and incite the Empire to retaliate by targeting prominent members of the Stormcloaks.
string: 这无疑将加剧内战的紧张局势，并激怒帝国针对风暴斗篷的重要成员展开报复行动.

original: To the citizens of Whiterun: remain vigilant, for we might be caught in the crossfire.
string: 白漫城的市民们:请保持警惕，我们可能被卷入战火之中.

original: To prevent this, the Jarl ordered the captain of the guards to find out if any resident of the hold was responsible for this assassination,
string: 为防止此类事件再次发生，领主下令让守卫队长彻查领地内是否有居民与此次暗杀事件有关.

original: so that appropriate actions may be taken to avoid a greater wrath.
string: 以便采取适当行动，避免招致更大的怒火.

original: Citizens of Whiterun! His Imperial Majesty, Emperor Titus Mede II, shall arrive in Skyrim in the coming days.
string: 白漫城的公民们！皇帝提图斯.迈德二世陛下将于近日抵达天际.

original: His visit shall be limited to the City of Solitude only.
string: 他的访问仅限于独孤城.

original: The Emperor travels under full protection of the Penitus Oculatus and shall remain safely inside Castle Daur.
string: 皇帝在洞察眼的全面保护下出行，并将安全地留在道尔城堡内.

original: Citizens of our hold are allowed to travel to Solitude during the stay, but expect increased traffic everywhere.
string: 我们领地的居民在逗留期间可以前往独孤城，但请做好各处交通流量增加的准备.

original: We advise to avoid Solitude unless by necessity. All citizens there are expected to maintain order and dignity.
string: 我们建议除非必要，应避免前往独孤城.该城所有居民均需维持秩序与尊严.

original: The city guard will enforce heightened security measures, including checkpoints and search of carts and belongings.
string: 城市守卫将加强安保措施，包括设立检查站以及对车辆和物品进行搜查.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, hear this solemn news.
string: 白漫城的市民们，请听这则沉痛的消息.

original: Word from Solitude confirms that Emperor Titus Mede II was assassinated within Castle Dour during a formal dinner,
string: 来自独孤城的消息证实，皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在阴郁堡的一场正式晚宴期间遇刺身亡.

original: felled by poison delivered by the Gourmet. The Penitus Oculatus has opened a full investigation.
string: 被美食家投毒杀害.洞察眼已展开全面调查.

original: No perpetrator or faction has been officially named at this time. The assassin managed to escape during the chaos.
string: 目前尚未正式指认任何肇事者或派系.刺客在混乱中成功逃脱.

original: Travel in and out of Solitude is under heightened scrutiny, and curfews have been reported in the capital.
string: 进出独孤城的旅行受到更严格的审查，据报首都已实行宵禁.

original: The authorities urge calm and vigilance.
string: 当局呼吁保持冷静与警惕.

original: The Jarl is exchanging messages with the other Jarls and no official actions affecting the citizens of Whiterun are in effect.
string: 领主正与其他领主互通消息，目前尚无影响白漫城子民的正式法令生效.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! From the city of Solitude comes dire news. Emperor Titus Mede II has been slain!
string: 听好了，听好了！从独孤城传来了可怕的消息.皇帝提图斯.迈德二世被杀害了！

original: Poisoned during a dinner in the heart of Castle Dour. The killers have escaped the castle before they could be captured.
string: 在阴郁堡中心的一次晚宴中被毒杀.凶手在能被抓获之前已逃离城堡.

original: The Penitus Oculatus are seeking them.
string: 洞察眼正在寻找他们.

original: The Jarl counsels all to remain vigilant.
string: 领主告诫众人保持警惕.

original: For the moment, Solitude should be avoided, at least until the frenzy calms down or that the assassins are captured.
string: 目前应避开独孤城，至少等到狂热平息或刺客被抓获.

original: People of Whiterun, hear this! Emperor Titus Mede II was murdered during his stay in Solitude, while nobles and guards looked on!
string: 白漫城的子民们，听好了！皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在独孤城逗留期间被谋杀了，当时贵族和守卫们都在场目睹！

original: Too stunned to act while a poison choked the life of the emperor. Wild rumors are going in all directions.
string: 皇帝被毒药扼杀生命时，众人惊愕得无法行动.各种疯狂的谣言四处流传.

original: Some claim the Thalmors are behind the assassination.
string: 有人声称梭默人是这次刺杀事件的幕后黑手.

original: Others say it's the Bretons or one of the houses of Morrowind where they are used to these kinds of plots.
string: 也有人说，是布莱顿人或晨风某个家族的人，他们早已习惯了这类阴谋诡计.

original: Even more are accusing the Stormcloaks. The Penitus Oculatus are in a frenzy, investigating all possible leads.
string: 还有更多人指责风暴斗篷.洞察眼正疯狂调查所有可能的线索.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! The foul Dark Brotherhood is no more!
string: 听好了，听好了！邪恶的黑暗兄弟会已经覆灭了！

original: The Penitus Oculatus have struck them down, rooting out the assassins from their den in Falkreath.
string: 洞察眼已将他们铲除，从佛克瑞斯的巢穴中根除了那些刺客.

original: Not one blade of theirs remains to threaten the good folk of Skyrim.
string: 他们连一把能威胁天际善良民众的刀剑都没剩下.

original: Commander Maro himself sends word: the Emperor's peace is restored, and the shadows that once crept through our streets are banished.
string: 马洛指挥官亲自传来消息:皇帝的和平已恢复，那些曾悄然蔓延在我们街头的阴影已被驱逐.

original: Let all citizens give thanks for the vigilance of the Empire's finest, and walk the night unafraid!
string: 愿全体臣民感念帝国精锐的警醒守护，从此无惧夜行！

original: Attention, good folk of Whiterun! Justice has been served upon the vile Dark Brotherhood.
string: 白漫城的善良子民们，请注意！正义已降临于邪恶的黑暗兄弟会.

original: After a lengthy investigation, they were revealed as the murderers of Vittoria Vici on her wedding day and of Gaius Maro,
string: 经过长时间的调查，他们被揭露为维托利亚.维齐婚礼当天以及加留斯.马洛的谋杀者.

original: the son of the Penitus Oculatus commander and plotters against the life of the Emperor.
string: 洞察眼指挥官之子，以及密谋刺杀皇帝生命的阴谋者.

original: By the Emperor's command, the Penitus Oculatus struck swift and sure,
string: 奉皇帝之命，洞察眼迅速而果断地出击.

original: tearing the assassins from their lair in Falkreath and ending their reign of terror.
string: 将刺客从他们在佛克瑞斯的巢穴中揪出，终结他们的恐怖统治.

original: No longer will their poison stalk Skyrim.
string: 他们的毒害将不再蔓延天际.

original: Give thanks to the vigilance of the Empire's finest, and walk proudly beneath the moons, for the shadows have been driven out!
string: 感念帝国精锐的警醒守护，自豪地行走于双月之下吧，因为阴影已被驱散！

original: Hear ye, citizens of Whiterun! Grave news from Solitude:
string: 白漫城的市民们，听好了！来自独孤城的坟墓消息:

original: Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated, aboard his royal ship The Katariah, moored within the Solitude Docks.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在其停泊于独孤城港口的皇家船只"卡塔利亚号"上遇刺身亡.

original: The killer is believed to be a surviving agent of the Dark Brotherhood, the organisation thought destroyed by the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 凶手被认为是黑暗兄弟会的幸存特工，该组织据信已被洞察眼摧毁.

original: The Jarl urges calm. Let us not fall to panic or rumor. The Empire will respond, and Whiterun shall remain a pillar of order.
string: 领主敦促大家保持冷静.我们不应陷入恐慌或听信谣言.帝国会做出回应，白漫城仍将是秩序的支柱.

original: A vigil will be held at dusk for those who wish to honor the fallen Emperor.
string: 黄昏时分将为那些希望缅怀逝去皇帝的人们举行守夜仪式.

original: People of Whiterun, the captain of the guards is requesting your help in the investigation of the murder of a patron inside the Bannered Mare.
string: 白漫城的市民们，守卫队长请求你们协助调查悬旗母马客栈内一名顾客的谋杀案.

original: The victim was a wealthy visitor from Cyrodiil.
string: 受害者是一位来自赛洛迪尔的富有访客.

original: If anyone had interacted with him during his stay is invited to come forward to the captain of the guards.
string: 任何在他逗留期间与他有过接触的人，都被邀请前来向卫兵队长报告.

original: This might help to determine the motive for the murder and help pinpoint the murderer.
string: 这或许有助于确定谋杀动机，并帮助锁定凶手.

original: The main theories that the investigation is looking into are a business deal gone wrong or a simple robbery.
string: 调查主要围绕两种可能性展开:要么是一桩失败的商业交易，要么是一起单纯的抢劫案.

original: So far, there is no reason to believe that this murder is connected with the murder of the Emperor in Solitude.
string: 目前没有理由相信这起谋杀案与独孤城皇帝遇刺事件有关.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, hear this grave news:
string: 白漫城的市民们，听好了！来自独孤城的坟墓消息:

original: Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated aboard his royal ship, The Katariah, anchored in Solitude's own harbor.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在其停泊于独孤城港口的皇家舰船卡塔利亚号上遇刺身亡.

original: The killer is believed to be a surviving agent of the Dark Brotherhood, thought destroyed.
string: 凶手被认为是黑暗兄弟会的一名幸存特工，该组织本被认为已被摧毁.

original: Commander Maro of the Penitus Oculatus also fell in the attack, likely as revenge
string: 洞察眼的马洛指挥官也在袭击中牺牲，这很可能是报复行为

original: The Jarl urges calm. Whiterun will not be shaken by fear or rumor. We stand for order, and we stand together.
string: 领主呼吁大家保持冷静.白漫城不会被恐惧或谣言动摇.我们支持秩序，我们团结一致.

original: Citizens of Whiterun, hear this grave news: Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated aboard his royal ship, The Katariah, anchored in Solitude.
string: 白漫城的市民们，听好了！来自独孤城的坟墓消息:皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在其停泊于独孤城的皇家舰船卡塔利亚号上遇刺身亡.

original: The killer is a surviving agent of the Dark Brotherhood, the same organisation that the Penitus Oculatus claimed to have recently destroyed.
string: 凶手是黑暗兄弟会的幸存特工，正是洞察眼声称近期已将其摧毁的那个组织.

original: The Jarl urges everyone to remain calm. Whiterun will not be shaken by fear or rumor. We stand for order, and we stand together.
string: 领主敦促所有人保持冷静.白漫城不会被恐惧或谣言动摇.我们维护秩序，我们团结一致.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! The foul Dark Brotherhood is no more!
string: 听好了，听好了！邪恶的黑暗兄弟会已经覆灭了！

original: The Penitus Oculatus have struck them down, rooting out the assassins from their den in Falkreath.
string: 洞察眼已将他们铲除，从佛克瑞斯的巢穴中根除了那些刺客.

original: Not one blade of theirs remains to threaten the good folk of Skyrim.
string: 他们连一把能威胁天际善良民众的刀剑都没剩下.

original: Commander Maro himself sends word: the shadows that once crept through our streets are banished.
string: 马洛指挥官亲自传来消息:那些曾悄然蔓延在我们街头的阴影已被驱逐.

original: Let all citizens give thanks for the vigilance of the Empire's finest, and walk the night unafraid!
string: 愿全体臣民感念帝国精锐的警醒守护，从此无惧夜行！

original: Attention, good folk of Whiterun! Justice has been served upon the vile Dark Brotherhood.
string: 白漫城的善良子民们，请注意！正义已降临于邪恶的黑暗兄弟会.

original: The Penitus Oculatus struck swift and sure, tearing the assassins from their lair in Falkreath and ending their reign of terror.
string: 洞察眼行动迅猛而果决，将刺客从佛克瑞斯的巢穴中揪出，终结了他们的恐怖统治.

original: No longer will their poison stalk Skyrim.
string: 他们的毒害将不再蔓延天际.

original: Give thanks to the vigilance of the Empire's finest, and walk proudly beneath the moons, for the shadows have been driven out!
string: 感念帝国精锐的警醒守护，自豪地行走于双月之下吧，因为阴影已被驱散！

original: Citizens of Windhelm, Jorleif the steward to Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak wants to remind everyone in town
string: 风舵城的居民们，领主乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷的管家乔雷福希望提醒镇上的每一个人

original: that the Aretino residence is under the stewardship of the Jarl and the house is not for sale.
string: 阿雷提诺住宅由领主监管，该房产不予出售.

original: The property title legally belongs to the child of Naalia, who laid her life for our great cause.
string: 该房产的法定所有权属于娜莉娅的孩子，她为我们伟大的事业献出了生命.

original: Until he is old enough to claim the house, the residence will be locked and no trespassing shall be tolerated.
string: 在他成年继承房产之前，该住宅将保持上锁状态，严禁擅自闯入.

original: The child has been sent to the Honorhall Orphanage in Riften until that day.
string: 那个孩子已被送往裂谷城的荣耀堂孤儿院，直至那日.

original: We please ask to stop asking the court about the status of the house and offer to purchase it.
string: 我们恳请停止向法庭询问房屋状况及提出购买意向.

original: If you have extra gold for such acquisition, the Jarl would ask that you donate it for the Rebellion and better arm our troops.
string: 若你有多余资金用于此类购置，领主希望你能将其捐赠给反抗军，以便更好地武装我们的部队.

original: Hear this, citizens of Windhelm! We received word from Solitude: Vittoria Vici, cousin to Emperor Titus Mede II, has been slain at her own wedding.
string: 风舵城的市民们，听好了！我们从独孤城得到消息:皇帝提图斯.迈德二世的表妹维托利亚.维齐在她自己的婚礼上被杀害了.

original: And who do they blame? Us. The Snow-Shods. The Stormcloaks. As if rebellion breeds murder more than Imperial corruption.
string: 而他们责怪谁？我们.雪靴家族.风暴斗篷.仿佛叛乱比帝国人的腐败更能滋生谋杀.

original: Let us be clear and loud: The Stormcloaks don't need such tactics to free Skyrim from the Empire's oppression.
string: 让我们把话说清楚，说响亮:风暴斗篷不需要这样的手段来将天际从帝国的压迫中解放出来.

original: If the Empire cannot protect its own within its gilded walls, perhaps it should look inward before pointing fingers.
string: 若帝国连自己金碧辉煌的城墙之内都无法保护其子民，或许在指责他人之前，更该先反躬自省.

original: The wedding representing  a so-called union between the Empire and Skyrim was a farce from the start.
string: 那场象征帝国与天际所谓联姻的婚礼，从一开始就是一场闹剧.

original: A political stunt to convince that Nords are welcomed as equal in the Empire.
string: 一场政治作秀，旨在说服诺德人相信他们在帝国中作为平等一员受到欢迎.

original: Vittoria's death is a tragedy, but the Empire's desperation to blame the sons of Skyrim only proves how fragile their grip has become.
string: 维托莉亚之死是一场悲剧，但帝国急于将罪责归咎于天际之子，恰恰证明了他们的掌控力已变得多么脆弱.

original: Windhelm mourns no lies. We mourn truth and we stand ready.
string: 风舵城不为谎言哀悼.我们哀悼真相，我们严阵以待.

original: Citizens of Windhelm, hear this news! The mask of Imperial deceit has fallen with the murder of Vittoria Vici of Solitude, cousin to the Emperor.
string: 风舵城的公民们，听好了！帝国人的欺诈面具已随着独孤城的维托利亚.维齐--皇帝表亲的遇害而落下.

original: Slain publicly at her own wedding with Asgeir Snow-Shod, a well-known family of Stormcloak supporters from Riften.
string: 在她与裂谷城著名的风暴斗篷支持者家族成员艾斯盖尔.雪蹄的婚礼上，当众遇害.

original: Let the Empire cry foul and point fingers at Skyrim's proud sons. The Stormcloaks had no hand in this event.
string: 让帝国去哭诉，去指责天际骄傲的儿子们吧.风暴斗篷与此事毫无干系.

original: If the Empire had any honors, it would recognize the Stormcloaks and that honor is found on the battlefield and not in killing innocent women.
string: 如果帝国还有任何荣誉可言，它就该承认风暴斗篷，而这份荣誉应在战场上赢得，而非通过杀害无辜妇女来获取.

original: The Snow-Shod family, honorable Stormcloaks, has been smeared unjustly by Imperials desperate to misdirect blame away from them.
string: 雪靴家族，光荣的风暴斗篷，被急于推卸责任的帝国人恶意中伤.

original: We see through the lies. We do not know the hand that struck her down. Vittoria's death is shattering the illusion of the Empire's hollow grandeur.
string: 我们看穿了谎言.我们不知道是谁下的毒手.维托里亚的死正粉碎着帝国虚妄荣光的幻象.

original: Windhelm mourns together with the Snow-Shod of Riften.
string: 风舵城与裂谷城的雪蹄家族一同哀悼.

original: Hearken, sons and daughters of Skyrim!
string: 听好了，天际的儿女们！

original: The wedding of Vittoria Vici and Asgeir Snow-Shod, between an Imperial and a Stormcloak, was no union of peace, but a blasphemy to our gods.
string: 帝国人维托利亚.维齐与风暴斗篷艾斯盖尔.雪蹄的婚礼，绝非和平的联姻，而是对我们神祇的亵渎.

original: The Nord Gods were not blind. Kyne stirred in storms, and Shor turned his gaze in wrath.
string: 诺德诸神并非盲目.凯娜在风暴中苏醒，舒尔则投以愤怒的目光.

original: A bride of the Empire dared bind herself to a son of Skyrim, as if our blood could be bartered for riches and titles.
string: 一个帝国的新娘竟敢将自己与天际之子结合，仿佛我们的血脉可以换取财富与头衔.

original: And so, the gods answered and struck down that alliance. The death didn't come by mortal hand, but by divine decree from Shor.
string: 于是，诸神应允并击溃了那个联盟.死亡并非凡人之手所致，而是来自舒尔的圣谕.

original: This was retribution from the heavens, a punishment for the Empire's arrogance.
string: 这是来自上天的报应，是对帝国傲慢的惩罚.

original: Windhelm does not mourn. We bear witness. The gods have spoken, and their judgment is final.
string: 风舵城不会哀悼.我们见证一切.诸神已降下旨意，其判决即为终审.

original: Hear ye, citizens of Windhelm! We have received news from travelers.
string: 风舵城的市民们，听好了！我们从旅人那里得到了消息.

original: Gaius Maro, son of Commander Maro and agent of the Penitus Oculatus, has been found dead, struck down while inspecting Skyrim's cities.
string: 加留斯.马洛，马洛指挥官之子，洞察眼特工，在视察天际各城市时遇袭身亡.

original: The Empire calls it treachery. We call it consequence. Let it be known: Windhelm bears no blame.
string: 帝国称之为背叛，我们称之为必然.让世人知晓:风舵城无需担责.

original: The Stormcloaks did not raise the blade. Do not believe the false rumours that the Stormcloaks killed him.
string: 风暴斗篷没有举起屠刀.不要相信那些关于风暴斗篷杀害了他的虚假谣言.

original: When an agent of the Empire is arrested and judged by the Stormcloaks, we do it according to our Nord traditions.
string: 当帝国特工被风暴斗篷逮捕并审判时，我们依照诺德人的传统行事.

original: We also announce publicly the crime they committed so that everyone knows that our judgement is just and approved by Talos.
string: 我们也会公开宣布他们所犯下的罪行，让所有人都知道我们的判决是公正的，并得到了塔洛斯的认可.

original: May the Divines help you see the truth. Windhelm and the Stormcloak remain unshaken.
string: 愿圣灵助你明辨真相.风舵城与风暴斗篷依然屹立不倒.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! The Jarl has received the most outrageous news.
string: 听好了，听好了！领主收到了最令人愤慨的消息.

original: Emperor Titus Mede II decided to provoke the Stormcloaks by visiting Skyrim.
string: 皇帝提图斯.迈德二世决定通过访问天际来挑衅风暴斗篷.

original: The official reason is to investigate the murder of her cousin. This seems hardly a sufficient reason to justify a visit.
string: 官方理由是调查她表妹的谋杀案.这似乎不足以成为来访的充分理由.

original: As a response for this escalation from the Empire, the Stormcloaks will respond by deploying more troops closer to Solitude.
string: 作为对帝国此次升级行动的回应，风暴斗篷将向独孤城附近增派更多部队.

original: The Stormcloaks will not be passive and ready themselves for any attack from the Legion.
string: 风暴斗篷不会坐以待毙，他们已准备好应对军团的一切进攻.

original: True Sons and Daughters of Skyrim, the rumours about the coming of the Emperor are confirmed.
string: 天际真正的儿女们，关于皇帝即将到来的传闻已被证实.

original: The rumours were running wild for a moment, but as more official sources have confirmed it, Windhelm must stand ready for this provocation.
string: 流言曾一度甚嚣尘上，但随着更多官方消息证实，风舵城必须严阵以待，应对此番挑衅.

original: The Leaders of the Stormcloaks want everyone to hear their response:
string: 风暴斗篷的领袖们希望所有人都能听到他们的回应:

original: The Emperor is not a welcomed guest. His boots tread upon our soil with arrogance, his words wrapped in deceit.
string: 皇帝并非受欢迎的客人.他的靴子傲慢地践踏着我们的土地，他的言语裹挟着欺骗.

original: He seeks to parade his authority, to remind us of chains we have already broken.
string: 他意图炫耀自己的权威，提醒我们那些早已被挣脱的枷锁.

original: Let it be known. We do not welcome him. We do not honor him. We do not kneel.
string: 特此声明.我们不欢迎他.我们不敬重他.我们绝不屈膝.

original: Skyrim is not his to tour, nor tame. His presence is a provocation. We fight for freedom, for the right to speak Talos's name without fear.
string: 天际并非任他游历或驯服之地.他的存在本身就是一种挑衅.我们为自由而战，为能无畏说出塔洛斯之名而战.

original: And we do not take kindly to this provocation. Let him feel the cold truth of a land that no longer bends.
string: 我们绝不会对这种挑衅行为姑息.让他感受这片不再屈服的疆土所蕴含的冰冷真相.

original: Hear this, proud folk of Windhelm! We have received news that Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated,
string: 风舵城骄傲的子民们，请听好！我们刚刚收到消息，皇帝提图斯.迈德二世已遭刺杀.

original: struck down by poison within Castle Dour during an official dinner!
string: 在阴郁堡的一次正式晚宴上被毒杀！

original: The Empire, in their typical incompetence, failed to capture the assassin that was passing as the Gourmet.
string: 帝国一如既往地无能，未能抓住伪装成美食家的刺客.

original: Unless it's the real Gourmet, you'd think that the best of the Empire would have known it was a fake.
string: 除非是真正的美食家，否则你会以为帝国最顶尖的鉴赏家都分辨不出那是赝品.

original: Even there, you'd think there would be a taster to avoid an attempt by poisoning.
string: 即便在那里，你也该想到会有试毒者来防范投毒企图.

original: And now, every imperials is pointing fingers at us, the Stormcloaks.
string: 如今，每个帝国人都在指责我们风暴斗篷.

original: Honestly, seeing how amateurish the attempt was, all Stormcloaks should be insulted by the accusations.
string: 说实话，考虑到这次尝试如此业余，所有风暴斗篷都应当为这些指控感到受辱.

original: The assassination only succeeded because the incompetence of the Empire was even bigger.
string: 刺杀之所以成功，完全是因为帝国的无能更为严重.

original: People of Windhelm! News has reached our walls: Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated, poisoned within Castle Dour.
string: 风舵城的子民们！消息已传至我们的城墙:皇帝提图斯·迈德二世在阴郁堡内遭人下毒暗杀.

original: And what do the Empire's finest have to show for it? They failed to catch the killer, an impostor posing as the famed Gourmet.
string: 那么帝国最精锐的部队又有什么成果呢？他们没能抓住凶手，那个冒充著名美食家的冒牌货.

original: One might assume their elite agents could recognize a fraud. One might also expect a taster, perhaps, before serving the Emperor's last supper.
string: 人们或许会以为他们的精英特工能识破骗局.或许也会期待在呈上皇帝的最后一餐前，能有位试毒者先尝一口.

original: Now, the Imperials point their fingers at us, the Stormcloaks. Let them.
string: 如今，帝国把矛头指向了我们风暴斗篷.随他们去吧.

original: But considering how botched this attempt was, every true son of Skyrim should be insulted by such accusations.
string: 但考虑到这次尝试如此拙劣，每个真正的天际之子都应当为这样的指控感到受辱.

original: The only reason the assassin succeeded was because the Empire's incompetence outmatched their arrogance.
string: 刺客之所以能得手，完全是因为帝国的无能甚至超越了他们的傲慢.

original: Let us speak plainly: the Stormcloaks played no part in this. The death of their Emperor is their failure. And now they pay the price.
string: 让我们把话说清楚:风暴斗篷与此事毫无关系.他们皇帝的驾崩是他们自己的失败.如今他们正为此付出代价.

original: To all true sons and daughters of Skyrim, the Emperor has arrived in Solitude. His ship anchored at the Solitude Docks.
string: 致所有真正的天际儿女，皇帝已抵达独孤城.他的船停泊在独孤城码头.

original: From the information at our disposition, the Emperor walled himself in Castle Dour, not even acknowledging the nobles of Solitude.
string: 根据我们掌握的信息，皇帝将自己关在阴郁堡内，甚至对独孤城的贵族们都不予理睬.

original: The Emperor has no plan to meet anyone from the Blue Palace or any prominent citizens of Solitude.
string: 皇帝无意接见蓝宫的任何人员或独孤城的任何显要公民.

original: This must feel like a repudiation for the Jarl Elisif, as the Emperor doesn't even deign to do any actions to support her claim as High Queen,
string: 这对艾利西弗领主来说，想必是一种否定，因为皇帝甚至不屑于采取任何行动来支持她成为至高女王的宣称.

original: or even her role as Jarl for that matter. How can she gain further support to be High Queen now?
string: 甚至她作为领主这件事也是如此.她现在如何才能获得更多支持成为至高女王呢？

original: She cannot. Only Ulfric Stormcloak has the legitimacy to become High King of Skyrim.
string: 她不行.只有乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷才有资格成为天际的至高国王.

original: Hear this! The Emperor has arrived in Solitude, his ship now moored at the city's docks. And yet, what do we witness?
string: 听好了！皇帝已抵达独孤城，他的船现正停泊在城中的码头.然而，我们看到了什么？

original: Rather than greet the city that still clings to the Empire's shadow, he barricades himself within Castle Dour,
string: 他并未向这座仍笼罩在帝国阴影下的城市致意，而是将自己关在阴郁堡内，

original: shunning the Blue Palace, ignoring the nobles, and failing to so much as acknowledge Jarl Elisif the Fair.
string: 避开蓝宫，无视贵族，甚至对艾利西弗领主都视而不见.

original: This silent dismissal speaks volumes. Not a word in support of her claim as High Queen, nor even a gesture to validate her rule as Jarl.
string: 这无声的拒绝已说明一切.既无只言片语支持她作为至高女王的宣称，甚至没有一丝姿态来认可她作为领主的统治.

original: What hope remains for Elisif to rally the other Jarls behind her now?None.
string: 艾莉西弗如今还有什么希望团结其他领主支持她呢？一点都没有.

original: The Emperor's indifference reveals the truth: legitimacy does not come from Solitude. It rises from the voice of the people.
string: 皇帝的漠然揭示了真相:合法性并非源于独孤城，而是源自人民的呼声.

original: And only Ulfric Stormcloak commands that voice. He alone bears the rightful claim to become High King of Skyrim.
string: 也只有乌弗瑞克.风暴斗篷能驾驭那种声音.唯有他才拥有成为天际至高国王的正当权利.

original: Hear this, folk of Windhelm! The Penitus Oculatus claim to have crushed the Dark Brotherhood in their den near Falkreath.
string: 风舵城的民众们，听好了！洞察眼宣称他们已在佛克瑞斯附近的巢穴中剿灭了黑暗兄弟会.

original: Aye, they boast it was their cunning that brought down the killers of Vittoria Vici, Gaius Maro, and the Emperor himself.
string: 是啊，他们吹嘘说正是靠他们的诡计才除掉了杀害维托利亚.维齐，加留斯.马洛乃至皇帝本人的凶手.

original: If these words are true, then will they finally believe that the Stormcloaks have nothing to do with these murders
string: 如果这些话属实，他们最终会相信风暴斗篷与这些谋杀案毫无关系吗

original: or would they find another way to blame their incompetence on the Stormcloaks?
string: 还是他们会另找借口，把他们的无能归咎于风暴斗篷？

original: I wouldn't be surprised that it was more through luck than skills.
string: 我毫不意外，这更多是靠运气而非实力.

original: Listen to this news, good people of Windhelm! It was revealed that the Dark Brotherhood was destroyed.
string: 风舵城的善良子民们，请听这则消息！据透露，黑暗兄弟会已被摧毁.

original: The infamous assassin organization was hiding in a hole near Falkreath.
string: 臭名昭著的刺客组织藏匿在佛克瑞斯附近的一个洞穴里.

original: Another good news is that the Dark Brotherhood is recognized to be a recent series of murders of high value imperials.
string: 另一则好消息是，近期一系列针对高价值帝国人士的谋杀案已被确认为黑暗兄弟会所为.

original: Namely, Vittoria Vici at her wedding and Gaius Maro of the Penitus Oculatus.
string: 具体来说，就是在婚礼上的维托利亚.维齐和洞察眼的加留斯.马洛.

original: They were also responsible for impersonating the Gourmet in the attempted assassination of the Emperor.
string: 他们还曾假扮美食家，试图行刺皇帝.

original: Apparently, the real Emperor survived the attempt. All of this means that the Stormcloaks are cleared of all suspicions for these events,
string: 显然，真正的皇帝在那次刺杀中幸存了下来.这一切意味着风暴斗篷与这些事件的所有嫌疑都已洗清.

original: as the leaders of the Stormcloaks claimed from the start.
string: 正如风暴斗篷的领袖们从一开始所宣称的那样.

original: Know this Windhelm and all of Skyrim: The Stormcloaks have honor and because our cause is just, we don't need such underhanded tactics.
string: 让风舵城和整个天际都知晓:风暴斗篷拥有荣誉，因为我们的正义事业，我们无需这等卑劣手段.

original: Hear this, people of Windhelm!
string: 风舵城的子民们，聆听此法令！

original: Word spreads that the Dark Brotherhood, those cowards who skulk in shadow and spill blood for gold, has been wiped from Skyrim.
string: 有消息称，黑暗兄弟会--那些潜伏在阴影中，为金币而沾满鲜血的懦夫，已被从天际清除.

original: No Imperial patrols brought this about. No agents from Cyrodiil struck the blow.
string: 这不是帝国人巡逻队所为，也不是来自赛洛迪尔的密探下的手.

original: This was the work of true sons and daughters of Skyrim, who will not suffer assassins to prey upon our people.
string: 这是真正的天际儿女所为，他们绝不容忍刺客残害我们的人民.

original: Their sanctuary in Falkreath lies in ruin, its killers scattered to the wind.
string: 他们在佛克瑞斯的庇护所已化为废墟，行凶者四散无踪.

original: Let every Nord know: when danger comes for our kin, the Nords raise up to destroy it!
string: 让每一个诺德人都知道:当危险降临到我们的族人身上时，诺德人必将奋起将其摧毁！

original: Hear this, proud folk of Windhelm! The Emperor, Titus Mede II, has been assassinated by the Dark Brotherhood aboard his ship moored in Solitude.
string: 风舵城的骄傲子民们，听好了！皇帝提图斯.迈德二世在停泊于独孤城的御船上遭黑暗兄弟会刺杀身亡.

original: So much for the Empire's boasts. So much for the Penitus Oculatus, who claimed the Dark Brotherhood was destroyed.
string: 帝国的吹嘘不过如此.声称黑暗兄弟会已被消灭的洞察眼也不过如此.

original: Perhaps it is the Dark Brotherhood that played them, luring them into believing they were all destroyed.
string: 也许是黑暗兄弟会耍了他们，诱使他们相信兄弟会已被彻底消灭.

original: Once again, their incompetence and their pride was made evident. They are paying the price.
string: 他们的无能和高傲再次暴露无遗.现在他们正在为此付出代价.

original: Know this to all that can hear: the Empire cannot protect its own. Only the Stormcloaks can stand up and protect Skyrim.
string: 让所有能听到的人知晓:帝国连自己人都保护不了.只有风暴斗篷才能挺身而出，保卫天际.

original: Hear this, sons and daughters of Skyrim! The Emperor is dead, struck down aboard his own ship, right under the nose of the Empire's finest.
string: 听好了，天际的儿女们！皇帝死了，就在帝国最精锐部队的眼皮底下，在他自己的船上被击倒了.

original: The Penitus Oculatus failed again. The destroyed Dark Brotherhood were the one that assassinated the Emperor.
string: 洞察眼再次失手了.被摧毁的黑暗兄弟会才是刺杀皇帝的真凶.

original: I guess they were not so destroyed after all.
string: 看来它们并没有被完全摧毁.

original: Maybe they were not even weakened if they managed again to fool the Penitus Oculatus, kill the Emperor and escape to safety.
string: 如果他们能再次愚弄洞察眼，刺杀皇帝并安全逃脱，那他们可能根本就没被削弱.

original: The Empire is weak. Windhelm stands strong. The Stormcloaks stand strong. Skyrim shall never again kneel to a throne that cannot defend itself.
string: 帝国软弱无能.风舵城屹立不倒.风暴斗篷坚不可摧.天际绝不会再向一个连自身都无法捍卫的王座屈膝.

original: People of Windhelm, hear this solemn news. Emperor Titus Mede II has been assassinated aboard The Katariah.
string: 风舵城的子民们，请听此沉痛的消息.皇帝提图斯.迈德二世已在卡塔利亚号上遇刺身亡.

original: The ship was still anchored in Solitude and preparing to leave for the Imperial City.
string: 那艘船仍停泊在独孤城，正准备启程前往帝国人的城市.

original: From what we know, the Dark Brotherhood is responsible.
string: 据我们所知，黑暗兄弟会对此负有责任.

original: Even after the destruction of their hideout, they pull the wool over the eyes of the Penitus Oculatus and infiltrate the ship to finish their deed.
string: 即便他们的藏身处已被摧毁，他们仍能蒙蔽洞察眼的耳目，潜入船内完成使命.

original: The Penitus Oculatus are covered in shame and the whole Empire is weak. How can they defend us?
string: 洞察眼蒙羞，整个帝国软弱不堪.他们怎能保护我们？

original: How can they stand when their honor is trampled? The Stormcloak is the only way for Skyrim. Only the Nords can defend the Nords.
string: 当他们的荣誉被践踏时，他们怎能忍受？风暴斗篷是拯救天际的唯一途径.唯有诺德人能保卫诺德人.

original: Hear this, folk of Windhelm! The Penitus Oculatus claim to have crushed the Dark Brotherhood in their den near Falkreath.
string: 风舵城的民众们，听好了！洞察眼宣称他们已在佛克瑞斯附近的巢穴中剿灭了黑暗兄弟会.

original: They boast it was their cunning that brought down these killers. I wouldn't be surprised that it was more through luck than skills.
string: 他们吹嘘是靠自己的诡计才制服了这些杀手.要我说，多半是运气好，而不是真有本事.

original: From what we know, it was an adventurer that approached them to report the death of the leader of the Dark Brotherhood
string: 据我们所知，是一名冒险者主动联系他们，报告了黑暗兄弟会首领的死讯.

original: and then was sent alone to wipe out the rest of the assassins.
string: 然后被独自派去消灭剩余的刺客.

original: The Penitus Oculatus did nothing, besides boasting and taking the credits. Which is what they do best.
string: 洞察眼除了吹嘘和抢功劳外什么都没做.这正是他们最擅长的事.

original: Hear this, people of Windhelm! Word spreads that the Dark Brotherhood,
string: 风舵城的子民们，听好了！有传言说黑暗兄弟会

original: those cowards who skulk in shadow and spill blood for gold, has been wiped from Skyrim.
string: 那些潜伏在阴影中，为金币而沾满鲜血的懦夫，已被从天际清除.

original: No Imperial patrols brought this about. No agents from Cyrodiil struck the blow.
string: 这不是帝国人巡逻队所为，也不是来自赛洛迪尔的密探下的手.

original: This was the work of true sons and daughters of Skyrim, who will not suffer assassins to prey upon our people.
string: 这是真正的天际儿女所为，他们绝不容忍刺客残害我们的人民.

original: Their sanctuary in Falkreath lies in ruin, its killers scattered to the wind. Let every Nord know:
string: 他们在佛克瑞斯的庇护所已化为废墟，行凶者四散无踪.让每个诺德人都知晓:

original: when danger comes for our kin, the Nords raise up to destroy it!
string: 当危险降临到我们的族人身上时，诺德人必将奋起将其摧毁！

original: Hear ye, hear ye! The Dawnguard are reforming!
string: 大家听好了，听好了！黎明守卫正在重组！

original: The famous group of vampire hunters of the Second Era are being established again to fight against the vampires.
string: 第二纪元著名的吸血鬼猎人团体正在重新组建，以对抗吸血鬼.

original: The vampires grow bolder by the day and it's time for Skyrim to fight back.
string: 吸血鬼日益猖獗，是时候让天际奋起反击了.

original: Those interested to join should travel to Fort Dawnguard, in the Dayspring Canyon near Riften.
string: 有意加入者应前往裂谷城附近的黎明峡谷中的黎明守卫堡垒.

original: No prior combat experience is required. Only your courage and your desire to fight back against the vampires are required.
string: 无需任何战斗经验，只需你的勇气和对抗吸血鬼的决心.

original: Citizens of Skyrim! The Dawnguard seeks new recruits with strong hearts and steady hands!
string: 天际的公民们！黎明守卫正在招募意志坚定，身手稳健的新成员！

original: The vampire menace grows bold: no farmstead, no hold and no family is safe from their bloodthirsty fangs.
string: 吸血鬼的威胁日益猖獗:无论是农庄，领地还是家庭，都无法幸免于他们嗜血的獠牙.

original: Join the Dawnguard today! Apply in their fortress beyond Riften at the far South East of Skyrim and take up arms in defense of Skyrim's people.
string: 今天就加入黎明守卫吧！前往天际东南边境，裂谷城之外的堡垒申请加入，拿起武器，为保卫天际的人民而战.

original: Stand in the light, and drive back the creatures of the night!
string: 站在光明之中，驱退黑夜的造物！

original: Listen up people of Skyrim!
string: 天际的子民们，听好了！

original: The Dawnguard is back in business and they're hunting vampires! The vampires have gone too far and need to be eliminated.
string: 黎明守卫重出江湖，他们正在猎杀吸血鬼！吸血鬼们做得太过分了，必须被消灭.

original: If you've got the guts and know which end of a crossbow to point, head to their fort in Dayspring Canyon.
string: 如果你有胆量，并且知道弩箭该指向哪一端，就去他们在黎明峡谷的堡垒吧.

original: Good coin, good cause, and a chance to put a bolt through a bloodsucker's heart!
string: 丰厚的报酬，正义的事业，还有机会将弩箭射进吸血鬼的心脏！

original: Sons and daughters of Skyrim! The night grows dangerous as vampires spread their curse across our land.
string: 天际的儿女们！随着吸血鬼将他们的诅咒散布在我们的土地上，夜晚正变得愈发危险.

original: The Dawnguard calls for warriors who will not bow to fear.
string: 黎明守卫召唤那些不向恐惧低头的战士.

original: Take the fight to the leeches in their lairs! Join at Fort Dawnguard, and let the night creatures know the strength of the Nords!
string: 直捣吸血鬼的巢穴！加入黎明守卫堡垒，让夜行生物见识诺德人的力量！

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Citizens of Skyrim, be warned. Reports of vampire attacks are on the rise across Skyrim!
string: 听好了，听好了！天际的公民们，请注意.据报告，吸血鬼袭击事件在整个天际正日益增多！

original: From the Reach to the Rift, travelers vanish, livestock is found drained, and families are struck in their own homes.
string: 从瑞驰到裂痕领，旅人失踪，牲畜被吸干血液，家庭在自己的家中遇袭.

original: The Jarl urges all to remain indoors after nightfall, travel in groups, and report any pale strangers or strange lights in the wilds.
string: 领主敦促所有人天黑后留在室内，结伴出行，并报告任何在荒野中出现的苍白陌生人或奇异光芒.

original: May The Divines watch over us and protect us from harm.
string: 愿众神眷顾我们，护佑我们免受伤害.

original: People of Skyrim! The night grows dangerous. Vampire attacks have been reported in every hold.
string: 天际的人民！夜晚正变得愈发危险.据报，每个领地都发生了吸血鬼袭击事件.

original: Guard your doors, keep your hearths lit, and do not walk alone after sundown. Stay indoors after nightfall.
string: 紧闭门户，保持炉火通明，日落后切勿独行.入夜后请留在家中.

original: The Jarl's guard will patrol the streets, but every citizen must stand watch for their kin and neighbors.
string: 领主的卫兵会在街道巡逻，但每位公民都必须为自己的亲人和邻里守望相助.

original: If you see signs of the curse, speak to the guards at once. Together, we will keep the city safe.
string: 若发现诅咒迹象，请立即告知守卫.我们齐心协力，方能守护城市安宁.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! The Dawnguard are reforming!
string: 大家听好了，听好了！黎明守卫正在重组！

original: The famous group of vampire hunters of the Second Era are being established again to fight against the vampires.
string: 第二纪元著名的吸血鬼猎人团体正在重新组建，以对抗吸血鬼.

original: The vampires grow bolder by the day and it's time for Skyrim to fight back.
string: 吸血鬼日益猖獗，是时候让天际奋起反击了.

original: Those interested to join should travel to Fort Dawnguard, in the Dayspring Canyon near Riften.
string: 有意加入者应前往裂谷城附近的黎明峡谷中的黎明守卫堡垒.

original: No prior combat experience is required. Only your courage and your desire to fight back against the vampires are required.
string: 无需任何战斗经验，只需你的勇气和对抗吸血鬼的决心.

original: Citizens of Skyrim! The Dawnguard seeks new recruits with strong hearts and steady hands!
string: 天际的公民们！黎明守卫正在招募意志坚定，身手稳健的新成员！

original: The vampire menace grows bold: no farmstead, no hold and no family is safe from their bloodthirsty fangs.
string: 吸血鬼的威胁日益猖獗:无论是农庄，领地还是家庭，都无法幸免于他们嗜血的獠牙.

original: Join the Dawnguard today! Apply in their fortress beyond Riften at the far South East of Skyrim and take up arms in defense of Skyrim's people.
string: 今天就加入黎明守卫吧！前往天际东南边境，裂谷城之外的堡垒申请加入，拿起武器，为保卫天际的人民而战.

original: Stand in the light, and drive back the creatures of the night!
string: 站在光明之中，驱退黑夜的造物！

original: Listen up people of Skyrim!
string: 天际的子民们，听好了！

original: The Dawnguard is back in business and they're hunting vampires! The vampires have gone too far and need to be eliminated.
string: 黎明守卫重出江湖，他们正在猎杀吸血鬼！吸血鬼们做得太过分了，必须被消灭.

original: If you've got the guts and know which end of a crossbow to point, head to their fort in Dayspring Canyon.
string: 如果你有胆量，并且知道弩箭该指向哪一端，就去他们在黎明峡谷的堡垒吧.

original: Good coin, good cause, and a chance to put a bolt through a bloodsucker's heart!
string: 丰厚的报酬，正义的事业，还有机会将弩箭射进吸血鬼的心脏！

original: Sons and daughters of Skyrim! The night grows dangerous as vampires spread their curse across our land.
string: 天际的儿女们！随着吸血鬼将他们的诅咒散布在我们的土地上，夜晚正变得愈发危险.

original: The Dawnguard calls for warriors who will not bow to fear.
string: 黎明守卫召唤那些不向恐惧低头的战士.

original: Take the fight to the leeches in their lairs! Join at Fort Dawnguard, and let the night creatures know the strength of the Nords!
string: 直捣吸血鬼的巢穴！加入黎明守卫堡垒，让夜行生物见识诺德人的力量！

original: Hear ye, hear ye! Citizens of Skyrim, be warned. Reports of vampire attacks are on the rise across Skyrim!
string: 听好了，听好了！天际的公民们，请注意.据报告，吸血鬼袭击事件在整个天际正日益增多！

original: From the Reach to the Rift, travelers vanish, livestock is found drained, and families are struck in their own homes.
string: 从瑞驰到裂痕领，旅人失踪，牲畜被吸干血液，家庭在自己的家中遇袭.

original: The Jarl urges all to remain indoors after nightfall, travel in groups, and report any pale strangers or strange lights in the wilds.
string: 领主敦促所有人天黑后留在室内，结伴出行，并报告任何在荒野中出现的苍白陌生人或奇异光芒.

original: May The Divines watch over us and protect us from harm.
string: 愿众神眷顾我们，护佑我们免受伤害.

original: People of Skyrim! The night grows dangerous. Vampire attacks have been reported in every hold.
string: 天际的人民！夜晚正变得愈发危险.据报，每个领地都发生了吸血鬼袭击事件.

original: Guard your doors, keep your hearths lit, and do not walk alone after sundown. Stay indoors after nightfall.
string: 紧闭门户，保持炉火通明，日落后切勿独行.入夜后请留在家中.

original: The Jarl's guard will patrol the streets, but every citizen must stand watch for their kin and neighbors.
string: 领主的卫兵会在街道巡逻，但每位公民都必须为自己的亲人和邻里守望相助.

original: If you see signs of the curse, speak to the guards at once. Together, we will keep the city safe.
string: 若发现诅咒迹象，请立即告知守卫.我们齐心协力，方能守护城市安宁.

original: Hear ye, hear ye! The Dawnguard are reforming!
string: 大家听好了，听好了！黎明守卫正在重组！

original: The famous group of vampire hunters of the Second Era are being established again to fight against the vampires.
string: 第二纪元著名的吸血鬼猎人团体正在重新组建，以对抗吸血鬼.

original: The vampires grow bolder by the day and it's time for Skyrim to fight back.
